  7202                                  		;mov	byte [SYSINIT+toomanydrivesflag],1
  7203                                  dmax_ok:				
  7204 0000227F C3                      		retn
  7205                                  
  7206                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
  7207                                  
  7208                                  ; 18/10/2022
  7209                                  ; 15/10/2022
  7210                                  ; 28/12/2018 - Retro DOS v4.0						
  7211                                  ;								 
  7212                                  ;	link next bds (at ds:di) into the chain. assume that the
  7213                                  ;	  chain is entirely within ds == datagrp. also update drvmax,
  7214                                  ;	  dskdrv_table, and end_of_bdss.	
  7215                                  
  7216                                  xinstall_bds:		
  7217 00002280 56                      		push	si
  7218 00002281 53                      		push	bx
  7219 00002282 8B36[1901]              		mov	si, [start_bds]	; get first bds
  7220                                  xinstall_bds_1:				
  7221 00002286 833CFF                  		cmp	word [si], 0FFFFh ; is this the last one?
  7222 00002289 7404                    		jz	short xinstall_bds_2 ;	skip ahead if so
  7223                                  		;mov	si, [si+BDS.link]
  7224 0000228B 8B34                    		mov	si, [si]	; chain	through	list
  7225 0000228D EBF7                    		jmp	short xinstall_bds_1
  7226                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  7227                                  
  7228                                  xinstall_bds_2:				
  7229                                  		;mov	[si+BDS.link], di
  7230 0000228F 893C                    		mov	[si], di
  7231                                  		;mov	[si+BDS.link+2], ds
  7232 00002291 8C5C02                  		mov	[si+2], ds
  7233                                  		;mov	word [di+BDS.link], -1
  7234 00002294 C705FFFF                		mov	word [di], 0FFFFh ; make sure it is a null ptr.
  7235                                  		;mov	[di+BDS.link+2], ds
  7236 00002298 8C5D02                  		mov	[di+2], ds ; might as well plug segment
  7237                                  		; 20/03/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
  7238                                  		;lea	bx, [di+BDS.BPB]
  7239 0000229B 8D5D06                  		lea	bx, [di+6]
  7240 0000229E 8B36[5217]              		mov	si, [last_dskdrv_table]
  7241 000022A2 891C                    		mov	[si], bx
  7242 000022A4 8306[5217]02            		add	word [last_dskdrv_table], 2
  7243 000022A9 FE06[7500]              		inc	byte [drvmax]
  7244 000022AD 8306[5417]64            		add	word [end_of_bdss], 100 ; BDS.size = 100
  7245 000022B2 5B                      		pop	bx
  7246 000022B3 5E                      		pop	si
  7247 000022B4 C3                      		retn
  7248                                  
  7249                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
  7250                                  
  7251                                  ; 17/10/2022
  7252                                  ; 15/10/2022
  7253                                  ; 28/12/2018 - Retro DOS v4.0
  7254                                  ; 03/06/2018 - Retro DOS v3.0
  7255                                  
  7256                                  cmos_clock_read:	
  7257 000022B5 50                      		push	ax
  7258 000022B6 51                      		push	cx
  7259 000022B7 52                      		push	dx
  7260 000022B8 55                      		push	bp
  7261 000022B9 31ED                    		xor	bp, bp
  7262                                  loop_clock:				
  7263 000022BB 31C9                    		xor	cx, cx
  7264 000022BD 31D2                    		xor	dx, dx
  7265 000022BF B402                    		mov	ah, 2
  7266 000022C1 CD1A                    		int	1Ah		; CLOCK	- READ REAL TIME CLOCK (AT,XT286,CONV,PS)
  7267                                  					; Return: CH = hours in	BCD
  7268                                  					; CL = minutes in BCD
  7269                                  					; DH = seconds in BCD
  7270 000022C3 83F900                  		cmp	cx, 0
  7271 000022C6 7512                    		jnz	short clock_present
  7272 000022C8 83FA00                  		cmp	dx, 0
  7273 000022CB 750D                    		jnz	short clock_present
  7274 000022CD 83FD01                  		cmp	bp, 1		; read again after a slight delay, in case clock
  7275 000022D0 741C                    		jz	short no_readdate ; was	at zero	setting.
  7276 000022D2 45                      		inc	bp		; only perform delay once.
  7277 000022D3 B90040                  		mov	cx, 4000h	; 16384
  7278                                  delay:					
  7279 000022D6 E2FE                    		loop	delay
  7280 000022D8 EBE1                    		jmp	short loop_clock
  7281                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  7282                                  
  7283                                  clock_present:				
  7284 000022DA 2EC606[F304]01          		mov	byte [cs:havecmosclock], 1 ; set the flag for cmos clock
  7285 000022E0 E81000                  		call	cmosck		; reset	cmos clock rate	that may be
  7286                                  					; possibly destroyed by	cp dos and
  7287                                  					; post routine did not restore that.
  7288 000022E3 56                      		push	si
  7289 000022E4 E842F2                  		call	read_real_date	; read real-time clock for date
  7290 000022E7 FA                      		cli
  7291                                  		;mov	ds:daycnt, si	; set system date
  7292 000022E8 8936[F004]              		mov	[daycnt], si
  7293 000022EC FB                      		sti
  7294 000022ED 5E                      		pop	si
  7295                                  
  7296                                  no_readdate:				
  7297 000022EE 5D                      		pop	bp
  7298 000022EF 5A                      		pop	dx
  7299 000022F0 59                      		pop	cx
  7300 000022F1 58                      		pop	ax
  7301 000022F2 C3                      		retn
  7302                                  
  7303                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  7304                                  
  7305                                  ; the following code is written by jack gulley in engineering group.
  7306                                  ; cp dos (CP/DOS, OS/2) is changing cmos clock rate for its own purposes
  7307                                  ; and if the use cold boot the system to use pc dos while running cp dos,
  7308                                  ; the cmos clock rate are still slow which slow down disk operations
  7309                                  ; of pc dos which uses cmos clock. pc dos is put this code in msinit
  7310                                  ; to fix this problem at the request of cp dos.
  7311                                  ;
  7312                                  ; the program is modified to be run on msinit. equates are defined
  7313                                  ; in cmosequ.inc. this program will be called by cmos_clock_read procedure.
  7314                                  ;
  7315                                  ;  the following code cmosck is used to insure that the cmos has not
  7316                                  ;	had its rate controls left in an invalid state on older at's.
  7317                                  ;
  7318                                  ;	it checks for an at model byte "fc" with a submodel type of
  7319                                  ;	00, 01, 02, 03 or 06 and resets the periodic interrupt rate
  7320                                  ;	bits in case post has not done it. this initilization routine
  7321                                  ;	is only needed once when dos loads. it should be run as soon
  7322                                  ;	as possible to prevent slow diskette access.
  7323                                  ;
  7324                                  ;	this code exposes one to dos clearing cmos setup done by a
  7325                                  ;	resident program that hides and re-boots the system.
  7326                                  
  7327                                  cmosck:					; check and reset rtc rate bits	
  7328                                  
  7329                                  ;model byte and submodel byte were already determined in msinit.
  7330                                  
  7331                                  	; 16/06/2018 - Retro DOS v3.0
  7332                                  	; 19/03/2018 (Model: 0FCh, Sub Model: 01h, REF: AMIBIOS Prog. Guide)
  7333                                  			
  7334 000022F3 50                      		push	ax
  7335 000022F4 2E803E[3E06]FC          		cmp	byte [cs:model_byte], 0FCh
  7336 000022FA 7525                    		jnz	short cmosck9	; Exit if not an AT model
  7337 000022FC 2E803E[3F06]06          		cmp	byte [cs:secondary_model_byte], 6
  7338                                  					; Is it 06 for the industral AT ?
  7339 00002302 7408                    		jz	short cmosck4	; Go reset CMOS	periodic rate if 06
  7340 00002304 2E803E[3F06]04          		cmp	byte [cs:secondary_model_byte], 4
  7341                                  					; Is it 00, 01, 02, or 03 ?
  7342 0000230A 7315                    		jnb	short cmosck9	; EXIT if problem fixed by POST  
  7343                                  					; Also,Secondary_model_byte = 0 
  7344                                  					;   when AH=0C0h, int 15h failed.
  7345                                  					;	RESET THE CMOS PERIODIC RATE 
  7346                                  					;  Model=FC submodel=00,01,02,03 or 06 
  7347                                  cmosck4:				
  7348 0000230C B08A                    		mov	al, 8Ah		; cmos_reg_a|nmi
  7349                                  					; NMI disabled on return
  7350 0000230E B426                    		mov	ah, 26h		; 00100110b
  7351                                  					; Set divider &	rate selection
  7352 00002310 E83000                  		call	cmos_write
  7353 00002313 B08B                    		mov	al, 8Bh		; cmos_reg_b|nmi
  7354                                  					; NMI disabled on return
  7355 00002315 E80B00                  		call	cmos_read
  7356 00002318 2407                    		and	al, 7		; 00000111b
  7357                                  					; clear	SET,PIE,AIE,UIE,SQWE
  7358 0000231A 88C4                    		mov	ah, al
  7359 0000231C B00B                    		mov	al, 0Bh		; cmos_reg_b
  7360                                  					; NMI enabled on return
  7361 0000231E E82200                  		call	cmos_write
  7362                                  cmosck9:				
  7363 00002321 58                      		pop	ax
  7364 00002322 C3                      		retn
  7365                                  
  7366                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
  7367                                  
  7368                                  ;--- CMOS_READ -----------------------------------------------------------------
  7369                                  ;		read byte from cmos system clock configuration table	       :
  7370                                  ;									       :
  7371                                  ; input: (al)=	cmos table address to be read				       :
  7372                                  ;		bit    7 = 0 for nmi enabled and 1 for nmi disabled on exit    :
  7373                                  ;		bits 6-0 = address of table location to read		       :
  7374                                  ;									       :
  7375                                  ; output: (al)	value at location (al) moved into (al). if bit 7 of (al) was   :
  7376                                  ;		on then nmi left disabled.  during the cmos read both nmi and  :
  7377                                  ;		normal interrupts are disabled to protect cmos data integrity. :
  7378                                  ;		the cmos address register is pointed to a default value and    :
  7379                                  ;		the interrupt flag restored to the entry state on return.      :
  7380                                  ;		only the (al) register and the nmi state is changed.	       :
  7381                                  ;-------------------------------------------------------------------------------
  7382                                  
  7383                                  cmos_read:				; read location (al) into (al)	
  7384 00002323 9C                      		pushf
  7385 00002324 FA                      		cli
  7386 00002325 53                      		push	bx
  7387 00002326 50                      		push	ax		; AL = cmos table address to be	read
  7388 00002327 0C80                    		or	al, 80h
  7389 00002329 E670                    		out	70h, al		; CMOS Memory/RTC Index	Register:
  7390                                  					; RTC Seconds
  7391 0000232B 90                      		nop			; (undocumented	delay needed)
  7392 0000232C E471                    		in	al, 71h		; CMOS Memory/RTC Data Register
  7393 0000232E 89C3                    		mov	bx, ax
  7394 00002330 58                      		pop	ax
  7395 00002331 2480                    		and	al, 80h
  7396 00002333 0C0F                    		or	al, 0Fh
  7397 00002335 E670                    		out	70h, al		; CMOS Memory/RTC Index	Register:
  7398                                  					; RTC Seconds
  7399 00002337 90                      		nop
  7400 00002338 E471                    		in	al, 71h		; CMOS Memory/RTC Data Register
  7401 0000233A 89D8                    		mov	ax, bx
  7402 0000233C 5B                      		pop	bx
  7403 0000233D 0E                      		push	cs		; *place code segment in stack and
  7404 0000233E E80100                  		call	cmos_popf	; *handle popf for b- level 80286
  7405 00002341 C3                      		retn			; return with flags restored
  7406                                  
  7407                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  7408                                  
  7409                                  cmos_popf:				
  7410 00002342 CF                      		iret			; popf for level b- parts
  7411                                  					; return far and restore flags
  7412                                  
  7413                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
  7414                                  
  7415                                  ;--- cmos_write ----------------------------------------------------------------
  7416                                  ;		write byte to cmos system clock configuration table	       :
  7417                                  ;									       :
  7418                                  ; input: (al)=	cmos table address to be written to			       :
  7419                                  ;		bit    7 = 0 for nmi enabled and 1 for nmi disabled on exit    :
  7420                                  ;		bits 6-0 = address of table location to write		       :
  7421                                  ;	 (ah)=	new value to be placed in the addressed table location	       :
  7422                                  ;									       :
  7423                                  ; output:	value in (ah) placed in location (al) with nmi left disabled   :
  7424                                  ;		if bit 7 of (al) is on. during the cmos update both nmi and    :
  7425                                  ;		normal interrupts are disabled to protect cmos data integrity. :
  7426                                  ;		the cmos address register is pointed to a default value and    :
  7427                                  ;		the interrupt flag restored to the entry state on return.      :
  7428                                  ;		only the cmos location and the nmi state is changed.	       :
  7429                                  ;-------------------------------------------------------------------------------
  7430                                  
  7431                                  cmos_write:				; write (ah) to location (al)	
  7432 00002343 9C                      		pushf			; write (ah) to location (al)
  7433 00002344 50                      		push	ax		; save work register values
  7434 00002345 FA                      		cli
  7435 00002346 50                      		push	ax		; save user nmi	state
  7436 00002347 0C80                    		or	al, 80h		; disable nmi for us
  7437 00002349 E670                    		out	70h, al		; CMOS Memory/RTC Index	Register:
  7438                                  					; RTC Seconds
  7439 0000234B 90                      		nop
  7440 0000234C 88E0                    		mov	al, ah
  7441 0000234E E671                    		out	71h, al		; CMOS Memory/RTC Data Register
  7442 00002350 58                      		pop	ax		; get user nmi
  7443 00002351 2480                    		and	al, 80h
  7444 00002353 0C0F                    		or	al, 0Fh
  7445 00002355 E670                    		out	70h, al		; CMOS Memory/RTC Index	Register:
  7446                                  					; RTC Seconds
  7447 00002357 90                      		nop
  7448 00002358 E471                    		in	al, 71h		; CMOS Memory/RTC Data Register
  7449 0000235A 58                      		pop	ax		; restore work registers
  7450 0000235B 0E                      		push	cs		; *place code segment in stack and
  7451 0000235C E8E3FF                  		call	cmos_popf	; *handle popf for b- level 80286
  7452 0000235F C3                      		retn
  7453                                  
  7454                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  7455                                  ; MSINIT.ASM (MSDOS 6.0, 1991)
  7456                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  7457                                  ; The following routines provide support for reading in the file MSDOS.SYS.
  7458                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  7459                                  
  7460                                  ; 15/10/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)
  7461                                  ;
  7462                                  ; (For Retro DOS, 'IO.SYS' and 'MSDOS.SYS' are already loaded together
  7463                                  ;  at once -as single kernel file- by the Retro DOS boot sector code.
  7464                                  ;  So, following disk reads -MSDOS.SYS loading- is not needed!
  7465                                  ;  Only needing is to move MSDOS Kernel to it's final memory location.) 
  7466                                  
  7467                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
  7468                                  
  7469                                  ; GetClus, read in a cluster at a specified address
  7470                                  ;
  7471                                  ;  bx = cluster to read
  7472                                  ;  cx = sectors per cluster
  7473                                  ;  es:di = load location
  7474                                  
  7475                                  ; 17/10/2022
  7476                                  ;DISKRD equ diskrd - DOSBIOSEG_2C7h	; (8E5h for MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)
  7477                                  ; 09/12/2022
  7478                                  DISKRD equ diskrd
  7479                                  
  7480                                  		; 17/10/2022
  7481                                  getclus:				
  7482 00002360 51                      		push	cx
  7483 00002361 57                      		push	di
  7484 00002362 2E890E[D016]            		mov	[cs:doscnt], cx
  7485 00002367 89D8                    		mov	ax, bx
  7486 00002369 48                      		dec	ax
  7487 0000236A 48                      		dec	ax
  7488 0000236B F7E1                    		mul	cx		; convert to logical sector
  7489                                  					; dx:ax	= matching logical sector number
  7490                                  					;	  starting from the data sector
  7491 0000236D 2E0306[CC16]            		add	ax, [cs:bios_l]
  7492 00002372 2E1316[CE16]            		adc	dx, [cs:bios_h]	; dx:ax	= first	logical	sector to read
  7493                                  unpack:					
  7494 00002377 1E                      		push	ds
  7495 00002378 50                      		push	ax
  7496 00002379 53                      		push	bx
  7497 0000237A 2E8B36[D316]            		mov	si, [cs:fatloc]
  7498 0000237F 8EDE                    		mov	ds, si
  7499 00002381 89DE                    		mov	si, bx		; next cluster
  7500 00002383 2EF606[D216]40          		test	byte [cs:fbigfat], 40h	; fbig
  7501                                  					; 16 bit fat?
  7502 00002389 753C                    		jnz	short unpack16	; yes
  7503 0000238B D1EE                    		shr	si, 1		; 12 bit fat. si=si/2
  7504                                  					; si = clus + clus/2
  7505 0000238D 01DE                    		add	si, bx		;
  7506                                  					; (si =	byte offset of the cluster in the FAT)
  7507 0000238F 52                      		push	dx
  7508 00002390 31D2                    		xor	dx, dx
  7509 00002392 E87C00                  		call	get_fat_sector
  7510 00002395 5A                      		pop	dx
  7511 00002396 8B07                    		mov	ax, [bx]	; save it into ax
  7512 00002398 7517                    		jnz	short even_odd	; if not a splitted fat, check even-odd.
  7513                                  		; 25/06/2023
  7514                                  		;mov	al, [bx]	; splitted fat
  7515 0000239A 2EA2[DA16]              		mov	[cs:temp_cluster], al
  7516 0000239E 46                      		inc	si		; (next	byte)
  7517 0000239F 52                      		push	dx
  7518 000023A0 31D2                    		xor	dx, dx
  7519 000023A2 E86C00                  		call	get_fat_sector
  7520 000023A5 5A                      		pop	dx
  7521                                  		;mov	al, ds:0
  7522 000023A6 A00000                  		mov	al, [0] ; 19/10/2022
  7523 000023A9 2EA2[DB16]              		mov	[cs:temp_cluster+1], al
  7524 000023AD 2EA1[DA16]              		mov	ax, [cs:temp_cluster]
  7525                                  even_odd:				
  7526 000023B1 5B                      		pop	bx		; restore old fat entry	value
  7527 000023B2 53                      		push	bx		; save it right	away.
  7528 000023B3 D1EB                    		shr	bx, 1		; was it even or odd?
  7529 000023B5 7308                    		jnb	short havclus	; it was even.
  7530 000023B7 D1E8                    		shr	ax, 1		; odd. massage fat value and keep
  7531                                  					; the highest 12 bits.
  7532 000023B9 D1E8                    		shr	ax, 1
  7533 000023BB D1E8                    		shr	ax, 1
  7534 000023BD D1E8                    		shr	ax, 1
  7535                                  havclus:				
  7536 000023BF 89C3                    		mov	bx, ax		; now bx = new fat entry.
  7537 000023C1 81E3FF0F                		and	bx, 0FFFh	; keep low 12 bits.
  7538 000023C5 EB0E                    		jmp	short unpackx
  7539                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  7540                                  
  7541                                  unpack16:				
  7542 000023C7 52                      		push	dx
  7543 000023C8 31D2                    		xor	dx, dx
  7544 000023CA D1E6                    		shl	si, 1		; extend to 32 bit offset
  7545 000023CC 83D200                  		adc	dx, 0
  7546 000023CF E83F00                  		call	get_fat_sector
  7547 000023D2 5A                      		pop	dx
  7548 000023D3 8B1F                    		mov	bx, [bx]	;
  7549                                  					; bx = new fat entry.
  7550                                  unpackx:				
  7551 000023D5 5E                      		pop	si		; restore old bx value into si
  7552 000023D6 58                      		pop	ax		; restore logical sector (low)
  7553 000023D7 1F                      		pop	ds
  7554 000023D8 29DE                    		sub	si, bx
  7555 000023DA 83FEFF                  		cmp	si, -1		; one apart?
  7556 000023DD 7507                    		jnz	short getcl2
  7557 000023DF 2E010E[D016]            		add	[cs:doscnt], cx
  7558 000023E4 EB91                    		jmp	short unpack
  7559                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  7560                                  
  7561                                  getcl2:					
  7562 000023E6 53                      		push	bx
  7563 000023E7 52                      		push	dx		; sector to read (high)
  7564 000023E8 50                      		push	ax		; sector to read (low)
  7565 000023E9 2EA1[CA16]              		mov	ax, [cs:drvfat]	; get drive and	fat spec
  7566 000023ED 2E8B0E[D016]            		mov	cx, [cs:doscnt]
  7567 000023F2 5A                      		pop	dx		; sector to read for diskrd (low)
  7568 000023F3 2E8F06[2B05]            		pop	word [cs:start_sec_h]
  7569                                  					; sector to read for diskrd (high)
  7570 000023F8 1E                      		push	ds
  7571 000023F9 0E                      		push	cs
  7572 000023FA 1F                      		pop	ds
  7573 000023FB 0E                      		push	cs		; simulate far call
  7574                                  		; 17/10/2022
  7575 000023FC BD[C408]                		mov	bp, DISKRD	; 8E5h
  7576                                  		;mov	bp, 8E5h	; offset diskrd
  7577                                  					; 2C7h:8E5h = 70h:2E55h
  7578 000023FF E863F3                  		call	call_bios_code	; read the clusters
  7579 00002402 1F                      		pop	ds
  7580 00002403 5B                      		pop	bx
  7581 00002404 5F                      		pop	di
  7582 00002405 2EA1[D016]              		mov	ax, [cs:doscnt]	; get number of	sectors	read
  7583 00002409 86E0                    		xchg	ah, al		; multiply by 256
  7584 0000240B D1E0                    		shl	ax, 1		; times	2 equal	512
  7585 0000240D 01C7                    		add	di, ax		; update load location
  7586 0000240F 59                      		pop	cx		; restore sectors/cluster
  7587 00002410 C3                      		retn
  7588                                  
  7589                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
  7590                                  
  7591                                  
  7592                                  ;function: find and read the corresponding fat sector into ds:0
  7593                                  ;
  7594                                  ;in). dx:si - offset value (starting from fat entry 0) of fat entry to find. M054
  7595                                  ;     ds - fatloc segment
  7596                                  ;     cs:drvfat - logical drive number, fat id
  7597                                  ;     cs:md_sectorsize
  7598                                  ;     cs:last_fat_secnum - last fat sector number read in.
  7599                                  ;
  7600                                  ;out). corresponding fat sector read in.
  7601                                  ;      bx = offset value from fatlog segment.
  7602                                  ;      other registera saved.
  7603                                  ;      zero flag set if the fat entry is splitted, i.e., when 12 bit fat entry
  7604                                  ;      starts at the last byte of the fat sector. in this case, the caller
  7605                                  ;      should save this byte, and read the next fat sector to get the rest
  7606                                  ;      of the fat entry value. (this will only happen with the 12 bit fat.)
  7607                                  
  7608                                  		; 17/10/2022
  7609                                  get_fat_sector:	
  7610 00002411 50                      		push	ax
  7611 00002412 51                      		push	cx
  7612 00002413 57                      		push	di
  7613 00002414 56                      		push	si
  7614 00002415 06                      		push	es
  7615 00002416 1E                      		push	ds
  7616 00002417 89F0                    		mov	ax, si
  7617 00002419 2E8B0E[D816]            		mov	cx, [cs:md_sectorsize] ; 512
  7618 0000241E F7F1                    		div	cx		; ax = sector number, dx = offset
  7619 00002420 90                      		nop
  7620                                  
  7621                                  		; Get rid of the assumption that
  7622                                  		; there	is only	one reserved sector
  7623                                  
  7624 00002421 06                      		push	es
  7625 00002422 1E                      		push	ds
  7626 00002423 57                      		push	di
  7627 00002424 50                      		push	ax
  7628 00002425 0E                      		push	cs
  7629 00002426 1F                      		pop	ds
  7630                                  
  7631 00002427 2EA1[CA16]              		mov	ax, [cs:drvfat]	; get drive # and FAT id
  7632 0000242B BD[CB04]                		mov	bp, SETDRIVE
  7633                                  		;mov	bp, 4D7h	; setdrive
  7634                                  					; at 2C7h:4D7h = 70h:2A47h
  7635 0000242E 0E                      		push	cs		; simulate far call
  7636 0000242F E833F3                  		call	call_bios_code	; get bds for drive
  7637 00002432 58                      		pop	ax		; (sector number -without reserved and hidden sectors-)
  7638 00002433 26034509                		add	ax, [es:di+9]	; [es:di+BDS.resectors]
  7639                                  					; add #reserved_sectors
  7640 00002437 5F                      		pop	di
  7641 00002438 1F                      		pop	ds
  7642 00002439 07                      		pop	es
  7643 0000243A 2E3B06[DC16]            		cmp	ax, [cs:last_fat_sec_num]
  7644 0000243F 742A                    		jz	short gfs_split_chk ; don't need to read it again.
  7645 00002441 2EA3[DC16]              		mov	[cs:last_fat_sec_num], ax 
  7646                                  					; sector number
  7647                                  					; (in the partition, without hidden sectors)
  7648 00002445 52                      		push	dx
  7649 00002446 2EC706[2B05]0000        		mov	word [cs:start_sec_h], 0 
  7650                                  					; prepare to read the fat sector
  7651                                  					; start_sec_h is always	0 for fat sector.
  7652 0000244D 89C2                    		mov	dx, ax
  7653 0000244F B90100                  		mov	cx, 1		; 1 sector read
  7654 00002452 2EA1[CA16]              		mov	ax, [cs:drvfat]
  7655 00002456 1E                      		push	ds
  7656 00002457 07                      		pop	es
  7657 00002458 31FF                    		xor	di, di		; es:di	-> fatloc segment:0
  7658 0000245A 1E                      		push	ds
  7659 0000245B 0E                      		push	cs
  7660 0000245C 1F                      		pop	ds
  7661 0000245D 0E                      		push	cs		; simulate far call
  7662 0000245E BD[C408]                		mov	bp, DISKRD	; 8E5h
  7663                                  		;mov	bp, 8E5h	; offset diskrd
  7664                                  					; 2C7h:8E5h = 70h:2E55h
  7665 00002461 E801F3                  		call	call_bios_code
  7666 00002464 1F                      		pop	ds
  7667 00002465 5A                      		pop	dx
  7668 00002466 2E8B0E[D816]            		mov	cx, [cs:md_sectorsize] ; 512
  7669                                  
  7670                                  gfs_split_chk:				
  7671 0000246B 49                      		dec	cx		; 511
  7672 0000246C 39CA                    		cmp	dx, cx		; if offset points to the
  7673                                  					; last byte of this sector,
  7674                                  					; then splitted	entry.
  7675 0000246E 89D3                    		mov	bx, dx		; set bx to dx
  7676 00002470 1F                      		pop	ds
  7677 00002471 07                      		pop	es
  7678 00002472 5E                      		pop	si
  7679 00002473 5F                      		pop	di
  7680 00002474 59                      		pop	cx
  7681 00002475 58                      		pop	ax
  7682 00002476 C3                      		retn
  7683                                  
  7684                                  ; 15/10/2022
  7685                                  ;Bios_Data_Init	ends
  7686                                  
  7687                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  7688                                  
  7689                                  		; 09/12/2022
  7690                                  		;db 0
  7691                                  
  7692                                  numbertodiv	equ ($-BData_start)
  7693                                  numbertomod	equ (numbertodiv % 16)
  7694                                  
  7695                                  %if numbertomod>0 & numbertomod<16
  7696 00002477 00<rep 9h>              		times (16-numbertomod) db 0
  7697                                  %endif
  7698                                  
  7699                                  ;align 16
  7700                                  
  7701                                  ; 09/12/2022
  7702                                  IOSYSCODESEGOFF	equ $ - BData_start
  7703                                  IOSYSCODESEG	equ (IOSYSCODESEGOFF>>4)+(700h>>4)
  7704                                  
  7705                                  ;--- End of DOSBIOS data segment --------------------------------------------
  7706                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  7707                                  		;db 4 dup(0)
  7708                                  ; 09/12/2022		
  7709                                  ;		times 4 db 0	; 19/10/2022
  7710                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  7711                                  
  7712                                  ;============================================================================
  7713                                  ; DOS BIOS (IO.SYS) CODE SEGMENT 
  7714                                  ;============================================================================
  7715                                  ; 09/12/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)
  7716                                  
  7717                                  section .BIOSCODE vstart=0  
  7718                                  
  7719                                  BCode_start:	 ; 09/12/2022
  7720                                   
  7721                                  ; 02/10/2022
  7722                                  
  7723                                  ;--- DOSBIOS code segment ---------------------------------------------------
  7724                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
  7725                                  ; MSBIO1.ASM (MSDOS 6.0, 1991)
  7726                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
  7727                                  
  7728                                  DOSBIOSEG_2C7h:	;db 30h dup(0)		; SEGMENT 2C7h (2C70h-700h=2570h)
  7729 00000000 00<rep 30h>             		times 48 db 0		; 19/10/2022	
  7730 00000030 7000                    BiosDataWord:	dw 70h
  7731                                  
  7732                                  ; 15/10/2022
  7733                                  ;BIOSDATAWORD	equ BiosDataWord - DOSBIOSEG_2C7h
  7734                                  ; 09/12/2022
  7735                                  BIOSDATAWORD	equ BiosDataWord
  7736                                  
  7737                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  7738                                  
  7739                                  ; 15/10/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS) 
  7740                                  
  7741                                  ;************************************************************************
  7742                                  ;*									*
  7743                                  ;*	seg_reinit is called with ax = our new code segment value,	*
  7744                                  ;*	  trashes di, cx, es						*
  7745                                  ;*									*
  7746                                  ;*	cas -- should be made disposable!				*
  7747                                  ;*									*
  7748                                  ;************************************************************************
  7749                                  
  7750                                  _seg_reinit:
  7751 00000032 2E8E06[3000]            		mov	es, [cs:BIOSDATAWORD]
  7752                                  					; at 2C7h:30h or 70h:25A0h
  7753                                  		;mov	di, (offset cdev+2)
  7754 00000037 BF[E006]                		mov	di, cdev+2	; 19/10/2022
  7755 0000003A B90400                  		mov	cx, 4		; (end_BC_entries - cdev)/4
  7756                                  
  7757                                  _seg_reinit_1:				
  7758 0000003D AB                      		stosw			; modify Bios_Code entry points
  7759 0000003E 47                      		inc	di
  7760 0000003F 47                      		inc	di
  7761 00000040 E2FB                    		loop	_seg_reinit_1
  7762 00000042 CB                      		retf
  7763                                  
  7764                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  7765                                  
  7766                                  ; 15/10/2022
  7767                                  
  7768                                  ;************************************************************************
  7769                                  ;*									*
  7770                                  ;*	chardev_entry - main device driver dispatch routine		*
  7771                                  ;*	   called with a dummy parameter block on the stack		*
  7772                                  ;*	   dw dispatch_table, dw prn/aux numbers (optional)		*
  7773                                  ;*									*
  7774                                  ;*	will eventually take care of doing the transitions in		*
  7775                                  ;*	   out of Bios_Code						*
  7776                                  ;*									*
  7777                                  ;************************************************************************
  7778                                  
  7779                                  chardev_entry:				; 0070h:25B3h =	02C7h:0043h
  7780 00000043 56                      		push	si
  7781 00000044 50                      		push	ax
  7782 00000045 51                      		push	cx
  7783 00000046 52                      		push	dx
  7784 00000047 57                      		push	di
  7785 00000048 55                      		push	bp
  7786 00000049 1E                      		push	ds
  7787 0000004A 06                      		push	es
  7788 0000004B 53                      		push	bx
  7789 0000004C 89E5                    		mov	bp, sp
  7790 0000004E 8B7612                  		mov	si, [bp+18]	; get return address (dispatch table)
  7791                                  		;;mov	ds, word [cs:0030h]
  7792                                  		;mov	ds, word ptr cs:BIOSDATAWORD ; [cs:0030h]
  7793 00000051 2E8E1E[3000]            		mov	ds, [cs:BIOSDATAWORD] ; 17/10/2022
  7794 00000056 8B4402                  		mov	ax, [si+2]	; get the device number	if present
  7795 00000059 A2[2100]                		mov	[auxnum], al
  7796 0000005C 8826[E704]              		mov	[printdev], ah
  7797 00000060 8B34                    		mov	si, [si]	; point	to the device dispatch table
  7798 00000062 C41E[1200]              		les	bx, [ptrsav]	; get pointer to i/o packet
  7799 00000066 268A4701                		mov	al, [es:bx+1]	; [es:bx+unit]	; al = unit code
  7800 0000006A 268A670D                		mov	ah, [es:bx+13]	; [es:bx+media]	; ah = media descrip
  7801 0000006E 268B4F12                		mov	cx, [es:bx+18]	; [es:bx+count]	; cx = count
  7802 00000072 268B5714                		mov	dx, [es:bx+20]	; [es:bx+start]	; dx = start sector
  7803                                  		; 17/10/2022
  7804 00000076 81FE[9604]              		cmp	si, DSKTBL
  7805                                  		;cmp	si, 4A2h	; dsktbl
  7806                                  					; at 2C7h:4A2h = 70h:2A12h
  7807 0000007A 7517                    		jnz	short no_sector32_mapping
  7808                                  
  7809                                  ; Special case for 32-bit start sector number:
  7810                                  ;   if (si==dsktbl) /* if this is a disk device call */
  7811                                  ;      set high 16 bits of secnum to 0
  7812                                  ;      if (secnum == 0xffff) fetch 32 bit sector number
  7813                                  ;
  7814                                  ; pass high word of sector number in start_sec_h, low word in dx
  7815                                  ;
  7816                                  ; note: start_l and start_h are the offsets within the io_request packet
  7817                                  ;	  which contain the low and hi words of the 32 bit start sector if
  7818                                  ;	  it has been used.
  7819                                  ;
  7820                                  ; note: remember not to destroy the registers which have been set up before
  7821                                  
  7822                                  		;mov	ds:start_sec_h,	0 ; initialize to 0
  7823 0000007C C706[2B05]0000          		mov	word [start_sec_h], 0
  7824 00000082 83FAFF                  		cmp	dx, 0FFFFh
  7825 00000085 750C                    		jnz	short no_sector32_mapping
  7826 00000087 268B571C                		mov	dx, [es:bx+28]	; [es:bx+start_h]
  7827                                  					; 32 bits dsk req
  7828                                  		;mov	ds:start_sec_h,	dx ; start_sec_h = packet.start_h
  7829 0000008B 8916[2B05]              		mov	[start_sec_h], dx
  7830 0000008F 268B571A                		mov	dx, [es:bx+26]	; [es:bx+start_l]
  7831                                  					; dx = packet.start_l
  7832                                  no_sector32_mapping:			
  7833 00000093 97                      		xchg	ax, di
  7834 00000094 268A4702                		mov	al, [es:bx+2]	; [es:bx+cmd]
  7835 00000098 2E3A04                  		cmp	al, cs:[si]
  7836 0000009B 732C                    		jnb	short command_error
  7837 0000009D 98                      		cbw			; note that al <= 15 means ok
  7838 0000009E D1E0                    		shl	ax, 1
  7839 000000A0 01C6                    		add	si, ax
  7840 000000A2 97                      		xchg	ax, di
  7841 000000A3 26C47F0E                		les	di, [es:bx+14]	; [es:bx+trans]
  7842 000000A7 FC                      		cld
  7843                                  		; 17/10/2022
  7844 000000A8 2EFF5401                		call	near [cs:si+1]
  7845                                  		;call	word ptr cs:si+1
  7846 000000AC 7202                    		jb	short already_got_ah_status
  7847 000000AE B401                    		mov	ah, 1
  7848                                  already_got_ah_status:
  7849                                  		;;mov	ds, [cs:0030h]	; 15/10/2022			
  7850                                  		;mov	ds, word ptr cs:BIOSDATAWORD ; [cs:0030h]
  7851                                  					; cas note: shouldn't be needed!
  7852 000000B0 2E8E1E[3000]            		mov	ds, [cs:BIOSDATAWORD] ; 17/10/2022
  7853                                  		;lds	bx, ds:ptrsav
  7854 000000B5 C51E[1200]              		lds	bx, [ptrsav]
  7855 000000B9 894703                  		mov	[bx+3],	ax	; [bx+status]
  7856                                  					; mark operation complete
  7857 000000BC 5B                      		pop	bx
  7858 000000BD 07                      		pop	es
  7859 000000BE 1F                      		pop	ds
  7860 000000BF 5D                      		pop	bp
  7861 000000C0 5F                      		pop	di
  7862 000000C1 5A                      		pop	dx
  7863 000000C2 59                      		pop	cx
  7864 000000C3 58                      		pop	ax
  7865 000000C4 5E                      		pop	si
  7866 000000C5 83C402                  		add	sp, 2		; get rid of fake return address
  7867                                  	
  7868                                  		; fall through into bc_retf
  7869                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------	
  7870                                  bc_retf:
  7871 000000C8 CB                      		retf
  7872                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  7873                                  
  7874                                  command_error:				
  7875 000000C9 E80900                  		call	bc_cmderr
  7876 000000CC EBE2                    		jmp	short already_got_ah_status
  7877                                  ; 15/10/2022
  7878                                  ; 01/05/2019
  7879                                  
  7880                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
  7881                                  ; The following piece of hack is for supporting CP/M compatibility
  7882                                  ; Basically at offset 5 we have a far call into 0:c0. But this does not call
  7883                                  ; 0:c0 directly instead it call f01d:fef0, because it needs to support 'lhld 6'
  7884                                  ; The following hack has to reside at ffff:d0 (= f01d:fef0) if BIOS is loaded
  7885                                  ; high.
  7886                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
  7887                                  
  7888                                  		;db 7 dup(0)
  7889                                  
  7890                                  		; 15/10/2022
  7891                                  
  7892 000000CE 0000                    		dw 0		; pad to bring offset to 0D0h
  7893                                  
  7894 000000D0 00<rep 5h>              off_d0: 	times 5 db 0	; 5 bytes from 0:c0 will be copied onto here
  7895                                  				;  which is the CP/M call 5 entry point
  7896                                  		
  7897                                  
  7898                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  7899                                  
  7900                                  ;	exit - all routines return through this path
  7901                                  
  7902                                  bc_cmderr:				
  7903 000000D5 B003                    		mov	al, 3		; 2C7h:D5h = 70h:2645h
  7904                                  					; unknown command error
  7905                                  
  7906                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
  7907                                  
  7908                                  ;	now zero the count field by subtracting its current value,
  7909                                  ;	  which is still in cx, from itself.
  7910                                  
  7911                                  ;	subtract the number of i/o's NOT YET COMPLETED from total
  7912                                  ;	  in order to return the number actually complete
  7913                                  
  7914                                  bc_err_cnt:	
  7915                                  		;les	bx, ds:ptrsav
  7916                                  		; 19/10/2022
  7917 000000D7 C41E[1200]              		les	bx, [ptrsav]
  7918 000000DB 26294F12                		sub	[es:bx+18], cx	; [es:bx+count]
  7919                                  					; # of successful i/o's
  7920 000000DF B481                    		mov	ah, 81h		; mark error return
  7921 000000E1 F9                      		stc			; indicate abnormal end
  7922 000000E2 C3                      		retn
  7923                                  
  7924                                  ; 15/10/2022
  7925                                  
  7926                                  ;Bios_Code ends
  7927                                  
  7928                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
  7929                                  ; MSCHAR.ASM - MSDOS 6.0 - 1991
  7930                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
  7931                                  ; 15/10/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)
  7932                                  ; 10/01/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
  7933                                  
  7934                                  ; 30/04/2019
  7935                                  
  7936                                  ;title	mschar - character and clock devices
  7937                                  
  7938                                  ;MODE_CTRLBRK	equ	0FFh
  7939                                  
  7940                                  ; BIOSCODE:00E4h (MSDOS 6.21, IO.SYS)
  7941                                  
  7942                                  ;************************************************************************
  7943                                  ;*									*
  7944                                  ;*	device driver dispatch tables					*
  7945                                  ;*									*
  7946                                  ;*	each table starts with a byte which lists the number of		*
  7947                                  ;*	legal functions, followed by that number of words. Each		*
  7948                                  ;*	word represents an offset of a routine in Bios_Code which	*
  7949                                  ;*	handles the function. The functions are terminated with		*
  7950                                  ;*	a near return. If carry is reset, a 'done' code is returned	*
  7951                                  ;*	to the caller. If carry is set, the ah/al registers are		*
  7952                                  ;*	returned as abnormal completion status. Notice that ds		*
  7953                                  ;*	is assumed to point to the Bios_Data segment throughout.	*
  7954                                  ;*									*
  7955                                  ;************************************************************************
  7956                                  
  7957                                  		; 13/12/2022
  7958                                  		;db 0
  7959                                  
  7960                                  		; 13/12/202
  7961 000000E3 0B                      con_table:	db ((con_table_end - con_table)-1)/2 ; 11
  7962                                  					; 2C7h:0E4h = 70h:2654h
  7963 000000E4 [F901]                  		dw bc_exvec  ; 1FBh	; bc_exvec at 2C7h:1FBh	= 70h:276Bh
  7964                                  					; 00 init
  7965 000000E6 [F901]                  		dw bc_exvec  ; 1FBh	; 01
  7966 000000E8 [F901]                  		dw bc_exvec  ; 1FBh	; 02
  7967 000000EA [D500]                  		dw bc_cmderr ; 0D5h	; bc_exvec at 2C7h:D5h = 70h:2645h
  7968                                  					; 03
  7969 000000EC [5B01]                  		dw con_read  ; 15Ch	; con_read at 2C7h:15Ch	= 70h:26CCh
  7970                                  					; 04
  7971 000000EE [9E01]                  		dw con_rdnd  ; 19Fh	; con_rdnd at 2C7h:19Fh	= 70h:270Fh
  7972                                  					; 05
  7973 000000F0 [F901]                  		dw bc_exvec  ; 1FBh	; 06
  7974 000000F2 [0702]                  		dw con_flush ; 209h	; con_flush at 2C7h:209h = 70h:2779h
  7975                                  					; 07
  7976 000000F4 [FB01]                  		dw con_writ  ; 1FDh	; con_writ at 2C7h:1FDh	= 70h:276Dh
  7977                                  					; 08
  7978 000000F6 [FB01]                  		dw con_writ  ; 1FDh	; 09
  7979 000000F8 [F901]                  		dw bc_exvec  ; 1FBh	; 0A
  7980                                  con_table_end:
  7981 000000FA 1A                      prn_table:	db ((prn_table_end - prn_table)-1)/2 ; 26			
  7982                                  					; 2C7h:0FBh = 70h:266Bh
  7983 000000FB [F901]                  		dw bc_exvec   ; 1FBh	; bc_exvec
  7984 000000FD [F901]                  		dw bc_exvec   ; 1FBh	; 01
  7985 000000FF [F901]                  		dw bc_exvec   ; 1FBh	; 02
  7986 00000101 [D500]                  		dw bc_cmderr  ;	0D5h	; bc_cmderr
  7987 00000103 [1802]                  		dw prn_input  ;	21Ah	; prn_input
  7988                                  					; 04 indicate zero chars read
  7989 00000105 [C601]                  		dw z_bus_exit ; 1C8h	; z_bus_exit
  7990                                  					; 05 read non-destructive
  7991 00000107 [F901]                  		dw bc_exvec   ; 1FBh	; 06
  7992 00000109 [F901]                  		dw bc_exvec   ; 1FBh	; 07
  7993 0000010B [1D02]                  		dw prn_writ   ;	21Fh	; prn_writ
  7994 0000010D [1D02]                  		dw prn_writ   ; 21Fh	; 09
  7995 0000010F [4E02]                  		dw prn_stat   ; 251h	; prn_stat
  7996 00000111 [F901]                  		dw bc_exvec   ; 1FBh	; 0B
  7997 00000113 [F901]                  		dw bc_exvec   ; 1FBh	; 0C
  7998 00000115 [F901]                  		dw bc_exvec   ; 1FBh	; 0D
  7999 00000117 [F901]                  		dw bc_exvec   ; 1FBh	; 0E
  8000 00000119 [F901]                  		dw bc_exvec   ; 1FBh	; 0F
  8001 0000011B [8802]                  		dw prn_tilbusy ; 28Bh	; prn_tilbusy
  8002 0000011D [F901]                  		dw bc_exvec   ; 1FBh	; 11
  8003 0000011F [F901]                  		dw bc_exvec   ; 1FBh	; 12
  8004 00000121 [B602]                  		dw prn_genioctl ; 2BAh	; prn_genioctl
  8005 00000123 [F901]                  		dw bc_exvec   ; 1FBh	; 14
  8006 00000125 [F901]                  		dw bc_exvec   ; 1FBh	; 15
  8007 00000127 [F901]                  		dw bc_exvec   ; 1FBh	; 16
  8008 00000129 [F901]                  		dw bc_exvec   ; 1FBh	; 17
  8009 0000012B [F901]                  		dw bc_exvec   ; 1FBh	; 18
  8010 0000012D [EB02]                  		dw prn_ioctl_query ; 2F0h ; prn_ioctl_query
  8011                                  prn_table_end:
  8012 0000012F 0B                      aux_table:	db ((aux_table_end - aux_table)-1)/2 ; 11			
  8013                                  					; 2C7h:130h = 70h:26A0h
  8014 00000130 [F901]                  		dw bc_exvec   ; 1FBh	; 00 - init
  8015 00000132 [F901]                  		dw bc_exvec   ; 1FBh	; 01
  8016 00000134 [F901]                  		dw bc_exvec   ; 1FBh	; 02
  8017 00000136 [D500]                  		dw bc_cmderr  ;	0D5h	; 03
  8018 00000138 [0603]                  		dw aux_read   ; 30Dh	; aux_read ; 04	- read
  8019 0000013A [2D03]                  		dw aux_rdnd   ; 335h	; aux_rdnd - 05	- read non-destructive
  8020 0000013C [F901]                  		dw bc_exvec   ; 1FBh	; 06
  8021 0000013E [6303]                  		dw aux_flsh   ;	36Ch	; aux_flsh
  8022 00000140 [6A03]                  		dw aux_writ   ;	374h	; aux_writ
  8023 00000142 [6A03]                  		dw aux_writ   ;	374h	; 09
  8024 00000144 [4D03]                  		dw aux_wrst   ;	355h	; aux_wrst
  8025                                  aux_table_end:
  8026 00000146 0A                      tim_table	db ((tim_table_end - tim_table)-1)/2 ; 10
  8027                                  					; 2C7h:147h = 70h:26B7h
  8028 00000147 [F901]                  		dw bc_exvec   ; 1FBh	; 00
  8029 00000149 [F901]                  		dw bc_exvec   ; 1FBh	; 01
  8030 0000014B [F901]                  		dw bc_exvec   ; 1FBh	; 02
  8031 0000014D [D500]                  		dw bc_cmderr  ;	0D5h	; 03
  8032 0000014F [2904]                  		dw tim_read   ;	435h	; tim_read
  8033 00000151 [C601]                  		dw z_bus_exit ; 1C8h	; z_bus_exit
  8034 00000153 [F901]                  		dw bc_exvec   ; 1FBh	; 06
  8035 00000155 [F901]                  		dw bc_exvec   ; 1FBh	; 07
  8036 00000157 [D003]                  		dw tim_writ   ; 3DBh	; tim_writ
  8037 00000159 [D003]                  		dw tim_writ   ; 3DBh	; 09
  8038                                  tim_table_end:
  8039                                  
  8040                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8041                                  
  8042                                  ;************************************************************************
  8043                                  ;*									*
  8044                                  ;*	con_read - read cx bytes from keyboard into buffer at es:di	*
  8045                                  ;*									*
  8046                                  ;************************************************************************
  8047                                  
  8048                                  con_read:				; 2C7h:15Ch = 70h:26CCh
  8049                                  		;jcxz	short con_exit	; read cx bytes	from keyboard into buffer
  8050 0000015B E306                    		jcxz	con_exit	; 19/10/2022
  8051                                  con_loop:				
  8052 0000015D E80500                  		call	chrin		; get char in al
  8053 00000160 AA                      		stosb			; store	char at	es:di
  8054 00000161 E2FA                    		loop	con_loop
  8055                                  con_exit:				
  8056 00000163 F8                      		clc
  8057 00000164 C3                      		retn
  8058                                  
  8059                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
  8060                                  
  8061                                  ;************************************************************************
  8062                                  ;*									*
  8063                                  ;*	chrin - input single char from keyboard into al			*
  8064                                  ;*									*
  8065                                  ;*	  we are going to issue extended keyboard function, if		*
  8066                                  ;*	  supported. the returning value of the extended keystroke	*
  8067                                  ;*	  of the extended keyboard function uses 0E0h in al		*
  8068                                  ;*	  instead of 00h as in the conventional keyboard function.	*
  8069                                  ;*	  this creates a conflict when the user entered real		*
  8070                                  ;*	  greek alpha charater (= 0E0h) to  distinguish the extended	*
  8071                                  ;*	  keystroke and the greek alpha. this case will be handled	*
  8072                                  ;*	  in the following manner:					*
  8073                                  ;*									*
  8074                                  ;*	      ah = 16h							*
  8075                                  ;*	      int 16h							*
  8076                                  ;*	      if al == 0, then extended code (in ah)			*
  8077                                  ;*	      else if al == 0E0h, then					*
  8078                                  ;*	      if ah <> 0, then extended code (in ah)			*
  8079                                  ;*		else greek_alpha character.				*
  8080                                  ;*									*
  8081                                  ;*	also, for compatibility reason, if an extended code is		*
  8082                                  ;*	  detected, then we are going to change the value in al		*
  8083                                  ;*	  from 0E0h to 00h.						*
  8084                                  ;*									*
  8085                                  ;************************************************************************
  8086                                  
  8087                                  		; 19/10/2022
  8088                                  chrin:		
  8089 00000165 8A26[E504]              		mov	ah, [keyrd_func] ; set by msinit. 0 or 10h
  8090 00000169 30C0                    		xor	al, al
  8091 0000016B 8606[0C00]              		xchg	al, [altah]	; get character	& zero altah
  8092 0000016F 08C0                    		or	al, al
  8093 00000171 752A                    		jnz	short keyret
  8094 00000173 CD16                    		int	16h		; KEYBOARD -
  8095 00000175 09C0                    		or	ax, ax
  8096 00000177 74EC                    		jz	short chrin
  8097 00000179 3D0072                  		cmp	ax, 7200h	; check	for ctrl-prtsc
  8098 0000017C 7504                    		jnz	short alt_ext_chk
  8099 0000017E B010                    		mov	al, 10h
  8100 00000180 EB1B                    		jmp	short keyret
  8101                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8102                                  
  8103                                  ;  if operation was extended function (i.e. keyrd_func != 0) then
  8104                                  ;    if character read was 0E0h then
  8105                                  ;      if extended byte was zero (i.e. ah == 0) then
  8106                                  ;	 goto keyret
  8107                                  ;      else
  8108                                  ;	 set al to zero
  8109                                  ;	 goto alt_save
  8110                                  ;      endif
  8111                                  ;    endif
  8112                                  ;  endif
  8113                                  
  8114                                  alt_ext_chk:
  8115 00000182 803E[E504]00            		cmp	byte [keyrd_func], 0
  8116 00000187 740C                    		jz	short not_ext
  8117 00000189 3CE0                    		cmp	al, 0E0h
  8118 0000018B 7508                    		jnz	short not_ext
  8119 0000018D 08E4                    		or	ah, ah
  8120 0000018F 740C                    		jz	short keyret
  8121 00000191 30C0                    		xor	al, al
  8122 00000193 EB04                    		jmp	short alt_save
  8123                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8124                                  
  8125                                  not_ext:				
  8126 00000195 08C0                    		or	al, al		; special case?
  8127 00000197 7504                    		jnz	short keyret
  8128                                  alt_save:				
  8129 00000199 8826[0C00]              		mov	[altah], ah	; store	special	key
  8130                                  keyret:					
  8131 0000019D C3                      		retn
  8132                                  
  8133                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8134                                  
  8135                                  ;************************************************************************
  8136                                  ;*									*
  8137                                  ;*	con_rdnd - keyboard non destructive read, no wait		*
  8138                                  ;*									*
  8139                                  ;*	pc-convertible-type machine: if bit 10 is set by the dos	*
  8140                                  ;*	in the status word of the request packet, and there is no	*
  8141                                  ;*	character in the input buffer, the driver issues a system	*
  8142                                  ;*	wait request to the rom. on return from the rom, it returns	*
  8143                                  ;*	a 'char-not-found' to the dos.					*
  8144                                  ;*									*
  8145                                  ;************************************************************************
  8146                                  
  8147                                  		; 19/10/2022
  8148                                  con_rdnd:				
  8149 0000019E A0[0C00]                		mov	al, [altah]
  8150 000001A1 08C0                    		or	al, al
  8151 000001A3 754C                    		jnz	short rdexit
  8152 000001A5 8A26[E604]              		mov	ah, [keysts_func]
  8153 000001A9 CD16                    		int	16h		; KEYBOARD -
  8154 000001AB 751D                    		jnz	short gotchr
  8155 000001AD 803E[7900]00            		cmp	byte [fhavek09], 0
  8156 000001B2 7412                    		jz	short z_bus_exit
  8157 000001B4 C41E[1200]              		les	bx, [ptrsav]
  8158                                  		; 12/12/2022
  8159 000001B8 26F6470404              		test	byte [es:bx+4], 04h
  8160                                  		;test	word [es:bx+3], 400h ; [es:bx+status]
  8161 000001BD 7407                    		jz	short z_bus_exit
  8162 000001BF B80041                  		mov	ax, 4100h
  8163 000001C2 30DB                    		xor	bl, bl
  8164 000001C4 CD15                    		int	15h		; SYSTEM - WAIT	ON EXTERNAL EVENT (CONVERTIBLE)
  8165                                  					; AL = condition type, BH = condition compare or mask value
  8166                                  					; BL = timeout value times 55 milliseconds, 00h	means no timeout
  8167                                  					; DX = I/O port	address	if AL bit 4 set
  8168                                  z_bus_exit:				
  8169 000001C6 F9                      		stc			; 2C7h:1C8h = 70h:2738h
  8170 000001C7 B403                    		mov	ah, 3		; indicate busy	status
  8171 000001C9 C3                      		retn
  8172                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8173                                  
  8174                                  gotchr:					
  8175 000001CA 09C0                    		or	ax, ax
  8176 000001CC 7508                    		jnz	short notbrk	; check	for null after break
  8177 000001CE 8A26[E504]              		mov	ah, [keyrd_func] ; issue keyboard read function
  8178 000001D2 CD16                    		int	16h		; KEYBOARD -
  8179 000001D4 EBC8                    		jmp	short con_rdnd	; get a	real status
  8180                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8181                                  
  8182                                  notbrk:					
  8183 000001D6 3D0072                  		cmp	ax, 7200h	; check	for ctrl-prtsc
  8184 000001D9 7504                    		jnz	short rd_ext_chk
  8185 000001DB B010                    		mov	al, 10h		; ('P' & 1Fh) ; return control p
  8186 000001DD EB12                    		jmp	short rdexit
  8187                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8188                                  
  8189                                  rd_ext_chk:				
  8190 000001DF 803E[E504]00            		cmp	byte [keyrd_func], 0 ; extended keyboard function?
  8191 000001E4 740B                    		jz	short rdexit
  8192 000001E6 3CE0                    		cmp	al, 0E0h	; extended key value or	greek alpha?
  8193 000001E8 7507                    		jnz	short rdexit
  8194 000001EA 80FC00                  		cmp	ah, 0		; scan code exist?
  8195 000001ED 7402                    		jz	short rdexit	; yes. greek alpha char.
  8196 000001EF B000                    		mov	al, 0		; no. extended key stroke.
  8197                                  					; change it for	compatibility
  8198                                  rdexit:					
  8199 000001F1 C41E[1200]              		les	bx, [ptrsav]
  8200 000001F5 2688470D                		mov	[es:bx+13], al	; [es:bx+media]
  8201                                  					; return keyboard character here
  8202                                  bc_exvec:				
  8203 000001F9 F8                      		clc			; bc_exvec at 2C7h:1FBh	= 70h:276Bh
  8204                                  					; indicate normal termination
  8205 000001FA C3                      		retn
  8206                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8207                                  
  8208                                  ;************************************************************************
  8209                                  ;*									*
  8210                                  ;*	con_write - console write routine				*
  8211                                  ;*									*
  8212                                  ;*	entry:	es:di -> buffer						*
  8213                                  ;*		cx    =  count						*
  8214                                  ;*									*
  8215                                  ;************************************************************************
  8216                                  
  8217                                  con_writ:

  8219 000001FB E3FC                    		jcxz	bc_exvec	; 19/10/2022

  8221                                  		;jcxz	cc_ret

  8224 00000200 47                      		inc	di
  8225 00000201 CD29                    		int	29h		; DOS 2+ internal - FAST PUTCHAR
  8226                                  					; AL = character to display

  8232                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================

  8234                                  ;************************************************************************
  8235                                  ;*									*
  8236                                  ;*	con_flush - flush out keyboard queue				*

  8242                                  flloop:					; while	(charavail()) charread();	
  8243 0000020C B401                    		mov	ah, 1
  8244 0000020E CD16                    		int	16h		; KEYBOARD - CHECK BUFFER, DO NOT CLEAR
  8245                                  					; Return: ZF clear if character	in buffer
  8246                                  					; AH = scan code, AL = character
  8247                                  					; ZF set if no character in buffer
  8248 00000210 74F3                    		jz	short cc_ret
  8249 00000212 30E4                    		xor	ah, ah
  8250 00000214 CD16                    		int	16h		; KEYBOARD - READ CHAR FROM BUFFER, WAIT IF EMPTY
  8251                                  					; Return: AH = scan code, AL = character
  8252 00000216 EBF4                    		jmp	short flloop
  8253

  8256                                  ; 15/10/2022

  8258                                  ;************************************************************************
  8259                                  ;*									*
  8260                                  ;*	some equates for rom bios printer i/o				*
  8261                                  ;*									*
  8262                                  ;************************************************************************
  8263                                  
  8264                                  ; ibm rom status bits (i don't trust them, neither should you)
  8265                                  ; warning!!! the ibm rom does not return just one bit. it returns a
  8266                                  ; whole slew of bits, only one of which is correct.
  8267                                  
  8268                                  ;notbusystatus	equ 10000000b		; not busy
  8269                                  ;nopaperstatus	equ 00100000b		; no more paper
  8270                                  ;prnselected	equ 00010000b		; printer selected
  8271                                  ;ioerrstatus	equ 00001000b		; some kinda error
  8272                                  ;timeoutstatus	equ 00000001b		; time out.
  8273                                  ;
  8274                                  ;noprinter	equ 00110000b		; no printer attached
  8275                                  
  8276                                  ; 18/03/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
  8277                                  ;error_I24_out_of_paper	equ 9 ; MSDOS 6.0, ERR.INC, 1991
  8278                                  
  8279                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8280                                  
  8281                                  ;************************************************************************
  8282                                  ;*									*
  8283                                  ;*	prn_input - return with no error but zero chars read		*
  8284                                  ;*									*
  8285                                  ;*	enter with cx = number of characters requested			*
  8286                                  ;*									*
  8287                                  ;************************************************************************
  8288                                  
  8289                                  prn_input:				; 2C7h:21Ah = 70h:278Ah
  8290 00000218 E8BCFE                  		call	bc_err_cnt	; reset	count to zero
  8291                                  					; (sub reqpkt.count,cx)
  8292                                  		; 12/12/2022
  8293                                  prn_done:
  8294 0000021B F8                      		clc			; but return with carry	reset for no error
  8295 0000021C C3                      		retn
  8296                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8297                                  
  8298                                  ;************************************************************************
  8299                                  ;*									*
  8300                                  ;*	prn_writ - write cx bytes from es:di to printer device		*
  8301                                  ;*									*
  8302                                  ;*	auxnum has printer number					*
  8303                                  ;*									*
  8304                                  ;************************************************************************
  8305                                  
  8306                                  prn_writ:				; 2C7h:21Fh = 70h:278Fh
  8307                                  		;jcxz	short prn_done	; no chars to output
  8308 0000021D E3FC                    		jcxz	prn_done	; 19/10/2022
  8309                                  prn_loop:				
  8310 0000021F BB0200                  		mov	bx, 2		; retry	count
  8311                                  prn_out:				
  8312 00000222 E83600                  		call	prnstat		; get status
  8313 00000225 751D                    		jnz	short TestPrnError
  8314 00000227 268A05                  		mov	al, [es:di]	; get character	to print
  8315 0000022A 30E4                    		xor	ah, ah
  8316 0000022C E82E00                  		call	prnop		; print	to printer
  8317 0000022F 7419                    		jz	short prn_con	; no error - continue
  8318 00000231 80FCFF                  		cmp	ah, 0FFh	; MODE_CTRLBRK
  8319 00000234 7509                    		jnz	short _prnwf
  8320 00000236 B00C                    		mov	al, 0Ch		; error_I24_gen_failure
  8321 00000238 C606[0C00]00            		mov	byte [altah], 0
  8322 0000023D EB08                    		jmp	short pmessg
  8323                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8324                                  
  8325                                  _prnwf:					
  8326 0000023F F6C401                  		test	ah, 1		; timeoutstatus
  8327 00000242 7406                    		jz	short prn_con
  8328                                  TestPrnError:				
  8329 00000244 4B                      		dec	bx		; retry	until count is exhausted.
  8330 00000245 75DB                    		jnz	short prn_out
  8331                                  pmessg:					
  8332 00000247 E98DFE                  		jmp	bc_err_cnt
  8333                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
