  8337 0000024B E2D2                    		loop	prn_loop
  8338                                  ;prn_done:				
  8339                                  		; 12/12/2022
  8340                                  prn_done2:
  8341                                  		;clc
  8342                                  		; cf=0
  8343 0000024D C3                      		retn
  8344                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8345                                  
  8346                                  ;************************************************************************
  8347                                  ;*									*
  8348                                  ;*	prn_stat - device driver entry to return printer status		*
  8349                                  ;*									*
  8350                                  ;************************************************************************
  8351                                  
  8352                                  prn_stat:				; 2C7h:251h = 70h:27C1h

  8354 00000251 75F4                    		jnz	short pmessg
  8355 00000253 F6C480                  		test	ah, 80h		; notbusystatus
  8356                                  		;jnz	short prn_done

  8359 00000258 E96BFF                  		jmp	z_bus_exit
  8360                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8361                                  
  8362                                  ;************************************************************************
  8363                                  ;*									*
  8364                                  ;*	prnstat - utility function to call ROM BIOS to check		*
  8365                                  ;*		 printer status. Return meaningful error code		*
  8366                                  ;*									*
  8367                                  ;************************************************************************
  8368                                  
  8369                                  prnstat:				
  8370 0000025B B402                    		mov	ah, 2		; set command for get status
  8371                                  					; PRINTER - GET	STATUS
  8372                                  					; DX = printer port (0-3)
  8373                                  					; Return: AH = status
  8374                                  
  8375                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
  8376                                  
  8377                                  ;************************************************************************
  8378                                  ;*									*
  8379                                  ;*	prnop - call ROM BIOS printer function in ah			*
  8380                                  ;*		return zero true if no error				*
  8381                                  ;*		return zero false if error, al = error code		*
  8382                                  ;*									*
  8383                                  ;************************************************************************
  8384                                  
  8385                                  prnop:	
  8386 0000025D 8B16[2100]              		mov	dx, [auxnum]	; get printer number
  8387 00000261 CD17                    		int	17h
  8388                                  
  8389                                  	; This check was added to see if this is a case of no
  8390                                  	; printer being installed. This tests checks to be sure
  8391                                  	; the error is noprinter (30h)
  8392                                  
  8393 00000263 50                      		push	ax
  8394 00000264 80E430                  		and	ah, 30h
  8395 00000267 80FC30                  		cmp	ah, 30h		; noprinter
  8396 0000026A 58                      		pop	ax
  8397 0000026B 7506                    		jnz	short NextTest
  8398 0000026D 80E4DF                  		and	ah, 0DFh	; ~nopaperstatus
  8399 00000270 80CC08                  		or	ah, 8		; ioerrstatus
  8400                                  
  8401                                  ; examine the status bits to see if an error occurred. unfortunately, several
  8402                                  ; of the bits are set so we have to pick and choose. we must be extremely
  8403                                  ; careful about breaking basic.
  8404                                  
  8405                                  NextTest:				
  8406 00000273 F6C428                  		test	ah, 28h		; (ioerrstatus+nopaperstatus)
  8407                                  					; i/o error?
  8408 00000276 740A                    		jz	short checknotready ; no, try not ready
  8409                                  
  8410                                  ; at this point, we know we have an error. the converse is not true
  8411                                  
  8412 00000278 B009                    		mov	al, 9		; error_I24_out_of_paper
  8413                                  					; first, assume	out of paper
  8414 0000027A F6C420                  		test	ah, 20h		; out of paper set?
  8415 0000027D 7502                    		jnz	short ret1	; yes, error is	set
  8416 0000027F FEC0                    		inc	al		; return al=10 (i/o error)
  8417                                  ret1:					
  8418 00000281 C3                      		retn
  8419                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8420                                  
  8421                                  checknotready:				
  8422 00000282 B002                    		mov	al, 2		; assume not-ready
  8423 00000284 F6C401                  		test	ah, 1
  8424 00000287 C3                      		retn
  8425                                  
  8426                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8427                                  
  8428                                  ;************************************************************************
  8429                                  ;*									*
  8430                                  ;*	prn_tilbusy - output until busy. Used by print spooler.		*
  8431                                  ;*		     this entry point should never block waiting for	*
  8432                                  ;*		     device to come ready.				*
  8433                                  ;*									*
  8434                                  ;*	inputs:	cx = count, es:di -> buffer				*
  8435                                  ;*	outputs: set the number of bytes transferred in the		*
  8436                                  ;*		 device driver request packet				*
  8437                                  ;*									*
  8438                                  ;************************************************************************
  8439                                  
  8440                                  		; 19/10/2022
  8441                                  prn_tilbusy:				; 2C7h:28Bh = 70h:27FBh
  8442 00000288 89FE                    		mov	si, di		; everything is	set for	lodsb
  8443                                  prn_tilbloop:				
  8444 0000028A 51                      		push	cx
  8445 0000028B 53                      		push	bx
  8446 0000028C 30FF                    		xor	bh, bh
  8447 0000028E 8A1E[E704]              		mov	bl, [printdev]
  8448 00000292 D1E3                    		shl	bx, 1
  8449                                  		;mov	cx, ds:wait_count[bx] ;	wait count times to come ready
  8450 00000294 8B8F[E804]              		mov	cx, [wait_count+bx]
  8451 00000298 5B                      		pop	bx
  8452                                  prn_getstat:				
  8453 00000299 E8BFFF                  		call	prnstat		; get status
  8454 0000029C 7514                    		jnz	short prn_bperr	; error
  8455 0000029E F6C480                  		test	ah, 80h		; ready	yet?
  8456 000002A1 E1F6                    		loope	prn_getstat	; no, go for more
  8457 000002A3 59                      		pop	cx		; get original count
  8458 000002A4 740D                    		jz	short prn_berr	; still	not ready => done
  8459 000002A6 26                      		es
  8460 000002A7 AC                      		lodsb
  8461                                  		;lods	byte ptr es:[si] ; es
  8462                                  					; lodsb
  8463 000002A8 30E4                    		xor	ah, ah
  8464 000002AA E8B0FF                  		call	prnop
  8465 000002AD 7504                    		jnz	short prn_berr	; error
  8466 000002AF E2D9                    		loop	prn_tilbloop
  8467                                  		; 12/12/2022
  8468                                  		; cf=0 (prnop)
  8469                                  		;clc			; normal no-error return
  8470 000002B1 C3                      		retn			;   from device driver
  8471                                  
  8472                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8473                                  
  8474                                  prn_bperr:				
  8475 000002B2 59                      		pop	cx		; restore transfer count from stack
  8476                                  prn_berr:				
  8477 000002B3 E921FE                  		jmp	bc_err_cnt
  8478                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8479

  8481                                  
  8482                                  ;************************************************************************
  8483                                  ;*									*
  8484                                  ;*	prn_genioctl - get/set printer retry count			*
  8485                                  ;*									*
  8486                                  ;************************************************************************
  8487                                  
  8488                                  ; IOCTL.INC (MSDOS 6.0, 1991)
  8489                                  ; 11/01/2019
  8490                                  
  8491                                  ;********************************;*
  8492                                  ; CHARACTER DEVICES (PRINTERS)	 ;*
  8493                                  ;********************************;*
  8494                                  
  8495                                  ;;RAWIO SUB-FUNCTIONS
  8496                                  ;;get_retry_count equ 65h
  8497                                  ;;set_retry_count equ 45h
  8498                                  
  8499                                  ;;struc A_RETRYCOUNT
  8500                                  ;;.rc_count: resw 1
  8501                                  ;;endstruc
  8502                                  
  8503                                  ;ioc_pc equ 5
  8504                                  
  8505                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8506                                  
  8507                                  		; 19/10/2022
  8508                                  prn_genioctl:				; 2C7h:2BAh = 70h:282Ah

  8511                                  					; ioc_pc
  8512 000002BF 7403                    		jz	short prnfunc_ok
  8513                                  
  8514                                  prnfuncerr:				
  8515 000002C1 E911FE                  		jmp	bc_cmderr

  8517                                  
  8518                                  prnfunc_ok:

  8520 000002C8 26C47D13                		les	di, [es:di+19]	; [es:di+IOCTL_REQ.GENERICIOCTL_PACKET]
  8521 000002CC 30FF                    		xor	bh, bh
  8522                                  		;mov	bl, ds:printdev	; get index into retry counts

  8524 000002D2 D1E3                    		shl	bx, 1

  8528 000002DA 7407                    		jz	short prngetcount

  8534 000002E3 898F[E804]              		mov	[wait_count+bx], cx
  8535 000002E7 26890D                  		mov	[es:di], cx	; [es:di+A_RETRYCOUNT.RC_COUNT]
  8536                                  					; return current retry count
  8537                                  		; 12/12/2022
  8538                                  		; cf=0
  8539                                  		;clc
  8540 000002EA C3                      		retn
  8541                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8542                                  
  8543                                  ;************************************************************************

  8571                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8572                                  
  8573                                  ;************************************************************************
  8574                                  ;*									*
  8575                                  ;*	aux port driver code -- "aux" == "com1"				*
  8576                                  ;*									*
  8577                                  ;*	the device driver entry/dispatch code sets up auxnum to		*
  8578                                  ;*	give the com port number to use (0=com1, 1=com2, 2=com3...)	*
  8579                                  ;*									*
  8580                                  ;************************************************************************
  8581                                  
  8582                                  ;	values in ah, requesting function of int 14h in rom bios
  8583                                  
  8584                                  ;auxfunc_send	 equ	1	;transmit
  8585                                  ;auxfunc_receive equ	2	;read
  8586                                  ;auxfunc_status	 equ	3	;request status
  8587                                  
  8588                                  ;	error flags, reported by int 14h, reported in ah:
  8589                                  
  8590                                  ;flag_data_ready equ	01h	;data ready
  8591                                  ;flag_overrun	 equ	02h	;overrun error
  8592                                  ;flag_parity	 equ	04h	;parity error
  8593                                  ;flag_frame	 equ	08h	;framing error
  8594                                  ;flag_break	 equ	10h	;break detect
  8595                                  ;flag_tranhol_emp equ	20h	;transmit holding register empty
  8596                                  ;flag_timeout	 equ	80h	;timeout
  8597                                  
  8598                                  ;	these flags reported in al:
  8599                                  
  8600                                  ;flag_cts	 equ	10h	;clear to send
  8601                                  ;flag_dsr	 equ	20h	;data set ready
  8602                                  ;flag_rec_sig	 equ	80h	;receive line signal detect
  8603                                  
  8604                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8605                                  
  8606                                  ;************************************************************************
  8607                                  ;*									*
  8608                                  ;*	aux_read - read cx bytes from [auxnum] aux port to buffer	*
  8609                                  ;*		   at es:di						*
  8610                                  ;*									*
  8611                                  ;************************************************************************
  8612                                  
  8613                                  aux_read:				; 2C7h:30Dh = 70h:287Dh
  8614                                  		;jcxz	short exvec2
  8615 00000306 E311                    		jcxz	exvec2		; 19/10/2022
  8616 00000308 E87700                  		call	getbx		; put address of auxbuf	in bx
  8617 0000030B 30C0                    		xor	al, al
  8618 0000030D 8607                    		xchg	al, [bx]
  8619 0000030F 08C0                    		or	al, al
  8620 00000311 7503                    		jnz	short aux2
  8621                                  aux1:					
  8622 00000313 E80500                  		call	auxin		; get character	from port
  8623                                  					; won't return if error
  8624                                  aux2:					
  8625 00000316 AA                      		stosb
  8626 00000317 E2FA                    		loop	aux1		; if more characters, go around	again
  8627                                  exvec2:					
  8628 00000319 F8                      		clc			; all done, successful exit
  8629                                  auxin_retn:	; 18/12/2022
  8630 0000031A C3                      		retn
  8631                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8632                                  
  8633                                  ;************************************************************************
  8634                                  ;*									*
  8635                                  ;*	auxin - call rom bios to read character from aux port		*
  8636                                  ;*		if error occurs, map the error and return one		*
  8637                                  ;*		level up to device driver exit code, setting		*
  8638                                  ;*		the number of bytes transferred appropriately		*
  8639                                  ;*									*
  8640                                  ;************************************************************************
  8641                                  
  8642                                  auxin:					
  8643 0000031B B402                    		mov	ah, 2		; auxfunc_receive
  8644 0000031D E83C00                  		call	auxop
  8645 00000320 F6C40E                  		test	ah, 0Eh		; flag_frame|flag_parity|flag_overrun
  8646                                  		;jnz	short arbad	; skip if any error bits set
  8647                                  		;retn
  8648                                  		; 25/06/2023 (BugFix)
  8649 00000323 74F5                    		jz	short auxin_retn
  8650                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8651                                  
  8652                                  arbad:					
  8653 00000325 58                      		pop	ax		; remove return	address	(near call)
  8654 00000326 30C0                    		xor	al, al
  8655 00000328 0CB0                    		or	al, 0B0h	; flag_rec_sig|	flag_dsr|flag_cts
  8656 0000032A E9AAFD                  		jmp	bc_err_cnt
  8657                                  
  8658                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8659                                  
  8660                                  ;************************************************************************
  8661                                  ;*									*
  8662                                  ;*	aux_rdnd - non-destructive aux port read			*
  8663                                  ;*									*
  8664                                  ;************************************************************************
  8665                                  
  8666                                  aux_rdnd:				; 2C7h:335h = 70h:28A5h
  8667 0000032D E85200                  		call	getbx
  8668 00000330 8A07                    		mov	al, [bx]	; have bx point	to auxbuf
  8669 00000332 08C0                    		or	al, al		; if al	is non-zero (char in buffer)
  8670 00000334 7511                    		jnz	short auxdrx	; then return character
  8671 00000336 E82100                  		call	auxstat		; if not, get status of	aux device
  8672 00000339 F6C401                  		test	ah, 1		; flag_data_ready - test data ready
  8673 0000033C 740C                    		jz	short auxbus	; then device is busy (not ready)
  8674 0000033E A820                    		test	al, 20h		; flag_dsr - test data set ready
  8675 00000340 7408                    		jz	short auxbus	; then device is busy (not ready)
  8676 00000342 E8D6FF                  		call	auxin		; else aux is ready, get character
  8677 00000345 8807                    		mov	[bx], al
  8678                                  auxdrx:					
  8679 00000347 E9A7FE                  		jmp	rdexit		; return busy status
  8680                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8681                                  
  8682                                  auxbus:					
  8683 0000034A E979FE                  		jmp	z_bus_exit
  8684                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8685                                  
  8686                                  ;************************************************************************
  8687                                  ;*									*
  8688                                  ;*	aux_wrst - return aux port write status				*
  8689                                  ;*									*
  8690                                  ;************************************************************************
  8691                                  
  8692                                  aux_wrst:				; 2C7h:355h = 70h:28C5h

  8694 00000350 A820                    		test	al, 20h		; test data set	ready
  8695 00000352 74F6                    		jz	short auxbus	; then device is busy (not ready)
  8696 00000354 F6C420                  		test	ah, 20h		; flag_tranhol_emp - test transmit hold	reg empty
  8697 00000357 74F1                    		jz	short auxbus	; then device is busy (not ready)
  8698                                  		; 12/12/2022
  8699                                  		; cf=0	; (test instruction resets cf)
  8700                                  		;clc
  8701 00000359 C3                      		retn
  8702                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8703                                  
  8704                                  ;************************************************************************
  8705                                  ;*									*
  8706                                  ;*	auxstat - call rom bios to determine aux port status		*
  8707                                  ;*									*
  8708                                  ;*	exit:	ax = status						*
  8709                                  ;*		dx = [auxnum]						*
  8710                                  ;*									*
  8711                                  ;************************************************************************
  8712                                  
  8713                                  auxstat:				
  8714 0000035A B403                    		mov	ah, 3		; auxfunc_status
  8715                                  
  8716                                  		; fall into auxop
  8717                                  
  8718                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
  8719                                  
  8720                                  ;************************************************************************
  8721                                  ;*									*
  8722                                  ;*	auxop - perform rom-biox aux port interrupt			*
  8723                                  ;*									*
  8724                                  ;*	entry:	ah = int 14h function number				*
  8725                                  ;*	exit:	ax = results						*
  8726                                  ;*		dx = [auxnum]						*
  8727                                  ;*									*
  8728                                  ;************************************************************************
  8729                                  
  8730                                  auxop:		; proc near		
  8731 0000035C 8B16[2100]              		mov	dx, [auxnum]	; ah=function code
  8732                                  					; 0=init, 1=send, 2=receive, 3=status
  8733                                  					; get port number
  8734 00000360 CD14                    		int	14h		; SERIAL I/O - GET USART STATUS
  8735                                  					; DX = port number (0-3)
  8736                                  					; Return: AX = port status code
  8737 00000362 C3                      		retn
  8738                                  
  8739                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8740                                  
  8741                                  ;************************************************************************
  8742                                  ;*									*
  8743                                  ;*	aux_flsh - flush aux input buffer - set contents of		*
  8744                                  ;*		   auxbuf [auxnum] to zero				*
  8745                                  ;*									*
  8746                                  ;*	cas - shouldn't this code call the rom bios input function	*
  8747                                  ;*	      repeatedly until it isn't ready?  to flush out any	*
  8748                                  ;*	      pending serial input queue if there's a tsr like MODE	*
  8749                                  ;*	      which is providing interrupt-buffering of aux port?	*
  8750                                  ;*									*
  8751                                  ;************************************************************************
  8752                                  
  8753                                  aux_flsh:				; 2C7h:36Ch = 70h:28DCh
  8754 00000363 E81C00                  		call	getbx		; flush	aux input buffer
  8755 00000366 C60700                  		mov	byte [bx], 0	; get bx to point to auxbuf
  8756                                  					; zero out buffer
  8757                                  		;clc			; all done, successful return
  8758                                  		; 12/12/2022
  8759                                  		; cf=0 ('add' instruction in 'getbx')
  8760 00000369 C3                      		retn
  8761                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8762                                  
  8763                                  ;************************************************************************
  8764                                  ;*									*
  8765                                  ;*	aux_writ - write to aux device					*
  8766                                  ;*									*
  8767                                  ;************************************************************************
  8768                                  
  8769                                  aux_writ:				; 2C7h:374h = 70h:28E4h
  8770                                  		;jcxz	short exvec2	; write	to aux device (if cx > 0)
  8771 0000036A E3AD                    		jcxz	exvec2		; 19/10/2022
  8772                                  aux_loop:				
  8773 0000036C 268A05                  		mov	al, [es:di]	; get character	to be written
  8774                                  					; move di pointer to next character
  8775 0000036F 47                      		inc	di
  8776 00000370 B401                    		mov	ah, 1		; auxfunc_send - indicates a write
  8777 00000372 E8E7FF                  		call	auxop		; send character over aux port
  8778 00000375 F6C480                  		test	ah, 80h		; check	for error
  8779 00000378 7405                    		jz	short awok	; then no error
  8780 0000037A B00A                    		mov	al, 10		; else indicate	write fault
  8781 0000037C E958FD                  		jmp	bc_err_cnt	; call error routines
  8782                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8783                                  
  8784                                  awok:					
  8785 0000037F E2EB                    		loop	aux_loop	; if cx	is non-zero,
  8786                                  					; still	more character to print
  8787                                  		;clc			; all done, successful return
  8788                                  		; 12/12/2022
  8789                                  		; cf=0 (test instruction above)	
  8790 00000381 C3                      		retn
  8791                                  
  8792                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
  8793                                  
  8794                                  ;************************************************************************
  8795                                  ;*									*
  8796                                  ;*	getbx - return bx -> single byte input buffer for		*
  8797                                  ;*		selected aux port ([auxnum])				*
  8798                                  ;*									*
  8799                                  ;************************************************************************
  8800                                  
  8801                                  getbx:	
  8802 00000382 8B1E[2100]              		mov	bx, [auxnum]	; return bx -> single byte input buffer
  8803                                  					; for selected aux port	([auxnum])
  8804                                  		;add	bx, offset auxbuf
  8805 00000386 81C3[1600]              		add	bx, auxbuf	; 19/10/2022
  8806                                  		; 12/12/2022
  8807                                  		; cf=0 (if [uaxnum] is valid number) 
  8808 0000038A C3                      		retn
  8809                                  
  8810                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8811                                  
  8812                                  ; 15/10/2022
  8813                                  
  8814                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------
  8815                                  ;								:
  8816                                  ;		    clock device driver 			:
  8817                                  ;								:
  8818                                  ;								:
  8819                                  ;   this file contains the clock device driver. 		:
  8820                                  ;								:
  8821                                  ;   the routines in this files are:				:
  8822                                  ;								:
  8823                                  ;	routine 		function			:
  8824                                  ;	------- 		--------			:
  8825                                  ;	tim_writ		set the current time		:
  8826                                  ;	tim_read		read the current time		:
  8827                                  ;	time_to_ticks		convert time to corresponding	:
  8828                                  ;				  number of clock ticks 	:
  8829                                  ;								:
  8830                                  ; the clock ticks at the rate of:				:
  8831                                  ;								:
  8832                                  ;	1193180/65536 ticks/second (about 18.2 ticks per second):
  8833                                  ; see each routine for information on the use.			:
  8834                                  ;								:
  8835                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------
  8836                                  
  8837                                  ; convert time to ticks
  8838                                  ; input : time in cx and dx
  8839                                  ; ticks returned in cx:dx
  8840                                  
  8841                                  ;19/07/2019
  8842                                  ;09/03/2019
  8843                                  
  8844                                  time_to_ticks:				; 0070h:2906h =	02C7h:0396h
  8845                                  
  8846                                  ; first convert from hour,min,sec,hund. to
  8847                                  ; total number of 100th of seconds
  8848                                  
  8849 0000038B B03C                    		mov	al, 60
  8850 0000038D F6E5                    		mul	ch		; hours	to minutes
  8851 0000038F B500                    		mov	ch, 0
  8852 00000391 01C8                    		add	ax, cx		; total	minutes
  8853 00000393 B97017                  		mov	cx, 6000	; 60*100
  8854 00000396 89D3                    		mov	bx, dx		; get out of the way of	the multiply
  8855 00000398 F7E1                    		mul	cx		; convert to 1/100 sec
  8856 0000039A 89C1                    		mov	cx, ax
  8857 0000039C B064                    		mov	al, 100
  8858 0000039E F6E7                    		mul	bh		; convert seconds to 1/100 sec
  8859 000003A0 01C1                    		add	cx, ax		; combine seconds with hours and min
  8860 000003A2 83D200                  		adc	dx, 0		; ripple carry
  8861 000003A5 B700                    		mov	bh, 0
  8862 000003A7 01D9                    		add	cx, bx		; combine 1/100	sec
  8863 000003A9 83D200                  		adc	dx, 0
  8864                                  
  8865                                  	; dx:cx is time in 1/100 sec
  8866                                  
  8867 000003AC 92                      		xchg	ax, dx
  8868 000003AD 91                      		xchg	ax, cx		; now time is in cx:ax
  8869 000003AE BB0BE9                  		mov	bx, 59659
  8870 000003B1 F7E3                    		mul	bx		; multiply low half
  8871 000003B3 87D1                    		xchg	dx, cx
  8872 000003B5 92                      		xchg	ax, dx		; cx->ax, ax->dx, dx->cx
  8873 000003B6 F7E3                    		mul	bx		; multiply high	half
  8874 000003B8 01C8                    		add	ax, cx		; combine overlapping products
  8875 000003BA 83D200                  		adc	dx, 0
  8876 000003BD 92                      		xchg	ax, dx		; ax:dx=time*59659
  8877 000003BE BB0500                  		mov	bx, 5
  8878 000003C1 F6F3                    		div	bl		; divide high half by 5
  8879 000003C3 88C1                    		mov	cl, al
  8880 000003C5 B500                    		mov	ch, 0
  8881 000003C7 88E0                    		mov	al, ah		; remainder of divide-by-5
  8882 000003C9 98                      		cbw
  8883 000003CA 92                      		xchg	ax, dx		; use it to extend low half
  8884 000003CB F7F3                    		div	bx		; divide low half by 5
  8885 000003CD 89C2                    		mov	dx, ax		; cx:dx	is now number of ticks in time
  8886 000003CF CB                      		retf			; far return
  8887                                  
  8888                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8889                                  
  8890                                  ; 17/10/2022
  8891                                  ; 15/10/2022
  8892                                  
  8893                                  ;--------------------------------------------------------------------
  8894                                  ;
  8895                                  ; tim_writ sets the current time
  8896                                  ;
  8897                                  ; on entry es:[di] has the current time:
  8898                                  ;
  8899                                  ;	number of days since 1-1-80	(word)
  8900                                  ;	minutes (0-59)			(byte)
  8901                                  ;	hours (0-23)			(byte)
  8902                                  ;	hundredths of seconds (0-99)	(byte)
  8903                                  ;	seconds (0-59)			(byte)
  8904                                  ;
  8905                                  ; each number has been checked for the correct range.
  8906                                  ;
  8907                                  ;	NOTE: Any changes in this routine probably require corresponding
  8908                                  ;	changes in the version that is built with the power manager driver.
  8909                                  ;	See ptime.asm.
  8910                                  ;
  8911                                  ;--------------------------------------------------------------------
  8912                                  
  8913                                  tim_writ:				; 2C7h:3DBh = 70h:294Bh
  8914 000003D0 268B05                  		mov	ax, [es:di]
  8915 000003D3 50                      		push	ax		; daycnt. we need to set this at the very
  8916                                  					; end to avoid tick windows.
  8917 000003D4 803E[F304]00            		cmp	byte [havecmosclock], 0
  8918                                  		;cmp	ds:havecmosclock, 0
  8919 000003D9 7426                    		jz	short no_cmos_1
  8920 000003DB 268A4503                		mov	al, [es:di+3]	; near indirect	calls
  8921                                  					; get binary hours
  8922                                  					; convert to bcd
  8923 000003DF FF1E[0205]              		call	far [bintobcd]
  8924                                  		;call	ds:bintobcd	; call far [bintobcd]
  8925 000003E3 88C5                    		mov	ch, al		; ch = bcd hours
  8926 000003E5 268A4502                		mov	al, [es:di+2]	; get binary minutes
  8927 000003E9 FF1E[0205]              		call	far [bintobcd]
  8928                                  		;call	ds:bintobcd	; convert to bcd
  8929 000003ED 88C1                    		mov	cl, al		; cl = bcd minutes
  8930 000003EF 268A4505                		mov	al, [es:di+5]	; get binary seconds
  8931 000003F3 FF1E[0205]              		call	far [bintobcd]
  8932                                  		;call	ds:bintobcd
  8933 000003F7 88C6                    		mov	dh, al		; dh = bcd seconds
  8934 000003F9 B200                    		mov	dl, 0		; dl = 0 (st) or 1 (dst)
  8935 000003FB FA                      		cli
  8936 000003FC B403                    		mov	ah, 3
  8937 000003FE CD1A                    		int	1Ah		; CLOCK	- SET REAL TIME	CLOCK (AT,XT286,CONV,PS)
  8938                                  					; CH = hours in	BCD, CL	= minutes in BCD
  8939                                  					;  DH =	seconds	in BCD,DL = 01h	if daylight savings, 00h if standard time
  8940                                  					; Return: CMOS clock set
  8941 00000400 FB                      		sti
  8942                                  no_cmos_1:				
  8943 00000401 268B4D02                		mov	cx, [es:di+2]
  8944 00000405 268B5504                		mov	dx, [es:di+4]
  8945                                  		; 17/10/2022
  8946 00000409 FF1E[E206]              		call	far [ttticks]
  8947                                  		;call	dword ptr ds:ttticks ; call far	[ttticks]
  8948                                  					; convert time to ticks
  8949                                  					; cx:dx	now has	time in	ticks
  8950 0000040D FA                      		cli			; turn off timer
  8951 0000040E B401                    		mov	ah, 1
  8952 00000410 CD1A                    		int	1Ah		; CLOCK	- SET TIME OF DAY
  8953                                  					; CX:DX	= clock	count
  8954                                  					; Return: time of day set
  8955                                  		;pop	ds:daycnt
  8956 00000412 8F06[F004]              		pop	word [daycnt]
  8957 00000416 FB                      		sti
  8958                                  		;cmp	ds:havecmosclock, 0
  8959 00000417 803E[F304]00            		cmp	byte [havecmosclock], 0
  8960 0000041C 740A                    		jz	short no_cmos_2
  8961 0000041E FF1E[0605]              		call	far [daycnttoday]
  8962                                  		;call	ds:daycnttoday	; call far [daycnttoday]
  8963                                  					; convert to bcd format
  8964 00000422 FA                      		cli
  8965 00000423 B405                    		mov	ah, 5
  8966 00000425 CD1A                    		int	1Ah		; CLOCK	- SET DATE IN REAL TIME	CLOCK (AT,XT286,CONV,PS)
  8967                                  					; DL = day in BCD, DH =	month in BCD, CL = year	in BCD
  8968                                  					; CH = century (19h or 20h)
  8969                                  					; Return: CMOS clock set
  8970 00000427 FB                      		sti
  8971                                  no_cmos_2:
  8972                                  		; 12/12/2022
  8973                                  		; cf=0				
  8974                                  		;clc
  8975 00000428 C3                      		retn
  8976                                  
  8977                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8978                                  
  8979                                  ; 15/10/2022
  8980                                  
  8981                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8982                                  ; gettime reads date and time
  8983                                  ; and returns the following information:
  8984                                  ;
  8985                                  ;	es:[di]  =count of days since 1-1-80
  8986                                  ;	es:[di+2]=hours
  8987                                  ;	es:[di+3]=minutes
  8988                                  ;	es:[di+4]=seconds
  8989                                  ;	es:[di+5]=hundredths of seconds
  8990                                  ;
  8991                                  ;	NOTE:  Any changes in this routine probably require corresponding
  8992                                  ;	changes in the version that is built with the power manager driver.
  8993                                  ;	See ptime.asm.
  8994                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8995                                  
  8996                                  tim_read:				; 2C7h:435h = 70h:29A5h
  8997 00000429 E84E00                  		call	GetTickCnt
  8998 0000042C 8B36[F004]              		mov	si, [daycnt]
  8999                                  
  9000                                  ; we now need to convert the time in tick to the time in 100th of
  9001                                  ; seconds. the relation between tick and seconds is:
  9002                                  ;
  9003                                  ;		 65,536 seconds
  9004                                  ;	       ----------------
  9005                                  ;		1,193,180 tick
  9006                                  ;
  9007                                  ; to get to 100th of second we need to multiply by 100. the equation is:
  9008                                  ;
  9009                                  ;	ticks from clock  * 65,536 * 100
  9010                                  ;      --------------------------------- = time in 100th of seconds
  9011                                  ;		1,193,180
  9012                                  ;
  9013                                  ; fortunately this formula simplifies to:
  9014                                  ;
  9015                                  ;	ticks from clock * 5 * 65,536
  9016                                  ;      --------------------------------- = time in 100th of seconds
  9017                                  ;		59,659
  9018                                  ;
  9019                                  ; the calculation is done by first multipling tick by 5. next we divide by
  9020                                  ; 59,659. in this division we multiply by 65,536 by shifting the dividend
  9021                                  ; my 16 bits to the left.
  9022                                  ;
  9023                                  ; start with ticks in cx:dx
  9024                                  ; multiply by 5
  9025                                  
  9026 00000430 89C8                    		mov	ax, cx
  9027 00000432 89D3                    		mov	bx, dx		; start	with ticks in cx:dx
  9028                                  					; multiply by 5
  9029 00000434 D1E2                    		shl	dx, 1
  9030 00000436 D1D1                    		rcl	cx, 1		; times	2
  9031 00000438 D1E2                    		shl	dx, 1
  9032 0000043A D1D1                    		rcl	cx, 1		; times	4
  9033 0000043C 01DA                    		add	dx, bx
  9034 0000043E 11C8                    		adc	ax, cx		; times	5
  9035 00000440 92                      		xchg	ax, dx
  9036                                  
  9037                                  ; now have ticks * 5 in	dx:ax
  9038                                  ; we now need to multiply by 65536 and divide by 59659 d.
  9039                                  
  9040 00000441 B90BE9                  		mov	cx, 59659	; get divisor
  9041 00000444 F7F1                    		div	cx		; dx now has remainder
  9042                                  					; ax has high word of final quotient
  9043 00000446 89C3                    		mov	bx, ax		; put high word	in safe	place
  9044 00000448 31C0                    		xor	ax, ax		; this is the multiply by 65536
  9045 0000044A F7F1                    		div	cx		; bx:ax	now has	time in	100th of seconds
  9046                                  
  9047                                  ; rounding based on the	remainder may be added here
  9048                                  ; the result in	bx:ax is time in 1/100 second.
  9049                                  
  9050 0000044C 89DA                    		mov	dx, bx		
  9051 0000044E B9C800                  		mov	cx, 200		;extract 1/100's
  9052                                  
  9053                                  ; division by 200 is necessary to ensure no overflow--max result
  9054                                  ; is number of seconds in a day/2 = 43200.
  9055                                  
  9056 00000451 F7F1                    		div	cx
  9057 00000453 80FA64                  		cmp	dl, 100		; remainder over 100?
  9058 00000456 7203                    		jb	short noadj
  9059 00000458 80EA64                  		sub	dl, 100		; keep 1/100's less than 100
  9060                                  noadj:					
  9061 0000045B F5                      		cmc			; if we	subtracted 100,	carry is now set
  9062 0000045C 88D3                    		mov	bl, dl		; save 1/100's
  9063                                  
  9064                                  ; to compensate	for dividing by	200 instead of 100, we now multiply
  9065                                  ; by two, shifting a one in if the remainder had exceeded 100.
  9066                                  
  9067 0000045E D1D0                    		rcl	ax, 1		
  9068 00000460 B200                    		mov	dl, 0
  9069 00000462 D1D2                    		rcl	dx, 1
  9070 00000464 B93C00                  		mov	cx, 60		; divide out seconds
  9071 00000467 F7F1                    		div	cx
  9072 00000469 88D7                    		mov	bh, dl		; save the seconds
  9073 0000046B F6F1                    		div	cl		; break	into hours and minutes
  9074 0000046D 86C4                    		xchg	al, ah
  9075                                  
  9076                                  ; time is now in ax:bx (hours, minutes, seconds, 1/100 sec)
  9077                                  
  9078 0000046F 50                      		push	ax
  9079 00000470 89F0                    		mov	ax, si		; daycnt
  9080 00000472 AB                      		stosw
  9081 00000473 58                      		pop	ax
  9082 00000474 AB                      		stosw
  9083 00000475 89D8                    		mov	ax, bx
  9084 00000477 AB                      		stosw
  9085 00000478 F8                      		clc
  9086 00000479 C3                      		retn
  9087                                  
  9088                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
  9089                                  
  9090                                  ; 15/10/2022
  9091                                  
  9092                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
  9093                                  ;
  9094                                  ; procedure : GetTickCnt
  9095                                  ;
  9096                                  ;		Returns the tick count in CX:DX. Takes care of DayCnt in case
  9097                                  ;		of rollover [except when power management driver is in use]. 
  9098                                  ;		Uses the following logic for updating Daycnt
  9099                                  ;
  9100                                  ;		if ( rollover ) {
  9101                                  ;			if ( t_switch )
  9102                                  ;				daycnt++ ;
  9103                                  ;			else
  9104                                  ;				daycnt += rollover ;
  9105                                  ;		}
  9106                                  ;
  9107                                  ; USES : AX
  9108                                  ;
  9109                                  ; RETURNS : CX:DX - tick count
  9110                                  ; MODIFIES : daycnt
  9111                                  ;
  9112                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
  9113                                  
  9114                                  		; 17/10/2022
  9115                                  GetTickCnt:	
  9116 0000047A 30E4                    		xor	ah, ah
  9117 0000047C CD1A                    		int	1Ah		; CLOCK	- GET TIME OF DAY
  9118                                  					; Return: CX:DX	= clock	count
  9119                                  					; AL = 00h if clock was	read or	written	(via AH=0,1) since the previous
  9120                                  					; midnight
  9121                                  					; Otherwise, AL	> 0
  9122 0000047E 803E[F204]00            		cmp	byte [t_switch], 0 ; use old method ? (>0 is yes)
  9123 00000483 7507                    		jnz	short inc_case	; old method assumes  that Int 1Ah returns rollover flag
  9124 00000485 30E4                    		xor	ah, ah		; new method assumes that Int 1Ah returns roll over count
  9125                                  					; and not flag
  9126 00000487 0106[F004]              		add	[daycnt], ax
  9127 0000048B C3                      		retn
  9128                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  9129                                  
  9130                                  inc_case:				
  9131 0000048C 08C0                    		or	al, al
  9132 0000048E 7404                    		jz	short no_rollover
  9133 00000490 FF06[F004]              		inc	word [daycnt]
  9134                                  no_rollover:				
  9135 00000494 C3                      		retn
  9136

  9164                                  ;-----------------------------------------------------------------
  9165                                  ;	disk interface routines
  9166                                  ;-----------------------------------------------------------------
  9167                                  
  9168                                  ; device attribute bits:
  9169                                  ;	bit 6 - get/set map for logical drives and generic ioctl.
  9170                                  
  9171                                  ;MAXERR		equ	5
  9172                                  ;MAX_HD_FMT_ERR	equ	2
  9173                                  
  9174                                  ;LSTDRV	equ 504h
  9175                                  
  9176                                  ; some floppies do not have changeline. as a result, media-check would
  9177                                  ; normally return i-don't-know, the dos would continually reread the fat and
  9178                                  ; discard cached data. we optimize this by implementing a logical door-latch:
  9179                                  ; it is physically impossible to change a disk in under 2 seconds. we retain
  9180                                  ; the time of the last successful disk operation and compare it with the current
  9181                                  ; time during media-check. if < 2 seconds and at least 1 timer tick has passed,
  9182                                  ; the we say no change. if > 2 seconds then we say i-don't-know. finally, 
  9183                                  ; since we cannot trust the timer to be always available, we record the number 
  9184                                  ; of media checks that have occurred when no apparent time has elapsed. while
  9185                                  ; this number is < a given threshold, we say no change. when it exceeds that
  9186                                  ; threshold, we say i-don't-know and reset the counter to 0. when we store 
  9187                                  ; the time of last successful access, if we see that time has passed too,
  9188                                  ; we reset the counter.
  9189                                  
  9190                                  accessmax	equ	5
  9191                                  
  9192                                  ; due to various bogosities, we need to continually adjust what the head
  9193                                  ; settle time is.  the following algorithm is used:
  9194                                  ;
  9195                                  ;   get the current head settle value.
  9196                                  ;   if it is 0, then
  9197                                  ;	set slow = 15
  9198                                  ;   else
  9199                                  ;	set slow = value
  9200                                  ;   ...
  9201                                  ;*********************************************
  9202                                  ;************ old algorithm ******************
  9203                                  ;*   if we are seeking and writing then
  9204                                  ;*	 use slow
  9205                                  ;*   else
  9206                                  ;*	 use fast
  9207                                  ;*********************************************
  9208                                  ;*********** ibm's requested logic ***********
  9209                                  ;   if we are seeking and writing and not on an at then
  9210                                  ;	use slow
  9211                                  ;   else
  9212                                  ;	use fast
  9213                                  ;   ...
  9214                                  ;   restore current head settle value
  9215                                  ;
  9216                                  ;
  9217                                  ;---------------------------------------
  9218                                  multrk_on	equ	10000000b	;user spcified mutitrack=on, or system turns
  9219                                  					; it on after handling config.sys file as a
  9220                                  					; default value, if multrk_flag = multrk_off1.
  9221                                  multrk_off1	equ	00000000b	;initial value. no "multitrack=" command entered.
  9222                                  multrk_off2	equ	00000001b	;user specified multitrack=off.
  9223                                  
  9224                                  ; close data segment, open Bios_Code segment
  9225                                  
  9226                                  ; 15/10/2022
  9227

  9304                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  9305                                  ; setdrive scans through the data structure of bdss, and returns a pointer to
  9306                                  ; the one that belongs to the drive specified. carry is set if none exists
  9307                                  ; for the drive. Pointer is returned in es:[di]
  9308                                  ;
  9309                                  ;  AL contains the logical drive number.
  9310                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  9311                                  
  9312                                  SetDrive:	
  9313                                  		;les	di, ds:start_bds ; Point es:di to first bds	
  9314 000004CB C43E[1901]              		les	di, [start_bds] ; 19/10/2022
  9315                                  X_Scan_Loop:				
  9316 000004CF 26384505                		cmp	[es:di+5], al	
  9317 000004D3 7409                    		jz	short X_SetDrv
  9318 000004D5 26C43D                  		les	di, [es:di]	; [es:di+BDS.link] ; Go	to next	bds
  9319 000004D8 83FFFF                  		cmp	di, 0FFFFh
  9320 000004DB 75F2                    		jnz	short X_Scan_Loop
  9321 000004DD F9                      		stc
  9322                                  X_SetDrv:				
  9323 000004DE C3                      		retn
  9324                                  
  9325                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  9326                                  
  9327                                  ; 15/10/2022
  9328                                  
  9329                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------
  9330                                  ; if id is f9, have a 96tpi disk else
  9331                                  ; if bit 2 is 0 then media is not removable and could not have changed
  9332                                  ;  otherwise if within 2 secs of last disk operation media could not
  9333                                  ;    have changed, otherwise dont know if media has changed
  9334                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------
  9335                                  
  9336                                  media_chk:				; 2C7h:4EBh = 70h:2A5Bh
  9337 000004DF E8E9FF                  		call	SetDrive
  9338 000004E2 BE0100                  		mov	si, 1
  9339 000004E5 26F6452401              		test	byte [es:di+24h], 1 ; [es:di+BDS.flags+1]
  9340                                  					; fchanged_by_format
  9341 000004EA 7416                    		jz	short WeAreNotFakingIt
  9342                                  		; 12/12/2022
  9343 000004EC 26806524FE              		and	byte [es:di+24h], 0FEh ; ~fchanged_by_format
  9344                                  		;and	word [es:di+23h], 0FEFFh ; [es:di+BDS.flags]
  9345                                  					; ~fchanged_by_format ;	reset flag
  9346 000004F1 C606[1E01]FF            		mov	byte [tim_drv], 0FFh ; -1
  9347                                  					; Ensure that we ask the rom if media has changed
  9348 000004F6 26F6452301              		test	byte [es:di+23h], 1 ; [es:di+BDS.flags]
  9349                                  					; fnon_removable
  9350 000004FB 740C                    		jz	short wehaveafloppy
  9351 000004FD BEFFFF                  		mov	si, 0FFFFh	; Indicate media changed
  9352 00000500 EB2C                    		jmp	short Media_Done ; Media_Done
  9353                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  9354                                  
  9355                                  WeAreNotFakingIt:
  9356                                  		;test	byte [es:di+BDS.flags], fnon_removable			
  9357 00000502 26F6452301              		test	byte [es:di+23h], 1
  9358 00000507 7525                    		jnz	short Media_Done
  9359                                  wehaveafloppy:				
  9360 00000509 31F6                    		xor	si, si		; Presume "I don't know"
  9361                                  
  9362                                  		; If we have a floppy with changeline support, we ask the ROM
  9363                                  		; to determine if media has changed. We do not perform the
  9364                                  		; 2 second check for these drives.
  9365                                  
  9366 0000050B 803E[7700]00            		cmp	byte [fhave96], 0	; Do we	have changeline	support?
  9367 00000510 740A                    		jz	short mChk_NoChangeLine	; Brif not
  9368 00000512 E89E12                  		call	mediacheck	;  Call	into removable routine
  9369 00000515 7236                    		jb	short err_exitj
  9370 00000517 E8F613                  		call	haschange
  9371 0000051A 7512                    		jnz	short Media_Done
  9372                                  mChk_NoChangeLine:
  9373                                  		; If we come here, we have a floppy with no changeline support
  9374                                  			
  9375 0000051C BE0100                  		mov	si, 1		; Presume no change

  9377 00000522 263A4504                		cmp	al, [es:di+4]	; [es:di+BDS.drivenum]
  9378                                  					; Is drive of last access the same?

  9413                                  
  9414                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
  9415                                  
  9416                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  9417                                  ; perform a check on the time passed since the last access for this physical
  9418                                  ; drive.
  9419                                  ; we are accessing the same drive. if the time of last successful access was
  9420                                  ; less than 2 seconds ago, then we may presume that the disk was not changed.
  9421                                  ; returns in si:
  9422                                  ;	0 - if time of last access was >= 2 seconds
  9423                                  ;	1 - if time was < 2 seconds (i.e no media change assumed)
  9424                                  ; registers affected ax,cx,dx, flags.
  9425                                  ;
  9426                                  ;	assume es:di -> bds, ds->Bios_Data
  9427                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  9428                                  
  9429                                  		; 19/10/2022
  9430                                  Check_Time_Of_Access:
  9431 00000553 BE0100                  		mov	si, 1		; presume no change.
  9432 00000556 E821FF                  		call	GetTickCnt	; cx:dx	is the elapsed time
  9433 00000559 268B4547                		mov	ax, [es:di+47h]	; [es:di+BDS.tim_lo]
  9434                                  					; get stored time
  9435 0000055D 29C2                    		sub	dx, ax
  9436 0000055F 268B4549                		mov	ax, [es:di+49h]	; [es:di+BDS.tim_hi]
  9437 00000563 19C1                    		sbb	cx, ax
  9438 00000565 751A                    		jnz	short timecheck_unk ; cx<>0 => >1 hour
  9439 00000567 09D2                    		or	dx, dx		; time must pass
  9440 00000569 7511                    		jnz	short timepassed ; yes, examine max value
  9441 0000056B FE06[1D01]              		inc	byte [accesscount]
  9442 0000056F 803E[1D01]05            		cmp	byte [accesscount], 5 
  9443                                  					; if count is less than threshold, ok
  9444 00000574 720C                    		jb	short timecheck_ret
  9445 00000576 FE0E[1D01]              		dec	byte [accesscount] ; don't let the count wrap
  9446 0000057A EB05                    		jmp	short timecheck_unk ; "i don't know" if media changed
  9447                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  9448                                  
  9449                                  timepassed:				
  9450 0000057C 83FA24                  		cmp	dx, 36		; 18*2 ; 18.2 tics per second.
  9451                                  					; min elapsed time? (2 seconds)
  9452 0000057F 7601                    		jbe	short timecheck_ret ; yes, presume no change
  9453                                  
  9454                                  		; everything indicates that we do not know what has happened.
  9455                                  timecheck_unk:				
  9456 00000581 4E                      		dec	si		; presume i don't know
  9457                                  timecheck_ret:				
  9458 00000582 C3                      		retn
  9459                                  
  9460                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  9461                                  ; 15/10/2022
  9462                                  Err_Exitj2:
  9463 00000583 EBC8                    		jmp	short err_exitj
  9464                                  
  9465                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  9466                                  
  9467                                  ; 15/10/2022

  9469                                  ; ==========================================================================
  9470                                  ; Build a valid bpb for the disk in the drive.

  9472                                  
  9473                                  		; 19/10/2022

  9478                                  					; fnon_removable

  9488 0000059D 72B1                    		jb	short ret81
  9489                                  		;cmp	ds:set_id_flag,	2 ; already, volume_label set from boot
  9490 0000059F 803E[0A05]02            		cmp	byte [set_id_flag], 2
  9491                                  		;mov	ds:set_id_flag,	0 ; record to bds table?
  9492 000005A4 C606[0A05]00            		mov	byte [set_id_flag], 0
  9493 000005A9 740A                    		jz	short already_gotbpb ; do not set it again from	root dir
  9494                                  					; otherwise, conventional boot record
  9495                                  		;cmp	ds:fhave96, 0	; do we	have changeline	support?
  9496 000005AB 803E[7700]00            		cmp	byte [fhave96], 0

  9498 000005B2 E86113                  		call	set_volume_id
  9499                                  already_gotbpb:				
  9500 000005B5 83C706                  		add	di, 6		; BDS.BPB
  9501                                  					; return the bpb from the current bds
  9502                                  
  9503                                  ;		 fall into setptrsav, es:di -> result
  9504

  9506                                  
  9507                                  ; 15/10/2022
  9508                                  
  9509                                  ; ==========================================================================
  9510                                  ;Setptrsav is also jumped to from dsk_init (msbio2.asm). In both cases, the
  9511                                  ;pointer to be returned is in es:di. We were incorrectly returning ds:di.
  9512                                  ;Note that this works in most cases because most pointers are in Bios_Data.
  9513                                  ;It fails, for instance, when we install an external drive using driver.sys
  9514                                  ;because then the BDS segment is no longer Bios_Data. 
  9515                                  ;NB: It is fine to corrupt cx because this is not a return value and anyway
  9516                                  ;this returns to Chardev_entry (msbio1.asm) where all registers are 
  9517                                  ;restored before returning to the caller.
  9518                                  ; ==========================================================================

  9535                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------
  9536                                  ; clear ids in bds table. only applied for floppies.

  9539                                  ;output: volid set to "NO NAME    "

  9588                                  
  9589                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  9590                                  ;	getbp - return bpb from the drive specified by the bds.
  9591                                  ;	    if the return_fake_bpb flag is set, then it does nothing.
  9592                                  ;	    note that we never come here for fixed disks.
  9593                                  ;	    for all other cases,
  9594                                  ;	      - it reads boot sector to pull out the bpb
  9595                                  ;	      - if no valid bpb is found, it then reads the fat sector,
  9596                                  ;		to get the fat id byte to build the bpb from there.
  9597                                  ;
  9598                                  ;   inputs:	es:di point to correct bds.
  9599                                  ;
  9600                                  ;   outputs:	fills in bpb in current bds if valid bpb or fat id on disk.
  9601                                  ;		carry set, and al=7 if invalid disk.
  9602                                  ;		carry set and error code in al if other error.
  9603                                  ;		if failed to recognize the boot record, then will set the
  9604                                  ;		set_id_flag to 0.
  9605                                  ;		this routine will only work for a floppy diskette.
  9606                                  ;		     for a fixed disk, it will just return.
  9607                                  ;
  9608                                  ;	****** Note: getbp is a clone of getbp which uses the newer
  9609                                  ;	  segment definitions. It should be migrated towards.
  9610                                  ;	   now es:di has the bds, ds: has Bios_Data
  9611                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  9612                                  
  9613                                  GetBp:		; if returning fake bpb then return bpb as is.
  9614                                  		;test	byte [es:di+BDS.flags], return_fake_bpb|fnon_removable		
  9615 000005F7 26F6452305              		test	byte [es:di+23h], 5
  9616 000005FC 7403                    		jz	short getbp1	; getbp1
  9617 000005FE E99500                  		jmp	getret_exit
  9618                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  9619                                  
  9620                                  getbp1:					
  9621 00000601 51                      		push	cx
  9622 00000602 52                      		push	dx
  9623 00000603 53                      		push	bx
  9624                                  
  9625                                  		; attempt to read in boot sector and determine bpb.
  9626                                  		; we assume that the 2.x and greater dos disks all
  9627                                  		; have a valid boot sector.
  9628                                  
  9629 00000604 E8A400                  		call	readbootsec
  9630 00000607 7209                    		jb	short getbp_err_ret_brdg ; carry set if there was error.
  9631 00000609 09DB                    		or	bx, bx		; bx is	0 if boot sector is valid.
  9632 0000060B 7508                    		jnz	short dofatbpb
  9633 0000060D E8F000                  		call	movbpb		; move bpb into	registers
  9634 00000610 EB57                    		jmp	short Has1
  9635                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  9636                                  
  9637                                  getbp_err_ret_brdg:			
  9638 00000612 E98200                  		jmp	getbp_err_ret
  9639                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  9640                                  
  9641                                  		; we have a 1.x diskette. In this case read in the fat ID byte
  9642                                  		; and fill in bpb from there.
  9643                                  dofatbpb:				
  9644 00000615 E85401                  		call	readfat		; puts media descriptor	byte in	ah
  9645 00000618 72F8                    		jb	short getbp_err_ret_brdg
  9646                                  		;cmp	ds:fhave96, 0	;  changeline support available?
  9647 0000061A 803E[7700]00            		cmp	byte [fhave96], 0 ; 19/10/2022
  9648 0000061F 7403                    		jz	short bpb_nochangeline ; brif not
  9649 00000621 E88D12                  		call	hidensity	; may not return! May add sp, 2	and
  9650                                  					; jump to has1!!!!!! or	has720K

  9653                                  					; ffSmall

  9655 0000062B 80FCF9                  		cmp	ah, 0F9h	; is it	a valid	fat id byte for	3.5" ?
  9656 0000062E 7571                    		jnz	short got_unknown_medium
  9657                                  Has720K:				
  9658                                  		;mov	bx, offset sm92 ; pointer to correct bpb

  9662                                  		; to get spf,csec,spau,spt correctly. it had been wrong if
  9663                                  		; driver.sys is loaded since the bds is inside the driver.sys.

  9672                                  		; 19/10/2022 - Temporary !
  9673                                  		;db	8Ah, 87h, 0, 0	; mov al, [bx+0]
  9674                                  		;db	8Bh, 8Fh, 3, 0	; mov cx, [bx+3]
  9675                                  		;db	8Bh, 97h, 5, 0	; mov dx, [bx+5]
  9676                                  		;db	8Bh, 9Fh, 1, 0	; mov bx, [bx+1]
