  9754                                  
  9755                                  ; 15/10/2022 - Retro DOS 4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)
  9756                                  
  9757                                  ; ----------------------------------------------------------------
  9758                                  ; read in the boot sector. set carry if error in reading sector.
  9759                                  ; bx is set to 1 if the boot sector is invalid, otherwise it is 0.
  9760                                  ;
  9761                                  ;	assumes es:di -> bds, ds-> Bios_Data
  9762                                  ; ----------------------------------------------------------------
  9763                                  
  9764                                  ; 10/03/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
  9765                                  
  9766                                  readbootsec:	
  9767 000006AB B600                    		mov	dh, 0		; head 0
  9768 000006AD B90100                  		mov	cx, 1		; cylinder 0, sector 1
  9769 000006B0 E8C600                  		call	read_sector
  9770 000006B3 724A                    		jb	short err_ret
  9771 000006B5 31DB                    		xor	bx, bx		; assume valid boot sector
  9772                                  
  9773                                  		; put a sanity check for the boot sector in here to detect
  9774                                  		; boot sectors that do not have valid bpbs. we examine the
  9775                                  		; first two bytes - they must contain a long jump (69h) or a
  9776                                  		; short jump (EBh) followed by a nop (90h), or a short jump
  9777                                  		; (E9h). if this test is passed, we further check by examining
  9778                                  		; the signature at the end of the boot sector for the word
  9779                                  		; AA55h. if the signature is not present, we examine the media
  9780                                  		; descriptor byte to see if it is valid. for dos 3.3, this
  9781                                  		; logic is modified a little bit. we are not going to check
  9782                                  		; signature. instead we are going to sanity check the media
  9783                                  		; byte in bpb regardless of the validity of signature. this is
  9784                                  		; to save the already developed commercial products that have
  9785                                  		; good jump instruction and signature but with the false bpb
  9786                                  		; informations
  9787                                  
  9788                                  ; that will crash the diskette drive operation. (for example, symphony diskette).
  9789                                  
  9790                                  		; 19/10/2022
  9791 000006B7 803E[4E01]69            		cmp	byte [disksector], 69h ; is it a direct jump?
  9792 000006BC 7415                    		jz	short check_bpb_mediabyte ; don't need to find a nop
  9793 000006BE 803E[4E01]E9            		cmp	byte [disksector], 0E9h ; dos 2.0 jump?
  9794 000006C3 740E                    		jz	short check_bpb_mediabyte ; no need for	nop
  9795 000006C5 803E[4E01]EB            		cmp	byte [disksector], 0EBh ; how about a short jump?
  9796 000006CA 7531                    		jnz	short invalidbootsec
  9797 000006CC 803E[5001]90            		cmp	byte [disksector+2], 90h ; is next one a nop?
  9798 000006D1 752A                    		jnz	short invalidbootsec
  9799                                  
  9800                                  ; 15/10/5022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)
  9801                                  ;
  9802                                  ;; 10/03/2019
  9803                                  ;; (MSDOS 3.3, MSDISK.ASM, 1988)
  9804                                  ;;
  9805                                  ;; Don't have to perform the following signature check since
  9806                                  ;; we need to check the media byte even with the good signatured diskette.
  9807                                  ;;
  9808                                  ;;check_signature:
  9809                                  ;;		cmp	word [cs:disksector+1FEh],0AA55h ; see if non-ibm
  9810                                  ;;							 ; disk or 1.x media.
  9811                                  ;;		jz	short checksinglesided ; go see if singled sided medium.
  9812                                  ;;					       ; may need some special handling
  9813                                  
  9814                                  ; check for non-ibm disks which do not have the signature AA55h at the
  9815                                  ; end of the boot sector, but still have a valid boot sector. this is done
  9816                                  ; by examining the media descriptor in the boot sector.
  9817                                  
  9818                                  		; 19/10/2022
  9819                                  check_bpb_mediabyte:			
  9820 000006D3 A0[6301]                		mov	al, [disksector+15h]
  9821                                  					; [disksector+EXT_BOOT.BPB+EBPB.MEDIADESCRIPTOR]
  9822 000006D6 24F0                    		and	al, 0F0h
  9823 000006D8 3CF0                    		cmp	al, 0F0h	; allow	for strange media
  9824 000006DA 7521                    		jnz	short invalidbootsec
  9825                                  
  9826                                  ; there were some (apparently a lot of them) diskettes that had been formatted
  9827                                  ; under dos 3.1 and earlier versions which have invalid bpbs in their boot
  9828                                  ; sectors. these are specifically diskettes that were formatted in drives
  9829                                  ; with one head, or whose side 0 was bad. these contain bpbs in the boot
  9830                                  ; sector that have the sec/clus field set to 2 instead of 1, as is standard
  9831                                  ; in dos. in order to support them, we have to introduce a "hack" that will
  9832                                  ; help our build bpb routine to recognise these specific cases, and to
  9833                                  ; set up out copy of the bpb accordingly.
  9834                                  ; we do this by checking to see if the boot sector is off a diskette that
  9835                                  ; is single-sided and is a pre-dos 3.20 diskette. if it is, we set the
  9836                                  ; sec/clus field to 1. if not, we carry on as normal.
  9837                                  
  9838                                  checksinglesided:
  9839 000006DC A0[6301]                		mov	al, [disksector+15h]
  9840 000006DF 3CF0                    		cmp	al, 0F0h
  9841 000006E1 741B                    		jz	short gooddsk
  9842 000006E3 A801                    		test	al, 1
  9843 000006E5 7517                    		jnz	short gooddsk
  9844 000006E7 813E[5601]332E          		cmp	word [disksector+8], 2E33h ; "3."
  9845 000006ED 7507                    		jnz	short mustbeearlier
  9846 000006EF 803E[5801]32            		cmp	byte [disksector+0Ah], 32h ; "2"
  9847 000006F4 7308                    		jnb	short gooddsk
  9848                                  
  9849                                  ; we must have a pre-3.20 diskette. set the sec/clus field to 1
  9850                                  
  9851                                  mustbeearlier:				
  9852 000006F6 C606[5B01]01            		mov	byte [disksector+0Dh], 1
  9853                                  					; [disksector+EXT_BOOT.BPB+EBPB.SECTORSPERCLUSTER]
  9854 000006FB EB01                    		jmp	short gooddsk
  9855                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  9856                                  
  9857                                  invalidbootsec:				
  9858 000006FD 43                      		inc	bx		; indicate that boot sector invalid
  9859                                  		; 10/12/2022
  9860                                  movbpb_ret:
  9861                                  gooddsk:				
  9862 000006FE F8                      		clc
  9863                                  err_ret:
  9864 000006FF C3                      		retn
  9865                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  9866                                  
  9867                                  		; 10/12/2022
  9868                                  ;err_ret:				
  9869                                  		;retn
  9870                                  
  9871                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
  9872                                  
  9873                                  ; 15/10/2022
  9874                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  9875                                  ; 'movbpb' moves the bpb read from the boot sector into registers for use by
  9876                                  ; getbp routine at has1
  9877                                  ;
  9878                                  ; if the set_id_flag is 1, and if an extended boot record, then set volume
  9879                                  ; serial number, volume label, file system id in bds according to
  9880                                  ; the boot record.  after that, this routine will set the set_id_flag to 2
  9881                                  ; to signal that volume label is set already from the extended boot record
  9882                                  ; (so, don't set it again by calling "set_volume_id" routine which uses
  9883                                  ; the volume label in the root directory.)
  9884                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  9885                                  
  9886                                  ; 10/03/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
  9887                                  
  9888                                  		; 19/10/2022
  9889                                  movbpb:	
  9890 00000700 8A36[5B01]              		mov	dh, [disksector+0Dh]
  9891                                  					; disksector+EXT_BOOT.BPB+EBPB.SECTORSPERCLUSTER]
  9892                                  					; sectors per unit
  9893 00000704 8A3E[5F01]              		mov	bh, [disksector+11h]
  9894                                  					; [disksector+EXT_BOOT.BPB+EBPB.ROOTENTRIES]
  9895                                  					; number of directory entries
  9896 00000708 8B0E[6101]              		mov	cx, [disksector+13h]
  9897                                  					; [disksector+EXT_BOOT.BPB+EBPB.TOTALSECTORS]
  9898                                  					; size of drive
  9899 0000070C 8A26[6301]              		mov	ah, [disksector+15h]
  9900                                  					; [disksector+EXT_BOOT.BPB+EBPB.MEDIADESCRIPTOR]
  9901                                  					; media	descriptor
  9902 00000710 A0[6401]                		mov	al, [disksector+16h];
  9903                                  					; [disksector+EXT_BOOT.BPB+EBPB.SECTORSPERFAT]
  9904                                  					; number of fat	sectors
  9905 00000713 8A1E[6601]              		mov	bl, [disksector+18h]
  9906                                  					; [disksector+EXT_BOOT.BPB+EBPB.SECTORSPERTRACK]
  9907                                  					; sectors per track
  9908 00000717 8A16[6801]              		mov	dl, [disksector+1Ah]
  9909                                  					; [disksector+EXT_BOOT.BPB+EBPB.HEADS]
  9910                                  					; number of heads
  9911 0000071B 803E[0A05]01            		cmp	byte [set_id_flag], 1 ; called by get_bpb?
  9912 00000720 75DC                    		jnz	short movbpb_ret
  9913 00000722 E81200                  		call	mov_media_ids
  9914 00000725 7205                    		jb	short movbpb_conv ; conventional boot record?
  9915 00000727 C606[0A05]02            		mov	byte [set_id_flag], 2 ; signals that volume id is set
  9916                                  movbpb_conv:				
  9917 0000072C 803E[7700]01            		cmp	byte [fhave96], 1
  9918 00000731 75CB                    		jnz	short movbpb_ret
  9919 00000733 E8D411                  		call	resetchanged	; reset	flags in bds to	not fchanged.
  9920                                  		; 10/12/2022
  9921                                  		; cf = 0
  9922                                  ;movbpb_ret:				
  9923                                  		;clc
  9924 00000736 C3                      		retn
  9925                                  
  9926                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
  9927                                  
  9928                                  ;copy the boot_serial number, volume id, and filesystem id from the
  9929                                  ;***extended boot record*** in ds:disksector to the bds table pointed
  9930                                  ;by es:di.
  9931                                  
  9932                                  ;in.) es:di -> bds
  9933                                  ;     ds:disksector = valid extended boot record.
  9934                                  ;out.) vol_serial, bds_volid and bds_system_id in bds are set according to
  9935                                  ;      the boot record information.
  9936                                  ;     carry flag set if not an extended bpb.
  9937                                  ;     all registers saved except the flag.
  9938                                  
  9939                                  		; 19/10/2022
  9940                                  mov_media_ids:		
  9941 00000737 803E[7401]29            		cmp	byte [disksector+26h], 29h
  9942                                  					; [disksector+EXT_BOOT.SIG],
  9943                                  					; EXT_BOOT_SIGNATURE
  9944 0000073C 752C                    		jnz	short mmi_not_ext
  9945 0000073E 51                      		push	cx
  9946 0000073F 8B0E[7501]              		mov	cx, [disksector+27h]
  9947                                  					; [disksector+EXT_BOOT.SERIAL]
  9948 00000743 26894D57                		mov	[es:di+57h], cx	; [es:di+BDS.vol_serial]
  9949 00000747 8B0E[7701]              		mov	cx, [disksector+29h]
  9950                                  					; [disksector+EXT_BOOT.SERIAL+2]
  9951 0000074B 26894D59                		mov	[es:di+59h], cx	; [es:di+BDS.vol_serial+2]
  9952 0000074F 57                      		push	di
  9953 00000750 56                      		push	si
  9954 00000751 B90B00                  		mov	cx, 11		; size_of_EXT_BOOT_VOL_LABEL
  9955 00000754 BE[7901]                		mov	si, disksector+2Bh
  9956                                  		;mov	si, (offset disksector+2Bh) ;
  9957                                  					; disksector+EXT_BOOT.VOL_LABEL
  9958 00000757 83C74B                  		add	di, 75		; BDS.volid
  9959 0000075A F3A4                    		rep movsb
  9960                                  		;mov	cx, 8		; size_of_EXT_SYSTEM_ID
  9961                                  		; 10/12/2022
  9962 0000075C B108                    		mov	cl, 8 ; cx = 8
  9963 0000075E BE[8401]                		mov	si, disksector+36h
  9964                                  		;mov	si, (offset disksector+36h) ; disksector+EXT_BOOT.SYSTEM_ID
  9965 00000761 83C705                  		add	di, 5		; (BDS.filesys_id-BDS.volid)-size_of_EXT_BOOT_VOL_LABEL
  9966 00000764 F3A4                    		rep movsb
  9967 00000766 5E                      		pop	si
  9968 00000767 5F                      		pop	di
  9969 00000768 59                      		pop	cx
  9970                                  		; 10/12/2022
  9971                                  		; cf = 0
  9972                                  		;clc		; this clc is not required (16/06/2019 - Erdogan Tan)
  9973                                  				; (20/09/2022)
  9974 00000769 C3                      		retn
  9975                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  9976                                  
  9977                                  mmi_not_ext:				
  9978 0000076A F9                      		stc
  9979 0000076B C3                      		retn
  9980                                  
  9981                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
  9982                                  
  9983                                  ; 15/10/2022
  9984                                  ; --------------------------------------------------------------
  9985                                  ; read in the fat sector and get the media byte from it.
  9986                                  ; input : es:di -> bds
  9987                                  ; output:
  9988                                  ;	  carry set if an error occurs, ax contains error code.
  9989                                  ;	  otherwise, ah contains media byte on exit
  9990                                  ; --------------------------------------------------------------
  9991                                  
  9992                                  readfat:	
  9993                                  		;mov	dh, 0
  9994                                  		; 10/12/2022
  9995 0000076C 30F6                    		xor	dh, dh
  9996 0000076E B90200                  		mov	cx, 2		; head 0
  9997                                  					; cylinder 0, sector 2
  9998 00000771 E80500                  		call	read_sector
  9999 00000774 7202                    		jb	short bad_fat_ret
 10000 00000776 8A27                    		mov	ah, [bx]	; media	byte
 10001                                  bad_fat_ret:				
 10002 00000778 C3                      		retn
 10003                                  
 10004                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 10005                                  
 10006                                  ; 15/10/2022
 10007                                  
 10008                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 10009                                  ; read a single sector into the temp buffer.
 10010                                  ; perform three retries in case of error.
 10011                                  ;   inputs:	es:[di].bds_drivenum has physical drive to use
 10012                                  ;		cx has sector and cylinder
 10013                                  ;		dh has head
 10014                                  ;		es:di has bds
 10015                                  ;		ds has Bios_Data
 10016                                  ;
 10017                                  ;   outputs:	carry clear
 10018                                  ;		    Bios_Data:bx point to sector
 10019                                  ;		       (note: some callers assume location of buffer)
 10020                                  ;
 10021                                  ;		carry set
 10022                                  ;		    ax has rom error code
 10023                                  ;
 10024                                  ; register bp is preserved.
 10025                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 10026                                  
 10027                                  ; 10/03/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 10028                                  
 10029                                  		; 19/10/2022
 10030                                  read_sector:	
 10031 00000779 55                      		push	bp
 10032 0000077A BD0300                  		mov	bp, 3		; make 3 attempts
 10033 0000077D 268A5504                		mov	dl, [es:di+4]	; [es:di+BDS.drivenum]
 10034 00000781 BB[4E01]                		mov	bx, disksector	; get es:bx to point to	buffer
 10035                                  rd_ret:					
 10036 00000784 06                      		push	es
 10037 00000785 1E                      		push	ds
 10038 00000786 07                      		pop	es
 10039 00000787 B80102                  		mov	ax, 201h
 10040 0000078A CD13                    		int	13h		; DISK - READ SECTORS INTO MEMORY
 10041                                  					; AL = number of sectors to read, CH = track, CL = sector
 10042                                  					; DH = head, DL	= drive, ES:BX -> buffer to fill
 10043                                  					; Return: CF set on error, AH =	status,	AL = number of sectors read
 10044 0000078C 07                      		pop	es
 10045 0000078D 734A                    		jnb	short okret2
 10046                                  rd_rty:					
 10047 0000078F E87604                  		call	again		; reset	disk, decrement	bp, preserve ax
 10048 00000792 7442                    		jz	short err_rd_ret
 10049 00000794 26F6452301              		test	byte [es:di+23h], 1
 10050                                  		;test	byte ptr [es:di+23h], 1	; [es:di+BDS.flags]
 10051                                  					; fnon_removable
 10052 00000799 75E9                    		jnz	short rd_ret
 10053 0000079B 803E[3806]00            		cmp	byte [media_set_for_format], 0
 10054 000007A0 7510                    		jnz	short rd_skip1_dpt
 10055 000007A2 50                      		push	ax
 10056 000007A3 1E                      		push	ds		; for retry, set the head settle time to 0Fh
 10057 000007A4 C536[2D01]              		lds	si, [dpt]
 10058                                  		;mov	al, [si+9]	; [si+DISK_PARMS.DISK_HEAD_STTL]
 10059                                  		;mov	byte [si+9], 15 ; [si+DISK_PARMS.DISK_HEAD_STTL]
 10060                                  		;			; NORMSETTLE
 10061                                  		; 12/12/2022
 10062 000007A8 B00F                    		mov	al, 15
 10063 000007AA 864409                  		xchg	al, [si+9]
 10064                                  		; 
 10065 000007AD 1F                      		pop	ds
 10066 000007AE A2[2A01]                		mov	[save_head_sttl], al
 10067 000007B1 58                      		pop	ax
 10068                                  rd_skip1_dpt:				
 10069 000007B2 06                      		push	es
 10070 000007B3 1E                      		push	ds
 10071 000007B4 07                      		pop	es
 10072 000007B5 B80102                  		mov	ax, 201h
 10073 000007B8 CD13                    		int	13h		; DISK - READ SECTORS INTO MEMORY
 10074                                  					; AL = number of sectors to read, CH = track, CL = sector
 10075                                  					; DH = head, DL	= drive, ES:BX -> buffer to fill
 10076                                  					; Return: CF set on error, AH =	status,	AL = number of sectors read
 10077 000007BA 07                      		pop	es
 10078 000007BB 9C                      		pushf
 10079 000007BC 803E[3806]00            		cmp	byte [media_set_for_format], 0
 10080 000007C1 750E                    		jnz	short rd_skip2_dpt
 10081 000007C3 50                      		push	ax
 10082 000007C4 A0[2A01]                		mov	al, [save_head_sttl]
 10083 000007C7 1E                      		push	ds
 10084 000007C8 C536[2D01]              		lds	si, [dpt]
 10085 000007CC 884409                  		mov	[si+9],	al	; [si+DISK_PARMS.DISK_HEAD_STTL]
 10086 000007CF 1F                      		pop	ds
 10087 000007D0 58                      		pop	ax
 10088                                  rd_skip2_dpt:				
 10089 000007D1 9D                      		popf
 10090 000007D2 7305                    		jnb	short okret2
 10091 000007D4 EBB9                    		jmp	short rd_rty
 10092                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 10093                                  
 10094                                  err_rd_ret:				
 10095 000007D6 B2FF                    		mov	dl, 0FFh	; make sure we ask rom if media	has changed
 10096                                  					; return error
 10097 000007D8 F9                      		stc
 10098                                  
 10099                                  ; update information pertaining to last drive accessed, time of access, last
 10100                                  ; track accessed in that drive.
 10101                                  
 10102                                  okret2:					
 10103 000007D9 8816[7600]              		mov	[step_drv], dl	; set up for head settle logic in disk
 10104 000007DD 8816[1E01]              		mov	[tim_drv], dl	; save drive last accessed
 10105 000007E1 26886D46                		mov	[es:di+46h], ch	; [es:di+BDS.track]
 10106                                  					; save last track accessed on this drive
 10107                                  					; preserve flags in case error occurred
 10108 000007E5 9C                      		pushf
 10109 000007E6 E8FF03                  		call	set_tim
 10110 000007E9 9D                      		popf			; restore flags
 10111 000007EA 5D                      		pop	bp
 10112 000007EB C3                      		retn
 10113                                  
 10114                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 10115                                  ;	disk open/close routines
 10116                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 10117                                  
 10118                                  dsk_open:				; 2C7h:80Ah = 70h:2D7Ah
 10119 000007EC 803E[7700]00            		cmp	byte [fhave96], 0
 10120 000007F1 7407                    		jz	short dsk_open_exit ; done if no changeline support
 10121 000007F3 E8D5FC                  		call	SetDrive	; get bds for drive
 10122 000007F6 26FF4520                		inc	word [es:di+20h] ; [es:di+BDS.opcnt]
 10123                                  dsk_open_exit:	
 10124                                  		; 10/12/2022
 10125                                  		; cf = 0			
 10126                                  		;clc		; CF is	already	ZERO here (18/09/2022, MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)
 10127                                  				; (19/07/2019 -	Erdogan	Tan - MSDOS 6.0	IO.SYS - retrodos4.s)
 10128 000007FA C3                      		retn
 10129                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 10130                                  
 10131                                  dsk_close:				; 2C7h:81Ah = 70h:2D8Ah
 10132 000007FB 803E[7700]00            		cmp	byte [fhave96], 0
 10133 00000800 740E                    		jz	short exitjx	; done if no changeline	support
 10134 00000802 E8C6FC                  		call	SetDrive	; get bds for drive
 10135 00000805 26837D2000              		cmp	word [es:di+20h], 0 ; [es:di+BDS.opcnt]
 10136 0000080A 7404                    		jz	short exitjx	; watch	out for	wrap
 10137 0000080C 26FF4D20                		dec	word [es:di+20h]
 10138                                  exitjx:					
 10139                                  		; 10/12/2022
 10140                                  		; cf = 0
 10141                                  		;clc		; CF is	already	ZERO here (18/09/2022, MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)
 10142                                  				; (19/07/2019 -	Erdogan	Tan - MSDOS 6.0	IO.SYS - retrodos4.s)
 10143 00000810 C3                      		retn
 10144                                  
 10145                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 10146                                  ;		disk removable routine
 10147                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 10148                                  
 10149                                  		; al is	unit #
 10150                                  dsk_rem:				; 2C7h:831h = 70h:2DA1h
 10151 00000811 E8B7FC                  		call	SetDrive	; get bds for this drive
 10152                                  		;test	byte [es:di+BDS.flags], fnon_removable
 10153 00000814 26F6452301              		test	byte [es:di+23h], 1
 10154                                  		;jnz	short x_bus_exit ; non_rem
 10155 00000819 7501                    		jnz	short non_rem	; 15/10/2022
 10156                                  		; 10/12/2022
 10157                                  		; cf = 0
 10158                                  		;clc			; CF is already ZERO here
 10159                                  					; 15/10/2022
 10160 0000081B C3                      		retn
 10161                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 10162                                  
 10163                                  non_rem:
 10164                                  x_bus_exit:				
 10165 0000081C B403                    		mov	ah, 3		; 2C7h:83Dh = 0070h:2DADh
 10166                                  					; return busy status
 10167 0000081E F9                      		stc
 10168                                  dsk_ret:				
 10169 0000081F C3                      		retn
 10170                                  
 10171                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 10172                                  ;		disk i/o routines

 10174

 10204                                  ; 15/10/2022
 10205                                  ; 10/03/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 10206                                  
 10207                                  ;-----------------------------------------------------------
 10208                                  ; miscellaneous odd jump routines. 
 10209                                  ; moved out of mainline for speed.
 10210                                  
 10211                                  ; if we have a system where we have virtual drives, we need 
 10212                                  ; to prompt the user to place the correct disk in the drive.
 10213                                  ;
 10214                                  ;	assume es:di -> bds, ds:->Bios_Data
 10215                                  ;-----------------------------------------------------------
 10216                                  
 10217                                  		; 19/10/2022
 10218                                  checksingle:		
 10219 0000083B 50                      		push	ax
 10220 0000083C 53                      		push	bx
 10221 0000083D 268B5D23                		mov	bx, [es:di+23h]	; [es:di+BDS.flags]
 10222                                  
 10223                                  ; if hard drive, cannot change disk.
 10224                                  ; if current owner of physical drive, no need to change diskette.
 10225                                  
 10226 00000841 F6C321                  		test	bl, 21h		; fnon_removable|fi_own_physical
 10227 00000844 7573                    		jnz	short singleret
 10228 00000846 F6C310                  		test	bl, 10h		; fi_am_mult
 10229                                  					; is there a drive sharing this	physical drive?
 10230 00000849 746E                    		jz	short singleret
 10231                                  
 10232                                  
 10233                                  ; look for the previous owner of this physical drive
 10234                                  ; and reset its ownership flag.
 10235                                  
 10236 0000084B 268A4504                		mov	al, [es:di+4]	; [es:di+BDS.drivenum]
 10237                                  					; get physical drive number
 10238 0000084F 06                      		push	es		; preserve pointer to current bds
 10239 00000850 57                      		push	di
 10240 00000851 C43E[1901]              		les	di, [start_bds] ; get first bds
 10241                                  scan_list:				
 10242 00000855 26384504                		cmp	[es:di+4], al
 10243 00000859 7553                    		jnz	short scan_skip	; Not our drive. Try next bds.
 10244 0000085B B320                    		mov	bl, 20h	; ' '   ; fi_own_physical ; test ownership flag
 10245 0000085D 26845D23                		test	[es:di+23h], bl
 10246 00000861 744B                    		jz	short scan_skip	; he doesn't own it either. continue
 10247 00000863 26305D23                		xor	[es:di+23h], bl	; reset	ownership flag
 10248 00000867 5F                      		pop	di		; restore pointer to current bds
 10249 00000868 07                      		pop	es
 10250 00000869 26085D23                		or	[es:di+23h], bl	; ; set	ownership flag
 10251                                  
 10252                                  ; we examine the fsetowner flag. if it is set, then we are using the code in
 10253                                  ; checksingle to just set the owner of a drive. we must not issue the prompt
 10254                                  ; in this case.
 10255 0000086D 803E[7A00]01            		cmp	byte [fsetowner], 1
 10256 00000872 7517                    		jnz	short not_fsetowner
 10257                                  		;cmp	byte ptr es:[di+4], 0 ;	are we handling	drive number 0 ?
 10258 00000874 26807D0400              		cmp	byte [es:di+4], 0
 10259 00000879 753E                    		jnz	short singleret
 10260 0000087B 268A4505                		mov	al, [es:di+5]
 10261                                  		;mov	al, es:[di+5]	; [es:di+BDS.drivelet]
 10262                                  					; get the DOS drive letter
 10263 0000087F 06                      		push	es
 10264 00000880 8E06[1A00]              		mov	es, [zeroseg]
 10265 00000884 26A20405                		mov	[es:LSTDRV], al
 10266                                  		;mov	es:504h, al	; [es:LSTDRV]
 10267                                  					; set up sdsb
 10268 00000888 07                      		pop	es		; restore bds pointer
 10269 00000889 EB2E                    		jmp	short singleret
 10270                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 10271                                  
 10272                                  ; to support "backward" compatibility with ibm's "single drive status byte"
 10273                                  ; we now check to see if we are in a single drive system and the application
 10274                                  ; has "cleverly" diddled the sdsb
 10275                                  
 10276                                  not_fsetowner:				
 10277 0000088B 803E[7800]02            		cmp	byte [single], 2 ; if (single_drive_system)
 10278 00000890 7517                    		jnz	short ignore_sdsb
 10279 00000892 50                      		push	ax
 10280 00000893 268A4505                		mov	al, [es:di+5]	; if (curr_drv == req_drv)
 10281 00000897 88C4                    		mov	ah, al
 10282 00000899 06                      		push	es
 10283 0000089A 8E06[1A00]              		mov	es, [zeroseg]
 10284 0000089E 2686060405              		xchg	al, [es:LSTDRV]
 10285                                  		;xchg	al, es:504h	; [es:LSTDRV]
 10286                                  					; then swap(curr_drv,req_drv)
 10287 000008A3 07                      		pop	es
 10288 000008A4 38C4                    		cmp	ah, al		; else
 10289 000008A6 58                      		pop	ax		; swap(curr_drv,req_drv)
 10290 000008A7 7410                    		jz	short singleret	; issue	swap_dsk_msg
 10291                                  ignore_sdsb:				
 10292 000008A9 E8800E                  		call	swpdsk
 10293 000008AC EB0B                    		jmp	short singleret
 10294                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 10295                                  
 10296                                  scan_skip:	
 10297 000008AE 26C43D                  		les	di, [es:di]			
 10298                                  		;les	di, es:[di]	; [es:di+BDS.link]
 10299                                  					; go to	next bds
 10300 000008B1 83FFFF                  		cmp	di, 0FFFFh	; end of list?
 10301 000008B4 759F                    		jnz	short scan_list	; ontinue until	hit end	of list
 10302 000008B6 F9                      		stc
 10303 000008B7 5F                      		pop	di		; restore current bds
 10304 000008B8 07                      		pop	es
 10305                                  
 10306                                  singleret:

 10308 000008BA 58                      		pop	ax
 10309 000008BB C3                      		retn

 10313                                  baddrive:

 10315 000008BE EB02                    		jmp	short baddrive_ret

 10317                                  
 10318                                  unformatteddrive:

 10327                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 10328                                  
 10329                                  ; 15/10/52022
 10330                                  
 10331                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 10332                                  ;	disk i/o handler
 10333                                  ;
 10334                                  ;	al = drive number (0-6)
 10335                                  ;	ah = media descriptor
 10336                                  ;	cx = sector count
 10337                                  ;	dx = first sector (low)
 10338                                  ;	[start_sec_h] = first sector (high)  32 bit calculation.
 10339                                  ;	ds = cs
 10340                                  ;	es:di = transfer address
 10341                                  ;	[rflag]=operation (2=read, 3=write)
 10342                                  ;	[verify]=1 for verify after write
 10343                                  ;
 10344                                  ;	if successful carry flag = 0
 10345                                  ;	  else cf=1 and al contains error code
 10346                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 10347                                  
 10348                                  diskrd:	
 10349                                  		;mov	ds:rflag, 2	; romread
 10350                                  		; 19/10/2022
 10351 000008C4 C606[2001]02            		mov	byte [rflag], 2 ; romread
 10352                                  
 10353                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 10354                                  
 10355                                  		; 19/10/2022
 10356                                  diskio:
 10357 000008C9 89FB                    		mov	bx, di		; es:bx	= transfer address
 10358 000008CB 8C06[3705]              		mov	[xfer_seg], es	; save transfer	segment
 10359 000008CF E8F9FB                  		call	SetDrive
 10360 000008D2 268A4510                		mov	al, [es:di+10h]	; [es:di+BDS.media]
 10361 000008D6 A2[1F01]                		mov	[medbyt], al
 10362                                  		;jcxz	short ioret
 10363 000008D9 E3E8                    		jcxz	ioret
 10364                                  
 10365                                  ; see if the media is formatted or not by checking the flags field in
 10366                                  ; in the bds. if it is unformatted we cannot allow i/o, so we should
 10367                                  ; go to the error exit at label unformatteddrive.
 10368                                  
 10369 000008DB 26F6452402              		test	byte [es:di+24h], 2
 10370                                  		;test	byte ptr es:[di+24h], 2	; [es:di+BDS.flags+1]
 10371                                  					; unformatted_media
 10372 000008E0 75DE                    		jnz	short unformatteddrive
 10373 000008E2 890E[2201]              		mov	[seccnt], cx	; save sector count
 10374 000008E6 8926[3501]              		mov	[spsav], sp	; save sp
 10375                                  
 10376                                  ; ensure that we are trying to access valid sectors on the drive
 10377                                  
 10378 000008EA 89D0                    		mov	ax, dx
 10379 000008EC 31F6                    		xor	si, si
 10380 000008EE 01CA                    		add	dx, cx
 10381 000008F0 83D600                  		adc	si, 0
 10382 000008F3 26837D0E00              		cmp	word [es:di+0Eh], 0 ; [es:di+BDS.totalsecs16]
 10383                                  					; > 32 bit sector ?
 10384 000008F8 740D                    		jz	short sanity32
 10385 000008FA 83FE00                  		cmp	si, 0
 10386 000008FD 75BD                    		jnz	short baddrive
 10387 000008FF 263B550E                		cmp	dx, [es:di+0Eh]	; [es:di+BDS.totalsecs16]
 10388 00000903 77B7                    		ja	short baddrive
 10389 00000905 EB12                    		jmp	short sanityok
 10390                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 10391                                  
 10392                                  sanity32:				
 10393 00000907 0336[2B05]              		add	si, [start_sec_h]
 10394 0000090B 263B751D                		cmp	si, [es:di+1Dh]	; [es:di+BDS.totalsecs32+2]
 10395 0000090F 7208                    		jb	short sanityok
 10396 00000911 77A9                    		ja	short baddrive
 10397 00000913 263B551B                		cmp	dx, [es:di+1Bh]	; [es:di+BDS.totalsecs32]
 10398 00000917 77A3                    		ja	short baddrive
 10399                                  
 10400                                  sanityok:				
 10401 00000919 8B16[2B05]              		mov	dx, [start_sec_h]
 10402 0000091D 26034517                		add	ax, [es:di+17h]	; [es:di+BDS.hiddensecs]
 10403 00000921 26135519                		adc	dx, [es:di+19h]	; [es:di+BDS.hiddensecs+2]
 10404                                  
 10405                                  ; now dx;ax have the physical first sector.
 10406                                  ; since the following procedures is going to destroy ax, let's
 10407                                  ; save it temporarily to saved_word.
 10408                                  
 10409 00000925 A3[2D05]                		mov	[saved_word], ax ; save the sector number (low)
 10410                                  
 10411                                  ; set up pointer to disk base table in [dpt]. we cannot assume that iosetup
 10412                                  ; will do it because we will skip the set up stuff with hard disks.
 10413                                  
 10414 00000928 06                      		push	es
 10415 00000929 8E06[1A00]              		mov	es, [zeroseg]
 10416 0000092D 26C4367800              		les	si, [es:DSKADR]
 10417                                  		;les	si, es:78h	; [es:DSKADR]
 10418                                  					; current disk parm table
 10419 00000932 8936[2D01]              		mov	[dpt], si
 10420 00000936 8C06[2F01]              		mov	[dpt+2], es
 10421 0000093A 07                      		pop	es

 10423                                  					; fnon_removable
 10424 00000940 7510                    		jnz	short skip_setup
 10425 00000942 E8F6FE                  		call	checksingle
 10426                                  
 10427                                  ; check to see if we have previously noted a change line. the routine
 10428                                  ; returns if everything is ok. otherwise, it pops off the stack and returns
 10429                                  ; the proper error code.
 10430                                  
 10431 00000945 803E[7700]00            		cmp	byte [fhave96], 0 ; do we have changeline support?
 10432 0000094A 7403                    		jz	short diskio_nochangeline ; brif not
 10433 0000094C E8AB0E                  		call	checklatchio	; will do a sneaky pop stack return
 10434                                  					; if a disk error occurs
 10435                                  diskio_nochangeline:

 10437                                  
 10438                                  ; now the settle values are correct for the following code
 10439                                  
 10440                                  skip_setup:
 10441                                  
 10442                                  ; 32 bit sector calculation.
 10443                                  ; dx:[saved_word] = starting sector number.
 10444                                  				
 10445 00000952 89D0                    		mov	ax, dx
 10446 00000954 31D2                    		xor	dx, dx
 10447 00000956 26F77513                		div	word [es:di+13h] ; [es:di+BDS.secpertrack]
 10448                                  					 ; divide by sec per track
 10449 0000095A A3[2905]                		mov	[temp_h], ax
 10450 0000095D A1[2D05]                		mov	ax, [saved_word]
 10451 00000960 26F77513                		div	word [es:di+13h] ; [es:di+BDS.secpertrack]
 10452                                  					; now, [temp_h]:ax = track #, dx = sector
 10453                                  		;inc	dl		; sector number	is 1 based.
 10454                                  		; 18/12/2022
 10455 00000964 42                      		inc	dx
 10456 00000965 8816[3101]              		mov	[cursec], dl	; save current sector
 10457 00000969 268B4D15                		mov	cx, [es:di+15h]	; es:di+BDS.heads]
 10458                                  					; get number of	heads
 10459 0000096D 50                      		push	ax
 10460 0000096E 31D2                    		xor	dx, dx
 10461 00000970 A1[2905]                		mov	ax, [temp_h]	; divide tracks	by heads per cylinder
 10462 00000973 F7F1                    		div	cx
 10463 00000975 A3[2905]                		mov	[temp_h], ax
 10464 00000978 58                      		pop	ax
 10465 00000979 F7F1                    		div	cx		; now, [temp_h]:ax = cylinder #, dx = head
 10466 0000097B 833E[2905]00            		cmp	word [temp_h], 0
 10467 00000980 7714                    		ja	short baddrive_brdg
 10468 00000982 3D0004                  		cmp	ax, 1024	; 2^10 currently maxium	for track #.
 10469 00000985 770F                    		ja	short baddrive_brdg

 10471 0000098B A3[3301]                		mov	[curtrk], ax	; save current track
 10472                                  
 10473                                  ; we are now set up for the i/o. normally, we consider the dma boundary
 10474                                  ; violations here. not true. we perform the operation as if everything is
 10475                                  ; symmetric; let the int 13 handler worry about the dma violations.
 10476

 10478 00000991 E88400                  		call	block		; (cas - call/ret)

 10480                                  		;retn
 10481                                  		; 18/12/2022

 10491                                  ;--------------------------------------------------------------
 10492                                  ; set the drive-last-accessed flag for diskette only. 
 10493                                  ; we know that the hard disk will not be removed.
 10494                                  ; es:di -> current bds.
 10495                                  ; ds -> Bios_Data
 10496                                  ; ax,cx,si are destroyed.

 10498                                  
 10499                                  		; 19/10/2022
 10500                                  iosetup:	
 10501 00000999 268A4504                		mov	al, [es:di+4]	; [es:di+BDS.drivenum]
 10502 0000099D A2[1E01]                		mov	[tim_drv], al	; save drive letter
 10503                                  
 10504                                  ; determine proper head settle values
 10505                                  
 10506 000009A0 803E[3806]00            		cmp	byte [media_set_for_format], 0

 10509 000009AA 1E                      		push	ds
 10510 000009AB C536[2D01]              		lds	si, [dpt]	; get pointer to disk base table
 10511 000009AF 884404                  		mov	[si+4],	al
 10512 000009B2 8A440A                  		mov	al, [si+10]	; [si+DISK_PARMS.DISK_MOTOR_STRT]
 10513 000009B5 8A6404                  		mov	ah, [si+4]	; [si+DISK_PARMS.DISK_EOT]
 10514 000009B8 1F                      		pop	ds

 10516 000009BC 8826[2B01]              		mov	[save_eot], ah
 10517                                  
 10518                                  ; for 3.5" drives, both external as well as on the k09, we need to set the
 10519                                  ; motor start time to 4. this checking for every i/o is going to affect
 10520                                  ; performance across the board, but is necessary!!
 10521                                  
 10522 000009C0 1E                      		push	ds

 10529                                  motor_start_ok:
 10530                                  
 10531                                  ; ds:si now points to disk parameter table.
 10532                                  ; get current settle and set fast settle
 10533

 10540                                  					; get settle and set up	for fast
 10541 000009D7 1F                      		pop	ds
 10542 000009D8 A2[2701]                		mov	[settlecurrent], al

 10544                                  					; someone has diddled the settle
 10545 000009DD A2[2801]                		mov	[settleslow], al
 10546                                  skip_dpt_setting:

 10548                                  
 10549                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 10550                                  
 10551                                  ;--------------------------------------------------------------
 10552                                  ; set time of last access, and reset default values in the dpt.
 10553                                  ;
 10554                                  ;	  note: trashes (at least) si

 10558                                  done:

 10565                                  diddle_back:

 10587                                  
 10588                                  ;--------------------------------------------------------------
 10589                                  ;read the number of sectors specified in ax,

 10595                                  block:

 10612                                  
 10613                                  block_floppy:
 10614                                  
 10615                                  ; read at most 1 track worth. perform minimization at sector / track
 10616                                  				
 10617 00000A30 268A4D13                		mov	cl, [es:di+19]	; [es:di+BDS.secpertrack]
 10618 00000A34 FEC1                    		inc	cl
 10619 00000A36 2A0E[3101]              		sub	cl, [cursec]
 10620 00000A3A 30ED                    		xor	ch, ch
 10621 00000A3C 39C8                    		cmp	ax, cx
 10622 00000A3E 7302                    		jnb	short gotmin
 10623 00000A40 89C1                    		mov	cx, ax
 10624                                  
 10625                                  gotmin:
 10626                                  
 10627                                  ; ax is the requested number of sectors to read
 10628                                  ; cx is the number that we can do on this track
 10629                                  					
 10630 00000A42 50                      		push	ax
 10631 00000A43 51                      		push	cx
 10632 00000A44 89C8                    		mov	ax, cx
 10633 00000A46 E80D00                  		call	Disk
 10634 00000A49 59                      		pop	cx
 10635 00000A4A 58                      		pop	ax
 10636                                  
 10637                                  ; cx is the number of sectors just transferred
 10638                                  
 10639 00000A4B 29C8                    		sub	ax, cx		; reduce sectors-remaining by last i/o
 10640 00000A4D D0E1                    		shl	cl, 1
 10641 00000A4F 00CF                    		add	bh, cl		; adjust transfer address
 10642 00000A51 EBC5                    		jmp	short block
 10643                                  dskerr_brdg:				
 10644 00000A53 E9EC00                  		jmp	dskerr
 10645                                  
 10646                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 10647                                  
 10648                                  ; 15/10/2022
 10649                                  
 10650                                  ;--------------------------------------------------------------
 10651                                  ;perform disk i/o with retries
 10652                                  ; al = number of sectors (1-8, all on one track)
 10653                                  ; es:di point to drive parameters
 10654                                  ; xfer_seg:bx = transfer address 
 10655                                  ;		(must not cross a 64k physical boundary)
 10656                                  ; [rflag] = 2 if read, 3 if write
 10657                                  ; [verify] = 0 for normal, 1 for verify after write
 10658                                  ;--------------------------------------------------------------
 10659                                  
 10660                                  		 ; 19/10/2022
 10661                                  Disk:
 10662                                  
 10663                                  ; Check for hard disk format and
 10664                                  ; if TRUE then set max error count to 2
 10665                                  
 10666 00000A56 BD0500                  		mov	bp, 5		; MAXERR
 10667                                  					; set up retry count
 10668 00000A59 26F6452301              		test	byte [es:di+23h], 1	;
 10669                                  					; [es:di+BDS.flags], fnon_removable
 10670 00000A5E 7408                    		jz	short GetRdWrInd
 10671 00000A60 80FC04                  		cmp	ah, 4		; romverify ; Is this a	track verify?
 10672 00000A63 7403                    		jz	short GetRdWrInd
 10673 00000A65 BD0200                  		mov	bp, 2		; This is not verify so only 1 retry
 10674                                  GetRdWrInd:				
 10675 00000A68 892E[3205]              		mov	[vretry_cnt], bp ; verify op. retry cnt for write-verify
 10676 00000A6C 892E[3405]              		mov	[soft_ecc_cnt], bp ; soft ecc error retry count.
 10677 00000A70 8A26[2001]              		mov	ah, [rflag]	; get read/write indicator
 10678                                  ;retry:
 10679                                  ; 09/12/2022
 10680                                  _retry:					
 10681 00000A74 50                      		push	ax
 10682 00000A75 8B16[3301]              		mov	dx, [curtrk]
 10683 00000A79 26F6452301              		test	byte [es:di+23h], 1
 10684 00000A7E 740B                    		jz	short disk_not_mini
 10685 00000A80 26837D4701              		cmp	word [es:di+47h], 1 ; [es:di+BDS.bdsm_ismini]
 10686                                  					; is this a mini disk? ((logical dos partition))
 10687 00000A85 7504                    		jnz	short disk_not_mini ; no. continue to next.
 10688 00000A87 26035549                		add	dx, [es:di+49h]	; [es:di+BDS.bdsm_hidden_trks]
 10689                                  					; add hidden trks.
 10690                                  disk_not_mini:				
 10691 00000A8B D0CE                    		ror	dh, 1
 10692 00000A8D D0CE                    		ror	dh, 1
 10693 00000A8F 0A36[3101]              		or	dh, [cursec]
 10694 00000A93 89D1                    		mov	cx, dx
 10695 00000A95 86E9                    		xchg	ch, cl		;  cl =	sector,	ch = cylinder
 10696 00000A97 8A36[3201]              		mov	dh, [curhd]	; load current head number and
 10697 00000A9B 268A5504                		mov	dl, [es:di+4]	; physical drive number
 10698                                  					; [es:di+BDS.drivenum]
 10699 00000A9F 26807D2205              		cmp	byte [es:di+22h], 5 ; [es:di+BDS.formfactor], ffHardFile
 10700 00000AA4 7413                    		jz	short do_fast	; hard files use fast speed
 10701                                  
 10702                                  ; if we have [step_drv] set to -1, we use the slow settle time.
 10703                                  ; this helps when we have just done a reset disk operation and the head has
 10704                                  ; been moved to another cylinder - the problem crops up with 3.5" drives.
 10705                                  
 10706 00000AA6 803E[7600]FF            		cmp	byte [step_drv], 0FFh ; -1
 10707 00000AAB 740A                    		jz	short do_writej
 10708 00000AAD 80FC02                  		cmp	ah, 2		; romread
 10709 00000AB0 7407                    		jz	short do_fast
 10710 00000AB2 80FC04                  		cmp	ah, 4		; romverify
 10711 00000AB5 7402                    		jz	short do_fast
 10712                                  do_writej:	
 10713                                  
 10714                                  ; reads always fast, unless we have just done a disk reset operation
 10715                                  			
 10716 00000AB7 EB56                    		jmp	short do_write	; reads	always fast
 10717                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 10718                                  
 10719                                  do_fast:				
 10720 00000AB9 E8FC00                  		call	fastspeed	; change settle	mode
 10721                                  
 10722                                  testerr:				
 10723 00000ABC 7295                    		jb	short dskerr_brdg
 10724                                  
 10725                                  ; set drive and track of last access
 10726                                  
 10727 00000ABE 8816[7600]              		mov	[step_drv], dl
 10728 00000AC2 26886D46                		mov	[es:di+46h], ch	; [es:di+BDS.track]
 10729                                  no_set:
 10730                                  		;cmp	word [wrtverify], 103h
 10731 00000AC6 813E[2001]0301          		cmp	word [rflag], 103h ; check for write and verify
 10732 00000ACC 7452                    		jz	short doverify
 10733                                  noverify:				
 10734 00000ACE 58                      		pop	ax
 10735                                  
 10736                                  ; check the flags word in the bds to see if the drive is non removable
 10737                                  ; if not we needn't do anything special
 10738                                  ; if it is a hard disk then check to see if multi-track operation
 10739                                  ; is specified. if specified we don't have to calculate for the next
 10740                                  ; track since we are already done. so we can go to the exit of this routine.
 10741                                  
 10742 00000ACF 26F6452301              		test	byte [es:di+23h], 1 ; [es:di+BDS.flags]
 10743                                  					; fnon_removable
 10744 00000AD4 7407                    		jz	short its_removable
 10745 00000AD6 F606[2F05]80            		test	byte [multrk_flag], 80h ; multrk_on
 10746 00000ADB 7530                    		jnz	short disk_ret
 10747                                  its_removable:				
 10748 00000ADD 80E13F                  		and	cl, 3Fh		; eliminate cylinder bits from sector
 10749 00000AE0 30E4                    		xor	ah, ah
 10750 00000AE2 2906[2201]              		sub	[seccnt], ax	; reduce count of sectors to go	next sector
 10751 00000AE6 00C1                    		add	cl, al
 10752 00000AE8 880E[3101]              		mov	[cursec], cl
 10753 00000AEC 263A4D13                		cmp	cl, [es:di+13h]	; [es:di+BDS.secpertrack]
 10754                                  					; see if sector/track limit reached
 10755 00000AF0 761B                    		jbe	short disk_ret
 10756 00000AF2 C606[3101]01            		mov	byte [cursec], 1 ; start with first sector of next track
 10757 00000AF7 8A36[3201]              		mov	dh, [curhd]
 10758 00000AFB FEC6                    		inc	dh
 10759 00000AFD 263A7515                		cmp	dh, [es:di+15h]	; [es:di+BDS.heads]
 10760 00000B01 7206                    		jb	short noxor
 10761 00000B03 30F6                    		xor	dh, dh
 10762 00000B05 FF06[3301]              		inc	word [curtrk]
 10763                                  noxor:					
 10764 00000B09 8836[3201]              		mov	[curhd], dh
 10765                                  disk_ret:				
 10766 00000B0D F8                      		clc
 10767 00000B0E C3                      		retn
 10768                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 10769                                  
 10770                                  ; 15/10/2022
 10771                                  
 10772                                  ;--------------------------------------------------------------
 10773                                  ; the request is for write. determine if we are talking about
 10774                                  ; the same track and drive. if so, use the fast speed.
 10775                                  ;--------------------------------------------------------------
 10776                                  
 10777                                  do_write:				
 10778 00000B0F 3A16[7600]              		cmp	dl, [step_drv]
 10779 00000B13 7506                    		jnz	short do_norm	; we have changed drives
 10780 00000B15 263A6D46                		cmp	ch, [es:di+46h]	; [es:di+BDS.track]
 10781 00000B19 749E                    		jz	short do_fast	; we are still on the same track
 10782                                  
 10783                                  do_norm:				
 10784 00000B1B E87500                  		call	normspeed
 10785 00000B1E EB9C                    		jmp	short testerr
 10786                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 10787                                  
 10788                                  ;--------------------------------------------------------------
 10789                                  ; we have a verify request also. get state info and go verify
 10790                                  ;--------------------------------------------------------------
 10791                                  
 10792                                  doverify:				
 10793 00000B20 58                      		pop	ax
 10794 00000B21 50                      		push	ax
 10795 00000B22 B404                    		mov	ah, 4
 10796 00000B24 E89100                  		call	fastspeed
 10797 00000B27 73A5                    		jnb	short noverify
 10798                                  
 10799                                  ; check the error returned in ah to see if it is a soft ecc error.
 10800                                  ; if it is not we needn't do anything special. if it is a soft
 10801                                  ; ecc error then decrement the soft_ecc_cnt error retry count. if
 10802                                  ; this retry count becomes 0 then we just ignore the error and go to
 10803                                  ; no_verify but if we can still try then we call the routine to reset
 10804                                  ; the disk and go to dskerr1 to retry the operation.
 10805                                  
 10806 00000B29 80FC11                  		cmp	ah, 11h		; soft ecc error ?
 10807 00000B2C 750B                    		jnz	short not_softecc_err
 10808 00000B2E FF0E[3405]              		dec	word [soft_ecc_cnt]
 10809 00000B32 749A                    		jz	short noverify	; no more retry
 10810 00000B34 E84405                  		call	ResetDisk	; reset	disk
 10811 00000B37 EB3E                    		jmp	short dskerr1	; retry
 10812                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 10813                                  
 10814                                  not_softecc_err:			; other error.			
 10815 00000B39 E83F05                  		call	ResetDisk
 10816 00000B3C FF0E[3205]              		dec	word [vretry_cnt]
 10817 00000B40 EB1C                    		jmp	short dskerr0
 10818                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 10819                                  
 10820                                  ;--------------------------------------------------------------
 10821                                  ; need to special case the change-line error ah=06h.
 10822                                  ; if we get this, we need to return it.
 10823                                  ;--------------------------------------------------------------
 10824                                  
 10825                                  dskerr:					
 10826 00000B42 803E[7700]00            		cmp	byte [fhave96], 0	; do we	have changeline	support?
 10827 00000B47 7403                    		jz	short dskerr_nochangeline ; brif not
 10828 00000B49 E8220D                  		call	checkio
 10829                                  dskerr_nochangeline:			
 10830 00000B4C 803E[3605]01            		cmp	byte [multitrk_format_flag], 1 ; multi trk format request?
 10831 00000B51 7508                    		jnz	short dochkagain ; no more retry.
 10832 00000B53 BD0100                  		mov	bp, 1
 10833 00000B56 C606[3605]00            		mov	byte [multitrk_format_flag], 0 ; clear the flag.
 10834                                  dochkagain:				
 10835 00000B5B E8AA00                  		call	again
 10836                                  dskerr0:				
 10837 00000B5E 7420                    		jz	short harderr
 10838 00000B60 26F6452301              		test	byte [es:di+23h], 1 ; [es:di+BDS.flags]
 10839                                  					; fnon_removable
 10840 00000B65 7505                    		jnz	short skip_timeout_chk
 10841 00000B67 80FC80                  		cmp	ah, 80h		; timeout?
 10842 00000B6A 7414                    		jz	short harderr
 10843                                  skip_timeout_chk:			
 10844 00000B6C 80FCCC                  		cmp	ah, 0CCh	; write	fault error?
 10845 00000B6F 740A                    		jz	short write_fault_err ;	then, don't retry.
 10846 00000B71 C706[3405]0500          		mov	word [soft_ecc_cnt], 5 ; MAXERR
 10847                                  					; set soft_ecc_cnt back	to maxerr
 10848                                  dskerr1:				
 10849 00000B77 58                      		pop	ax		; restore sector count
 10850                                  		;jmp	retry
 10851                                  		; 09/12/2022
 10852 00000B78 E9F9FE                  		jmp	_retry
 10853                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 10854                                  
 10855                                  write_fault_err:			
 10856 00000B7B BD0100                  		mov	bp, 1		; just retry only once
 10857                                  					; for write fault error.
 10858 00000B7E EBF7                    		jmp	short dskerr1
 10859                                  
 10860                                  		; fall into harderr
 10861                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 10862                                  
 10863                                  ; entry point for routines that call maperror themselves
 10864                                  
 10865                                  harderr:				
 10866 00000B80 E84D00                  		call	maperror
 10867                                  harderr2:				
 10868 00000B83 C606[1E01]FF            		mov	byte [tim_drv], 0FFh
 10869                                  					; force a media check through rom
 10870 00000B88 8B0E[2201]              		mov	cx, [seccnt]	; get count of sectors to go
 10871 00000B8C 8B26[3501]              		mov	sp, [spsav]	; recover entry	stack pointer
 10872                                  
 10873                                  ; since we are performing a non-local goto, restore the disk parameters
 10874                                  
 10875                                  		;jmp	diddleback
 10876                                  		; 09/12/2022
 10877 00000B90 E958FE                  		jmp	diddle_back
 10878                                  
 10879                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 10880                                  
 10881                                  ; change settle value from settlecurrent to whatever is appropriate
 10882                                  ; note that this routine is never called for a fixed disk.
 10883                                  
 10884                                  		; 19/10/2022
 10885                                  normspeed:
 10886 00000B93 803E[3806]00            		cmp	byte [media_set_for_format], 0
 10887 00000B98 751E                    		jnz	short fastspeed
 10888 00000B9A 06                      		push	es
 10889 00000B9B 50                      		push	ax
 10890 00000B9C A0[2801]                		mov	al, [settleslow]
 10891 00000B9F C436[2D01]              		les	si, [dpt]	; current disk parm table
 10892 00000BA3 26884409                		mov	[es:si+9], al	; [es:si+DISK_PARMS.DISK_HEAD_STTL]
 10893 00000BA7 58                      		pop	ax
 10894 00000BA8 07                      		pop	es
 10895 00000BA9 E80C00                  		call	fastspeed
 10896 00000BAC 06                      		push	es
 10897 00000BAD C436[2D01]              		les	si, [dpt]
 10898 00000BB1 26C6440901              		mov	byte [es:si+9], 1 ; [es:si+DISK_PARMS.DISK_HEAD_STTL]
 10899                                  					; 1 is fast settle value
 10900 00000BB6 07                      		pop	es
 10901 00000BB7 C3                      		retn
 10902                                  
 10903                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 10904                                  
 10905                                  ; if the drive has been marked as too big (i.e. starting sector of the
 10906                                  ; partition is > 16 bits, then always return drive not ready.
 10907                                  
 10908                                  fastspeed:		
 10909 00000BB8 26F6451F80              		test	byte [es:di+1Fh], 80h ; [es:di+BDS.fatsiz]
 10910                                  					; ftoobig
 10911 00000BBD 750D                    		jnz	short notready
 10912 00000BBF 06                      		push	es
 10913 00000BC0 8E06[3705]              		mov	es, [xfer_seg]
 10914 00000BC4 CD13                    		int	13h		; DISK -
 10915 00000BC6 8C06[3705]              		mov	[xfer_seg], es
 10916 00000BCA 07                      		pop	es
 10917 00000BCB C3                      		retn
 10918                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 10919                                  
 10920                                  notready:				
 10921 00000BCC F9                      		stc
 10922 00000BCD B480                    		mov	ah, 80h
 10923 00000BCF C3                      		retn
 10924                                  
 10925                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 10926                                  
 10927                                  ; map error returned by rom in ah into corresponding code to be returned to
 10928                                  ; dos in al. trashes di. guaranteed to set carry.
 10929                                  
 10930                                  maperror:	
 10931 00000BD0 51                      		push	cx
 10932 00000BD1 06                      		push	es
 10933 00000BD2 1E                      		push	ds		; set es=Bios_Data
 10934 00000BD3 07                      		pop	es
 10935 00000BD4 88E0                    		mov	al, ah		; put error code in al
 10936 00000BD6 A2[4401]                		mov	[lsterr], al	; terminate list with error code
 10937 00000BD9 B90900                  		mov	cx, 9		; numerr (= errout-errin)
 10938                                  					; number of possible error conditions
 10939 00000BDC BF[3C01]                		mov	di, errin	; point to error conditions
 10940 00000BDF F2AE                    		repne scasb
 10941                                  		; 10/12/2022
 10942 00000BE1 8A4508                  		mov	al, [di+8]	; [di+numerr-1]
 10943                                  					; get translation
 10944                                  		; 19/10/2022 - Temporary ! 
 10945                                  		;db	8Ah, 85h, 8, 0	; mov al, [di+8]
 10946 00000BE4 07                      		pop	es
 10947 00000BE5 59                      		pop	cx
 10948 00000BE6 F9                      		stc			; flag error condition
 10949 00000BE7 C3                      		retn
 10950                                  
 10951                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 10952                                  
 10953                                  ; set the time of last access for this drive.
 10954                                  ; this is done only for removable media. es:di -> bds
 10955                                  
 10956                                  set_tim:		
 10957 00000BE8 50                      		push	ax
 10958 00000BE9 E88EF8                  		call	GetTickCnt	; Does INT 1A ah=0 & updates daycnt
 10959                                  
 10960                                  ; we have the new time. if we see that the time has passed,
 10961                                  ; then we reset the threshold counter...
 10962                                  
 10963 00000BEC 263B5547                		cmp	dx, [es:di+47h]	; [es:di+BDS.tim_lo]
 10964 00000BF0 7506                    		jnz	short setaccess
 10965 00000BF2 263B4D49                		cmp	cx, [es:di+49h]	; [es:di+BDS.tim_hi]
 10966                                  		;jz	short done_set
 10967                                  		; 12/12/2022
 10968 00000BF6 740E                    		je	short done_set2
 10969                                  setaccess:				
 10970 00000BF8 C606[1D01]00            		mov	byte [accesscount], 0
 10971 00000BFD 26895547                		mov	[es:di+47h], dx	; [es:di+BDS.tim_lo]
 10972 00000C01 26894D49                		mov	[es:di+49h], cx	; [es:di+BDS.tim_hi]
 10973                                  done_set:				
 10974 00000C05 F8                      		clc
 10975                                  done_set2:		; 12/12/2022
 10976 00000C06 58                      		pop	ax
 10977 00000C07 C3                      		retn
 10978                                  
 10979                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 10980                                  
 10981                                  ; this routine is called if an error occurs while formatting or verifying.
 10982                                  ; it resets the drive,and decrements the retry count.
 10983                                  ; on entry - ds:di - points to bds for the drive
 10984                                  ;	     bp    - contains retry count
 10985                                  ; on exit    flags indicate result of decrementing retry count
 10986                                  
 10987                                  again:	
 10988 00000C08 E87004                  		call	ResetDisk
 10989 00000C0B 80FC06                  		cmp	ah, 6
 10990 00000C0E 7402                    		jz	short dont_dec_retry_count ; If	it is a	media change error
 10991                                  					; do not decrement retry count.
 10992 00000C10 4D                      		dec	bp		; decrement retry count
 10993 00000C11 C3                      		retn
 10994                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 10995                                  
 10996                                  dont_dec_retry_count:			
 10997 00000C12 08E4                    		or	ah, ah
 10998 00000C14 C3                      		retn

 11010                                  ;
 11011                                  ; NOTE: GetAccessFlag/SetAccessFlag is unpublished function.
 11012                                  ;
 11013                                  ;      This function is intended to give the user to control the
 11014                                  ;      bds table flags of unformatted_media bit.
 11015                                  ;      GetAccessFlag will show the status -
 11016                                  ;	 a_DiskAccess_Control.dac_access_flag = 0 disk i/o not allowed
 11017                                  ;						1 disk i/o allowed
 11018                                  ;      SetAccessFlag will set/reset the unformatted_media bit in flags -
 11019                                  ;	 a_DiskAccess_Control.dac_access_flag = 0 allow disk i/o
 11020                                  ;						1 disallow disk i/o
 11021                                  ; ==========================================================================

 11024

 11026

 11028 00000C15 00                      		db 0
 11029
