 11031                                  %if 0
 11032                                  
 11033                                  IoReadJumpTable: db 8	; ((IoWriteJumpTable-IoReadJumpTable)-1)/2
 11034                                  		dw 0CA7h	; 60h	; GetDeviceParameters
 11035                                  		dw 0EE8h	; 61h	; ReadTrack
 11036                                  		dw 0E86h	; 62h	; VerifyTrack

 11038                                  		dw 0CA3h		; Cmd_Error_Proc

 11042                                  		dw 12C1h	; 68h	; SenseMediaType
 11043                                  
 11044                                  IoWriteJumpTable: db 7	; ((IOC_DC_Table-IoWriteJumpTable)-1)/2
 11045                                  		dw 0CF3h	; 40h	; SetDeviceParameters
 11046                                  		dw 0EEFh	; 41h	; WriteTrack
 11047                                  		dw 0DC1h	; 42h	; FormatTrack
 11048                                  		dw 0CA3h		; Cmd_Error_Proc
 11049                                  		dw 0CA3h		; Cmd_Error_Proc
 11050                                  		dw 0CA3h		; Cmd_Error_Proc

 11053                                  
 11054                                  %endif

 11056                                  		; 09/12/2022
 11057 00000C16 09                      IoReadJumpTable: db ((IoWriteJumpTable-IoReadJumpTable)-1)/2 ; 8

 11104                                  ; ==========================================================================
 11105                                  ; Do_Generic_IOCtl: perform generic ioctl request
 11106                                  ;
 11107                                  ;    input: AL contains logical drive
 11108                                  ;
 11109                                  ;	functions are dispatched through a call. On return, carry indicates
 11110                                  ;	error code in al. Note::bES:b& ds undefined on return from
 11111                                  ;	subfunctions.

 11117                                  do_generic_ioctl:			; 2C7h:0C6Bh = 70h:31DBh

 11119 00000C48 06                      		push	es

 11121 00000C4D 26807F0D08              		cmp	byte [es:bx+0Dh], 8 ; [es:bx+IOCTL_REQ.MAJORFUNCTION]
 11122                                  					; RAWIO

 11124 00000C56 07                      		pop	es
 11125 00000C57 7525                    		jnz	short IoctlFuncErr

 11128                                  		; Would have to preserve al for SetDrive

 11133                                  					; at 2C7h:0C3Ch	= 70h:31ACh
 11134 00000C5C A820                    		test	al, 20h		; GEN_IOCTL_FN_TST ; test of req. function

 11390                                  
 11391                                  ; ==========================================================================
 11392                                  ; FormatTrack:
 11393                                  ; if specialfunction byte is 1,then this is a status call to see if there is
 11394                                  ; rom support for the combination of sec/trk and # of cyln,and if the
 11395                                  ; combination is legal. if specialfunction byte is 0,then format the track.
 11396                                  ;
 11397                                  ; input: ES:di points to bds for drive
 11398                                  ;
 11399                                  ; output:
 11400                                  ;	for status call:
 11401                                  ;	specialfunction byte set to:
 11402                                  ;		0 - rom support + legal combination
 11403                                  ;		1 - no rom support
 11404                                  ;		2 - illegal combination
 11405                                  ;		3 - no media present
 11406                                  ;	carry cleared.
 11407                                  ;
 11408                                  ;	for format track:
 11409                                  ;		carry set if error
 11410                                  ;
 11411                                  ; ==========================================================================
 11412                                  
 11413                                  ; 16/03/2019
 11414                                  
 11415                                  		; 19/10/2022
 11416                                  FormatTrack:
 11417 00000D97 C51E[1200]              		lds	bx, [ptrsav]
 11418 00000D9B C55F13                  		lds	bx, [bx+19]	; [bx+IOCTL_REQ.GENERICIOCTL_PACKET
 11419 00000D9E F60701                  		test	byte [bx], 1	; [bx+A_DEVICEPARAMETERS.DP_SPECIALFUNCTIONS]
 11420                                  					; STATUS_FOR_FORMAT

 11422 00000DA3 1E                      		push	ds
 11423                                  		; 17/10/2022

 11425                                  		;mov	ds, word ptr cs:BIOSDATAWORD ; [cs:Bios_Data_Word]
 11426 00000DA9 E83902                  		call	SetMediaForFormat ; Also moves current Dpt to TempDpt
 11427 00000DAC 1F                      		pop	ds

 11429 00000DAF F8                      		clc
 11430 00000DB0 C3                      		retn
 11431                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 11432

 11462                                  					; about	the illegal combination)

 11561 00000E7C 8B0E[3905]              		mov	cx, [sectorspertrack]
 11562                                  
 11563                                  		; Check specialfunctions to see if DO_FAST_FORMAT has been
 11564                                  		; specified if not we should go to the normal track verification
 11565                                  		; routine. If fast format has been specified we should get the
 11566                                  		; number of tracks to be verified and check it to see if it is
 11567                                  		; > 255. If it is then it is an error and we should go to
 11568                                  		; VerifyTrack_Err. If not multiply the number of tracks by the
 11569                                  		; sectors per track to get the total number of sectors to be
 11570                                  		; verified. This should also be less than equal to 255
 11571                                  		; otherwise we go to same error exit. If everything is okay
 11572                                  		; we initalise cx to the total sectors. use ax as a temporary
 11573                                  		; register.
 11574                                  
 11575                                  					; Special function requested?

 11577 00000E83 7421                    		jz	short NormVerifyTrack

 11580 00000E89 752C                    		jnz	short VerifyTrack_Err ; #tracks > 255
 11581 00000E8B F6E1                    		mul	cl
 11582 00000E8D 08E4                    		or	ah, ah

 11584 00000E91 89C1                    		mov	cx, ax

 11588                                  					; fnon_removable
 11589 00000E98 740C                    		jz	short NormVerifyTrack

 11594                                  		;test	word [multrk_flag], 80h ; MULTI_TRK_ON

 11650                                  
 11651                                  ReadWriteTrack:	
 11652                                  		; save bds pointer segment so we can use it to access
 11653                                  		; our packet. Notice that this is not the standard register
 11654                                  		; assignment for accessing packets
 11655                                  		
 11656                                  		; 19/10/2022

 11659 00000ECD 26C45F13                		les	bx, [es:bx+19]	; [es:bx+IOCTL_REQ.GENERICIOCTL_PACKET]
 11660 00000ED1 268B4703                		mov	ax, [es:bx+3]	; [es:bx+A_TRACKREADWRITEPACKET.TRWP_CYLINDER]
 11661 00000ED5 A3[3301]                		mov	[curtrk], ax

 11664 00000EDF 268B4705                		mov	ax, [es:bx+5]	; [es:bx+A_TRACKREADWRITEPACKET.TRWP_FIRSTSECTOR]
 11665 00000EE3 268B4F07                		mov	cx, [es:bx+7]	; [es:bx+A_TRACKREADWRITEPACKET.TRWP_SECTORSTOREADWRITE]
 11666 00000EE7 26C45F09                		les	bx, [es:bx+9]	; [es:bx+A_TRACKREADWRITEPACKET.TRWP_TRANSFERADDRESS]
 11667                                  					; Get transfer address
 11668

 11670

 11672 00000EEF 07                      		pop	es
 11673                                  
 11674                                  		; Fall into TrackIo
 11675                                  
 11676                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 11677                                  
 11678                                  ; 16/10/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)
 11679                                  
 11680                                  ; ==========================================================================
 11681                                  ;
 11682                                  ; TrackIo:
 11683                                  ;    performs track read/write/verify
 11684                                  ;
 11685                                  ;   input:
 11686                                  ;      rFlag	- 2 = read
 11687                                  ;		  3 = write
 11688                                  ;		  4 = verify
 11689                                  ;      AX	- Index into track table of first sector to io
 11690                                  ;      CX	- Number of sectors to io
 11691                                  ;      Xfer_Seg:BX - Transfer address
 11692                                  ;      ES:DI	- Pointer to bds
 11693                                  ;      CurTrk	- Current cylinder
 11694                                  ;      CurHd	- Current head
 11695                                  ;
 11696                                  ; ==========================================================================
 11697                                  
 11698                                  ; 16/03/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 11699                                  		
 11700                                  		; 19/10/2022
 11701                                  TrackIo:	
 11702                                  					; Procedure `disk' will pop stack to
 11703 00000EF0 8926[3501]              		mov	[spsav], sp	; SpSav	and return if error
 11704 00000EF4 E844F9                  		call	checksingle	; Ensure correct disk is in drv
 11705 00000EF7 803E[3806]01            		cmp	byte [media_set_for_format], 1
 11706                                  					; See if we have already set	disk
 11707 00000EFC 7407                    		jz	short Dptalreadyset ; base table
 11708 00000EFE 50                      		push	ax		; set up tables	and variables for i/o
 11709 00000EFF 51                      		push	cx
 11710 00000F00 E896FA                  		call	iosetup
 11711 00000F03 59                      		pop	cx
 11712 00000F04 58                      		pop	ax
 11713                                  Dptalreadyset:				; Point si at the table entry of the			
 11714 00000F05 BE[3B05]                		mov	si, tracktable	; first sector to be io'd
 11715 00000F08 D1E0                    		shl	ax, 1
 11716 00000F0A D1E0                    		shl	ax, 1
 11717 00000F0C 01C6                    		add	si, ax
 11718                                  
 11719                                  		; WE WANT:
 11720                                  		; CX to	be the number of times we have to loop
 11721                                  		; DX to	be the number of sectors we read on each iteration
 11722                                  		
 11723 00000F0E BA0100                  		mov	dx, 1
 11724                                  		; 12/12/2022
 11725 00000F11 26F6452308              		test	byte [es:di+23h], 8
 11726                                  		;test	word [es:di+35], 8 ; [es:di+BDS.flags]
 11727                                  					; good_tracklayout
 11728 00000F16 7402                    		jz	short ionextsector
 11729                                  		
 11730 00000F18 87D1                    		xchg	dx, cx		; HEY! We can read all secs in one blow
 11731                                  ionextsector:				
 11732 00000F1A 51                      		push	cx
 11733 00000F1B 52                      		push	dx
 11734 00000F1C 46                      		inc	si
 11735 00000F1D 46                      		inc	si		; Skip over the	cylinder and head in
 11736                                  					; the track table
 11737 00000F1E AC                      		lodsb			; Get sector ID	from track table
 11738 00000F1F A2[3101]                		mov	[cursec], al
 11739                                  
 11740                                  		; assumptions for a fixed disk multi-track disk	i/o
 11741                                  		; 1). In the input CX (# of sectors to go) to TrackIo,
 11742                                  		;     only CL is valid.
 11743                                  		; 2). Sector size should be set	to 512 bytes.
 11744                                  		; 3). Good track layout
 11745                                  		
 11746                                  		; 12/12/2022
 11747 00000F22 26F6452301              		test	byte [es:di+23h], 1

 11749                                  					; fnon_removable ; Fixed disk?
 11750 00000F27 7414                    		jz	short IoRemovable ; No
 11751                                  		; 12/12/2022
 11752 00000F29 F606[2F05]80            		test	byte [multrk_flag], 80h
 11753                                  		;test	word [multrk_flag], 80h ; MULTI_TRK_ON
 11754                                  						; Allow multi-track operation?
 11755 00000F2E 740D                    		jz	short IoRemovable ; No,don't do that.
 11756 00000F30 8916[2201]              		mov	[seccnt], dx
 11757 00000F34 89D0                    		mov	ax, dx
 11758 00000F36 E81DFB                  		call	Disk
 11759 00000F39 5A                      		pop	dx
 11760 00000F3A 59                      		pop	cx
 11761 00000F3B F8                      		clc
 11762 00000F3C C3                      		retn
 11763                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 11764                                  
 11765                                  IoRemovable:				
 11766 00000F3D AC                      		lodsb			; Get sector size index	from track
 11767                                  					; table	and save it
 11768 00000F3E 50                      		push	ax
 11769 00000F3F 56                      		push	si
 11770 00000F40 1E                      		push	ds		; Save Bios_Data
 11771 00000F41 50                      		push	ax
 11772 00000F42 8A26[2C01]              		mov	ah, [eot]	; Preserve whatever might be in	ah
 11773                                  					; Fetch	EOT while ds-> Bios_Data
 11774 00000F46 C536[2D01]              		lds	si, [dpt]
 11775 00000F4A 884403                  		mov	[si+3],	al	; [si+DISK_PARMS.DISK_SECTOR_SIZ]
 11776 00000F4D 886404                  		mov	[si+4],	ah	; [si+DISK_PARMS.DISK_EOT]
 11777 00000F50 58                      		pop	ax
 11778 00000F51 1F                      		pop	ds
 11779 00000F52 88D0                    		mov	al, dl
 11780 00000F54 A3[2201]                		mov	[seccnt], ax
 11781 00000F57 E8FCFA                  		call	Disk
 11782 00000F5A 5E                      		pop	si		; Advance buffer pointer by adding
 11783                                  					; sector size
 11784 00000F5B 58                      		pop	ax
 11785 00000F5C E81D00                  		call	SectorSizeIndexToSectorSize
 11786 00000F5F 01C3                    		add	bx, ax
 11787 00000F61 5A                      		pop	dx
 11788 00000F62 59                      		pop	cx
 11789 00000F63 E2B5                    		loop	ionextsector
 11790 00000F65 803E[3806]01            		cmp	byte [media_set_for_format], 1
 11791                                  		;jz	short NoNeedDone
 11792                                  		; 12/12/2022
 11793 00000F6A 7404                    		je	short NoNeedDone2
 11794 00000F6C E872FA                  		call	done		; set time of last access, and reset
 11795                                  					; entries in Dpt.
 11796                                  NoNeedDone:				
 11797 00000F6F F8                      		clc
 11798                                  NoNeedDone2:
 11799 00000F70 C3                      		retn
 11800                                  
 11801                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 11802                                  
 11803                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 11804                                  ;
 11805                                  ; The sector size in bytes needs to be converted to an index value for the ibm
 11806                                  ; rom. (0=>128,1=>256,2=>512,3=>1024). It is assumed that only these values
 11807                                  ; are permissible.
 11808                                  ;
 11809                                  ; On Input   AX contains sector size in bytes
 11810                                  ; On Output  AL Contains index
 11811                                  ; All other registers preserved
 11812                                  ;
 11813                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 11814                                  
 11815                                  SectSizeToSectIndex:	
 11816 00000F71 80FC02                  		cmp	ah, 2		; (0=>128,1=>256,2=>512,3=>1024)
 11817                                  					; examine upper	byte only
 11818 00000F74 7703                    		ja	short OneK
 11819 00000F76 88E0                    		mov	al, ah		; value	in AH is the index!
 11820 00000F78 C3                      		retn
 11821                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 11822                                  
 11823                                  OneK:					
 11824 00000F79 B003                    		mov	al, 3
 11825 00000F7B C3                      		retn

 11827                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 11828                                  
 11829                                  
 11830                                  SectorSizeIndexToSectorSize:

 11841                                  ;
 11842                                  ; SetDASD
 11843                                  ;
 11844                                  ; Set up the rom for formatting.
 11845                                  ; we have to tell the rom bios what type of disk is in the drive.
 11846                                  ;
 11847                                  ; On Input   - ES:di - Points to bds
 11848                                  ;
 11849                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 11850                                  
 11851                                  		; 19/10/2022
 11852                                  SetDasd:	
 11853 00000F84 803E[3906]01            		cmp	byte [had_format_error], 1 ;
 11854                                  					; See if we've previously set dasd type
 11855 00000F89 740C                    		jz	short DoSetDasd
 11856                                  		; 10/12/2022
 11857 00000F8B 26F6452380              		test	byte [es:di+23h], 80h
 11858                                  		;test	word [es:di+23h], 80h ; [es:di+BDS.flags]
 11859                                  					; set_dasd_true
 11860 00000F90 744A                    		jz	short DasdHasBeenSet
 11861                                  		; 10/12/2022
 11862 00000F92 268065237F              		and	byte [es:di+23h], 7Fh
 11863                                  		;and	word [es:di+23h], 0FF7Fh ; [es:di+BDS.flags]
 11864                                  					; ~set_dasd_true

 11868 00000FA1 B004                    		mov	al, 4

 11870                                  					; DEV_3INCH720KB
 11871 00000FA8 741A                    		jz	short DoSet
 11872 00000FAA 26807D2201              		cmp	byte [es:di+22h], 1 ; [es:di+BDS.formfactor]
 11873                                  					; DEV_5INCH96TPI

 11878                                  
 11879                                  GotBig:					
 11880 00000FB5 B002                    		mov	al, 2		; 160/320k in a	1.2 meg	drive
 11881 00000FB7 803E[3706]00            		cmp	byte [mediatype], 0
 11882 00000FBC 7506                    		jnz	short DoSet
 11883                                  		;mov	al, 3		; 1.2meg in a 1.2meg drive
 11884                                  		; 10/12/2022
 11885                                  		;inc	al  ; al = 3
 11886                                  		; 18/12/2022

 11888 00000FBF C606[3B01]54            		mov	byte [gap_patch], 54h
 11889                                  DoSet:					
 11890 00000FC4 1E                      		push	ds
 11891 00000FC5 56                      		push	si
 11892 00000FC6 8E1E[1A00]              		mov	ds, [zeroseg]	; Point	to interrupt vectors
 11893                                  
 11894 00000FCA C5367800                		lds	si, [DSKADR]
 11895                                  		;lds	si, [78h]	; [DSKADR]  (Int 1Eh)
 11896                                  		;;lds	si, ds:78h		
 11897                                  
 11898 00000FCE C644090F                		mov	byte [si+9], 0Fh ;
 11899                                  					; [si+DISK_PARMS.DISK_HEAD_STTL]
 11900 00000FD2 5E                      		pop	si
 11901 00000FD3 1F                      		pop	ds
 11902 00000FD4 B417                    		mov	ah, 17h
 11903 00000FD6 268A5504                		mov	dl, [es:di+4]
 11904 00000FDA CD13                    		int	13h		; DISK - DISK -	SET TYPE (AT,XT2,XT286,CONV,PS
 11905                                  					; AL = disk type AL = 03h - high-capacity disk in high-capacity	drive
 11906                                  DasdHasBeenSet:				
 11907 00000FDC 268A6513                		mov	ah, [es:di+13h]	; [es:di+BDS.secpertrack]
 11908 00000FE0 8826[3701]              		mov	[formt_eot], ah
 11909 00000FE4 C3                      		retn
 11910                                  
 11911                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 11912                                  
 11913                                  ; 16/10/2022
 11914                                  
 11915                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 11916                                  ;
 11917                                  ; Set Media Type for Format
 11918                                  ; Performs the int 13 with ah = 18h to see if the medium described in the
 11919                                  ; BPB area in the BDS can be handled by the rom.
 11920                                  ; On Input, ES:DI -> current BDS.
 11921                                  ; The status of the operation is returned in AL
 11922                                  ;
 11923                                  ;	- 0 - if the support is available,and the combination is valid.
 11924                                  ;	- 1 - no rom support
 11925                                  ;	- 2 - illegal combination
 11926                                  ;	- 3 - no media present (rom support exists but cannot determine now)
 11927                                  ;
 11928                                  ; Flags also may be altered. All other registers preserved.
 11929                                  ; If the call to rom returns no error,then the current Dpt is "replaced" by
 11930                                  ; the one returned by the rom. This is Done by changing the pointer in [Dpt]
 11931                                  ; to the one returned. the original pointer to the disk base table is stored
 11932                                  ; in TempDpt, until it is restored.
 11933                                  ;
 11934                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 11935                                  
 11936                                  		; 19/10/2022
 11937                                  SetMediaForFormat:	
 11938 00000FE5 51                      		push	cx
 11939 00000FE6 52                      		push	dx
 11940                                  
 11941                                  		; If we have a format error, then do not change Dpt, TempDpt.
 11942                                  		; but we need to call int 13h, ah=18h again.
 11943                                  
 11944 00000FE7 803E[3906]01            		cmp	byte [had_format_error], 1
 11945 00000FEC 7425                    		jz	short SkipSaveDskAdr
 11946 00000FEE 30C0                    		xor	al, al		; If already done return 0
 11947 00000FF0 803E[3806]01            		cmp	byte [media_set_for_format], 1
 11948 00000FF5 7502                    		jnz	short DoSetMediaForFormat
 11949 00000FF7 EB7F                    		jmp	SetMediaRet	; Media	already	set
 11950                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 11951                                  
 11952                                  DoSetMediaForFormat:			
 11953 00000FF9 06                      		push	es
 11954 00000FFA 56                      		push	si
 11955 00000FFB 8E06[1A00]              		mov	es, [zeroseg]	; Point to interrupt vectors
 11956 00000FFF 26C4367800              		les	si, [es:DSKADR]
 11957                                  		;les	si, es:78h	; [es:DSKADR]
 11958                                  					; Get pointer to disk base table
 11959 00001004 8936[2D01]              		mov	[dpt], si
 11960 00001008 8C06[2F01]              		mov	[dpt+2], es	; Save pointer to table
 11961                                  
 11962                                  		; Initialize the head settle time to 0Fh. See the offsets
 11963                                  		; given in dskprm.inc.
 11964                                  
 11965 0000100C 26C644090F              		mov	byte [es:si+9], 0Fh ; [es:si+DISK_PARMS.DISK_HEAD_STTL]
 11966 00001011 5E                      		pop	si
 11967 00001012 07                      		pop	es
 11968                                  
 11969                                  SkipSaveDskAdr:				
 11970 00001013 268B4D25                		mov	cx, [es:di+25h]	; [es:di+BDS.cylinders]
 11971 00001017 49                      		dec	cx
 11972 00001018 80E503                  		and	ch, 3
 11973 0000101B D0CD                    		ror	ch, 1
 11974 0000101D D0CD                    		ror	ch, 1
 11975 0000101F 86E9                    		xchg	ch, cl
 11976 00001021 260A4D13                		or	cl, [es:di+13h]	; [es:di+BDS.secpertrack]
 11977 00001025 268A5504                		mov	dl, [es:di+4]	; [es:di+BDS.drivenum]
 11978 00001029 06                      		push	es
 11979 0000102A 1E                      		push	ds
 11980 0000102B 56                      		push	si
 11981 0000102C 57                      		push	di
 11982 0000102D B418                    		mov	ah, 18h
 11983 0000102F CD13                    		int	13h		; DISK - SET MEDIA TYPE	FOR FORMAT (AT model 3x9,XT2,XT286,PS)
 11984                                  					; DL = drive number, CH	= lower	8 bits of number of tracks, CL = sectors per track
 11985 00001031 7233                    		jb	short FormaStatErr
 11986 00001033 803E[3906]01            		cmp	byte [had_format_error], 1
 11987 00001038 7425                    		jz	short skip_disk_base_setting
 11988 0000103A 06                      		push	es		; Save segment returned	by the rom
 11989 0000103B 8E06[1A00]              		mov	es, [zeroseg]	; Point	to interrupt vector segment
 11990 0000103F 26C4367800              		les	si, [es:DSKADR]
 11991                                  		;les	si, es:78h	; [es:DSKADR] (Int 1Eh)
 11992                                  					; Get current disk base	table
 11993 00001044 8936[3A06]              		mov	[tempdpt], si
 11994 00001048 8C06[3C06]              		mov	[tempdpt+2], es ; Save it
 11995 0000104C 8E06[1A00]              		mov	es, [zeroseg]
 11996                                  		;mov	es:78h,	di
 11997 00001050 26893E7800              		mov	[es:DSKADR], di
 11998                                  		;pop	word ptr es:7Ah	; replace with one returned by rom
 11999 00001055 268F067A00              		pop	word [es:DSKADR+2]
 12000 0000105A C606[3806]01            		mov	byte [media_set_for_format], 1
 12001                                  skip_disk_base_setting:			
 12002 0000105F 30C0                    		xor	al, al		; Legal	combination + rom support code
 12003                                  		;mov	ds:had_format_error, al	; Reset	the flag
 12004 00001061 A2[3906]                		mov	[had_format_error], al
 12005 00001064 EB0E                    		jmp	short PopStatRet
 12006                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 12007                                  
 12008                                  FormaStatErr:
 12009                                  		; 10/12/2022
 12010 00001066 B003                    		mov	al, 3
 12011                                  				
 12012 00001068 80FC0C                  		cmp	ah, 0Ch		; DSK_ILLEGAL_COMBINATION
 12013                                  					; Illegal combination =	0Ch
 12014 0000106B 7406                    		jz	short FormatStatIllegalComb
 12015 0000106D 80FC80                  		cmp	ah, 80h		; DSK_TIMEOUT_ERR
 12016 00001070 7402                    		jz	short FormatStatTimeOut
 12017                                  		; 10/12/2022
 12018                                  		;dec	al
 12019                                  		; 18/12/2022

 12022                                  		;mov	al, 1		; Function not supported.
 12023                                  		;jmp	short PopStatRet

 12025

 12030 00001073 48                      		dec	ax

 12032                                  		;mov	al, 2		; Function supported, but
 12033                                  					; Illegal sect/trk,trk combination.
 12034                                  		; 10/12/2022
 12035                                  		;jmp	short PopStatRet
 12036                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 12037

 12042                                  					; Media	not present.

 12054                                  
 12055                                  ; 16/10/2022
 12056                                  
 12057                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 12058                                  ;
 12059                                  ; RESET THE DRIVE
 12060                                  ;
 12061                                  ; we also set [Step_Drv] to -1 to force the main disk routine to use the
 12062                                  ; slow head settle time for the next operation. this is because the reset
 12063                                  ; operation moves the head to cylinder 0,so we need to do a seek the next
 12064                                  ; time around - there is a problem with 3.5" drives in that the head does
 12065                                  ; not settle down in time,even for read operations!!
 12066                                  ;
 12067                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 12068                                  
 12069                                  ResetDisk:	
 12070 0000107B 50                      		push	ax
 12071 0000107C 803E[3806]01            		cmp	byte [media_set_for_format], 1
 12072                                  					; Reset while formatting?
 12073 00001081 7505                    		jnz	short ResetDisk_cont
 12074                                  					; Then verify operation in "fmt & vrfy"
 12075 00001083 C606[3906]01            		mov	byte [had_format_error], 1 ; Might have failed.
 12076                                  ResetDisk_cont:				
 12077 00001088 30E4                    		xor	ah, ah		; So signals that we had a format error
 12078 0000108A CD13                    		int	13h		; DISK - RESET DISK SYSTEM
 12079                                  					; DL = drive (if bit 7 is set both hard	disks and floppy disks reset)
 12080 0000108C C606[7600]FF            		mov	byte [step_drv], 0FFh ; -1
 12081                                  					; Zap up the speed
 12082 00001091 58                      		pop	ax
 12083 00001092 C3                      		retn

 12085                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 12086                                  
 12087                                  ; 16/10/2022
 12088                                  
 12089                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 12090                                  ;
 12091                                  ; This routine sets up the drive parameter table with the values needed for
 12092                                  ; format,does an int 13. values in Dpt are restored after a verify is done.
 12093                                  ;
 12094                                  ; on entry  -	ES:DI - points to bds for the drive
 12095                                  ;		Xfer_Seg:BX - points to trkbuf
 12096                                  ;		AL    - number of sectors
 12097                                  ;		AH    - int 13 function code
 12098                                  ;		CL    - sector number for verify
 12099                                  ;		DS    - Bios_Data
 12100                                  ;
 12101                                  ; ON EXIT   -	DS,DI,ES,BX remain unchanged.
 12102                                  ;		AX and flags are the results of the int 13
 12103                                  ;
 12104                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 12105                                  
 12106                                  		; 19/10/2022
 12107                                  ToRom:	
 12108 00001093 53                      		push	bx
 12109 00001094 56                      		push	si
 12110                                  
 12111                                  		; Compaq bug fix - check whether we are using new ROM
 12112                                  		; functionality to set up format, not merely if it exists.
 12113                                  		; This was formerly a check against [new_rom]
 12114                                  
 12115 00001095 F606[3806]01            		test	byte [media_set_for_format], 1
 12116 0000109A 7536                    		jnz	short GotValidDpt
 12117 0000109C 50                      		push	ax
 12118 0000109D 06                      		push	es		; Save bds segment
 12119 0000109E 26807D2202              		cmp	byte [es:di+22h], 2 ; [es:di+BDS.formfactor]
 12120                                  					; ffSmall ; is it a 3.5" drive?
 12121 000010A3 9C                      		pushf			; (Save	the cmp	result)
 12122 000010A4 8E06[1A00]              		mov	es, [zeroseg]
 12123                                  		;les	si, es:78h	; Get pointer to disk base table
 12124 000010A8 26C4367800              		les	si, [es:DSKADR]
 12125                                  		;mov	word ptr ds:dpt, si
 12126                                  		;mov	word ptr ds:dpt+2, es ;	 Save pointer to table
 12127 000010AD 8936[2D01]              		mov	[dpt], si
 12128 000010B1 8C06[2F01]              		mov	[dpt+2], es	; Save pointer to table
 12129                                  		
 12130 000010B5 A0[3701]                		mov	al, [formt_eot]
 12131 000010B8 26884404                		mov	[es:si+4], al	; [es:si+DISK_PARMS.DISK_EOT]
 12132 000010BC A0[3B01]                		mov	al, [gap_patch]
 12133 000010BF 26884407                		mov	[es:si+7], al	; [es:si+DISK_PARMS.DISK_FORMT_GAP]
 12134                                  					; Important for	format
 12135 000010C3 26C644090F              		mov	byte [es:si+9], 0Fh ; [es:si+DISK_PARMS.DISK_HEAD_STTL]
 12136                                  					; Assume we are	doing a	seek operation
 12137                                  					; Setup	motor start correctly for 3.5" drives
 12138 000010C8 9D                      		popf			; Get result of	earlier	cmp
 12139 000010C9 7505                    		jnz	short MotorStrtOK
 12140 000010CB 26C6440A04              		mov	byte [es:si+0Ah], 4 ; [es:si+DISK_PARMS.DISK_MOTOR_STRT]
 12141                                  MotorStrtOK:				
 12142 000010D0 07                      		pop	es		; Restore bds segment
 12143 000010D1 58                      		pop	ax
 12144                                  GotValidDpt:				
 12145 000010D2 8B16[3901]              		mov	dx, [trknum]	; Set track number
 12146 000010D6 88D5                    		mov	ch, dl		; Set low 8 bits in ch
 12147 000010D8 268A5504                		mov	dl, [es:di+4]	; Set drive number
 12148 000010DC 8A36[3801]              		mov	dh, [hdnum]	; Set head number
 12149 000010E0 06                      		push	es		; Save bds segment
 12150 000010E1 8E06[3705]              		mov	es, [xfer_seg]
 12151 000010E5 CD13                    		int	13h		; DISK -
 12152 000010E7 07                      		pop	es		; Restore bds segment
 12153 000010E8 5E                      		pop	si
 12154 000010E9 5B                      		pop	bx
 12155 000010EA C3                      		retn

 12157                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 12158                                  
 12159                                  ; 16/10/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)
 12160                                  
 12161                                  ; BIOSCODE:1124h (MSDOS 6.21, IO.SYS)
 12162                                  
 12163                                  ; ==========================================================================
 12164                                  ;
 12165                                  ; get the owner of the physical drive represented by the logical drive in al.
 12166                                  ; the assumption is that we **always** keep track of the owner of a drive!!
 12167                                  ; if this is not the case, the system may hang, just following the linked list.
 12168                                  ;
 12169                                  ; ==========================================================================
 12170                                  
 12171                                  		; 19/10/2022
 12172                                  ioctl_getown:
 12173 000010EB E8DDF3                  		call	SetDrive
 12174 000010EE 268A4504                		mov	al, [es:di+4]	; [es:di+BDS.drivenum]
 12175                                  					; Get physical drive number
 12176 000010F2 C43E[1901]              		les	di, [start_bds] ; Get start of bds chain
 12177                                  ownloop:				
 12178 000010F6 26384504                		cmp	[es:di+4], al	; [es:di+BDS.drivenum]
 12179 000010FA 7507                    		jnz	short getnextBDS
 12180                                  		; 10/12/2022
 12181 000010FC 26F6452320              		test	byte [es:di+23h], 20h
 12182                                  		;test	word [es:di+23h], 20h ; [es:di+BDS.flags]
 12183                                  					; fi_own_physical
 12184 00001101 7515                    		jnz	short exitown
 12185                                  getnextBDS:				
 12186 00001103 26C43D                  		les	di, [es:di]	; [es:di+BDS.link]
 12187 00001106 EBEE                    		jmp	short ownloop
 12188                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 12189                                  
 12190                                  ; ==========================================================================
 12191                                  ;
 12192                                  ; set the ownership of the physical drive represented by the logical drive
 12193                                  ; in al to al.
 12194                                  ;
 12195                                  ; ==========================================================================
 12196                                  
 12197                                  		; 19/10/2022
 12198                                  ioctl_setown:
 12199 00001108 E8C0F3                  		call	SetDrive
 12200 0000110B C606[7A00]01            		mov	byte [fsetowner], 1
 12201                                  					; set flag for CheckSingle to look at.
 12202 00001110 E828F7                  		call	checksingle
 12203 00001113 C606[7A00]00            		mov	byte [fsetowner], 0
 12204                                  					; set ownership	of drive reset flag
 12205                                  		; Fall into ExitOwn
 12206                                  
 12207                                  ; ==========================================================================
 12208                                  ;
 12209                                  ; if there is only one logical drive assigned to this physical drive, return
 12210                                  ; 0 to user to indicate this. Enter with ES:di -> the owner's bds.
 12211                                  ;
 12212                                  ; ==========================================================================
 12213                                  
 12214                                  exitown:				
 12215 00001118 30C9                    		xor	cl, cl
 12216                                  		; 12/12/2022
 12217 0000111A 26F6452310              		test	byte [es:di+23h], 10h
 12218                                  		;test	word [es:di+23h], 10h ; [es:di+BDS.flags]
 12219                                  					; fi_am_mult
 12220 0000111F 7406                    		jz	short exitnomult
 12221 00001121 268A4D05                		mov	cl, [es:di+5]	; [es:di+BDS.drivelet]
 12222                                  					; Get logical drive number
 12223                                  					; Get it 1-based
 12224 00001125 FEC1                    		inc	cl
 12225                                  exitnomult:				
 12226 00001127 C51E[1200]              		lds	bx, [ptrsav]
 12227 0000112B 884F01                  		mov	[bx+1],	cl	; [bx+unit]
 12228                                  					; Exit normal termination
 12229                                  		; 12/12/2022
 12230                                  		; cf=0
 12231                                  		;clc
 12232 0000112E C3                      		retn
 12233                                  
 12234                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 12235                                  
 12236                                  ; 16/10/2022
 12237                                  
 12238                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 12239                                  ;
 12240                                  ; moves the old Dpt that had been saved in TempDpt back to Dpt. this is done
 12241                                  ; only if the first byte of TempDpt is not -1.
 12242                                  ; all registers (including flags) are preserved.
 12243                                  ;
 12244                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 12245                                  
 12246                                  		; 19/10/2022
 12247                                  RestoreOldDpt:
 12248                                  		; if we have already restored the disk base table earlier,
 12249                                  		; do not do it again.
 12250                                  	
 12251 0000112F 50                      		push	ax
 12252 00001130 30C0                    		xor	al, al
 12253 00001132 A2[3906]                		mov	[had_format_error], al	; Reset flag and 
 12254 00001135 8606[3806]              		xchg	al, [media_set_for_format] ; get current flag setting
 12255 00001139 08C0                    		or	al, al

 12257 0000113D 56                      		push	si

 12265 00001149 268E06[1A00]            		mov	es, [es:zeroseg]

 12267

 12279                                  		;clc			;  Clear carry
 12280 0000115C C3                      		retn
 12281                                  
 12282                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 12283                                  
 12284                                  ; 16/10/2022
 12285                                  
 12286                                  ; ==========================================================================
 12287                                  ;	get media id
 12288                                  ; ==========================================================================
 12289                                  ;
 12290                                  ; FUNCTION: get the volume label,the system id and the serial number from
 12291                                  ;	    the media that has the extended boot record.
 12292                                  ;	    for the conventional media,this routine will return "unknown
 12293                                  ;	    media type" error to dos.
 12294                                  ;
 12295                                  ; INPUT :   ES:di -> bds table for this drive.
 12296                                  ;
 12297                                  ; OUTPUT:   the request packet filled with the information,if not carry.
 12298                                  ;	    if carry set,then al contains the device driver error number
 12299                                  ;	    that will be returned to dos.
 12300                                  ;	    register DS,DX,AX,CX,DI,SI destroyed.
 12301                                  ;
 12302                                  ; SUBROUTINES TO BE CALLED:
 12303                                  ;	BootIo:NEAR
 12304                                  ;
 12305                                  ; LOGIC:
 12306                                  ;	to recognize the extended boot record,this logic will actually
 12307                                  ;	access the boot sector even if it is a hard disk.
 12308                                  ;	note:the valid extended bpb is recognized by looking at the mediabyte
 12309                                  ;	field of bpb and the extended boot signature.
 12310                                  ;
 12311                                  ; {
 12312                                  ;	get logical drive number from bds table;
 12313                                  ;	rFlag = read operation;
 12314                                  ;	BootIo;		 /*get the media boot record into the buffer
 12315                                  ;	if (no error) then
 12316                                  ;	     if (extended boot record) then
 12317                                  ;		{ set volume label,volume serial number and system id
 12318                                  ;		  of the request packet to those of the boot record;
 12319                                  ;		};
 12320                                  ;	     else		  /*not an extended bpb */
 12321                                  ;		{ set register al to "unknown media.." error code;
 12322                                  ;		  set carry bit;
 12323                                  ;		};
 12324                                  ;	else
 12325                                  ;	     ret;	/*already error code is set in the register al
 12326                                  ;
 12327                                  ; ==========================================================================
 12328                                  
 12329                                  ;size_of_EXT_BOOT_SERIAL equ 4
 12330                                  ;;size_of_EXT_BOOT_VOL_LABEL equ 11
 12331                                  ;;size_of_EXT_SYSTEM_ID equ 8
 12332                                  
 12333                                  		; 19/10/2022
 12334                                  GetMediaId:
 12335 0000115D E89F00                  		call	ChangeLineChk
 12336 00001160 268A4505                		mov	al, [es:di+5]	; [es:di+BDS.drivelet] ; Logical drive number
 12337 00001164 C606[2001]02            		mov	byte [rflag], 2	; Read operation
 12338 00001169 E87B00                  		call	BootIo		; Read boot sector into	DiskSector
 12339 0000116C 7224                    		jb	short IOCtl_If1
 12340                                  					; Valid? (0F0h-0FFh?)
 12341 0000116E 803E[6301]F0            		cmp	byte [disksector+15h], 0F0h
 12342                                  					; [disksector+EXT_BOOT.BPB+EBPB.MEDIADESCRIPTOR]
 12343 00001173 721A                    		jb	short IOCtl_If2	; brif not valid (0F0h - 0FFh)
 12344                                  		; 10/12/2022
 12345 00001175 BE[7401]                		mov	si, disksector+26h
 12346 00001178 803C29                  		cmp	byte [si], 29h
 12347                                  		;cmp	byte [disksector+26h], 29h ; [disksector+EXT_BOOT.SIG]
 12348                                  					; EXT_BOOT_SIGNATURE
 12349 0000117B 7512                    		jnz	short IOCtl_If2	; not extended boot record
 12350 0000117D C43E[1200]              		les	di, [ptrsav]	; es:di	points to request header
 12351 00001181 26C47F13                		les	di, [es:bx+19]	; [es:bx+IOCTL_REQ.GENERICIOCTL_PACKET]
 12352                                  		; 10/12/2022
 12353 00001185 46                      		inc	si
 12354                                  		; si = disksector+27h 
 12355                                  		;mov	si, disksector+27h ; disksector+EXT_BOOT.SERIAL
 12356 00001186 83C702                  		add	di, 2		; A_MEDIA_ID_INFO.MI_SERIAL
 12357 00001189 B91700                  		mov	cx, 23		; size_of_EXT_BOOT_SERIAL
 12358                                  					; L+size_of_EXT_BOOT_VOL_LABEL
 12359                                  					; +size_of_EXT_SYSTEM_ID
 12360 0000118C F3A4                    		rep movsb		; Move from Bios_Data into request packet
 12361                                  	
 12362                                  		; 10/12/2022
 12363                                  		; cf = 0
 12364                                  		;clc
 12365                                  
 12366 0000118E C3                      		retn
 12367                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 12368                                  
 12369                                  IOCtl_If2:				
 12370 0000118F B007                    		mov	al, 7		; error_unknown_media
 12371 00001191 F9                      		stc
 12372                                  IOCtl_If1:				
 12373 00001192 C3                      		retn
 12374                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 12375                                  
 12376                                  ; 16/10/2022
 12377                                  
 12378                                  ; ==========================================================================
 12379                                  ;  set media id
 12380                                  ; ==========================================================================
 12381                                  
 12382                                  ; function: set the volume label, the system id and the serial number of
 12383                                  ;	    the media that has the extended boot record.
 12384                                  ;	    for the conventional media, this routine will return "unknown
 12385                                  ;	    media.." error to dos.
 12386                                  ;	    this routine will also set the corresponding informations in
 12387                                  ;	    the bds table.
 12388                                  ;
 12389                                  ; input :   ES:di -> bds table for this drive.
 12390                                  ;
 12391                                  ; output:   the extended boot record in the media will be set according to
 12392                                  ;	    the request packet.
 12393                                  ;	    if carry set, then al contains the device driver error number
 12394                                  ;	    that will be returned to dos.
 12395                                  ;
 12396                                  ; subroutines to be called:
 12397                                  ;	BootIo:NEAR
 12398                                  ;
 12399                                  ; logic:
 12400                                  ;
 12401                                  ; {
 12402                                  ;	get drive_number from bds;
 12403                                  ;	rFlag = "read operation";
 12404                                  ;	BootIo;
 12405                                  ;	if (no error) then
 12406                                  ;	     if (extended boot record) then
 12407                                  ;		{ set volume label,volume serial number and system id
 12408                                  ;		  of the boot record to those of the request packet;
 12409                                  ;		  rFlag = "write operation";
 12410                                  ;		  get drive number from bds;
 12411                                  ;		  BootIo;	  /*write it back*/
 12412                                  ;		};
 12413                                  ;	     else		  /*not an extended bpb */
 12414                                  ;		{ set register al to "unknown media.." error code;
 12415                                  ;		  set carry bit;
 12416                                  ;		  ret;	 /*return back to caller */
 12417                                  ;		};
 12418                                  ;	else
 12419                                  ;	     ret;		 /*already error code is set */
 12420                                  ;
 12421                                  ; ==========================================================================
 12422                                  
 12423                                  		; 19/10/2022
 12424                                  SetMediaId:
 12425 00001193 E86900                  		call	ChangeLineChk
 12426 00001196 268A4505                		mov	al, [es:di+5]	; [es:di+BDS.drivelet]
 12427                                  					; Logical drive	number
 12428 0000119A 88C2                    		mov	dl, al
 12429 0000119C C606[2001]02            		mov	byte [rflag], 2	; romread
 12430 000011A1 52                      		push	dx
 12431 000011A2 E84200                  		call	BootIo		; Read boot sec	to Bios_Data:DiskSector
 12432 000011A5 5A                      		pop	dx
 12433 000011A6 723E                    		jb	short IOCtl_If6
 12434                                  					; Valid? (0F0h-0FFh?)
 12435 000011A8 803E[6301]F0            		cmp	byte [disksector+15h], 0F0h
 12436                                  					; [disksector+EXT_BOOT.BPB+EBPB.MEDIADESCRIPTOR]
 12437 000011AD 7234                    		jb	short IOCtl_If7	; Brif not
 12438 000011AF 803E[7401]29            		cmp	byte [disksector+26h], 29h ; [disksector+EXT_BOOT.SIG]
 12439                                  					; EXT_BOOT_SIGNATURE
 12440 000011B4 752D                    		jnz	short IOCtl_If7	; not extended boot record
 12441 000011B6 06                      		push	es		; Save BDS pointer
 12442 000011B7 57                      		push	di
 12443 000011B8 1E                      		push	ds		; Point	ES To boot record
 12444 000011B9 07                      		pop	es
 12445 000011BA BF[7501]                		mov	di, disksector+27h ; disksector+EXT_BOOT.SERIAL
 12446 000011BD C536[1200]              		lds	si, [ptrsav]	; ds:si	points to request header.
 12447 000011C1 C57413                  		lds	si, [si+19]	; [si+IOCTL_REQ.GENERICIOCTL_PACKET]
 12448 000011C4 83C602                  		add	si, 2		; A_MEDIA_ID_INFO.MI_SERIAL
 12449 000011C7 B91700                  		mov	cx, 23		; size_of_EXT_BOOT_SERIAL
 12450                                  					; +size_of_EXT_BOOT_VOL_LABEL
 12451                                  					; +size_of_EXT_SYSTEM_ID
 12452 000011CA F3A4                    		rep movsb
 12453 000011CC 06                      		push	es		; point	ds back	to Bios_Data
 12454 000011CD 1F                      		pop	ds
 12455 000011CE 5F                      		pop	di		; restore bds pointer
 12456 000011CF 07                      		pop	es
 12457 000011D0 E864F5                  		call	mov_media_ids	; update the bds media id info.
 12458 000011D3 88D0                    		mov	al, dl
 12459 000011D5 C606[2001]03            		mov	byte [rflag], 3	; romwrite
 12460 000011DA E80A00                  		call	BootIo		; write	it back.
 12461 000011DD C606[1E01]FF            		mov	byte [tim_drv], 0FFh
 12462                                  					; make sure chk_media check the driver
 12463                                  					; return with error code from BootIo
 12464 000011E2 C3                      		retn
 12465                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 12466                                  
 12467                                  IOCtl_If7:				
 12468 000011E3 B007                    		mov	al, 7		; error_unknown_media
 12469 000011E5 F9                      		stc
 12470                                  IOCtl_If6:				
 12471 000011E6 C3                      		retn
 12472                                  
 12473                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 12474                                  
 12475                                  ; 16/10/2022
 12476                                  
 12477                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 12478                                  ;	BootIo
 12479                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 12480                                  ;
 12481                                  ; function: read/write the boot record into boot sector.
 12482                                  ;
 12483                                  ; input :
 12484                                  ;	    al=logical drive number
 12485                                  ;	    rFlag = operation (read/write)
 12486                                  ;
 12487                                  ; output:   for read operation,the boot record of the drive specified in bds
 12488                                  ;	    be read into the DiskSector buffer.
 12489                                  ;	    for write operation,the DiskSector buffer image will be written
 12490                                  ;	    to the drive specified in bds.
 12491                                  ;	    if carry set,then al contains the device driver error number
 12492                                  ;	    that will be returned to dos.
 12493                                  ;	    AX,CX,DX register destroyed.
 12494                                  ;	    if carry set,then al will contain the error code from DiskIO.
 12495                                  ;
 12496                                  ; subroutines to be called:
 12497                                  ;	DiskIO:NEAR
 12498                                  ;
 12499                                  ; logic:
 12500                                  ;
 12501                                  ; {
 12502                                  ;	first_sector = 0;	 /*logical sector 0 is the boot sector */
 12503                                  ;	sectorcount = 1;	 /*read 1 sector only */
 12504                                  ;	buffer = DiskSector;	 /*read it into the DiskSector buffer */
 12505                                  ;	call DiskIO (rFlag,drive_number,first_sector,sectorcount,buffer);
 12506                                  ; }
 12507                                  ; ==========================================================================
 12508                                  
 12509                                  		; 19/10/2022
 12510                                  BootIo:	
 12511 000011E7 06                      		push	es
 12512 000011E8 57                      		push	di
 12513 000011E9 53                      		push	bx
 12514 000011EA 1E                      		push	ds
 12515 000011EB 07                      		pop	es		; Point ES: to Bios_Data
 12516                                  
 12517                                  		; Call DiskIO to read/write the boot sec. The parameters which
 12518                                  		; need to be initialized for this subroutine out here are
 12519                                  		; - Transfer address to Bios_Data:DiskSector
 12520                                  		; - Low sector needs to be initalized to 0. this is a reg. param
 12521                                  		; - Hi sector in [Start_Sec_H] needs to be initialised to 0.
 12522                                  		; - Number of sectors <-- 1
 12523                                  
 12524 000011EC BF[4E01]                		mov	di, disksector	; es:di -> transfer address
 12525 000011EF 31D2                    		xor	dx, dx		; First	sector (h) -> 0
 12526 000011F1 8916[2B05]              		mov	[start_sec_h], dx ; Start sector (h) -> 0
 12527 000011F5 B90100                  		mov	cx, 1
 12528 000011F8 E8CEF6                  		call	diskio
 12529 000011FB 5B                      		pop	bx
 12530 000011FC 5F                      		pop	di
 12531 000011FD 07                      		pop	es
 12532 000011FE C3                      		retn
 12533                                  
 12534                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 12535                                  
 12536                                  ; 16/10/2022
 12537                                  
 12538                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 12539                                  ;	ChangeLineChk
 12540                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 12541                                  ;
 12542                                  ; when the user calls get/set media id call before dos establishes the media
 12543                                  ; by calling "media_chk",the change line activity of the drive is going to be
 12544                                  ; lost.	this routine will check the change line activity and will save the
 12545                                  ; history in the flags.
 12546                                  ;
 12547                                  ; FUNCTION: check the change line error activity
 12548                                  ;
 12549                                  ; INPUT :  ES:di -> bds table.
 12550                                  ;
 12551                                  ; OUTPUT:   flag in bds table will be updated if change line occurs.
 12552                                  ;
 12553                                  ; SUBROUTINES TO BE CALLED:
 12554                                  ;	Set_Changed_DL
 12555                                  ;
 12556                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 12557                                  
 12558                                  ChangeLineChk:	
 12559 000011FF 268A5504                		mov	dl, [es:di+4]	; [es:di+BDS.drivenum]
 12560 00001203 08D2                    		or	dl, dl		; Fixed	disk?
 12561 00001205 7821                    		js	short ChangeLnChkRet ; Yes, skip it.
 12562                                  		; 12/12/2022
 12563 00001207 26F6452304              		test	byte [es:di+23h], 4
 12564                                  		;test	word [es:di+23h], 4 ; [es:di+BDS.flags]
 12565                                  					; return_fake_bpb
 12566 0000120C 751A                    		jnz	short ChangeLnChkRet
 12567 0000120E 803E[7700]01            		cmp	byte [fhave96], 1	; This rom support change line?
 12568 00001213 7513                    		jnz	short ChangeLnChkRet
 12569 00001215 E8F806                  		call	haschange	; This drive support change line?
 12570 00001218 740E                    		jz	short ChangeLnChkRet ; Do nothing
 12571                                  
 12572                                  		; Execute the rom disk interrupt to check changeline activity.
 12573                                  
 12574 0000121A B416                    		mov	ah, 16h
 12575 0000121C CD13                    		int	13h		; DISK - FLOPPY	DISK - CHANGE OF DISK STATUS (AT,XT2,XT286,CONV,PS)
 12576                                  					; DL = drive to	check
 12577                                  					; Return: AH = disk change status
 12578 0000121E 7308                    		jnb	short ChangeLnChkRet
 12579 00001220 53                      		push	bx
 12580 00001221 BB4000                  		mov	bx, 40h		; fchanged
 12581                                  					; Update flag in BDS for this
 12582                                  					; physical drive
 12583 00001224 E8C206                  		call	set_changed_dl
 12584 00001227 5B                      		pop	bx
 12585                                  ChangeLnChkRet:				
 12586 00001228 C3                      		retn
 12587                                  
 12588                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 12589                                  
 12590                                  ; 16/10/2022
 12591                                  
 12592                                  ; ==========================================================================
 12593                                  ;	GetAccessFlag
 12594                                  ; ==========================================================================
 12595                                  ;
 12596                                  ; FUNCTION: get the status of UNFORMATTED_MEDIA bit of flags in bds table
 12597                                  ;
 12598                                  ; INPUT :
 12599                                  ;	    ES:di -> bds table
 12600                                  ;
 12601                                  ; OUTPUT:   a_DiskAccess_Control.dac_access_flag = 0 if disk i/o not allowed.
 12602                                  ;						 = 1 if disk i/o allowed.
 12603                                  ; ==========================================================================
 12604                                  
 12605                                  		; 19/10/2022
 12606                                  GetAccessFlag:				
 12607 00001229 C51E[1200]              		lds	bx, [ptrsav]	; DS:BX	points to request header
 12608 0000122D C55F13                  		lds	bx, [bx+19]	; [bx+IOCTL_REQ.GENERICIOCTL_PACKET]
 12609                                  		;mov	al, 0		; Assume result	is unformatted
 12610                                  		; 10/12/2022
 12611 00001230 28C0                    		sub	al, al
 12612                                  		; 10/12/2022
 12613 00001232 26F6452402              		test	byte [es:di+36], 02h
 12614                                  		;test	word [es:di+35], 200h ; [es:di+BDS.flags]
 12615                                  					; unformatted_media
 12616 00001237 7502                    		jnz	short GafDone	; Done if unformatted
 12617 00001239 FEC0                    		inc	al		; Return true for formatted
 12618                                  
 12619                                  GafDone:				
 12620 0000123B 884701                  		mov	[bx+1],	al	; [bx+A_DISKACCESS_CONTROL.DAC_ACCESS_FLAG]
 12621 0000123E C3                      		retn
 12622                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 12623                                  
 12624                                  ; 16/10/2022
 12625                                  
 12626                                  ; ==========================================================================
 12627                                  ;	SetAccessFlag
 12628                                  ; ==========================================================================
 12629                                  ;
 12630                                  ; function: set/reset the UNFORMATTED_MEDIA bit of flags in bds table
 12631                                  ;
 12632                                  ; input :
 12633                                  ;	    ES:di -> bds table
 12634                                  ;
 12635                                  ; output:   unformtted_media bit modified according to the user request
 12636                                  ; ==========================================================================
 12637                                  
 12638                                  		; 19/10/2022
 12639                                  SetAccessFlag:				
 12640 0000123F C51E[1200]              		lds	bx, [ptrsav]	; ES:BX	points to request header
 12641 00001243 C55F13                  		lds	bx, [bx+19]	; [bx+IOCTL_REQ.GENERICIOCTL_PACKET]
 12642                                  		; 10/12/2022
 12643 00001246 26806524FD              		and	byte [es:di+36], 0FDh
 12644                                  		;and	word [es:di+35], 0FDFFh ; [es:di+BDS.flags]
 12645                                  					; ~unformatted_media
 12646 0000124B 807F0100                		cmp	byte [bx+1], 0	; [bx+A_DISKACCESS_CONTROL.DAC_ACCESS_FLAG]
 12647 0000124F 7505                    		jnz	short saf_Done
 12648                                  		; 10/12/2022
 12649 00001251 26804D2402              		or	byte [es:di+36], 02h
 12650                                  		;or	word [es:di+35], 200h ; [es:di+BDS.flags]
 12651                                  					; unformatted_media
 12652                                  saf_Done:				
 12653 00001256 C3                      		retn
 12654                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 12655
