 12658                                  ; ==========================================================================
 12659                                  ; Ioctl_Support_Query
 12660                                  ; ==========================================================================
 12661                                  ;
 12662                                  ; New device command which was added in DOS 5.00 to allow a query of a 
 12663                                  ; specific GENERIC IOCtl to see if it is supported. Bit 7 in the
 12664                                  ; device attributes specifies if this function is supported.
 12665                                  ;
 12666                                  ; ==========================================================================
 12667                                  
 12668                                  		; 19/10/2022
 12669                                  ioctl_support_query:
 12670 00001257 06                      		push	es
 12671 00001258 C41E[1200]              		les	bx, [ptrsav]	; ES:BX Points to request header.
 12672 0000125C 268B470D                		mov	ax, [es:bx+13]	; [es:bx+IOCTL_REQ.MAJORFUNCTION]
 12673                                  					; AL ==	Major, AH == Minor
 12674 00001260 3C08                    		cmp	al, 8		; IOC_DC
 12675                                  					; See if major code is 8
 12676 00001262 7513                    		jnz	short nosupport
 12677 00001264 0E                      		push	cs
 12678 00001265 07                      		pop	es
 12679 00001266 B90B00                  		mov	cx, 11		; IOC_DC_TABLE_LEN
 12680                                  		; 10/12/2022
 12681 00001269 BF[3A0C]                		mov	di, IOC_DC_Table
 12682                                  		;mov	di, 0C60h	; IOC_DC_Table
 12683                                  					; at 2C7h:0C60h	= 70h:31D0h
 12684 0000126C 86C4                    		xchg	al, ah		; Put minor code in AL
 12685 0000126E F2AE                    		repne scasb		; Scan for minor code in AL
 12686 00001270 7505                    		jnz	short nosupport	; it was not found
 12687 00001272 B80001                  		mov	ax, 100h
 12688                                  		; 10/12/2022
 12689                                  		; (jump to ioctlsupexit is not required)
 12690                                  		;jmp	short $+2	; ioctlsupexit
 12691                                  					; Signal ioctl is supported
 12692                                  		;;jmp	short ioctlsupexit
 12693                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 12694                                  ioctlsupexit:				
 12695 00001275 07                      		pop	es
 12696                                  		; 10/12/2022
 12697                                  		; cf = 0
 12698                                  		;clc
 12699 00001276 C3                      		retn
 12700                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 12701                                  nosupport:				
 12702 00001277 07                      		pop	es
 12703 00001278 E95AEE                  		jmp	bc_cmderr
 12704                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 12705                                  
 12706                                  ; 16/10/2022
 12707                                  
 12708                                  ; ==========================================================================
 12709                                  ;	GetMediaSenseStatus
 12710                                  ; ==========================================================================
 12711                                  ;
 12712                                  ; FUNCTION: Will return the type of diskette media in the specified DOS
 12713                                  ;	    diskette drive and whether the media is the default type
 12714                                  ;	    for that drive. (default type means the max size for that
 12715                                  ;	    drive)
 12716                                  ;
 12717                                  ; INPUT :   ES:DI -> BDS table
 12718                                  ; OUTPUT:   If carry clear
 12719                                  ;	    DS:BX -> Updated IOCtlPacket
 12720                                  ;
 12721                                  ;			 Special Function at offset 0:
 12722                                  ;				0	- Media detected is not default type
 12723                                  ;				1	- Media detected is default type
 12724                                  ;
 12725                                  ;			 Device Type at offset 1:
 12726                                  ;				2       - 720K 3.5" 80 tracks
 12727                                  ;				7	- 1.44M 3.5" 80 tracks
 12728                                  ;				9	- 2.88M 3.5" 80 tracks
 12729                                  ;
 12730                                  ; Error Codes returned in AX if carry set:
 12731                                  ;
 12732                                  ; 8102 - Drive not ready	- No disk is in the drive.
 12733                                  ; 8107 - Unknown media type	- Drive doesn't support this function or
 12734                                  ;				  the media is really unkown, any error
 12735                                  ;				  other than "media not present"
 12736                                  ; 
 12737                                  ; ==========================================================================
 12738                                  
 12739                                  		; 19/10/2022
 12740                                  SenseMediaType:				
 12741 0000127B C51E[1200]              		lds	bx, [ptrsav]	; DS:BX	points to request header.
 12742 0000127F C55F13                  		lds	bx, [bx+19]	; bx+IOCTL_REQ.GENERICIOCTL_PACKET]
 12743                                  		; 10/10/2022
 12744                                  		;mov	word [bx], 0	; Initialize the 2 packet bytes
 12745 00001282 31D2                    		xor	dx, dx
 12746 00001284 8917                    		mov	[bx], dx ; 0
 12747                                  		;
 12748 00001286 268A5504                		mov	dl, [es:di+4]	; [es:di+BDS.drivenum]
 12749                                  					; Get int 13h drive number from	BDS
 12750                                  		; 10/12/2022
 12751                                  		;xor	dh, dh		; DX = physical	drive number
 12752 0000128A B420                    		mov	ah, 20h		; Get Media Type function
 12753                                  					; If no	carry media type in AL
 12754 0000128C CD13                    		int	13h		; DISK - QCACHE	- DISMOUNT
 12755 0000128E 7216                    		jb	short MediaSenseEr ; error code	in AH
 12756 00001290 FE07                    		inc	byte [bx]	; Signal media type is default (bit 1)
 12757                                  DetermineMediaType:			
 12758 00001292 FEC8                    		dec	al
 12759 00001294 3C02                    		cmp	al, 2		; Chk for 720K ie: (3-1) = 2
 12760 00001296 740A                    		jz	short GotMediaType
 12761 00001298 0404                    		add	al, 4
 12762 0000129A 3C07                    		cmp	al, 7		; Chk for 1.44M ie: (4-1+4) = 7
 12763 0000129C 7404                    		jz	short GotMediaType
 12764 0000129E 3C09                    		cmp	al, 9		; Chk for 2.88M	ie: (6-1+4) = 9
 12765 000012A0 7510                    		jnz	short UnknownMediaType ; Just didn't recognize media type
 12766                                  GotMediaType:				
 12767 000012A2 884701                  		mov	[bx+1],	al	; Save the return value
 12768                                  		; 10/12/2022
 12769                                  		; cf = 0
 12770                                  		;clc			; Signal success
 12771 000012A5 C3                      		retn
 12772                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 12773                                  
 12774                                  MediaSenseEr:				
 12775 000012A6 80FC32                  		cmp	ah, 32h		; See if not default media error
 12776 000012A9 74E7                    		jz	short DetermineMediaType ; Not really an error
 12777 000012AB B002                    		mov	al, 2		; Now assume drive not ready
 12778 000012AD 80FC31                  		cmp	ah, 31h		; See if media was present
 12779 000012B0 7402                    		jz	short SenseErrExit ; Return drive not ready
 12780                                  UnknownMediaType:			
 12781 000012B2 B007                    		mov	al, 7		; Just don't know the media type
 12782                                  SenseErrExit:				
 12783 000012B4 B481                    		mov	ah, 81h		; Signal error return
 12784 000012B6 F9                      		stc
 12785 000012B7 C3                      		retn
 12786                                  
 12787                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 12788                                  		; 10/12/2022
 12789                                  		;db    0
 12790                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 12791                                  
 12792                                  ; 16/10/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)
 12793                                  
 12794                                  ;-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 12795                                  ; MSINT13.ASM - MSDOS 6.0 - 1991
 12796                                  ;-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 12797                                  ; 16/03/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 12798                                  
 12799                                  ;	int 2f function 13h allows the user to change the orig13 int_13 vector
 12800                                  ;	after booting. this allows testing and implementation of custom int_13
 12801                                  ;	handlers, without giving up ms-dos error recovery
 12802                                  ;	entry:	ds:dx	== addr. of new int_13 handler
 12803                                  ;		es:bx	== addr. of new int_13 vector used by warm boot (int19)
 12804                                  ;	exit:	orig13	== address of new int_13 handler
 12805                                  ;		ds:dx	== old orig13 value
 12806                                  ;		es:bx	== old old13  value
 12807                                  ;
 12808                                  ; int 2f handler for external block drivers to communicate with the internal
 12809                                  ; block driver in msdisk. the multiplex number chosen is 8. the handler
 12810                                  ; sets up the pointer to the request packet in [ptrsav] and then jumps to
 12811                                  ; dsk_entry, the entry point for all disk requests.
 12812                                  ;
 12813                                  ; on exit from this driver, we will return to the external driver
 12814                                  ; that issued this int 2f, and can then remove the flags from the stack.
 12815                                  ; this scheme allows us to have a small external device driver, and makes
 12816                                  ; the maintainance of the various drivers (driver and msbio) much easier,
 12817                                  ; since we only need to make changes in one place (most of the time).
 12818                                  ;
 12819                                  ;   ax=800h - check for installed handler - reserved
 12820                                  ;   ax=801h - install the bds into the linked list
 12821                                  ;   ax=802h - dos request
 12822                                  ;   ax=803h - return bds table starting pointer in ds:di
 12823                                  ;	   (ems device driver hooks int 13h to handle 16kb dma overrun
 12824                                  ;	    problem. bds table is going to be used to get head/sector
 12825                                  ;	    informations without calling generic ioctl get device parm call.)
 12826                                  
 12827                                  ;BIOSSEGMENT equ 70h
 12828                                  DOSBIOSSEG equ 0070h ; 17/10/2022	
 12829                                  
 12830                                  ;;BIOSCODE:1302h (MSDOS 6.21, IO.SYS)
 12831                                  
 12832                                  i2f_handler:				; here is 02C7h:1302h =	0070h:3872h
 12833 000012B8 80FC13                  		cmp	ah, 13h
 12834 000012BB 7413                    		jz	short int2f_replace_int13
 12835 000012BD 80FC08                  		cmp	ah, 8
 12836 000012C0 743B                    		jz	short mine
 12837                                  
 12838                                  ; Check for WIN386 startup and return the BIOS instance data
 12839                                  
 12840 000012C2 80FC16                  		cmp	ah, 16h		; MultWin386
 12841 000012C5 7479                    		jz	short win386call

 12843 000012CA 7503                    		jnz	short i2f_handler_iret
 12844 000012CC E9A500                  		jmp	handle_multmult
 12845                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 12846                                  
 12847                                  i2f_handler_iret:			
 12848 000012CF CF                      		iret
 12849                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 12850                                  
 12851                                  int2f_replace_int13:

 12853 000012D1 8CD8                    		mov	ax, ds	; then we can use ds: -> Bios_Data
 12854                                  		;;mov	ds, word [cs:0030h] ; 15/10/2022	
 12855                                  		;mov	ds, word ptr cs:BIOSDATAWORD ; [cs:0030h]
 12856                                  					; = [02C7h:0030h] = [0070h:25A0h]
 12857 000012D3 2E8E1E[3000]            		mov	ds, [cs:BIOSDATAWORD] ; 17/10/2022
 12858                                  		; 19/10/2022
 12859                                  		;push	word ptr ds:Orig13	; save old value of old13 and
 12860                                  		;push	word ptr ds:Orig13+2	; orig13 so that we can
 12861                                  		;push	word ptr ds:Old13	; return them to caller
 12862                                  		;push	word ptr ds:Old13+2

 12866 000012E4 FF36[0801]              		push	word [Old13+2]

 12869                                  		;mov	word ptr ds:Orig13+2, ax
 12870                                  		;mov	word ptr ds:Old13, bx	; old13 := addr. of new boot_13
 12871                                  		;mov	word ptr ds:Old13+2, es
 12872 000012E8 8916[B400]              		mov	[Orig13], dx
 12873 000012EC A3[B600]                		mov	[Orig13+2], ax
 12874 000012EF 891E[0601]              		mov	[Old13], bx
 12875 000012F3 8C06[0801]              		mov	[Old13+2], es
 12876                                  
 12877 000012F7 07                      		pop	es			; es:bx := old old13 vector
 12878 000012F8 5B                      		pop	bx
 12879 000012F9 1F                      		pop	ds			; ds:dx := old orig13 vector
 12880 000012FA 5A                      		pop	dx
 12881 000012FB 58                      		pop	ax
 12882                                  i2f_iret:				
 12883 000012FC CF                      		iret
 12884                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------

 12886                                  mine:

 12888 000012FF 73FB                    		jnb	short i2f_iret
 12889 00001301 08C0                    		or	al, al			; a get installed state request?
 12890 00001303 7504                    		jnz	short disp_func

 12918                                  					;  IRET type function. Callers of

 12944                                  		;lds	di, ds:start_bds
 12945                                  ;ii2f_iret:	; 10/12/2022
