 14132                                  
 14133                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14134                                  ; at media check time, we need to really get down and check what the change is.
 14135                                  ; this is guaranteed to be expensive.
 14136                                  ;
 14137                                  ;	es:di -> bds, ds -> Bios_Data
 14138                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14139                                  
 14140                                  mediacheck:	
 14141 000017B3 E885F0                  		call	checksingle	; make sure correct disk is in place
 14142 000017B6 31F6                    		xor	si, si
 14143 000017B8 E85501                  		call	haschange
 14144 000017BB 742F                    		jz	short mediaret
 14145 000017BD E84401                  		call	checkromchange
 14146 000017C0 752B                    		jnz	short mediadovolid
 14147 000017C2 50                      		push	ax
 14148 000017C3 52                      		push	dx
 14149 000017C4 268A5504                		mov	dl, [es:di+4]	; [es:di+BDS.drivenum]
 14150                                  					; set logical drive number
 14151 000017C8 B416                    		mov	ah, 16h
 14152 000017CA CD13                    		int	13h		; DISK - FLOPPY	DISK - CHANGE OF DISK STATUS (AT,XT2,XT286,CONV,PS)
 14153                                  					; DL = drive to	check
 14154                                  					; Return: AH = disk change status
 14155 000017CC 5A                      		pop	dx
 14156 000017CD 58                      		pop	ax
 14157 000017CE 721D                    		jb	short mediadovolid
 14158 000017D0 BE0100                  		mov	si, 1		; signal no change
 14159                                  
 14160                                  ; there are some drives with changeline that "lose" the changeline indication
 14161                                  ; if a different drive is accessed after the current one. in order to avoid
 14162                                  ; missing a media change, we return an "i don't know" to dos if the changeline
 14163                                  ; is not active and we are accessing a different drive from the last one.
 14164                                  ; if we are accessing the same drive, then we can safely rely on the changeline
 14165                                  ; status.
 14166                                  		; 19/10/2022
 14167 000017D3 8A1E[1E01]              		mov	bl, [tim_drv]	; get last drive accessed
 14168 000017D7 26385D04                		cmp	[es:di+4], bl	; [es:di+BDS.drivenum]
 14169                                  					; (If the last drive accessed is not current drive
 14170                                  					; media	change status may be incorrect.	So,
 14171                                  					; "I don't now" will be returned even if it is indicated
 14172                                  					; as media is not changed.)
 14173 000017DB 740F                    		jz	short mediaret	; (same	drive,
 14174                                  					; media	changeline indication is reliable)
 14175                                  
 14176                                  ; do the 2 second twiddle. if time >= 2 seconds, do a volid check.
 14177                                  ; otherwise return "i don't know" (strictly speaking, we should return a
 14178                                  ; "not changed" here since the 2 second test said no change.)
 14179                                  
 14180 000017DD 50                      		push	ax
 14181 000017DE 51                      		push	cx
 14182 000017DF 52                      		push	dx
 14183 000017E0 E870ED                  		call	Check_Time_Of_Access
 14184 000017E3 5A                      		pop	dx
 14185 000017E4 59                      		pop	cx
 14186 000017E5 58                      		pop	ax
 14187 000017E6 09F6                    		or	si, si
 14188 000017E8 7403                    		jz	short mediadovolid ; check_time	says ">= 2 secs	passed"
 14189                                  					; (volume id will be checked)
 14190 000017EA 31F6                    		xor	si, si		; return "i don't know"
 14191                                  mediaret:				
 14192 000017EC C3                      		retn
 14193                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14194                                  
 14195                                  ; somehow the media was changed. look at vid to see. we do not look at fat
 14196                                  ; because this may be different since we only set medbyt when doing a read
 14197                                  ; or write.
 14198                                  
 14199                                  mediadovolid:				
 14200 000017ED E807EE                  		call	GetBp		; build	a new bpb in current bds
 14201 000017F0 72FA                    		jb	short mediaret
 14202 000017F2 E82D00                  		call	check_vid
 14203 000017F5 73F5                    		jnb	short mediaret
 14204 000017F7 E9D6F3                  		jmp	maperror	; fix up al for	return to dos
 14205                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14206                                  
 14207                                  ; simple, quick check of latched change. if no indication, then return
 14208                                  ; otherwise do expensive check. if the expensive test fails, pop off the
 14209                                  ; return and set al = 15 (for invalid media change) which will be returned to
 14210                                  ; dos.
 14211                                  ;
 14212                                  ; for dos 3.3, this will work only for the drive that has changeline.
 14213                                  
 14214                                  ;	call with es:di -> bds, ds -> Bios_Data
 14215                                  ;	***** warning:  this routine will return one level up on the stack
 14216                                  ;			if an error occurs!
 14217                                  
 14218                                  checklatchio:	
 14219                                  
 14220                                  ; if returning fake bpb then assume the disk has not changed
 14221                                  			
 14222 000017FA E8B0FF                  		call	chkopcnt
 14223 000017FD 741B                    		jz	short checkret	; done if zero
 14224                                  
 14225                                  ; check for past rom indications. if no rom change indicated, then return ok.
 14226                                  
 14227 000017FF E80201                  		call	checkromchange
 14228 00001802 7416                    		jz	short checkret
 14229                                  
 14230                                  ; we now see that a change line has been seen in the past. let's do the
 14231                                  ; expensive verification.
 14232                                  
 14233 00001804 E8F0ED                  		call	GetBp		; build	bpb in current bds
 14234 00001807 720F                    		jb	short ret_no_error_map ; getbp has already called maperror
 14235 00001809 E81600                  		call	check_vid
 14236 0000180C 7207                    		jb	short checklatchret ; disk error trying	to read	in.
 14237 0000180E 09F6                    		or	si, si		; is changed for sure?
 14238 00001810 7908                    		jns	short checkret
 14239 00001812 E87D00                  		call	returnvid
 14240                                  checklatchret:				
 14241 00001815 E8B8F3                  		call	maperror	; fix up al for	return to dos
 14242                                  ret_no_error_map:			
 14243 00001818 F9                      		stc
 14244 00001819 5E                      		pop	si		; pop off return address
 14245                                  checkret:				
 14246 0000181A C3                      		retn
 14247                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14248                                  
 14249                                  ; check the fat and the vid. return in di -1 or 0. return with carry set
 14250                                  ; only if there was a disk error. return that error code in ax.
 14251                                  ;
 14252                                  ;	called with es:di -> bds, ds -> Bios_Data
 14253                                  
 14254                                  checkfatvid:				
 14255 0000181B E8CD01                  		call	fat_check	; check	the fat	and the	vid
 14256 0000181E 09F6                    		or	si, si
 14257 00001820 7827                    		js	short changed_drv ;
 14258                                  
 14259                                  ; the fat was the same. fall into check_vid and check volume id.
 14260                                  
 14261                                  		; fall into check_vid
 14262                                  
 14263                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 14264                                  
 14265                                  ; now with the extended boot record, the logic should be enhanced.
 14266                                  ;
 14267                                  ; if it is the extended boot record, then we check the volume serial
 14268                                  ; number instead of volume id. if it is different, then set si to -1.
 14269                                  ;
 14270                                  ; if it is same, then si= 1 (no change).
 14271                                  ;
 14272                                  ; if it is not the extended boot record, then just follows the old
 14273                                  ; logic. dos 4.00 will check if the # of fat in the boot record bpb
 14274                                  ; is not 0.  if it is 0 then it must be non_fat based system and
 14275                                  ; should have already covered by extended boot structure checking.
 14276                                  ; so, we will return "i don't know" by setting si to 0.
 14277                                  ;
 14278                                  ; this routine assume the newest valid boot record is in cs:[disksector].
 14279                                  ; (this will be gauranteed by a successful getbp call right before this
 14280                                  ; routine.)
 14281                                  ;
 14282                                  ;	called with es:di -> bds, ds -> bds
 14283                                  
 14284                                  		; 19/10/2022
 14285                                  check_vid:
 14286                                  
 14287                                  ; check the disksector.EXT_BOOT_SIG variable for the extended
 14288                                  ; boot signature. if it is set then go to do the extended
 14289                                  ; id check otherwise continue with code below
 14290                                  
 14291 00001822 803E[7401]29            		cmp	byte [disksector+26h], 29h
 14292                                  					; [disksector+EXT_BOOT.SIG],
 14293                                  					; EXT_BOOT_SIGNATURE
 14294 00001827 7427                    		jz	short do_ext_check_id
 14295 00001829 E8E400                  		call	haschange
 14296 0000182C 74EC                    		jz	short checkret
 14297 0000182E 31F6                    		xor	si, si
 14298 00001830 803E[5E01]00            		cmp	byte [disksector+10h], 0 
 14299                                  					; [disksector+EXT_BOOT.BPB+EBPB.NUMBEROFFATS]
 14300 00001835 7411                    		jz	short checkfatret ; don't read vol id
 14301                                  					; if not fat system
 14302 00001837 E8F600                  		call	read_volume_id
 14303 0000183A 720C                    		jb	short checkfatret
 14304 0000183C E89B01                  		call	check_volume_id
 14305 0000183F BEFFFF                  		mov	si, 0FFFFh	; -1
 14306                                  					; definitely changed
 14307 00001842 7505                    		jnz	short changed_drv
 14308                                  
 14309 00001844 46                      		inc	si		; not changed
 14310                                  vid_no_changed:				
 14311 00001845 E8C200                  		call	resetchanged
 14312                                  		; 12/12/2022
 14313                                  		; cf=0 ('and' instruction in 'resetchanged' clears cf) 
 14314                                  		;clc
 14315                                  checkfatret:				
 14316 00001848 C3                      		retn
 14317                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14318                                  
 14319                                  		; 12/12/2022
 14320                                  changed_drv:
 14321 00001849 F8                      		clc			; cas -- return	no error
 14322 0000184A C606[1E01]FF            		mov	byte  [tim_drv], 0FFh 
 14323                                  					; ensure that we ask rom for media
 14324 0000184F C3                      		retn			; check	next time round
 14325                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14326                                  
 14327                                  ; extended id check
 14328                                  
 14329                                  ; 16/10/2022
 14330                                  
 14331                                  ; the code to check extended id is basically a check to see if the
 14332                                  ; volume serial number is still the same. the volume serial number
 14333                                  ; previously read is in cs:disksector.EXT_BOOT_SERIAL
 14334                                  ; ds:di points to the bds of the drive under consideration.
 14335                                  ; the bds has fields containing the high and low words 
 14336                                  ; of the volume serial number of the media in the drive.
 14337                                  ; compare these fields to the fields mentioned above. if these fields
 14338                                  ; do not match the media has changed and so we should jump to the code
 14339                                  ; starting at ext_changed else return "i don't know" status
 14340                                  ; in the register used for the changeline status and continue executing
 14341                                  ; the code given below. for temporary storage use the register which
 14342                                  ; has been saved and restored around this block.
 14343                                  ;
 14344                                  ; bds fields in inc\msbds.inc
 14345                                  
 14346                                  		; 19/10/2022
 14347                                  do_ext_check_id:			
 14348 00001850 50                      		push	ax
 14349                                  		;mov	ax, word ptr ds:disksector+27h
 14350                                  					; [DiskSector+EXT_BOOT.SERIAL]
 14351 00001851 A1[7501]                		mov	ax, [disksector+27h]
 14352 00001854 263B4557                		cmp	ax, [es:di+57h]	; [di+BDS.vol_serial]
 14353 00001858 750E                    		jnz	short ext_changed
 14354 0000185A A1[7701]                		mov	ax, [disksector+29h] ; [DiskSector+EXT_BOOT.SERIAL+2]
 14355 0000185D 263B4559                		cmp	ax, [es:di+59h]	; [di+BDS.vol_serial+2]
 14356 00001861 7505                    		jnz	short ext_changed
 14357 00001863 31F6                    		xor	si, si		; 0
 14358                                  					; don't know
 14359 00001865 58                      		pop	ax
 14360 00001866 EBDD                    		jmp	short vid_no_changed
 14361                                  					; reset the flag
 14362                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14363                                  
 14364                                  ext_changed:				
 14365 00001868 58                      		pop	ax
 14366 00001869 BEFFFF                  		mov	si, 0FFFFh	; -1
 14367                                  					; disk changed!
 14368                                  		; 12/12/2022
 14369                                  		; ('changed_drv' clears cf)
 14370                                  		;clc
 14371 0000186C EBDB                    		jmp	short changed_drv
 14372                                  
 14373                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14374                                  
 14375                                  ; at i/o time, we detected the error. now we need to determine whether the
 14376                                  ; media was truly changed or not. we return normally if media change unknown.
 14377                                  ; and we pop off the call and jmp to harderr if we see an error.
 14378                                  ;
 14379                                  ; es:di -> bds
 14380                                  
 14381                                  checkio:				
 14382 0000186E 80FC06                  		cmp	ah, 6
 14383 00001871 75D5                    		jnz	short checkfatret
 14384 00001873 E837FF                  		call	chkopcnt
 14385 00001876 74D0                    		jz	short checkfatret
 14386 00001878 E87CED                  		call	GetBp
 14387 0000187B 7212                    		jb	short no_error_map
 14388 0000187D E89BFF                  		call	checkfatvid
 14389 00001880 7209                    		jb	short checkioret ; disk	error trying to	read in.
 14390 00001882 09F6                    		or	si, si		; is changed for sure?
 14391 00001884 7802                    		js	short checkioerr ; yes changed
 14392 00001886 45                      		inc	bp		; allow	a retry
 14393 00001887 C3                      		retn
 14394                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14395                                  
 14396                                  checkioerr:				
 14397 00001888 E80700                  		call	returnvid
 14398                                  
 14399                                  checkioret:				
 14400 0000188B F9                      		stc			; make sure carry gets passed through
 14401 0000188C E9F1F2                  		jmp	harderr
 14402                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14403                                  
 14404                                  no_error_map:				
 14405 0000188F E9F1F2                  		jmp	harderr2
 14406                                  
 14407                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 14408                                  
 14409                                  ; return vid sets up the vid for a return to dos.
 14410                                  ;  es:di -> bds, returns pointer in packet to bds_volid
 14411                                  ;  **** trashes si! ****
 14412                                  
 14413                                  returnvid:		
 14414 00001892 BE1600                  		mov	si, 22		; extra
 14415                                  					; offset into pointer to return	value
 14416 00001895 E80700                  		call	vid_into_packet
 14417 00001898 B406                    		mov	ah, 6
 14418 0000189A F9                      		stc
 14419 0000189B C3                      		retn
 14420                                  
 14421                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14422                                  
 14423                                  ; moves the pointer to the volid for the drive into the original request packet
 14424                                  ; no attempt is made to preserve registers.
 14425                                  ;
 14426                                  ; assumes es:di -> bds
 14427                                  ; **trashes si**
 14428                                  
 14429                                  media_set_vid:				
 14430 0000189C BE0F00                  		mov	si, 15		; trans+1
 14431                                  					; return the value here	in packet
 14432                                  
 14433                                  		; fall into vid_into_packet
 14434                                  
 14435                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 14436                                  
 14437                                  ; return pointer to vid in bds at es:di in packet[si]
 14438                                  
 14439                                  		; 19/10/2022
 14440                                  vid_into_packet:
 14441 0000189F 1E                      		push	ds		; return pointer to vid	in bds at es:di	in packet[si]
 14442 000018A0 C51E[1200]              		lds	bx, [ptrsav]
 14443 000018A4 83C74B                  		add	di, 75		; BDS.volid
 14444 000018A7 8938                    		mov	[bx+si], di
 14445 000018A9 83EF4B                  		sub	di, 75		; BDS.volid
 14446 000018AC 8C4002                  		mov	[bx+si+2], es
 14447 000018AF 1F                      		pop	ds
 14448                                  dofloppy:	; 18/12/2022
 14449 000018B0 C3                      		retn
 14450                                  
 14451                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14452                                  
 14453                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14454                                  ;   hidensity - examine a drive/media descriptor to set the media type. if
 14455                                  ;   the media descriptor is not f9 (not 96tpi or 3 1/2), we return and let the
 14456                                  ;   caller do the rest. otherwise, we pop off the return and jump to the tail
 14457                                  ;   of getbp. for 3.5" media, we just return.
 14458                                  ;
 14459                                  ;   inputs:	es:di point to correct bds for this drive
 14460                                  ;		ah has media byte
 14461                                  ;
 14462                                  ;   outputs:	carry clear
 14463                                  ;		    no registers modified
 14464                                  ;		carry set
 14465                                  ;		    al = sectors/fat
 14466                                  ;		    bh = number of root directory entries
 14467                                  ;		    bl = sectors per track
 14468                                  ;		    cx = number of sectors
 14469                                  ;		    dh = sectors per allocation unit
 14470                                  ;		    dl = number of heads
 14471                                  ;
 14472                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14473                                  
 14474                                  hidensity:
 14475                                  
 14476                                  ; check for correct drive
 14477                                  		
 14478                                  		; 12/12/2022
 14479 000018B1 26F6452302              		test	byte [es:di+23h], 2		
 14480                                  		;test	word [es:di+23h], 2 ; is it special?	
 14481                                  					; [es:di+BDS.flags], fchangeline
 14482 000018B6 74F8                    		jz	short dofloppy	; no, do normal floppy test
 14483                                  
 14484                                  ; we have a media byte that is pretty complex. examine drive information
 14485                                  ; table to see what kind it is.
 14486                                  
 14487 000018B8 26807D2202              		cmp	byte [es:di+22h], 2 ; is it single-media?
 14488 000018BD 74F1                    		jz	short dofloppy	; [es:di+BDS.formfactor], ffSmall
 14489                                  					; yes, use fatid...
 14490                                  ; 96 tpi drive?
 14491 000018BF 80FCF9                  		cmp	ah, 0F9h
 14492 000018C2 75EC                    		jnz	short dofloppy
 14493                                  
 14494                                  ;------ If formfactor of drive = ffother or ff288 it has to be
 14495                                  ;------ a 720K diskette
 14496                                  
 14497 000018C4 26807D2207              		cmp	byte [es:di+22h], 7 ; [es:di+BDS.formfactor]
 14498                                  					; ffOther
 14499 000018C9 7418                    		jz	short Is720K
 14500 000018CB 26807D2209              		cmp	byte [es:di+22h], 9 ; [es:di+BDS.formfactor]
 14501                                  					; ff288
 14502 000018D0 7411                    		jz	short Is720K
 14503 000018D2 B007                    		mov	al, 7		; seven	sectors	/ fat
 14504 000018D4 BB0FE0                  		mov	bx, 57359	; 224*256+0Fh
 14505                                  					; 224 root dir entries
 14506                                  					; & 0Fh sector max
 14507 000018D7 B96009                  		mov	cx, 2400	; 80*15*2
 14508                                  					; 80 tracks, 15 sectors/track,
 14509                                  					; 2 sides
 14510 000018DA BA0201                  		mov	dx, 258		; 1*256+2
 14511                                  					; sectors/allocation unit
 14512                                  					; & head max
 14513 000018DD 83C402                  		add	sp, 2		; pop off return address
 14514 000018E0 E986ED                  		jmp	Has1		; return to tail of getbp
 14515                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14516                                  
 14517                                  Is720K:					
 14518 000018E3 83C402                  		add	sp, 2		; pop off return address
 14519 000018E6 E947ED                  		jmp	Has720K		; return to 720K code
 14520                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14521                                  
 14522                                  		; 18/12/2022
 14523                                  ;dofloppy:				
 14524                                  		;retn
 14525                                  
 14526                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 14527                                  
 14528                                  ; 16/10/2022
 14529                                  
 14530                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14531                                  ; set_changed_dl - sets flag bits according to bits set in bx.
 14532                                  ;		   essentially used to indicate changeline, or format.
 14533                                  ;
 14534                                  ;   inputs:	dl contains physical drive number
 14535                                  ;		bx contains bits to set in the flag field in the bdss
 14536                                  ;   outputs:	none
 14537                                  ;   registers modified: flags
 14538                                  ;
 14539                                  ;	called from int13 hooker.  Must preserve ALL registers!!!
 14540                                  ;
 14541                                  ; in the virtual drive system we *must* flag the other drives as being changed
 14542                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14543                                  
 14544                                  set_changed_dl:	
 14545 000018E9 06                      		push	es
 14546 000018EA 57                      		push	di
 14547                                  		;les	di, ds:start_bds
 14548                                  		; 19/10/2022
 14549 000018EB C43E[1901]              		les	di, [start_bds]
 14550                                  
 14551                                  ; note: we assume that the list is non-empty
 14552                                  
 14553                                  scan_bds:				
 14554 000018EF 26385504                		cmp	[es:di+4], dl	; [es:di+BDS.drivenum]
 14555 000018F3 7504                    		jnz	short get_next_bds
 14556                                  
 14557                                  ; someone may complain, but this *always* must be done when a disk change is
 14558                                  ; noted. there are *no* other compromising circumstances.
 14559                                  
 14560 000018F5 26095D23                		or	[es:di+23h], bx	; [es:di+BDS.flags]
 14561                                  					; signal change	on other drive
 14562                                  get_next_bds:				
 14563 000018F9 26C43D                  		les	di, [es:di]	; [es:di+BDS.link]
 14564                                  					; go to	next bds
 14565 000018FC 83FFFF                  		cmp	di, 0FFFFh
 14566 000018FF 75EE                    		jnz	short scan_bds	; loop unless we hit end of chain
 14567 00001901 5F                      		pop	di
 14568 00001902 07                      		pop	es
 14569 00001903 C3                      		retn
 14570                                  
 14571                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 14572                                  
 14573                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14574                                  ; checkromchange - see if external program has diddled rom change line.
 14575                                  ;
 14576                                  ;   inputs:	es:di points to current bds.
 14577                                  ;   outputs:	zero set - no change
 14578                                  ;		zero reset - change
 14579                                  ;   registers modified: none
 14580                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14581                                  
 14582                                  checkromchange:	
 14583                                  		;test	word [es:di+BDS.flags], fchanged ; 40h
 14584                                  		; 10/12/2022
 14585 00001904 26F6452340              		test	byte [es:di+23h], 40h
 14586                                  		;test	word [es:di+23h], 40h ; [es:di+BDS.flags]
 14587                                  					; fchanged
 14588 00001909 C3                      		retn
 14589                                  
 14590                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 14591                                  
 14592                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14593                                  ; resetchanged - restore value of change line
 14594                                  ;
 14595                                  ;   inputs:	es:di points to current bds
 14596                                  ;   outputs:	none
 14597                                  ;   registers modified: none
 14598                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14599                                  
 14600                                  resetchanged:	
 14601                                  		;and	word [es:di+BDS.flags], ~fchanged ; 0FFBFh	
 14602                                  		; 10/12/2022
 14603 0000190A 26806523BF              		and	byte [es:di+23h], 0BFh
 14604                                  		;and	word [es:di+23h], 0FFBFh ; [es:di+BDS.flags]
 14605                                  					; ~fchanged
 14606 0000190F C3                      		retn
 14607                                  
 14608                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 14609                                  
 14610                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14611                                  ; haschange - see if drive can supply change line
 14612                                  ;
 14613                                  ;   inputs:	es:di points to current bds
 14614                                  ;   outputs:	zero set - no change line available
 14615                                  ;		zero reset - change line available
 14616                                  ;   registers modified: none
 14617                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14618                                  
 14619                                  haschange:
 14620                                  		;test	word [es:di+BDS.flags], fchangeline ; 2
 14621                                  		; 10/12/2022
 14622 00001910 26F6452302              		test	byte [es:di+23h], 2		
 14623                                  		;test	word [es:di+23h], 2 ; [es:di+BDS.flags]
 14624                                  					; fchangeline
 14625 00001915 C3                      		retn
 14626                                  
 14627                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14628                                  
 14629                                  ; 16/10/2022
 14630                                  
 14631                                  ;-------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14632                                  ; set_volume_id      -	main routine, calls other routines.
 14633                                  ; read_volume_id     -	read the volume id and tells if it has been changed.
 14634                                  ; transfer_volume_id -	copy the volume id from tmp to special drive.
 14635                                  ; check_volume_id    -	compare volume id in tmp area with one expected for drive.
 14636                                  ; fat_check          -	see of the fatid has changed in the specified drive.
 14637                                  ;-------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14638                                  
 14639                                  ; set_volume_id
 14640                                  ;   if drive has changeline support, read in and set the volume_id
 14641                                  ; and the last fat_id byte. if no change line support then do nothing.
 14642                                  ;
 14643                                  ;   on entry:
 14644                                  ;	es:di points to the bds for this disk.
 14645                                  ;	ah contains media byte
 14646                                  ;
 14647                                  ;   on exit:
 14648                                  ;	carry clear:
 14649                                  ;	   successful call
 14650                                  ;	carry set
 14651                                  ;	   error and ax has error code
 14652                                  
 14653                                  set_volume_id:				
 14654 00001916 52                      		push	dx		; save registers
 14655 00001917 50                      		push	ax
 14656 00001918 E8F5FF                  		call	haschange	; does drive have changeline support?
 14657 0000191B 740B                    		jz	short setvret	; no, get out
 14658 0000191D E81000                  		call	read_volume_id
 14659 00001920 7209                    		jb	short seterr
 14660 00001922 E8A200                  		call	transfer_volume_id ; copy the volume id	to special drive
 14661 00001925 E8E2FF                  		call	resetchanged	; restore value	of change line
 14662                                  setvret:				
 14663                                  		; 10/12/2022
 14664                                  		; cf = 0
 14665                                  		;clc			; no error, clear carry flag
 14666 00001928 58                      		pop	ax		; restore registers
 14667 00001929 5A                      		pop	dx
 14668 0000192A C3                      		retn
 14669                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14670                                  
 14671                                  seterr:					
 14672 0000192B 5A                      		pop	dx		; pop stack but don't overwrite ax
 14673 0000192C 5A                      		pop	dx		; restore dx
 14674 0000192D C3                      		retn
 14675                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14676 0000192E 0000                    root_sec:	dw 0			; root sector #
 14677                                  
 14678                                  ; 16/10/2022
 14679                                  ;ROOTSEC equ root_sec - DOSBIOSEG_2C7h		
 14680                                  ; 09/12/2022
 14681                                  ROOTSEC equ root_sec
 14682                                  
 14683                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 14684                                  
 14685                                  ; 16/10/2022
 14686                                  
 14687                                  ; read_volume_id read the volume id and tells if it has been changed.
 14688                                  ;
 14689                                  ;   on entry:
 14690                                  ;	es:di points to current bds for drive.
 14691                                  ;
 14692                                  ;   on exit:
 14693                                  ;	carry clear
 14694                                  ;	    si = 1  no change
 14695                                  ;	    si = 0  ?
 14696                                  ;	    si = -1 change
 14697                                  ;
 14698                                  ;	carry set:
 14699                                  ;	    error and ax has error code.
 14700                                  
 14701                                  read_volume_id:
 14702 00001930 52                      		push	dx		; preserve registers
 14703 00001931 51                      		push	cx
 14704 00001932 53                      		push	bx
 14705 00001933 50                      		push	ax
 14706 00001934 06                      		push	es		; stack the bds last
 14707 00001935 57                      		push	di
 14708 00001936 1E                      		push	ds		; point es to Bios_Data
 14709 00001937 07                      		pop	es
 14710 00001938 BF[0A09]                		mov	di, tmp_vid	; "NO NAME	 "
 14711 0000193B BE[FE08]                		mov	si, nul_vid	; "NO NAME	 "
 14712 0000193E B90C00                  		mov	cx, 12		; initialize tmp_vid to	null vi_id
 14713 00001941 F3A4                    		rep movsb
 14714 00001943 5F                      		pop	di
 14715 00001944 07                      		pop	es
 14716 00001945 268A450B                		mov	al, [es:di+11]	; [es:di+BDS.fats]
 14717                                  					; # of fats
 14718 00001949 268B4D11                		mov	cx, [es:di+17]	; [es:di+BDS.fatsecs]
 14719                                  					; sectors / fat
 14720 0000194D F6E1                    		mul	cl		; size taken by	fats
 14721 0000194F 26034509                		add	ax, [es:di+9]	; [es:di+BDS.resectors]
 14722                                  					; add on reserved sectors
 14723                                  					;
 14724                                  					; ax is	now sector # (0	based)
 14725                                  		; 17/10/2022
 14726 00001953 2EA3[2E19]              		mov	[cs:ROOTSEC], ax
 14727                                  		;mov	word ptr cs:198Fh, ax ; [cs:root_sec]
 14728                                  					; 0070h:3EFFh =	2C7h:198Fh
 14729 00001957 268B450C                		mov	ax, [es:di+12]	; [es:di+BDS.direntries]
 14730                                  					; # root dir entries
 14731 0000195B B104                    		mov	cl, 4		; 16 entries/sector
 14732 0000195D D3E8                    		shr	ax, cl		; divide by 16
 14733 0000195F 89C1                    		mov	cx, ax		; cx is	# of sectors to	scan
 14734                                  next_sec:				
 14735 00001961 51                      		push	cx		; save outer loop counter
 14736 00001962 2EA1[2E19]              		mov	ax, [cs:ROOTSEC]
 14737                                  		;mov	ax, word ptr cs:198Fh ; [cs:root_sec]
 14738                                  					; get sector #
 14739 00001966 268B4D13                		mov	cx, [es:di+19]	; [es:di+BDS.secpertrack]
 14740                                  					; sectors / track
 14741 0000196A 31D2                    		xor	dx, dx
 14742 0000196C F7F1                    		div	cx
 14743                                  
 14744                                  ; set up registers for call to read_sector
 14745                                  
 14746 0000196E 42                      		inc	dx		; dx= sectors into track
 14747                                  					; ax= track count from 0
 14748 0000196F 88D1                    		mov	cl, dl		; sector to read
 14749 00001971 31D2                    		xor	dx, dx
 14750 00001973 26F77515                		div	word [es:di+21] ; [es:di+BDS.heads]
 14751                                  					; # heads on this disc
 14752 00001977 88D6                    		mov	dh, dl		; head number
 14753 00001979 88C5                    		mov	ch, al		; track	#
 14754 0000197B E8FBED                  		call	read_sector	; get first sector of the root directory,
 14755                                  					; ds:bx	-> directory sector
 14756 0000197E 7243                    		jb	short readviderr
 14757 00001980 B91000                  		mov	cx, 16		; # of dir entries in a	block of root
 14758 00001983 B008                    		mov	al, 8		; volume label bit
 14759                                  fvid_loop:				
 14760 00001985 803F00                  		cmp	byte [bx], 0 ; end of dir?
 14761 00001988 7436                    		jz	short no_vid	; yes, no vol id
 14762 0000198A 803FE5                  		cmp	byte [bx], 0E5h ; empty entry?
 14763 0000198D 7405                    		jz	short ent_loop	; yes, skip
 14764 0000198F 84470B                  		test	[bx+11], al	; is volume label bit set in fcb?
 14765 00001992 7511                    		jnz	short found_vid	; jmp yes
 14766                                  ent_loop:				
 14767 00001994 83C320                  		add	bx, 32		; add length of	directory entry
 14768 00001997 E2EC                    		loop	fvid_loop
 14769 00001999 59                      		pop	cx		; outer loop
 14770 0000199A 2EFF06[2E19]            		inc	word [cs:ROOTSEC]
 14771                                  		;inc	word ptr cs:198Fh ; inc word [root_sec]
 14772                                  					; next sector
 14773 0000199F E2C0                    		loop	next_sec	; continue
 14774                                  notfound:				
 14775 000019A1 31F6                    		xor	si, si
 14776 000019A3 EB16                    		jmp	short fvid_ret
 14777                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14778                                  
 14779                                  found_vid:				
 14780 000019A5 59                      		pop	cx		; clean stack of outer loop counter
 14781 000019A6 89DE                    		mov	si, bx		; point	to volume_id
 14782 000019A8 06                      		push	es		; preserve current bds
 14783 000019A9 57                      		push	di
 14784 000019AA 1E                      		push	ds
 14785 000019AB 07                      		pop	es		; point es to Bios_Data
 14786 000019AC BF[0A09]                		mov	di, tmp_vid	; "NO NAME	 "
 14787 000019AF B90B00                  		mov	cx, 11		; VOLID_SIZ-1
 14788                                  					; length of string minus nul
 14789 000019B2 F3A4                    		rep movsb		; mov volume label to tmp_vid
 14790 000019B4 30C0                    		xor	al, al
 14791 000019B6 AA                      		stosb			; null terminate
 14792 000019B7 31F6                    		xor	si, si
 14793 000019B9 5F                      		pop	di		; restore current bds
 14794 000019BA 07                      		pop	es
 14795                                  fvid_ret:				
 14796 000019BB 58                      		pop	ax
 14797                                  		; 10/12/2022
 14798                                  		; cf = 0
 14799                                  		;clc
 14800                                  rvidret:				
 14801 000019BC 5B                      		pop	bx		; restore registers
 14802 000019BD 59                      		pop	cx
 14803 000019BE 5A                      		pop	dx
 14804 000019BF C3                      		retn
 14805                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14806                                  
 14807                                  no_vid:					
 14808 000019C0 59                      		pop	cx		; clean stack of outer loop counter
 14809 000019C1 EBDE                    		jmp	short notfound	; not found
 14810                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14811                                  
 14812                                  readviderr:				
 14813 000019C3 5E                      		pop	si		; trash the outer loop counter
 14814 000019C4 5E                      		pop	si		; caller's ax, return error code instead 
 14815 000019C5 EBF5                    		jmp	short rvidret
 14816                                  
 14817                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 14818                                  
 14819                                  ; transfer_volume_id - copy the volume id from tmp to special drive
 14820                                  ;
 14821                                  ; inputs:	es:di has current bds
 14822                                  ; outputs:	bds for drive has volume id from tmp
 14823                                  
 14824                                  transfer_volume_id:	
 14825 000019C7 57                      		push	di		; copy the volume id from tmp to special drive
 14826 000019C8 56                      		push	si
 14827 000019C9 51                      		push	cx
 14828 000019CA BE[0A09]                		mov	si, tmp_vid	; "NO NAME	 "
 14829                                  		;add	di, BDS.volid
 14830 000019CD 83C74B                  		add	di, 75		; BDS.volid
 14831                                  		;mov	cx, VOLID_SIZ
 14832 000019D0 B90C00                  		mov	cx, 12		; VOLID_SIZ
 14833 000019D3 FC                      		cld
 14834 000019D4 F3A4                    		rep movsb
 14835 000019D6 59                      		pop	cx
 14836 000019D7 5E                      		pop	si
 14837 000019D8 5F                      		pop	di
 14838 000019D9 C3                      		retn
 14839                                  
 14840                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 14841                                  
 14842                                  ;  check_volume_id - compare volume id in tmp area with
 14843                                  ;		     one expected for drive
 14844                                  ;
 14845                                  ;   inputs:	es:di has current bds for drive
 14846                                  ;   outputs:	zero true means it matched
 14847                                  
 14848                                  check_volume_id:	
 14849 000019DA 57                      		push	di
 14850 000019DB 51                      		push	cx
 14851 000019DC BE[0A09]                		mov	si, tmp_vid	; "NO NAME	 "
 14852                                  		;add	di, BDS.volid
 14853 000019DF 83C74B                  		add	di, 75		; BDS.volid
 14854                                  		;mov	cx, VOLID_SIZ
 14855 000019E2 B90C00                  		mov	cx, 12		; VOLID_SIZ
 14856 000019E5 FC                      		cld
 14857 000019E6 F3A6                    		repe cmpsb		; are the 2 volume_ids the same?
 14858 000019E8 59                      		pop	cx
 14859 000019E9 5F                      		pop	di
 14860 000019EA C3                      		retn
 14861                                  
 14862                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 14863                                  
 14864                                  ;   fat_check - see of the fatid has changed in the specified drive.
 14865                                  ;	      - uses the fat id obtained from the boot sector.
 14866                                  ;
 14867                                  ;   inputs:	medbyt is expected fat id
 14868                                  ;		es:di points to current bds
 14869                                  ;
 14870                                  ;   output:	si = -1 if fat id different,
 14871                                  ;		si = 0 otherwise
 14872                                  ;
 14873                                  ;   no other registers changed.
 14874                                  
 14875                                  fat_check:		
 14876 000019EB 50                      		push	ax
 14877 000019EC 31F6                    		xor	si, si		; say fat id's are same.
 14878 000019EE A0[1F01]                		mov	al, [medbyt]	; 19/10/2022
 14879 000019F1 263A4510                		cmp	al, [es:di+10h]	; [es:di+BDS.media]
 14880                                  					; compare it with the bds medbyte
 14881 000019F5 7401                    		jz	short okret1	; carry	clear
 14882 000019F7 4E                      		dec	si
 14883                                  okret1:					
 14884 000019F8 58                      		pop	ax
 14885 000019F9 C3                      		retn
 14886                                  
 14887                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14888                                  
 14889                                  ; BIOSCODE:1A69h (MSDOS 6.21, IO.SYS)
 14890                                  		;times 7 db 0
 14891                                  
 14892                                  ; BIOSCODE:180Bh (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)	
 14893                                  
 14894                                  		; 09/12/2022
 14895                                  		;times 4 db 0	; 17/10/2022
 14896                                  		;db 4 dup(0)	; times 4 db 0
 14897                                  
 14898                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14899                                  
 14900                                  		; 09/12/2022
 14901                                  		;db 0
 14902                                  
 14903                                  number2div	equ ($-BCode_start)
 14904                                  number2mod	equ (number2div % 16)
 14905                                  
 14906                                  %if number2mod>0 & number2mod<16
 14907 000019FA 00<rep 6h>              		times (16-number2mod) db 0
 14908                                  %endif
 14909                                  
 14910                                  ;align 16
 14911                                  
 14912                                  ; 09/12/2022
 14913                                  BCODE_END	equ $ - BCode_start
 14914                                  ;SYSINITSEG	equ IOSYSCODESEG+(BCODE_END>>4)
 14915                                  ; 13/12/2022
 14916                                  SYSINITOFFSET	equ BCODE_END
 14917                                  SYSINITSEG	equ IOSYSCODESEG+(SYSINITOFFSET>>4)
 14918                                  
 14919                                  ;--- End of DOSBIOS code segment ---------------------------------------------
 14920

 14922                                  ; 01/05/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0 
 14923                                  ; ============================================================================
 14924                                  ; end of BIOSCODE

 14927                                  ; %include sysinit5.s	; 09/12/2022

 14930                                  ;=============================================================================
 14931                                  ; (IO.SYS) SYSINIT SEGMENT 
 14932                                  ;=============================================================================
 14933                                  ; 09/12/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)
 14934                                  
 14935                                  section .SYSINIT vstart=0
 14936                                  
 14937                                  ; ****************************************************************************
 14938                                  ; SYSINIT.BIN (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS) - RETRO DOS v4.0 by ERDOGAN TAN - 21/10/2022
 14939                                  ; ----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14940                                  ; Last Update: 04/01/2023 (Modified IO.SYS)  ((Previous: 31/12/2022))
 14941                                  ; ----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14942                                  ; Beginning: 03/06/2018 (Retro DOS 3.0), 21/03/2019 (Retro DOS 4.0)
 14943                                  ; ----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14944                                  ; Assembler: NASM version 2.15
 14945                                  ; ----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14946                                  ;	   ((nasm sysinit5.s -l sysinit5.lst -o SYSINIT5.BIN -Z error.txt)) 	
 14947                                  ; ----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14948                                  ; Modified from 'sysinit2.s' (SYSINIT2.BIN) file of Retro DOS v3.0 (6/7/2018)
 14949                                  ; ----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14950                                  ; Derived from 'SYSINIT1.ASM' and 'SYSINIT2.ASM' files of MSDOS 6.0
 14951                                  ; source code by Microsoft, 1991 
 14952                                  ; ----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14953                                  ; Derived from 'SYSINIT.ASM' file of MSDOS 2.0 (IBM PCDOS v2.0) source code
 14954                                  ; by Microsoft, 12/10/1983
 14955                                  ; ****************************************************************************
 14956                                  ; main file: 'retrodos4.s'
 14957                                  ; incbin 'SYSINIT3.BIN' ; (SYINITSEG)
 14958                                  
 14959                                  ; 21/10/2022
 14960                                  ; ----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14961                                  ; This source code (version) is based on SYSINIT source code of disassembled
 14962                                  ; MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS file (SYSINIT.BIN) 
 14963                                  ; Dissassembler: Hex-Rays Interactive Disassembler (IDA)
 14964                                  ; ----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14965                                  ; Binary file splitter & joiner: FFSJ v3.3
 14966                                  
 14967                                  ;--------------------------------------------------------------
 14968                                  ; SYSINIT.TXT (27/01/1983)
 14969                                  ;--------------------------------------------------------------
 14970                                  ;    SYSINIT is  a module linked behind the OEM bios.  It takes
 14971                                  ;over  the  system  initialization  after  the  OEM  bios   has
 14972                                  ;performed any  initialization  it  needs  to  do.   Control is
 14973                                  ;transfered with a long jump to the external  variable  SYSINIT
 14974                                  ;
 14975                                  ;
 14976                                  ;   The OEM  has  the  following  variables declared external:
 14977                                  ;
 14978                                  ;   CURRENT_DOS_LOCATION    WORD
 14979                                  ;
 14980                                  ;This word  contains  the  segment  number of the DOS before it
 14981                                  ;is relocated.  The OEM bios must set this value.
 14982                                  ;
 14983                                  ;   FINAL_DOS_LOCATION      WORD
 14984                                  ;
 14985                                  ;This word contains the segment number of the DOS after SYSINIT
 14986                                  ;moves it.  The OEM bios must set this value.
 14987                                  ;
 14988                                  ;   DEVICE_LIST             DWORD
 14989                                  ;
 14990                                  ;This  double  word  pointer  points  to  the  linked  list  of
 14991                                  ;character and block device drivers.  The  OEM  must  set  this
 14992                                  ;value.
 14993                                  ;
 14994                                  ;   MEMORY_SIZE             WORD
 14995                                  ;
 14996                                  ;This word  contains  the  number  of  RAM  paragraphs.  If the
 14997                                  ;bios doesn't set  this  variable  SYSINIT  will  automatically
 14998                                  ;calculate it.   NOTE:  systems with PARITY checked memory must
 14999                                  ;size memory in the BIOS.  SYSINITs method is to  write  memory
 15000                                  ;and read it back until it gets a mismatch.
 15001                                  ;
 15002                                  ;   DEFAULT_DRIVE           BYTE
 15003                                  ;
 15004                                  ;This is  the initial default drive when the system first comes
 15005                                  ;up.  drive a=0, drive b=1,  etc.   If  the  bios  doesn't  set
 15006                                  ;it then drive a is assumed.
 15007                                  ;
 15008                                  ;   BUFFERS                 BYTE
 15009                                  ;
 15010                                  ;This is  the  default  number of buffers for the system.  This
 15011                                  ;value may be overridden by the user in  the  CONFIG.SYS  file.
 15012                                  ;It is DBed to 2 in SYSINIT it should be greater than 1.
 15013                                  ;
 15014                                  ;   FILES                   BYTE
 15015                                  ;
 15016                                  ;This is  the  default  number  of  files for the system.  This
 15017                                  ;value may be overridden by the user in  the  CONFIG.SYS  file.
 15018                                  ;It is  DBed  to  8 in SYSINIT, values less than 5 are ignored.
 15019                                  ;
 15020                                  ;   SYSINIT                 FAR
 15021                                  ;
 15022                                  ;The entry  point  of  the  SYSINIT  module.  OEM BIOS jumps to
 15023                                  ;this label at the end of its INIT code.
 15024                                  ;
 15025                                  ;   The OEM  has  the  following  variables declared public:
 15026                                  ;
 15027                                  ;   RE_INIT                 FAR
 15028                                  ;
 15029                                  ;This is an entry point which allows the BIOS to do some INIT
 15030                                  ;work  after  the  DOS is initialized.  ALL REGISTERS MUST BE
 15031                                  ;PRESERVED.  On entry DS points to the first available memory
 15032                                  ;(after  the DOS).  DS:0 points to a 100H byte program header
 15033                                  ;prefix which represents  the  "program"  currently  running.
 15034                                  ;This  program  should  be  thought  of  as  the OEM BIOS and
 15035                                  ;SYSINIT taken together.  This is not  a  normal  program  in
 15036                                  ;that  no  memory  is  allocated to it, it is running in free
 15037                                  ;memory.
 15038                                  ;NOTES:
 15039                                  ;     At the time this routine is called SYSINIT occupies the
 15040                                  ;highest 10K of memory ("highest" is determined by the  value
 15041                                  ;of the MEMORY_SIZE variable), DO NOT DO WRITES THERE.
 15042                                  ;     Since this is called AFTER DOS is initialized, you can
 15043                                  ;make system calls.  This also implies that the code for this
 15044                                  ;routine    CANNOT   be   thrown   away   by   use   of   the
 15045                                  ;FINAL_DOS_LOCATION since the DOS has already been moved.
 15046                                  ;     If you don't want  anything done just set this to point
 15047                                  ;at a FAR RET instruction.
 15048                                  
 15049                                  ; ----------------------------------------------------------------------
 15050                                  ; TITLE   BIOS SYSTEM INITIALIZATION
 15051                                  ; ----------------------------------------------------------------------
 15052                                  
 15053                                  ;include version.inc
 15054                                  ; ----------------------------------------------------------------------
 15055                                  
 15056                                  ;FALSE   EQU     0
 15057                                  ;TRUE    EQU     0FFFFh
 15058                                  
 15059                                  ;IBMVER	    EQU     TRUE
 15060                                  ;IBMCOPYRIGHT EQU   FALSE
 15061                                  ;STACKSW    EQU	    TRUE		;Include Switchable Hardware Stacks
 15062                                  ;IBMJAPVER  EQU     FALSE		; If TRUE set KANJI true also
 15063                                  ;MSVER      EQU     FALSE
 15064                                  ;ALTVECT    EQU     FALSE		; Switch to build ALTVECT version
 15065                                  ;KANJI      EQU     FALSE
 15066                                  
 15067                                  ;(MSDOS 6.0, versiona.inc, 1991)
 15068                                  ; ----------------------------------------------------------------------
 15069                                  ;MAJOR_VERSION  EQU	6
 15070                                  ;;MINOR_VERSION	EQU	0	;6.00
 15071                                  ;MINOR_VERSION  EQU	21	;6.21  ; 21/03/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 15072                                  
 15073                                  ; 22/10/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0)
 15074                                  ; ----------------------------------------------------------------------
 15075                                  MAJOR_VERSION   EQU	5
 15076                                  MINOR_VERSION   EQU	0
 15077                                  
 15078                                  expected_version equ	(MINOR_VERSION<<8)+MAJOR_VERSION
 15079                                  
 15080                                  ;DOSREVNM equ	00000000b       ; m037 - bits 0-2 = revision number of DOS
 15081                                  				; currently 0.
 15082                                  DOSREVNM equ	00000111b	; [[[ 7 for Retro DOS v4.0 ]]] (21/03/2019)	
 15083                                  DOSINROM equ	00001000B       ; bit 3 of ver flags returned in BH
 15084                                  DOSINHMA equ	00010000B       ; bit 4 of ver flags 
 15085                                  
 15086                                  ;      if1
 15087                                  ;      %OUT  ... for DOS Version 5.00 ...
 15088                                  ;      endif
 15089                                  
 15090                                         ;******************************
 15091                                         ;Each assembler program should:
 15092                                         ;  mov ah,030h                   ;DOS Get Version function
 15093                                         ;  int 021h                      ;Version ret. in AX,minor version first
 15094                                         ;  cmp ax,expected_version       ;ALL utilities should check for an
 15095                                         ;  jne error_handler             ; EXACT version match.
 15096                                         ;******************************
 15097                                  
 15098                                  ; ----------------------------------------------------------------------
 15099                                  ; device definitions
 15100                                  
 15101                                  ;Attribute bit masks
 15102                                  DEVTYP  EQU     8000h           ;Bit 15 - 1  if Char, 0 if block
 15103                                  DEVIOCTL EQU    4000h           ;Bit 14 - CONTROL mode bit
 15104                                  ISFATBYDEV EQU  2000h           ;Bit 13 - Device uses FAT ID bytes, comp media.
 15105                                  ISCIN   EQU     0001h           ;Bit 0 - This device is the console input.
 15106                                  ISCOUT  EQU     0002h           ;Bit 1 - This device is the console output.
 15107                                  ISNULL  EQU     0004h           ;Bit 2 - This device is the null device.
 15108                                  ISCLOCK EQU     0008h           ;Bit 3 - This device is the clock device.
 15109                                  ISIBM   EQU     0010h           ;Bit 4 - This device is special
 15110                                  
 15111                                  ; The device table list has the form:
 15112                                  struc	SYSDEV
 15113 00000000 ????????                .NEXT:		resd 1		;Pointer to next device header
 15114 00000004 ????                    .ATT:		resw 1		;Attributes of the device
 15115 00000006 ????                    .STRAT:		resw 1		;Strategy entry point
 15116 00000008 ????                    .INT:		resw 1		;Interrupt entry point
 15117 0000000A ????????????????        .NAME:		resb 8		;Name of device (only first byte used for block)
 15118                                  .size:
 15119                                  endstruc
 15120                                  
 15121                                  ;Static Reguest Header
 15122                                  struc	SRHEAD
 15123 00000000 ??                      .REQLEN:	resb 1		;Length in bytes of request block
 15124 00000001 ??                      .REQUNIT:	resb 1		;Device unit number
 15125 00000002 ??                      .REQFUNC:	resb 1		;Type of request
 15126 00000003 ????                    .REQSTAT:	resw 1		;Status Word
 15127 00000005 ????????????????                	resb 8		;Reserved for queue links
 15128                                  .size:
 15129                                  endstruc
 15130                                  
 15131                                  ;Status word masks
 15132                                  STERR   EQU     8000H           ;Bit 15 - Error
 15133                                  STBUI   EQU     0200H           ;Bit 9 - Buisy
 15134                                  STDON   EQU     0100H           ;Bit 8 - Done
 15135                                  STECODE EQU     00FFH           ;Error code
 15136                                  WRECODE EQU     0

 15142                                  DMEDHL  EQU     15              ;Size of media check header
 15143                                  DEVBPB  EQU     2               ;Get BPB
 15144                                  DEVRDIOCTL EQU  3               ;IOCTL read
 15145                                  DBPBHL  EQU     22              ;Size of Get BPB header
 15146                                  DEVRD   EQU     4               ;Read

 15148                                  DEVRDND EQU     5               ;Non destructive read no wait (character devs)
 15149                                  DRDNDHL EQU     14              ;Size of non destructive read header
 15150                                  DEVIST  EQU     6               ;Input status
 15151                                  DSTATHL EQU     13              ;Size of status header

 15161                                  struc	SYS_FCB
 15162 00000000 ??                      .fcb_drive:	resb 1
 15163 00000001 ????????????????        .fcb_name:	resb 8
 15164 00000009 ??????                  .fcb_ext:	resb 3
 15165 0000000C ????                    .fcb_EXTENT:	resw 1
 15166 0000000E ????                    .fcb_RECSIZ:	resw 1	; Size of record (user settable)
 15167 00000010 ????                    .fcb_FILSIZ:	resw 1	; Size of file in bytes; used with the following
 15168                                                          ; word
 15169 00000012 ????                    .fcb_DRVBP:	resw 1	; BP for SEARCH FIRST and SEARCH NEXT
 15170 00000014 ????                    .fcb_FDATE:	resw 1	; Date of last writing
 15171 00000016 ????                    .fcb_FTIME:	resw 1	; Time of last writing
 15172 00000018 ??                      .fcb_DEVID:	resb 1	; Device ID number, bits 0-5 if file.
 15173                                                          ; bit 7=0 for file, bit 7=1 for I/O device
 15174                                                          ; If file, bit 6=0 if dirty
 15175                                                          ; If I/O device, bit 6=0 if EOF (input)
 15176                                                          ;               Bit 5=1 if Raw mode
 15177                                                          ;               Bit 0=1 if console input device
 15178                                                          ;               Bit 1=1 if console output device
 15179                                                          ;               Bit 2=1 if null device
 15180                                                          ;               Bit 3=1 if clock device
 15181 00000019 ????                    .fcb_FIRCLUS:	resw 1	; First cluster of file
 15182 0000001B ????                    .fcb_CLUSPOS:	resw 1	; Position of last cluster accessed
 15183 0000001D ????                    .fcb_LSTCLUS:	resw 1	; Last cluster accessed and directory
 15184 0000001F ??                                   	resb 1	; pack 2 12 bit numbers into 24 bits...
 15185 00000020 ??                      .fcb_NR:	resb 1	; Next record
 15186 00000021 ????????                .fcb_RR:	resb 4	; Random record
 15187                                  .size:
 15188                                  endstruc

 15190                                  ; ----------------------------------------------------------------------
 15191                                  ; Field definition for I/O buffer information
 15192                                  
 15193                                  ; 22/03/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0 (MSDOS 6.0, BUFFER.INC, 1991)
 15194                                  
 15195                                  struc buffinfo
 15196 00000000 ????                    .buf_next:	resw 1	; Pointer to next buffer in list
 15197 00000002 ????                    .buf_prev:	resw 1	; Pointer to previous buffer in list
 15198 00000004 ??                      .buf_ID:	resb 1	; Drive of buffer (bit 7 = 0)
 15199                                  			; SFT table index (bit 7 = 1)
 15200                                  			; = FFh if buffer free
 15201 00000005 ??                      .buf_flags:	resb 1	; Bit 7 = 1 if Remote file buffer
 15202                                  			;	= 0 if Local device buffer
 15203                                  			; Bit 6 = 1 if buffer dirty
 15204                                  			; Bit 5 = Reserved
 15205                                  			; Bit 4 = Search bit (bit 7 = 1)
 15206                                  			; Bit 3 = 1 if buffer is DATA
 15207                                  			; Bit 2 = 1 if buffer is DIR
 15208                                  			; Bit 1 = 1 if buffer is FAT
 15209                                  			; Bit 0 = Reserved
 15210 00000006 ????????                .buf_sector:	resd 1	; Sector number of buffer (bit 7 = 0)
 15211                                  ; The next two items are often refed as a word (bit 7 = 0)
 15212 0000000A ??                      .buf_wrtcnt:	resb 1	; For FAT sectors, # times sector written out
 15213 0000000B ????                    .buf_wrtcntinc:	resw 1	; "   "     "   , # sectors between each write
 15214 0000000D ????????                .buf_DPB :	resd 1	; Pointer to drive parameters
 15215 00000011 ????                    .buf_fill:	resw 1	; How full buffer is (bit 7 = 1)
 15216 00000013 ??                      .buf_reserved:	resb 1	; make DWORD boundary for 386
 15217                                  .size:
 15218                                  endstruc
 15219                                  
 15220                                  %define buf_offset	dword [buf_sector]
 15221                                  			;For bit 7 = 1, this is the byte
 15222                                  			;offset of the start of the buffer in
 15223                                  			;the file pointed to by buf_ID.  Thus
 15224                                  			;the buffer starts at location
 15225                                  			;buf_offset in the file and contains
 15226                                  			;buf_fill bytes.
 15227                                  
 15228                                  bufinsiz	equ	buffinfo.size ; ; Size of structure in bytes
 15229                                  
 15230                                  
 15231                                  buf_Free	equ	0FFh		; buf_id of free buffer
 15232                                  
 15233                                  ;Flag byte masks
 15234                                  buf_isnet	EQU	10000000B
 15235                                  buf_dirty	EQU	01000000B
 15236                                  ;***
 15237                                  buf_visit	EQU	00100000B
 15238                                  ;***
 15239                                  buf_snbuf	EQU	00010000B
 15240                                  
 15241                                  buf_isDATA	EQU	00001000B
 15242                                  buf_isDIR	EQU	00000100B
 15243                                  buf_isFAT	EQU	00000010B
 15244                                  buf_type_0	EQU	11110001B	; AND sets type to "none"
 15245                                  
 15246                                  buf_NetID	EQU	bufinsiz
