 30750                                  	;putdata fInHigh,0	; We're leaving, so update fInHigh.
 30751                                  	;
 30752                                  	;push	es
 30753                                  	;push	cs
 30754                                  	;pop	es
 30755                                  	;mov	byte [es:fInHigh],0
 30756                                  	;pop	ds	
 30757                                  
 30758                                  	mov	byte [cs:fInHigh],0	
 30759                                  
 30760                                  	call	he_unlink	; Unlink UMBs
 30761                                  
 30762                                  	pop	ax
 30763                                  	; 12/12/2022
 30764                                  	;clc	; 12/12/2022 (this clc may not be necessary!?)
 30765                                  	retn
 30766                                  
 30767                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 30768                                  ;*** he_unlink - unlinks UMBs if fm_umb is set to 0
 30769                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 30770                                  ; ENTRY:    fm_umb == 1 : leave linked, else unlink
 30771                                  ; EXIT:     None
 30772                                  ; ERROR:    None
 30773                                  ; USES:     AX, BX
 30774                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 30775                                  
 30776                                  he_unlink:
 30777                                  	xor	bh, bh
 30778                                  
 30779                                  	;getdata bl, fm_umb	; Restore original link-state
 30780                                  	mov	bl,[cs:fm_umb]	
 30781                                  
 30782                                  	mov	ax,DOS_SET_UMBLINK ; 5803h
 30783                                  	int	21h
 30784                                  	retn
 30785                                  
 30786                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 30787                                  ;*** freeUMBs - frees all HIDDEN memory elements in upper-memory.
 30788                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 30789                                  ; ENTRY:    None
 30790                                  ; EXIT:     None; HIDDEN memory elements returned to FREE
 30791                                  ; ERROR:    None (ignore CF)
 30792                                  ; USES:     Flags
 30793                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 30794                                  
 30795                                  FreeUMBs:
 30796                                  	push	ax
 30797                                  	push	es
 30798                                  
 30799                                  	call	HeadUmb		; Returns with carry if err, else ES == MCB
 30800                                  	jc	short fusX
 30801                                  
 30802                                  	mov	es,ax		; Prepare for the loop; ES = current MCB addr.
 30803                                  fus10:	
 30804                                  	call	isHideMCB	; Returns with ZF set if owner is 0
 30805                                  	jnz	short fus20
 30806                                  	call	freeMCB
 30807                                  fus20:	   
 30808                                  	mov	al,[es:ARENA.SIGNATURE]
 30809                                  	cmp	al,arena_signature_end ; 'Z'
 30810                                  	jz	short fusX	; That means this was the last MCB--that's it.
 30811                                  
 30812                                  	mov	ax,es
 30813                                  	add	ax,[es:ARENA.SIZE]
 30814                                  	inc	ax
 30815                                  	mov	es,ax		; Go on forward.
 30816                                  
 30817                                  	jmp	short fus10
 30818                                  fusX:	
 30819                                  	pop	es
 30820                                  	pop	ax
 30821                                  	retn
 30822                                  
 30823                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 30824                                  ;*** isHideMCB - returns with ZF set if current MCB (ES:0) is HIDDEN
 30825                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 30826                                  ; ENTRY:    ES:0 should point to an MCB
 30827                                  ; EXIT:     ZF set if MCB is hidden, else !ZF
 30828                                  ; ERROR:    None
 30829                                  ; USES:     Flags
 30830                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 30831                                  
 30832                                  isHideMCB:
 30833                                  	;push	ax
 30834                                  
 30835                                  	cmp	word [es:ARENA.OWNER],SystemPSPOwner ; If the owner's SYSTEM
 30836                                  	jne	short ihm_x				; then check for HIDDEN
 30837                                  
 30838                                  	;mov	ax,[es:ARENA.NAME]
 30839                                  	;cmp	ax,'HI' ; 4948h
 30840                                  	cmp	word [es:ARENA.NAME+0],'HI'
 30841                                  	jne	short ihm_x
 30842                                  	;mov	ax,[es:ARENA.NAME+2]
 30843                                  	;cmp	ax,'DD' ; 4444h
 30844                                  	cmp	word [es:ARENA.NAME+2],'DD'
 30845                                  	jne	short ihm_x
 30846                                  	;mov	ax,[es:ARENA.NAME+4]
 30847                                  	;cmp	ax,'EN' ; 4E45h
 30848                                  	cmp	word [es:ARENA.NAME+4],'EN'
 30849                                  	jne	short ihm_x
 30850                                  	;mov	ax,[es:ARENA.NAME+6]
 30851                                  	;cmp	ax,'  ' ; 2020h
 30852                                  	cmp	word [es:ARENA.NAME+6],'  '
 30853                                  ihm_x:	
 30854                                  	;pop	ax
 30855                                  	retn
 30856                                  
 30857                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 30858                                  ;*** freeMCB - marks as free the MCB at ES:0
 30859                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 30860                                  ; ENTRY:    ES:0 should point to an MCB
 30861                                  ; EXIT:     None; MCB free'd
 30862                                  ; ERROR:    None
 30863                                  ; USES:     AX
 30864                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 30865                                  
 30866                                  freeMCB:
 30867                                  	mov	word [es:ARENA.OWNER],0
 30868                                  	mov	ax,'  '
 30869                                  	mov	[es:ARENA.NAME+0],ax
 30870                                  	mov	[es:ARENA.NAME+2],ax
 30871                                  	mov	[es:ARENA.NAME+4],ax
 30872                                  	mov	[es:ARENA.NAME+6],ax
 30873                                  	retn
 30874                                  
 30875                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 30876                                  ;*** HeadUmb - returns in AX the address of the first UMB block (0x9FFF)
 30877                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 30878                                  ; ENTRY:  Nothing
 30879                                  ; EXIT:   AX contains 0x9FFF for most systems
 30880                                  ; ERROR:  Carry set if pointer is 0xFFFF (if not set up yet--DH runs into this)
 30881                                  ; USES:   Flags, AX
 30882                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 30883                                  
 30884                                  HeadUmb:
 30885                                  	; 13/05/2019
 30886                                  
 30887                                  	;push	si ; ?
 30888                                  	;push	ds ; ?
 30889                                  	;push	es
 30890                                  	;push	bx ; *
 30891                                  
 30892                                  	; 09/04/2019
 30893                                  	; !!! No need to save es,bx,ds,si above !!! (es,bx are changed here)
 30894                                  
 30895                                  	mov	ah,GET_IN_VARS		; Call int 21h, function 52h...
 30896                                  	int	21h
 30897                                  			; DOS - 2+ internal - GET LIST OF LISTS
 30898                                  			; Return: ES:BX -> DOS list of lists
 30899                                  	;mov	ax,[es:8Ch]
 30900                                  	mov	ax,[es:UMB_HeadIdx]	; And read what's in ES:008C
 30901                                  	cmp	ax,0FFFFh
 30902                                  	;je	short xhu_e		; If it's 0xFFFF, it's an error...
 30903                                  
 30904                                  	;clc				; Else, it isn't.
 30905                                  	;jmp	short xhu_x
 30906                                  xhu_e:	
 30907                                  	;stc
 30908                                  	cmc	; 09/04/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0 ; *
 30909                                  xhu_x:	
 30910                                  	;pop	bx ; *
 30911                                  	;pop	es	
 30912                                  	;pop	ds ; ?
 30913                                  	;pop	si ; ?
 30914                                  	retn
 30915                                  
 30916                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 30917                                  ;*** linkumb - links UMBs not already linked in; updates fm_umb as needed
 30918                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 30919                                  ; ENTRY:    None
 30920                                  ; EXIT:     fm_umb == 0 if not linked in previously, 1 if already linked in
 30921                                  ; ERROR:    None
 30922                                  ; USES:     AX, BX, fm_umb
 30923                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 30924                                  
 30925                                  linkumb:
 30926                                  	mov	ax,DOS_GET_UMBLINK ; 5802h
 30927                                  	int	21h			; Current link-state is now in al
 30928                                  
 30929                                  	or	al,al			; BUGBUG: proper check?
 30930                                  	jnz	short lumbX		; Jumps if UMBs already linked in
 30931                                  
 30932                                  	mov	ax,DOS_SET_UMBLINK ; 5803h
 30933                                  	mov	bx,1
 30934                                  	int	21h
 30935                                  lumbX:
 30936                                  	retn
 30937                                  
 30938                                  %endif
 30939                                  
 30940                                  ; 01/11/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)
 30941                                  ; (SYSINIT:2B5Fh)
 30942                                  
 30943                                  ; ----------------------------------------------------------------------
 30944                                  ; SYSCONF.ASM (MSDOS 6.0 - 1991) 	
 30945                                  ; ----------------------------------------------------------------------
 30946                                  ; 09/04/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 30947                                  
 30948                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 30949                                  ;
 30950                                  ; procedure : InitDevLoad
 30951                                  ;
 30952                                  ;	Input : DeviceHi = 0 indicates load DD in low memory
 30953                                  ;			 = 1 indicates load in UMB:
 30954                                  ;		           ConvLoad = 0 indicates a new-style load (see below)
 30955                                  ;		                    = 1 indicates a DOS 5-style load
 30956                                  ;		DevSize  = Size of the device driver file in paras
 30957                                  ;
 30958                                  ;	Output : none
 30959                                  ;
 30960                                  ;	Initializes DevLoadAddr, DevLoadEnd & DevEntry.
 30961                                  ;	Also sets up a header for the Device driver entry for mem utility
 30962                                  ;
 30963                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 30964                                  ; For a "new-style load", we break off the current DevEntry and link the umbs
 30965                                  ; as we see fit, using HideUMBs (and UnHideUMBs at exit, though _it_ decides
 30966                                  ; whether it's entitled to do anything). HideUMBs uses the chart built by
 30967                                  ; ParseVar to determine which UMBs to leave FREE, and which not.
 30968                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 30969                                  
 30970                                  	; 01/11/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)
 30971                                  InitDevLoad:
 30972                                  	; 11/12/2022
 30973                                  	; ds = cs
 30974 00002818 803E[071F]00            	cmp	byte [DeviceHi],0
 30975                                  	;cmp	byte [cs:DeviceHi],0	; Are we loading in UMB ?
 30976                                  	;je	short InitForLo		; no, init for lo mem
 30977 0000281D 741F                    	je	short initforlo_x ; 09/04/2019
 30978                                  
 30979                                  ; 01/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS SYSINIT compatibility)
 30980                                  ;	cmp	byte [cs:ConvLoad],1	; Are we loading as per DOS 5?
 30981                                  ;	je	short InitForConv
 30982                                  ;
 30983                                  ;; There are two stages to preparing upper-memory; first, we mark as 8+HIDDEN
 30984                                  ;; any areas not specified on the /L:... chain. Second, we mark as 8+FROZEN
 30985                                  ;; any areas left in upper-memory, except for elements in the load UMB...
 30986                                  ;; we then malloc space as per Dos-5 style, and mark as free any spaces which
 30987                                  ;; are 8+FROZEN (but leave 8+HIDDEN still hidden). The load is performed,
 30988                                  ;; and UnHideUMBs later on marks all 8+HIDDEN as free.
 30989                                  ;
 30990                                  ;	call	ShrinkUMB		; Stop using the old device arena
 30991                                  ;
 30992                                  ;	call	HideUMBs		; Mark up the UM area as we see fit
 30993                                  ;	call	FreezeUM		; Hide everything BUT the load area
 30994                                  ;	call	GetUMBForDev		; And grab that load area as needed
 30995                                  ;	pushf
 30996                                  ;	call	UnFreeze		; Then unhide everything frozen
 30997                                  ;	popf
 30998                                  ;
 30999                                  ;	jc	short InitForLo		; (if carry, it's loading low)
 31000                                  ;
 31001                                  ;	jmp	short InitForHi
 31002                                  
 31003                                  	; 01/11/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)
 31004                                  	; (SYSINIT:2B67h)
 31005                                  InitForConv:
 31006                                  	; 11/12/2022
 31007                                  	; ds = cs
 31008 0000281F E83700                  	call	SpaceInUMB		; Do we have space left in the
 31009                                  					;  current UMB ?
 31010 00002822 7308                    	jnc	short InitForHi		; yes, we have
 31011 00002824 E84F04                  	call	ShrinkUMB		; shrink the current UMB in use
 31012 00002827 E84500                  	call	GetUMBForDev		; else try to allocate new UMB
 31013 0000282A 720D                    	jc	short InitForLo		; we didn't succeed, so load
 31014                                  					;  in low memory
 31015                                  InitForHi:
 31016                                  	; 11/12/2022
 31017                                  	; ds = cs
 31018                                  	;mov	ax,[cs:DevUMBFree]	; get Para addr of free mem
 31019                                  	;mov	dx,[cs:DevUMBAddr]	; UMB start addr
 31020                                  	;add	dx,[cs:DevUMBSize]	; DX = UMB End addr
 31021 0000282C A1[FD1E]                	mov	ax,[DevUMBFree]
 31022 0000282F 8B16[F91E]              	mov	dx,[DevUMBAddr]
 31023 00002833 0316[FB1E]              	add	dx,[DevUMBSize]
 31024 00002837 EB0C                    	jmp	short idl1
 31025                                  
 31026                                  InitForLo:
 31027                                  	; 11/12/2022
 31028                                  	; ds = cs
 31029                                  	;mov	byte [cs:DeviceHi],0	; in case we failed to load
 31030 00002839 C606[071F]00            	mov	byte [DeviceHi],0
 31031                                  initforlo_x:
 31032                                  	; 11/12/2022
 31033                                  	; ds = cs
 31034                                  					;  into UMB indicate that
 31035                                  					;  we are loading low
 31036                                  	;mov	ax,[cs:memhi]		; AX = start of Low memory
 31037                                  	;mov	dx,[cs:ALLOCLIM]	; DX = End of Low memory
 31038 0000283E A1[E003]                	mov	ax,[memhi]
 31039 00002841 8B16[A302]              	mov	dx,[ALLOCLIM]
 31040                                  idl1:
 31041 00002845 E86C00                  	call	DevSetMark		; setup a sub-arena for DD
 31042                                  	; 11/12/2022
 31043                                  	; ds = cs
 31044                                  	;mov	[cs:DevLoadAddr],ax	; init the Device load address
 31045                                  	;mov	[cs:DevLoadEnd],dx	; init the limit of the block
 31046                                  	;mov	word [cs:DevEntry],0	; init Entry point to DD
 31047                                  	;mov	[cs:DevEntry+2],ax
 31048 00002848 A3[EC1E]                	mov	[DevLoadAddr],ax
 31049 0000284B 8916[EE1E]              	mov	[DevLoadEnd],dx
 31050 0000284F C706[F01E]0000          	mov	word [DevEntry],0
 31051 00002855 A3[F21E]                	mov	[DevEntry+2],ax
 31052 00002858 C3                      	retn
 31053                                  
 31054                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31055                                  ;
 31056                                  ; procedure : SpaceInUMB?
 31057                                  ;
 31058                                  ;	Input : DevUMBAddr, DevUMBSize, DevUMBFree & DevSize
 31059                                  ;	Output : Carry set if no space in UMB
 31060                                  ;		 Carry clear if Space is available for the device in
 31061                                  ;		   current UMB
 31062                                  ;
 31063                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31064                                  
 31065                                  SpaceInUMB:
 31066                                  	; 11/12/2022
 31067                                  	; ds = cs
 31068                                  	;mov	ax,[cs:DevUMBSize]
 31069                                  	;add	ax,[cs:DevUMBAddr]	; End of UMB
 31070                                  	;sub	ax,[cs:DevUMBFree]	; - Free = Remaining space
 31071 00002859 A1[FB1E]                	mov	ax,[DevUMBSize]
 31072 0000285C 0306[F91E]              	add	ax,[DevUMBAddr]		; End of UMB
 31073 00002860 2B06[FD1E]              	sub	ax,[DevUMBFree]		; - Free = Remaining space
 31074                                  	; 11/12/2022
 31075                                  	;or	ax,ax			; Nospace ?
 31076                                  	;jnz	short spcinumb1
 31077                                  	;stc
 31078                                  	;retn
 31079                                  	; 11/12/2022
 31080 00002864 83F801                  	cmp	ax,1
 31081 00002867 7205                    	jb	short spcinumb2	; cf=1
 31082                                  spcinumb1:
 31083 00002869 48                      	dec	ax			; space for sub-arena
 31084                                  	; 11/12/2022
 31085                                  	; ds = cs
 31086 0000286A 3B06[EA1E]              	cmp	ax,[DevSize]
 31087                                  	;cmp	ax,[cs:DevSize]		; do we have space ?
 31088                                  spcinumb2:
 31089 0000286E C3                      	retn
 31090                                  
 31091                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31092                                  ;
 31093                                  ; procedure : PrepareMark
 31094                                  ;
 31095                                  ;	Input : AX==Address of MCB (not addr of free space), BX==Size
 31096                                  ;	Output : None; MCB marked appropriately and DevUMB* set as needed.
 31097                                  ;
 31098                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31099                                  
 31100                                  ;	; 01/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS SYSINIT compatibility)
 31101                                  ;
 31102                                  ;PrepareMark:
 31103                                  ;	push	ds
 31104                                  ;	mov	ds,ax
 31105                                  ;	mov	word [ARENA.OWNER],8
 31106                                  ;	mov	word [ARENA.NAME],'SD' ; 4453h
 31107                                  ;	pop	ds
 31108                                  ;
 31109                                  ;	inc	ax
 31110                                  ;	mov	[cs:DevUMBAddr],ax
 31111                                  ;	mov	[cs:DevUMBFree],ax
 31112                                  ;	mov	[cs:DevUMBSize],bx	; update the UMB Variables
 31113                                  ;	retn
 31114                                  
 31115                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31116                                  ;
 31117                                  ; procedure : GetUMBForDev
 31118                                  ;
 31119                                  ;	Input : DevSize
 31120                                  ;	Output : Carry set if couldn't allocate a UMB to fit the
 31121                                  ;		 the device.
 31122                                  ;		 If success carry clear
 31123                                  ;
 31124                                  ;	Allocates the biggest UMB for loading devices and updates
 31125                                  ;	DevUMBSize, DevUMBAddr & DevUMBFree if it succeeded in allocating
 31126                                  ;	UMB.
 31127                                  ;
 31128                                  ;	This routine relies on the fact that all of the low memory
 31129                                  ;	is allocated, and any DOS alloc calls should return memory
 31130                                  ;	from the UMB pool.
 31131                                  ;
 31132                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31133                                  
 31134                                  	; 01/11/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)
 31135                                  	; (SYSINIT:2BC6h)
 31136                                  
 31137                                  GetUMBForDev:
 31138                                  	; 11/12/2022
 31139                                  	; ds = cs
 31140 0000286F BBFFFF                  	mov	bx,0FFFFh
 31141 00002872 B80048                  	mov	ax,4800h
 31142 00002875 CD21                    	int	21h
 31143                                  		; DOS - 2+ - ALLOCATE MEMORY
 31144                                  		; BX = number of 16-byte paragraphs desired
 31145                                  
 31146 00002877 09DB                    	or	bx,bx
 31147 00002879 742C                    	jz	short gufd_err
 31148                                  
 31149 0000287B 4B                      	dec	bx
 31150                                  	; 11/12/2022
 31151                                  	; ds = cs
 31152 0000287C 391E[EA1E]              	cmp	[DevSize],bx
 31153                                  	;cmp	[cs:DevSize],bx
 31154 00002880 7725                    	ja	short gufd_err
 31155 00002882 43                      	inc	bx
 31156                                  
 31157 00002883 B80048                  	mov	ax,4800h
 31158 00002886 CD21                    	int	21h
 31159 00002888 721D                    	jc	short gufd_err
 31160                                  
 31161                                  	; 01/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS SYSINIT compatibility)
 31162                                  	;dec	ax
 31163                                  	;call	PrepareMark
 31164                                  	;
 31165                                  PrepareMark:
 31166 0000288A 1E                      	push	ds
 31167 0000288B 48                      	dec	ax
 31168 0000288C 8ED8                    	mov	ds,ax
 31169 0000288E C70601000800            	mov	word [ARENA.OWNER],8
 31170 00002894 C70608005344            	mov	word [ARENA.NAME],'SD' ; 4453h
 31171 0000289A 40                      	inc	ax
 31172 0000289B 1F                      	pop	ds
 31173                                  	; 11/12/2022
 31174                                  	; ds = cs
 31175                                  	;mov	[cs:DevUMBSize],bx	; update the UMB Variables
 31176                                  	;mov	[cs:DevUMBAddr],ax
 31177                                  	;mov	[cs:DevUMBFree],ax
 31178 0000289C 891E[FB1E]              	mov	[DevUMBSize],bx		; update the UMB Variables
 31179 000028A0 A3[F91E]                	mov	[DevUMBAddr],ax
 31180 000028A3 A3[FD1E]                	mov	[DevUMBFree],ax
 31181                                  	;
 31182                                  	; 11/12/2022
 31183                                  	; cf=0
 31184                                  	;clc				; mark no error
 31185 000028A6 C3                      	retn
 31186                                  gufd_err:
 31187 000028A7 31C0                    	xor	ax,ax ; 0
 31188                                  	; 11/12/2022
 31189                                  	; ds = cs
 31190                                  	;mov	[cs:DevUMBSize],ax	; erase the previous values
 31191                                  	;mov	[cs:DevUMBAddr],ax
 31192                                  	;mov	[cs:DevUMBFree],ax
 31193 000028A9 A3[FB1E]                	mov	[DevUMBSize],ax		; erase the previous values
 31194 000028AC A3[F91E]                	mov	[DevUMBAddr],ax
 31195 000028AF A3[FD1E]                	mov	[DevUMBFree],ax
 31196 000028B2 F9                      	stc
 31197 000028B3 C3                      	retn

 31199                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31200                                  ;
 31201                                  ; procedure : DevSetMark
 31202                                  ;
 31203                                  ;	Input : AX - Free segment were device is going to be loaded
 31204                                  ;	Output : AX - Segment at which device can be loaded (AX=AX+1)
 31205                                  ;
 31206                                  ;	Creates a sub-arena for the device driver
 31207                                  ;	puts 'D' marker in the sub-arena
 31208                                  ;	Put the owner of the sub-arena as (AX+1)
 31209                                  ;	Copies the file name into sub-arena name field
 31210                                  ;
 31211                                  ;	Size field of the sub-arena will be set only at succesful
 31212                                  ;	completion of Device load.
 31213                                  ;
 31214                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31215                                  
 31216                                  	; 01/11/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)
 31217                                  	; (SYSINIT:2C13h)
 31218                                  
 31219                                  DevSetMark:
 31220 000028B4 06                      	push	es
 31221 000028B5 57                      	push	di
 31222 000028B6 1E                      	push	ds
 31223 000028B7 56                      	push	si
 31224 000028B8 8EC0                    	mov	es,ax
 31225 000028BA 26C606000044            	mov	byte [es:devmark.id],devmark_device ; 'D'
 31226 000028C0 40                      	inc	ax
 31227 000028C1 26A30100                	mov	[es:devmark.seg],ax
 31228                                  
 31229                                  ;-------------- Copy file name
 31230                                  
 31231 000028C5 50                      	push	ax			; save load addr
 31232 000028C6 2EC536[F803]            	lds	si,[cs:bpb_addr]	; command line is still there
 31233                                  
 31234 000028CB 89F7                    	mov	di,si
 31235 000028CD FC                      	cld
 31236                                  dsm_again:
 31237 000028CE AC                      	lodsb
 31238 000028CF 3C3A                    	cmp	al,':'
 31239 000028D1 7504                    	jne	short isit_slash
 31240 000028D3 89F7                    	mov	di,si
 31241 000028D5 EBF7                    	jmp	short dsm_again
 31242                                  isit_slash:
 31243 000028D7 3C5C                    	cmp	al, '\'
 31244 000028D9 7504                    	jne	short isit_null
 31245 000028DB 89F7                    	mov	di,si
 31246 000028DD EBEF                    	jmp	short dsm_again
 31247                                  isit_null:
 31248 000028DF 08C0                    	or	al,al
 31249 000028E1 75EB                    	jnz	short dsm_again
 31250 000028E3 89FE                    	mov	si,di
 31251                                  
 31252 000028E5 BF0800                  	mov	di,devmark.filename ; 8
 31253 000028E8 B90800                  	mov	cx,8			; maximum 8 characters
 31254                                  dsm_next_char:
 31255 000028EB AC                      	lodsb
 31256 000028EC 08C0                    	or	al, al
 31257 000028EE 7407                    	jz	short blankout
 31258 000028F0 3C2E                    	cmp	al, '.'
 31259 000028F2 7403                    	je	short blankout
 31260 000028F4 AA                      	stosb
 31261 000028F5 E2F4                    	loop	dsm_next_char
 31262                                  blankout:
 31263 000028F7 E304                    	jcxz	dsm_exit
 31264 000028F9 B020                    	mov	al, ' '
 31265 000028FB F3AA                    	rep	stosb			; blank out the rest
 31266                                  dsm_exit:
 31267 000028FD 58                      	pop	ax			; restore load addr
 31268 000028FE 5E                      	pop	si
 31269 000028FF 1F                      	pop	ds
 31270 00002900 5F                      	pop	di
 31271 00002901 07                      	pop	es
 31272 00002902 C3                      	retn

 31275                                  ;
 31276                                  ; procedure : SizeDevice
 31277                                  ;
 31278                                  ;	Input : ES:SI - points to device file to be sized
 31279                                  ;
 31280                                  ;	Output : Carry set if file cannot be opened or if it is an OS2EXE file
 31281                                  ;
 31282                                  ;	Calculates the size of the device file in paras and stores it
 31283                                  ;	in DevSize
 31284                                  ;
 31285                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31286                                  
 31287                                  	; 01/11/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)
 31288                                  SizeDevice:
 31289                                  	; 01/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS SYSINIT compatibility)
 31290                                  	; 11/12/2022 ; *
 31291 00002903 1E                      	push	ds ; *
 31292 00002904 06                      	push	es
 31293 00002905 1F                      	pop	ds
 31294 00002906 89F2                    	mov	dx,si			; ds:dx -> file name
 31295 00002908 B8003D                  	mov	ax,3D00h		; open
 31296 0000290B CD21                    	int	21h
 31297 0000290D 7243                    	jc	short sd_err		; open failed
 31298                                  
 31299 0000290F 89C3                    	mov	bx,ax			; BX - file handle
 31300 00002911 B80242                  	mov	ax,4202h		; seek
 31301 00002914 31C9                    	xor	cx,cx
 31302 00002916 89CA                    	mov	dx,cx			; to end of file
 31303 00002918 CD21                    	int	21h
 31304 0000291A 722F                    	jc	short sd_close		; did seek fail (impossible)
 31305 0000291C 83C00F                  	add	ax,15			; para convert
 31306 0000291F 83D200                  	adc	dx,0
 31307 00002922 F7C2F0FF                	test	dx,0FFF0h		; size > 0ffff paras ?
 31308 00002926 7409                    	jz	short szdev1		; no
 31309 00002928 2EC706[EA1E]FFFF        	mov	word [cs:DevSize],0FFFFh ; invalid device size
 31310                                  					; assuming that we fail later
 31311 0000292F EB1A                    	jmp	short sd_close
 31312                                  szdev1:
 31313 00002931 B104                    	mov	cl,4			; convert it to paras
 31314 00002933 D3E8                    	shr	ax,cl
 31315 00002935 B10C                    	mov	cl,12
 31316 00002937 D3E2                    	shl	dx,cl
 31317 00002939 09D0                    	or	ax,dx
 31318                                  	;
 31319                                  	; 01/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS SYSINIT compatibility)
 31320 0000293B 2E3B06[081F]            	cmp     ax,[cs:DevSizeOption]
 31321                                  	;ja	short szdev2
 31322                                  	; 14/08/2023
 31323 00002940 7305                    	jnb	short szdev2
 31324 00002942 2EA1[081F]              	mov     ax,[cs:DevSizeOption]
 31325                                  	; 12/12/2022
 31326 00002946 F8                      	clc
 31327                                  szdev2:
 31328 00002947 2EA3[EA1E]              	mov	[cs:DevSize],ax		; save file size
 31329                                  
 31330                                  	; 01/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS SYSINIT compatibility)
 31331                                  	; 12/12/2022
 31332                                  	; cf=0
 31333                                  	;clc
 31334                                  sd_close:
 31335 0000294B 9C                      	pushf				; let close not spoil our
 31336                                  					;  carry flag
 31337 0000294C B8003E                  	mov	ax,3E00h		; close
 31338 0000294F CD21                    	int	21h			; we are not checking for err
 31339 00002951 9D                      	popf
 31340                                  sd_err:
 31341                                  	; 01/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS SYSINIT compatibility)
 31342                                  	; 11/12/2022 ; *
 31343 00002952 1F                      	pop     ds ; *
 31344 00002953 C3                      	retn

 31645 00002A2F E85306                  	call	delim
 31646 00002A32 75F7                    	jnz	short sd_ret
 31647 00002A34 46                      	inc	si
 31648 00002A35 EBF5                    	jmp	short sd_next_char ; 01/11/2022

 31651                                  ;sd_ret:

 31654                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31655                                  ;
 31656                                  ; procedure : GetHexNum
 31657                                  ;
 31658                                  ;	Converts an ascii string terminated by a delimiter into binary.
 31659                                  ;	Assumes that the ES:SI points to a Hexadecimal string
 31660                                  ;
 31661                                  ;	Returns in AX the number number of paras equivalent to the
 31662                                  ;	hex number of bytes specified by the hexadecimal string.
 31663                                  ;
 31664                                  ;	Returns carry in case it encountered a non-hex character or
 31665                                  ;	if it encountered crlf
 31666                                  ;
 31667                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31668                                  
 31669                                  ; 13/05/2019
 31670                                  
 31671                                  	; 01/11/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)
 31672                                  	; (SYSINIT:2DA5h)
 31673                                  GetHexNum:
 31674 00002A37 31C0                    	xor	ax,ax
 31675 00002A39 31D2                    	xor	dx,dx
 31676                                  ghn_next:
 31677 00002A3B 268A1C                  	mov	bl,[es:si]
 31678 00002A3E 80FB0D                  	cmp	bl,cr  ; 0Dh
 31679 00002A41 7436                    	je	short ghn_err
 31680 00002A43 80FB0A                  	cmp	bl,lf  ; 0Ah
 31681 00002A46 7431                    	je	short ghn_err
 31682 00002A48 50                      	push	ax
 31683 00002A49 88D8                    	mov	al,bl
 31684 00002A4B E83706                  	call	delim
 31685 00002A4E 58                      	pop	ax
 31686                                  	; 04/01/2023
 31687 00002A4F B90400                  	mov	cx, 4
 31688 00002A52 7410                    	jz	short ghn_into_paras
 31689 00002A54 E82400                  	call	GetNibble
 31690                                  	;jc	short ghn_err
 31691                                  	; 11/12/2022
 31692 00002A57 7221                    	jc	short ghn_ret ; cf=1
 31693                                  	; 04/01/2023
 31694                                  	;mov	cx,4
 31695                                  ghn_shift1:
 31696 00002A59 D1E0                    	shl	ax,1
 31697 00002A5B D1D2                    	rcl	dx,1
 31698 00002A5D E2FA                    	loop	ghn_shift1
 31699 00002A5F 08D8                    	or	al,bl
 31700 00002A61 46                      	inc	si
 31701 00002A62 EBD7                    	jmp	short ghn_next
 31702                                  ghn_into_paras:
 31703 00002A64 83C00F                  	add	ax,15
 31704 00002A67 83D200                  	adc	dx,0
 31705 00002A6A F7C2F0FF                	test	dx,0FFF0h
 31706 00002A6E 7509                    	jnz	short ghn_err
 31707                                  	; 04/01/2023
 31708                                  	;mov	cx,4
 31709                                  ghn_shift2:
 31710 00002A70 F8                      	clc
 31711 00002A71 D1DA                    	rcr	dx,1
 31712 00002A73 D1D8                    	rcr	ax,1
 31713 00002A75 E2F9                    	loop	ghn_shift2
 31714 00002A77 F8                      	clc
 31715 00002A78 C3                      	retn
 31716                                  	; 11/12/2022
 31717                                  ghn_err:
 31718                                  gnib_err:
 31719 00002A79 F9                      	stc
 31720                                  ghn_ret:
 31721                                  gnib_ret:
 31722 00002A7A C3                      	retn

 31726                                  ; procedure : GetNibble
 31727                                  ;
 31728                                  ;	Convert one nibble (hex digit) in BL into binary
 31729                                  ;
 31730                                  ;	Retruns binary value in BL
 31731                                  ;
 31732                                  ;	Returns carry if BL contains non-hex digit
 31733                                  ;
 31734                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------

 31742 00002A83 7704                    	ja	short is_it_hex
 31743 00002A85 80EB30                  	sub	bl,'0'		; clc
 31744 00002A88 C3                      	retn
 31745                                  is_it_hex:

 31752 00002A93 80EB37                  	sub	bl,'A'- 10	; clc

 31843                                  ;-------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31844                                  ;
 31845                                  ; Procedure Name	: umb_allocate
 31846                                  ;
 31847                                  ; Inputs		: DS = data
 31848                                  ;
 31849                                  ; Outputs		: if UMB available
 31850                                  ;				Allocates the largest available UMB and 
 31851                                  ;			  	BX = segment of allocated block
 31852                                  ;				DX = size of allocated block
 31853                                  ;				NC
 31854                                  ;			  else 
 31855                                  ;				CY
 31856                                  ;

 31858                                  ;

 31862                                  	; 31/12/2022

 31867                                  					;   possible

 31872                                  					; the largest UMB

 31881

 31883 00002AEF 7502                    	jne	short ua_err		; N: error
 31884                                  	;clc
 31885                                  	; 02/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS SYSINIT compatibility)
 31886                                  	; 12/12/2022
 31887                                  	; cf=0
 31888                                  	;clc

 31896                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31897                                  ;
 31898                                  ; Procedure Name	: umb_insert
 31899                                  ;
 31900                                  ; Inputs		: DOSDATA:UMB_HEAD = start of umb chain
 31901                                  ;			: BX = seg address of UMB to be linked in
 31902                                  ;			: DX = size of UMB to be linked in paras
 31903                                  ;			; DS = data
 31904                                  ;
 31905                                  ; Outputs		: links the UMB into the arena chain
 31906                                  ;
 31907                                  ; Uses			: AX, CX, ES, DX, BX
 31908                                  ;
 31909                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31910                                  
 31911                                  umb_insert:
 31912 00002AF6 1E                      	push	ds
 31913                                  
 31914                                  	; 31/12/2022
 31915                                  	; ds = cs
 31916                                  
 31917                                  	;mov	ds,[cs:DevDOSData]
 31918 00002AF7 8E1E[161F]              	mov	ds,[DevDOSData] ; 31/12/2022 
 31919                                  	;mov	ds,[8Ch]
 31920 00002AFB 8E1E8C00                	mov	ds,[UMB_ARENA]		; es = UMB_HEAD
 31921 00002AFF 8CD8                    	mov	ax,ds
 31922 00002B01 8EC0                    	mov	es,ax
 31923                                  ui_next:
 31924 00002B03 39D8                    	cmp	ax,bx			; Q: is current block above
 31925                                  					;    new block
 31926 00002B05 770F                    	ja	short ui_insert		; Y: insert it
 31927                                  					; Q: is current block the
 31928                                  					;    last
 31929 00002B07 26803E00005A            	cmp	byte [es:ARENA.SIGNATURE],arena_signature_end ; 'Z'
 31930 00002B0D 745C                    	je	short ui_append		; Y: append new block to chain
 31931                                  					; N: get next block
 31932 00002B0F 8ED8                    	mov	ds,ax			; M005
 31933                                  	;call	get_next		; ax = es = next block
 31934 00002B11 E8E200                  	call	_get_next_ ; 13/04/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 31935 00002B14 EBED                    	jmp	short ui_next
 31936                                  
 31937                                  ui_insert:
 31938 00002B16 8CD9                    	mov	cx,ds			; ds = previous arena
 31939 00002B18 41                      	inc	cx			; top of previous block
 31940                                  
 31941 00002B19 29D9                    	sub	cx,bx
 31942 00002B1B F7D9                    	neg	cx			; cx = size of used block
 31943                                  	;mov	byte [0],'M'
 31944 00002B1D C60600004D              	mov	byte [ARENA.SIGNATURE],arena_signature_normal ; 'M'
 31945                                  	;mov	word [1],8

 31947                                  	;mov	[3],cx

 31949                                  	;mov	word [8],4353h ; 'SC'

 31951                                  
 31952                                  ; prepare the arena at start of new block
 31953                                  
 31954 00002B32 8EC3                    	mov	es,bx
 31955 00002B34 26C60600004D            	mov	byte [es:ARENA.SIGNATURE],arena_signature_normal ; 'M'
 31956 00002B3A 26C70601000000          	mov	word [es:ARENA.OWNER],arena_owner_system ; 0
 31957                                  					; mark as free
 31958 00002B41 83EA02                  	sub	dx,2			; make room for arena at
 31959                                  					; start & end of new block
 31960 00002B44 2689160300              	mov	[es:ARENA.SIZE],dx
 31961                                  
 31962                                  ; prepare arena at end of new block
 31963                                  	
 31964 00002B49 01D3                    	add	bx,dx
 31965 00002B4B 43                      	inc	bx
 31966 00002B4C 8EC3                    	mov	es,bx			; es=arena at top of new block
 31967 00002B4E 43                      	inc	bx			; bx=top of new block
 31968                                  
 31969                                  					; ax contains arena just above
 31970                                  					; this block
 31971 00002B4F 29D8                    	sub	ax,bx			; ax = size of used block
 31972                                  	
 31973 00002B51 26C60600004D            	mov	byte [es:ARENA.SIGNATURE],arena_signature_normal
 31974 00002B57 26C70601000800          	mov	word [es:ARENA.OWNER],8	; mark as system owned
 31975 00002B5E 26A30300                	mov	[es:ARENA.SIZE],ax	
 31976 00002B62 26C70608005343          	mov	word [es:ARENA.NAME],'SC' ; 4353h
 31977                                  
 31978 00002B69 EB47                    	jmp	short ui_done
 31979                                  
 31980                                  ui_append:
 31981                                  					; es = arena of last block	
 31982 00002B6B 2603060300              	add	ax,[es:ARENA.SIZE]	; ax=top of last block-1 para
 31983 00002B70 26832E030001            	sub	word [es:ARENA.SIZE],1	; reflect the space we are
 31984                                  					; going to rsrv on top of this 
 31985                                  					; block for the next arena.

 31988                                  
 31989 00002B7C 89C1                    	mov	cx,ax			; cx=top of prev block-1
 31990 00002B7E 40                      	inc	ax
 31991 00002B7F 29D8                    	sub	ax,bx			; ax=top of prev block - 
 31992                                  					;    seg. address of new block
 31993 00002B81 F7D8                    	neg	ax
 31994                                  
 31995 00002B83 8EC1                    	mov	es,cx			; ds = arena of unused block
 31996                                  
 31997 00002B85 26C60600004D            	mov	byte [es:ARENA.SIGNATURE],arena_signature_normal
 31998 00002B8B 26C70601000800          	mov	word [es:ARENA.OWNER],8	; mark as system owned
 31999 00002B92 26A30300                	mov	[es:ARENA.SIZE],ax	
 32000 00002B96 26C70608005343          	mov	word [es:ARENA.NAME],'SC'
 32001                                  
 32002                                  ; prepare the arena at start of new block
 32003 00002B9D 8EC3                    	mov	es,bx
 32004 00002B9F 26C60600005A            	mov	byte [es:ARENA.SIGNATURE],arena_signature_end
 32005 00002BA5 26C70601000000          	mov	word [es:ARENA.OWNER],arena_owner_system
 32006                                  					; mark as free
 32007 00002BAC 4A                      	dec	dx			; make room for arena
 32008 00002BAD 2689160300              	mov	[es:ARENA.SIZE],dx	
 32009                                  ui_done:
 32010                                  uc_done: ; 31/12/2022 ; *!
 32011 00002BB2 1F                      	pop	ds

 32014 00002BB3 C3                      	retn

 32016                                  ; 13/04/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 32017                                  
 32018                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 32019                                  ;
 32020                                  ;**	umb_coalesce - Combine free blocks ahead with current block
 32021                                  ;
 32022                                  ;	Coalesce adds the block following the argument to the argument block,
 32023                                  ;	iff it's free.  Coalesce is usually used to join free blocks, but
 32024                                  ;	some callers (such as $setblock) use it to join a free block to it's
 32025                                  ;	preceeding allocated block.
 32026                                  ;
 32027                                  ;	EXIT	'C' clear if OK
 32028                                  ;		  (ds) unchanged, this block updated
 32029                                  ;		  (ax) = address of next block, IFF not at end
 32030                                  ;		'C' set if arena trashed
 32031                                  ;	USES	cx, di, ds, es
 32032                                  ;
 32033                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 32034                                  
 32035                                  umb_coalesce:
 32036                                  	; 31/12/2022
 32037                                  	; ds = cs
 32038 00002BB4 1E                      	push	ds ; *!
 32039                                  
 32040 00002BB5 31FF                    	xor	di, di
 32041                                  
 32042                                  	;mov	es,[cs:DevDOSData]
 32043                                  	; 31/12/2022
 32044 00002BB7 8E06[161F]              	mov	es,[DevDOSData]
 32045 00002BBB 268E068C00              	mov	es,[es:UMB_ARENA]	; es = UMB_HEAD
 32046                                  uc_nextfree:
 32047 00002BC0 8CC0                    	mov	ax,es
 32048 00002BC2 8ED8                    	mov	ds,ax
 32049                                  	;cmp	[es:1],di
 32050 00002BC4 26393E0100              	cmp	[es:ARENA.OWNER],di	; Q: is current arena free
 32051 00002BC9 7407                    	je	short uc_again		; Y: try to coalesce with next block
 32052                                  					; N: get next arena
 32053 00002BCB E82100                  	call	get_next		; es, ax = next arena
 32054 00002BCE 72E2                    	jc	short uc_done	; *!
 32055 00002BD0 EBEE                    	jmp	short uc_nextfree
 32056                                  uc_again:
 32057 00002BD2 E81A00                  	call	get_next		; ES, AX <- next block
 32058 00002BD5 72DB                    	jc	short uc_done	; *!
 32059                                  uc_check:
 32060 00002BD7 26393E0100              	cmp     [es:ARENA.OWNER],di	; Q: is arena free
 32061 00002BDC 75E2                    	jne	short uc_nextfree	; N: get next free arena
 32062                                  					; Y: coalesce
 32063 00002BDE 268B0E0300              	mov     cx,[es:ARENA.SIZE]      ; cx <- next block size
 32064 00002BE3 41                      	inc     cx                      ; cx <- cx + 1 (for header size)
 32065                                  	;add	[3],cx
 32066 00002BE4 010E0300                	add     [ARENA.SIZE],cx		; current size <- current size + cx
 32067 00002BE8 268A0D                  	mov     cl,[es:di]              ; move up signature
 32068 00002BEB 880D                    	mov     [di],cl
 32069 00002BED EBE3                    	jmp     short uc_again		; try again
 32070                                  
 32071                                  	; 18/12/2022
 32072                                  ;uc_done:
 32073                                  	;retn
 32074                                  
 32075                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 32076                                  ;
 32077                                  ;**	get_next - Find Next item in Arena
 32078                                  ;
 32079                                  ;	ENTRY	dS - pointer to block head
 32080                                  ;	EXIT	AX,ES - pointers to next head
 32081                                  ;		'C' set if arena damaged
 32082                                  ;
 32083                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 32084                                  
 32085                                  	; 01/11/2022
 32086                                  get_next:
 32087 00002BEF 803E00005A              	cmp	byte [0],arena_signature_end ; 'Z'
 32088 00002BF4 740A                    	je	short gn_err
 32089                                  _get_next_:
 32090 00002BF6 8CD8                    	mov     ax,ds                   ; ax=current block
 32091 00002BF8 03060300                	add     ax,[ARENA.SIZE]		; ax=ax + current block length
 32092 00002BFC 40                      	inc     ax                      ; remember that header!
 32093 00002BFD 8EC0                    	mov	es,ax
 32094                                  	;clc
 32095                                  	; 01/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS SYSINIT compatibility)
 32096                                  	; 11/12/2022
 32097                                  	; cf=0
 32098                                  	;clc
 32099 00002BFF C3                      	retn
 32100                                  gn_err:
 32101 00002C00 F9                      	stc
 32102                                  	; 11/12/2022	
 32103                                  lfu_err:	 ; cf=1
 32104 00002C01 C3                      	retn

 32106                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 32107                                  ;
 32108                                  ; procedure : LinkFirstUMB
 32109                                  ;
 32110                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 32111                                  
 32112                                  	; 01/11/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)
 32113                                  	; (SYSINIT:2F81h)
 32114                                  LinkFirstUMB:
 32115                                  	; 31/12/2022
 32116                                  	; ds = cs
 32117 00002C02 E8D3FE                  	call	umb_allocate
 32118 00002C05 72FA                    	jc	short lfu_err  ; ds = cs ; 31/12/2022
 32119                                  
 32120                                  ; bx = segment of allocated UMB
 32121                                  ; dx = size of UMB
 32122                                  
 32123                                  	; 31/12/2022
 32124                                  	; ds = cs
 32125                                  
 32126 00002C07 CD12                    	int	12h			; ax = size of memory
 32127 00002C09 B106                    	mov	cl,6
 32128 00002C0B D3E0                    	shl	ax,cl			; ax = size in paragraphs
 32129                                  
 32130 00002C0D 89C1                    	mov	cx,ax			; cx = size in paras
 32131 00002C0F 29D8                    	sub	ax,bx			; ax = - size of unused block
 32132                                  
 32133 00002C11 F7D8                    	neg	ax
 32134                                  
 32135 00002C13 83E901                  	sub	cx,1			; cx = first umb_arena
 32136 00002C16 8EC1                    	mov	es,cx			; es = first umb_arena
 32137                                  	
 32138 00002C18 26C60600004D            	mov	byte [es:ARENA.SIGNATURE],arena_signature_normal ; 'M'
 32139 00002C1E 26C70601000800          	mov	word [es:ARENA.OWNER],8	; mark as system owned
 32140                                  					
 32141 00002C25 26A30300                	mov	[es:ARENA.SIZE],ax

 32143                                  
 32144                                  ; put in the arena for the first UMB
 32145

 32147 00002C32 26C60600005A            	mov	byte [es:ARENA.SIGNATURE],arena_signature_end ; 'Z'
 32148 00002C38 26C70601000000          	mov	word [es:ARENA.OWNER],arena_owner_system ; 0	
 32149                                  					; mark as free 
 32150 00002C3F 4A                      	dec	dx			; make room for arena
 32151 00002C40 2689160300              	mov	[es:ARENA.SIZE],dx

 32153                                  	;mov	es,[cs:DevDOSData]
 32154                                  	; 31/12/2022

 32156 00002C49 BF8C00                  	mov	di,UMB_ARENA ; 8Ch
 32157 00002C4C 26890D                  	mov	[es:di],cx		; initialize umb_head in DOS
 32158                                  					;  data segment with the arena
 32159                                  					;  just below Top of Mem
 32160                                  
 32161                                  ; we must now scan the arena chain and update the size of the last arena
 32162

 32164 00002C52 268E05                  	mov	es,[es:di]		; es = start arena
 32165 00002C55 31FF                    	xor	di,di
 32166                                  ;scan_next
 32167                                  ; 09/12/2022
 32168                                  scannext:
 32169 00002C57 26803D5A                	cmp	byte [es:di],arena_signature_end  ; 'Z'
 32170 00002C5B 740C                    	je	short got_last
 32171

 32176                                  	;jmp	short scan_next
 32177                                  	; 09/12/2022
 32178 00002C67 EBEE                    	jmp	short scannext
 32179                                  got_last:
 32180 00002C69 26832E030001            	sub	word [es:ARENA.SIZE],1
 32181 00002C6F 26C60600004D            	mov	byte [es:ARENA.SIGNATURE],arena_signature_normal ; 'M'

 32200                                  ; procedure : ShrinkUMB
 32201                                  ;
 32202                                  ;	Shrinks the current UMB in use, so that the unused portions
 32203                                  ;	of the UMB is given back to the DOS free mem pool
 32204                                  ;
 32205                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 32206                                  
 32207                                  ShrinkUMB:
 32208                                  	; 12/12/2022
 32209                                  	; ds = cs
 32210 00002C76 833E[F91E]00            	cmp	word [DevUMBAddr],0
 32211                                  	;cmp	word [cs:DevUMBAddr],0
 32212 00002C7B 7421                    	je	short su_exit
 32213 00002C7D 06                      	push	es
 32214 00002C7E 53                      	push	bx
 32215                                  	; 12/12/2022
 32216                                  	;mov	bx,[cs:DevUMBFree]
 32217                                  	;sub	bx,[cs:DevUMBAddr]
 32218                                  	;mov	es,[cs:DevUMBAddr]
 32219 00002C7F 8B1E[FD1E]              	mov	bx,[DevUMBFree]
 32220 00002C83 2B1E[F91E]              	sub	bx,[DevUMBAddr]
 32221 00002C87 8E06[F91E]              	mov	es,[DevUMBAddr]
 32222                                  	
 32223 00002C8B B8004A                  	mov	ax,4A00h
 32224 00002C8E CD21                    	int	21h
 32225                                  		; DOS - 2+ - ADJUST MEMORY BLOCK SIZE (SETBLOCK)
 32226                                  		; ES = segment address of block to change
 32227                                  		; BX = new size in paragraphs
 32228 00002C90 8CC0                    	mov	ax,es
 32229 00002C92 48                      	dec	ax
 32230 00002C93 8EC0                    	mov	es,ax
 32231 00002C95 26C70601000800          	mov	word [es:ARENA.OWNER],8
 32232 00002C9C 5B                      	pop	bx
 32233 00002C9D 07                      	pop	es
 32234                                  su_exit:
 32235 00002C9E C3                      	retn

 32245                                  UnlinkUMB:

 32248 00002C9F 1E                      	push	ds
 32249 00002CA0 06                      	push	es

 32252                                  	;cmp	byte [cs:FirstUMBLinked],0
 32253 00002CA6 7420                    	je	short ulu_x		; nothing to unlink
 32254                                  	; 12/12/2022
 32255 00002CA8 8E06[161F]              	mov	es,[DevDOSData]
 32256                                  	;mov	es,[cs:DevDOSData]	; get DOS data seg
 32257 00002CAC 268E1E2400              	mov	ds,[es:DOS_ARENA]
 32258 00002CB1 268B3E8C00              	mov	di,[es:UMB_ARENA]
 32259                                  ulu_next:
 32260 00002CB6 E836FF                  	call	get_next
 32261 00002CB9 720D                    	jc	short ulu_x
 32262 00002CBB 39C7                    	cmp	di,ax			; is the next one UMB ?
 32263 00002CBD 7404                    	je	short ulu_found
 32264 00002CBF 8ED8                    	mov	ds,ax
 32265 00002CC1 EBF3                    	jmp	short ulu_next
 32266                                  ulu_found:
 32267                                  	;mov	byte [0],'Z'
 32268 00002CC3 C60600005A              	mov     byte [ARENA.SIGNATURE],arena_signature_end ; 'Z'
 32269                                  ulu_x:
 32270 00002CC8 07                      	pop	es
 32271 00002CC9 1F                      	pop	ds
 32272 00002CCA C3                      	retn

 32274                                  ; ----------------------------------------------------------------------
 32275                                  ; SYSINIT2.ASM - MSDOS 6.0 - 1991
 32276                                  ; ----------------------------------------------------------------------
 32277                                  ; 14/04/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 32278                                  
 32279                                  ; Multiple configuration block support  Created 16-Mar-1992 by JeffPar
 32280                                  ;
 32281                                  ; Summary:
 32282                                  ;
 32283                                  ;   The procedure "organize" crunches the in-memory copy of config.sys
 32284                                  ;   into lines delimited by CR/LF (sometimes no CR, but *always* an LF)
 32285                                  ;   with the leading "keyword=" replaced by single character codes (eg, B
 32286                                  ;   for BUFFERS, D for DEVICE, Z for any unrecognized keyword); see comtab
 32287                                  ;   and/or config.inc for the full list.
 32288                                  ;
 32289                                  ;   [blockname] and INCLUDE are the major syntactical additions for multi-
 32290                                  ;   configuration support. blockname is either MENU, which contains one
 32291                                  ;   or more MENUITEM lines, an optional MENUDEFAULT (which includes optional
 32292                                  ;   time-out), or any user-defined keyword, such as NETWORK, CD-ROM, etc.
 32293                                  ;   INCLUDE allows the current block to name another block for inclusion
 32294                                  ;   during the processing phase of CONFIG.SYS. An INCLUDE is only honored
 32295                                  ;   once, precluding nasty infinite-loop scenarios. If blocks are present
 32296                                  ;   without a MENU block, then only lines inside COMMON blocks are processed.
 32297                                  ;
 32298                                  ; Example:
 32299                                  ;
 32300                                  ;   [menu]
 32301                                  ;   menuitem=misc,Miscellaneous
 32302                                  ;   menuitem=network,Network Configuration
 32303                                  ;   menudefault=network,15
 32304                                  ;
 32305                                  ;   [network]
 32306                                  ;   include misc
 32307                                  ;   device=foo
 32308                                  ;
 32309                                  ;   [misc]
 32310                                  ;   device=bar
 32311                                  ;   include alternate
 32312                                  ;
 32313                                  ;   [alternate]
 32314                                  ;   device=tar
 32315                                  ;
 32316                                  ;
 32317                                  ;   When the menu is displayed
 32318                                  ;
 32319                                  ;    1. Miscellaneous
 32320                                  ;    2. Network Configuration
 32321                                  ;
 32322                                  ;   #2 is highlighted as the default option, and will be automatically
 32323                                  ;   selected after 15 seconds. It will invoke the following lines in the
 32324                                  ;   following order:
 32325                                  ;
 32326                                  ;       DEVICE=BAR
 32327                                  ;       DEVICE=TAR
 32328                                  ;       DEVICE=FOO
 32329                                  ;
 32330                                  
 32331                                  ;MULTI_CONFIG equ 1
 32332                                  
 32333                                  ; the following depend on the positions of the various letters in switchlist
 32334                                  
 32335                                  switchnum	equ 11111000b ; 0F8h	; which switches require number
 32336                                  
 32337                                  flagec35	equ 00000100b ; 4	; electrically compatible 3.5 inch disk drive
 32338                                  flagdrive	equ 00001000b ; 8 
 32339                                  flagcyln	equ 00010000b ; 16
 32340                                  flagseclim	equ 00100000b ; 32
 32341                                  flagheads	equ 01000000b ; 64
 32342                                  flagff		equ 10000000b ; 128
 32343                                  
 32344                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 32345                                  ; 19/04/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 32346                                  
 32347                                  ; MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS - SYSINIT:3E78h
 32348                                  
 32349                                  ; 01/11/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)
 32350                                  ; MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS - SYSINIT:3054h
 32351                                  
 32352 00002CCB 00                      insert_blank:	db 	0
 32353

 32356                                  ; procedure : setparms
 32357                                  ;
 32358                                  ; the following set of routines is used to parse the drivparm = command in
 32359                                  ; the config.sys file to change the default drive parameters.
 32360                                  ;
 32361                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 32362                                  
 32363                                  setparms:
 32364 00002CCC 1E                      	push	ds
 32365 00002CCD 50                      	push	ax
 32366 00002CCE 53                      	push	bx
 32367 00002CCF 51                      	push	cx
 32368 00002CD0 52                      	push	dx
 32369                                  
 32370 00002CD1 0E                      	push	cs
 32371 00002CD2 1F                      	pop	ds
 32372                                  
 32373 00002CD3 31DB                    	xor	bx,bx
 32374 00002CD5 8A1E[0E37]              	mov	bl,[drive]
 32375                                  	; 18/12/2022
 32376 00002CD9 43                      	inc	bx
 32377                                  	;inc	bl			; get it correct for ioctl call
 32378                                  					; (1=a,2=b...)
 32379 00002CDA BA[E635]                	mov	dx,deviceparameters
 32380 00002CDD B444                    	mov	ah,IOCTL ; 44h
 32381 00002CDF B00D                    	mov	al,GENERIC_IOCTL ; 0Dh
 32382 00002CE1 B508                    	mov	ch,RAWIO ; 8
 32383 00002CE3 B140                    	mov	cl,SET_DEVICE_PARAMETERS ; 40h
 32384 00002CE5 CD21                    	int	21h
 32385                                  
 32386                                  ; 01/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS SYSINIT compatibility)
 32387                                  ;
 32388                                  ;	;;mov	ax,Bios_Data		; get Bios_Data segment
 32389                                  ;	;mov	ax,KERNEL_SEGMENT ; 70h
 32390                                  ;	; 21/10/2022
 32391                                  ;	mov	ax,DOSBIODATASEG ; 0070h	
 32392                                  ;	mov	ds,ax			; set Bios_Data segment
 32393                                  ;
 32394                                  ;	test	word [cs:switches],flagec35 ; 4
 32395                                  ;	jz	short not_ec35
 32396                                  
 32397                                  	; 01/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS SYSINIT compatibility)
 32398                                  	;test	word [switches],flagec35 ; 4
 32399                                  	; 12/12/2022
 32400 00002CE7 F606[0F37]04            	test	byte [switches],flagec35 ; 4
 32401 00002CEC 7411                    	jz	short eot_ok
 32402                                  
 32403                                  	;mov	cl,[cs:drive]		; which drive was this for?
 32404                                  	; 02/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS SYSINIT compatibility)
 32405 00002CEE 8A0E[0E37]              	mov	cl,[drive]
 32406 00002CF2 B87000                  	mov	ax,DOSBIODATASEG ; 0070h	
 32407 00002CF5 8ED8                    	mov	ds,ax	
 32408                                  
 32409 00002CF7 B001                    	mov	al,1			; assume drive 0
 32410 00002CF9 D2E0                    	shl	al,cl			; set proper bit depending on drive
 32411                                  	;or	[531h],al ; (MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS Offset SYINIT:3EACh)
 32412 00002CFB 0806[3105]              	or	[ec35_flag],al		; set the bit in the permanent flags
 32413                                  
 32414                                  ; 01/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS SYSINIT compatibility)
 32415                                  ;
 32416                                  ;not_ec35:
 32417                                  ;;	Now adjust the BIOS's EOT variable if our new drive has more
 32418                                  ;;	sectors per track than any old ones.
 32419                                  ;
 32420                                  ;	;mov	al,[cs:deviceparameters+20]
 32421                                  ;	mov	al,[cs:deviceparameters+A_DEVICEPARAMETERS.DP_BPB+A_BPB.BPB_SECTORSPERTRACK]
 32422                                  ;	;cmp	al,[12Ch] ; (MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS Offset SYINIT:3EB4h)
 32423                                  ;	cmp	al,[EOT]
 32424                                  ;	jbe	short eot_ok
 32425                                  ;	mov	[EOT],al
 32426                                  
 32427                                  eot_ok:
 32428 00002CFF 5A                      	pop	dx			; fix up all the registers
 32429 00002D00 59                      	pop	cx
 32430 00002D01 5B                      	pop	bx
 32431 00002D02 58                      	pop	ax
 32432 00002D03 1F                      	pop	ds ; 13/05/2019
 32433 00002D04 C3                      	retn

 32447                                  	;mov	word [deviceparameters+4],80
 32448 00002D08 C706[EA35]5000          	mov	word [deviceparameters+A_DEVICEPARAMETERS.DP_CYLINDERS],80
 32449                                  	;mov	byte [deviceparameters+1],2
 32450 00002D0E C606[E735]02            	mov	byte [deviceparameters+A_DEVICEPARAMETERS.DP_DEVICETYPE],DEV_3INCH720KB ; 2
 32451                                  	;mov	word [deviceparameters+2],0
 32452 00002D13 C706[E835]0000          	mov	word [deviceparameters+A_DEVICEPARAMETERS.DP_DEVICEATTRIBUTES],0
 32453 00002D19 C706[0F37]0000          	mov	word [switches],0	    ; zero all switches

 32458                                  %if 0
