 32462                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 32463                                  ;
 32464                                  ; procedure : parseline
 32465                                  ;
 32466                                  ; entry point is parseline. al contains the first character in command line.
 32467                                  ;
 32468                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 32469                                  
 32470                                  	; 01/11/2022 - Retrodos v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)
 32471                                  	; (SYSINIT:30ACh)
 32472                                  
 32473                                  parseline:
 32474                                  	push	ds
 32475                                  
 32476                                  	push	cs
 32477                                  	pop	ds
 32478                                  
 32479                                  nextswtch:
 32480                                  	cmp	al,cr			; carriage return?
 32481                                  	je	short done_line
 32482                                  	cmp	al,lf			; linefeed?
 32483                                  	je	short put_back		; put it back and done
 32484                                  
 32485                                  ; anything less or equal to a space is ignored.
 32486                                  
 32487                                  	cmp	al,' '                  ; space?
 32488                                  	jbe	short getnext		; skip over space
 32489                                  	cmp	al,'/'
 32490                                  	je	short getparm
 32491                                  	stc				; mark error invalid-character-in-input
 32492                                  	jmp	short exitpl
 32493                                  
 32494                                  getparm:
 32495                                  	call	check_switch
 32496                                  	mov	[switches],bx		; save switches read so far
 32497                                  	jc	short swterr
 32498                                  getnext:
 32499                                  	call	getchr
 32500                                  	jc	short done_line
 32501                                  	jmp	short nextswtch
 32502                                  swterr:
 32503                                  	jmp	short exitpl		; exit if error
 32504                                  
 32505                                  done_line:
 32506                                  	; 12/12/2022
 32507                                  	test	byte [switches],flagdrive ; 8
 32508                                  	;test	word [switches],flagdrive ; 8 ; see if drive specified
 32509                                  	jnz	short okay
 32510                                  	stc				; mark error no-drive-specified
 32511                                  	jmp	short exitpl
 32512                                  
 32513                                  okay:
 32514                                  	mov	ax,[switches]
 32515                                  	and	ax,0003h	    ; get flag bits for changeline and non-rem
 32516                                  	mov	[deviceparameters+A_DEVICEPARAMETERS.DP_DEVICEATTRIBUTES],ax
 32517                                  	mov	word [deviceparameters+A_DEVICEPARAMETERS.DP_TRACKTABLEENTRIES],0
 32518                                  	;clc			    ; everything is fine
 32519                                  	; 01/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS SYSINIT compatibility)
 32520                                  	; 12/12/2022
 32521                                  	; cf=0
 32522                                  	;clc
 32523                                  	call	setdeviceparameters
 32524                                  exitpl:
 32525                                  	pop	ds
 32526                                  	retn
 32527                                  put_back:
 32528                                  	inc	word [count]		; one more char to scan
 32529                                  	dec	word [chrptr]		; back up over linefeed
 32530                                  	jmp	short done_line
 32531                                  
 32532                                  %endif
 32533                                  
 32534                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 32535                                  ;
 32536                                  ; procedure : check_switch
 32537                                  ;
 32538                                  ; processes a switch in the input. it ensures that the switch is valid, and
 32539                                  ; gets the number, if any required, following the switch. the switch and the
 32540                                  ; number *must* be separated by a colon. carry is set if there is any kind of
 32541                                  ; error.
 32542                                  ;
 32543                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 32544                                  
 32545                                  check_switch:
 32546 00002D21 E817FA                  	call	getchr
 32547                                  	;jc	short err_check
 32548 00002D24 724E                    	jc	short err_chk
 32549 00002D26 24DF                            and     al,0DFh                 ; convert it to upper case
 32550 00002D28 3C41                    	cmp	al,'A'
 32551                                  	;jb	short err_check
 32552 00002D2A 7248                    	jb	short err_chk ; 15/04/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 32553 00002D2C 3C5A                    	cmp	al,'Z'
 32554 00002D2E 7743                    	ja	short err_check
 32555                                  
 32556 00002D30 06                      	push	es
 32557                                  
 32558 00002D31 0E                      	push	cs
 32559 00002D32 07                      	pop	es
 32560                                  
 32561 00002D33 8A0E[A237]              	mov	cl,[switchlist]		; get number of valid switches
 32562 00002D37 B500                    	mov	ch,0
 32563 00002D39 BF[A337]                	mov	di,1+switchlist		; point to string of valid switches
 32564 00002D3C F2AE                    	repne	scasb
 32565                                  
 32566 00002D3E 07                      	pop	es
 32567 00002D3F 7532                    	jnz	short err_check
 32568                                  
 32569 00002D41 B80100                  	mov	ax,1
 32570 00002D44 D3E0                    	shl	ax,cl			; set bit to indicate switch
 32571 00002D46 8B1E[0F37]              	mov	bx,[switches]		; get switches so far
 32572 00002D4A 09C3                    	or	bx,ax			; save this with other switches
 32573 00002D4C 89C1                    	mov	cx,ax
 32574                                  	; 12/12/2022
 32575 00002D4E A8F8                    	test	al,switchnum ; 0F8h
 32576                                  	;test	ax,switchnum ; 0F8h	; test against switches that require number to follow
 32577 00002D50 741E                    	jz	short done_swtch
 32578                                  
 32579 00002D52 E8E6F9                  	call	getchr
 32580 00002D55 721A                    	jc	short err_swtch
 32581                                  
 32582 00002D57 3C3A                    	cmp	al,':'
 32583 00002D59 7516                    	jne	short err_swtch
 32584                                  
 32585 00002D5B E8DDF9                  	call	getchr
 32586 00002D5E 53                      	push	bx			; preserve switches
 32587                                  	; 02/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS SYSINIT compatibility)
 32588                                  	;mov	byte [cs:sepchr],' '	; allow space separators
 32589                                  	; 12/12/2022
 32590                                  	; ds = cs
 32591 00002D5F C606[2A03]20            	mov	byte [sepchr],' '
 32592 00002D64 E8D803                  	call	getnum
 32593                                  	;mov	byte [cs:sepchr],0
 32594                                  	; 12/12/2022
 32595 00002D67 C606[2A03]00            	mov	byte [sepchr],0
 32596 00002D6C 5B                      	pop	bx			; restore switches
 32597                                  
 32598                                  ; because getnum does not consider carriage-return or line-feed as ok, we do
 32599                                  ; not check for carry set here. if there is an error, it will be detected
 32600                                  ; further on (hopefully).
 32601                                  
 32602 00002D6D E80500                  	call	process_num
 32603                                  
 32604                                  done_swtch:
 32605                                  	;clc
 32606                                  	; 02/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS SYSINIT compatibility)
 32607                                  	; 12/12/2022
 32608                                  	; cf=0
 32609                                  	;clc
 32610 00002D70 C3                      	retn
 32611                                  
 32612                                  err_swtch:
 32613 00002D71 31CB                    	xor	bx,cx			; remove this switch from the records
 32614                                  err_check:
 32615 00002D73 F9                      	stc
 32616                                  err_chk:
 32617 00002D74 C3                      	retn
 32618                                  
 32619                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 32620                                  ;
 32621                                  ; procedure : process_num
 32622                                  ;
 32623                                  ; this routine takes the switch just input, and the number following (if any),
 32624                                  ; and sets the value in the appropriate variable. if the number input is zero
 32625                                  ; then it does nothing - it assumes the default value that is present in the
 32626                                  ; variable at the beginning. zero is ok for form factor and drive, however.
 32627                                  ;
 32628                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 32629                                  
 32630                                  	; 02/11/2022 - Retrodos v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)
 32631                                  	; (SYSINIT:3156h)
 32632                                  process_num:
 32633 00002D75 850E[0F37]              	test	[switches],cx		; if this switch has been done before,
 32634 00002D79 752B                    	jnz	short done_ret		; ignore this one.
 32635                                  	; 12/12/2022
 32636 00002D7B F6C108                  	test	cl,flagdrive ; 8
 32637                                  	;test	cx,flagdrive ; 8
 32638 00002D7E 7404                    	jz	short try_f
 32639 00002D80 A2[0E37]                	mov	byte [drive],al
 32640                                  	; 02/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS SYSINIT compatibility)
 32641                                  	;jmp	short done_ret
 32642                                  	; 12/12/2022
 32643                                  	; cf=0
 32644 00002D83 C3                      	retn	; 13/05/2019

 32705                                  ;
 32706                                  ; procedure : parseline
 32707                                  ;
 32708                                  ; entry point is parseline. al contains the first character in command line.
 32709                                  ;
 32710                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 32711                                  
 32712                                  	; 01/11/2022 - Retrodos v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)
 32713                                  	; (SYSINIT:30ACh)
 32714                                  parseline:
 32715                                  	; 04/01/2023
 32716                                  	; ds = cs ; *
 32717                                  
 32718                                  	;push	ds ; *
 32719                                  
 32720                                  	;push	cs ; *
 32721                                  	;pop	ds ; *
 32722                                  
 32723                                  nextswtch:
 32724 00002DA7 3C0D                    	cmp	al,cr			; carriage return?
 32725 00002DA9 741C                    	je	short done_line
 32726 00002DAB 3C0A                    	cmp	al,lf			; linefeed?
 32727 00002DAD 7421                    	je	short put_back		; put it back and done
 32728                                  
 32729                                  ; anything less or equal to a space is ignored.
 32730                                  
 32731 00002DAF 3C20                    	cmp	al,' '                  ; space?
 32732 00002DB1 760F                    	jbe	short getnext		; skip over space
 32733 00002DB3 3C2F                    	cmp	al,'/'
 32734 00002DB5 7402                    	je	short getparm
 32735 00002DB7 F9                      	stc				; mark error invalid-character-in-input
 32736                                  	;jmp	short exitpl
 32737                                  	; 04/01/2023
 32738                                  swterr:
 32739 00002DB8 C3                      	retn
 32740                                  
 32741                                  getparm:
 32742 00002DB9 E865FF                  	call	check_switch
 32743 00002DBC 891E[0F37]              	mov	[switches],bx		; save switches read so far
 32744 00002DC0 72F6                    	jc	short swterr
 32745                                  getnext:
 32746 00002DC2 E876F9                  	call	getchr
 32747                                  	;jc	short done_line
 32748                                  	;jmp	short nextswtch
 32749                                  	; 04/01/2023
 32750 00002DC5 73E0                    	jnc	short nextswtch
 32751                                  ;swterr:
 32752                                  	;jmp	short exitpl		; exit if error
 32753                                  
 32754                                  done_line:
 32755                                  	; 12/12/2022
 32756 00002DC7 F606[0F37]08            	test	byte [switches],flagdrive ; 8
 32757                                  	;test	word [switches],flagdrive ; 8 ; see if drive specified
 32758 00002DCC 750C                    	jnz	short okay
 32759 00002DCE F9                      	stc				; mark error no-drive-specified
 32760                                  	;jmp	short exitpl
 32761                                  	; 04/01/2023
 32762 00002DCF C3                      	retn
 32763                                  
 32764                                  ;exitpl:
 32765                                  	; 04/01/2023
 32766                                  	; ds = cs
 32767                                  	;;pop	ds ; *
 32768                                  	;retn
 32769                                  
 32770                                  put_back:
 32771 00002DD0 FF06[D203]              	inc	word [count]		; one more char to scan
 32772 00002DD4 FF0E[D603]              	dec	word [chrptr]		; back up over linefeed
 32773 00002DD8 EBED                    	jmp	short done_line
 32774                                  
 32775                                  okay:
 32776 00002DDA A1[0F37]                	mov	ax,[switches]
 32777 00002DDD 83E003                  	and	ax,0003h	    ; get flag bits for changeline and non-rem
 32778 00002DE0 A3[E835]                	mov	[deviceparameters+A_DEVICEPARAMETERS.DP_DEVICEATTRIBUTES],ax
 32779 00002DE3 C706[0C36]0000          	mov	word [deviceparameters+A_DEVICEPARAMETERS.DP_TRACKTABLEENTRIES],0
 32780                                  	;clc			    ; everything is fine
 32781                                  	; 01/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS SYSINIT compatibility)
 32782                                  	; 12/12/2022
 32783                                  	; cf=0
 32784                                  	;clc
 32785                                  	;call	setdeviceparameters
 32786                                  	; 04/01/2023
 32787                                  	;jmp	short setdeviceparameters
 32788

 32794                                  ;
 32795                                  ; procedure : setdeviceparameters
 32796                                  ;
 32797                                  ; setdeviceparameters sets up the recommended bpb in each bds in the
 32798                                  ; system based on the form factor. it is assumed that the bpbs for the
 32799                                  ; various form factors are present in the bpbtable. for hard files,
 32800                                  ; the recommended bpb is the same as the bpb on the drive.
 32801                                  ; no attempt is made to preserve registers since we are going to jump to
 32802                                  ; sysinit straight after this routine.
 32803                                  ;
 32804                                  ;	if we return carry, the DRIVPARM will be aborted, but presently
 32805                                  ;	  we always return no carry
 32806                                  ;
 32807                                  ;	note:  there is a routine by the same name in msdioctl.asm
 32808                                  ;
 32809                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 32810                                  
 32811                                  ; 15/04/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 32812                                  
 32813                                  	; 02/11/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)
 32814                                  setdeviceparameters:
 32815                                  	; 04/01/2023
 32816                                  	; ds = cs
 32817                                  	
 32818 00002DE9 06                      	push	es
 32819                                  
 32820 00002DEA 0E                      	push	cs
 32821 00002DEB 07                      	pop	es
 32822                                  
 32823 00002DEC 31DB                    	xor	bx,bx
 32824 00002DEE 8A1E[E735]              	mov	bl,[deviceparameters+A_DEVICEPARAMETERS.DP_DEVICETYPE]
 32825 00002DF2 80FB00                  	cmp	bl,DEV_5INCH ; 0
 32826 00002DF5 7506                    	jne	short got_80
 32827                                  
 32828 00002DF7 C706[EA35]2800          	mov	word [deviceparameters+A_DEVICEPARAMETERS.DP_CYLINDERS],40
 32829                                  							; 48 tpi=40 cyl
 32830                                  got_80:
 32831 00002DFD D1E3                    	shl	bx,1			; get index into bpb table
 32832 00002DFF 8BB7[8E37]              	mov	si,[bpbtable+bx]	; get address of bpb
 32833                                  
 32834                                  	;mov	di,deviceparameters+7	
 32835                                  	; 02/11/2022
 32836 00002E03 BF[ED35]                	mov	di,deviceparameters+A_DEVICEPARAMETERS.DP_BPB ; es:di -> bpb
 32837 00002E06 B91F00                  	mov	cx,A_BPB.size ; 31
 32838 00002E09 FC                      	cld
 32839                                  	;repe	movsb
 32840                                  	; 02/11/2022
 32841 00002E0A F3A4                    	rep	movsb
 32842                                  
 32843 00002E0C 07                      	pop	es
 32844                                  
 32845                                  	; 12/12/2022
 32846 00002E0D F606[0F37]20            	test	byte [switches],flagseclim ; 20h
 32847                                  	;test	word [switches],flagseclim ; 20h
 32848 00002E12 7406                    	jz	short see_heads
 32849                                  
 32850 00002E14 A1[0C37]                	mov	ax,[slim]
 32851                                  	;mov	[deviceparameters+20],ax
 32852 00002E17 A3[FA35]                	mov	[deviceparameters+A_DEVICEPARAMETERS.DP_BPB+A_BPB.BPB_SECTORSPERTRACK],ax
 32853                                  
 32854                                  see_heads:
 32855                                  	; 12/12/2022
 32856 00002E1A F606[0F37]40            	test	byte [switches],flagheads ; 40h
 32857                                  	;test	word [switches],flagheads ; 40h
 32858 00002E1F 7406                    	jz	short heads_not_altered
 32859                                  
 32860 00002E21 A1[0A37]                	mov	ax,[hlim]
 32861                                  	;mov	[deviceparameters+22],ax	
 32862 00002E24 A3[FC35]                	mov	[deviceparameters+A_DEVICEPARAMETERS.DP_BPB+A_BPB.BPB_HEADS],ax
 32863                                  
 32864                                  heads_not_altered:
 32865                                  
 32866                                  ; set up correct media descriptor byte and sectors/cluster
 32867                                  ;   sectors/cluster is always 2 except for any one sided disk or 1.44M
 32868                                  
 32869                                  	;mov	byte [deviceparameters+9],2
 32870                                  	; 02/11/2022
 32871                                  	;mov	byte [deviceparameters+A_DEVICEPARAMETERS.DP_BPB+A_BPB.BPB_SECTORSPERCLUSTER],2
 32872                                  	; 04/01/2023
 32873 00002E27 B80200                  	mov	ax,2	
 32874 00002E2A A2[EF35]                	mov	[deviceparameters+A_DEVICEPARAMETERS.DP_BPB+A_BPB.BPB_SECTORSPERCLUSTER],al ; 2
 32875                                  
 32876 00002E2D B3F0                    	mov	bl,0F0h			; get default mediabyte
 32877                                  
 32878                                  ;	preload the mediadescriptor from the bpb into bh for convenient access
 32879                                  
 32880                                  	;mov	bh,[deviceparameters+17]
 32881                                  	; 02/11/2022
 32882 00002E2F 8A3E[F735]              	mov	bh,[deviceparameters+A_DEVICEPARAMETERS.DP_BPB+A_BPB.BPB_MEDIADESCRIPTOR]
 32883                                  
 32884                                  	; 04/01/2023
 32885                                  	; ax = 2
 32886 00002E33 3906[FC35]              	cmp	[deviceparameters+A_DEVICEPARAMETERS.DP_BPB+A_BPB.BPB_HEADS],ax ; >2 heads?
 32887                                  	;cmp	word [deviceparameters+A_DEVICEPARAMETERS.DP_BPB+A_BPB.BPB_HEADS],2 ; >2 heads?
 32888 00002E37 773C                    	ja	short got_correct_mediad ; just use default if heads>2
 32889                                  
 32890 00002E39 7524                    	jne	short only_one_head	; one head, do one head stuff
 32891                                  
 32892                                  ;	two head drives will use the mediadescriptor from the bpb
 32893                                  
 32894 00002E3B 88FB                    	mov	bl,bh			; get mediadescriptor from bpb
 32895                                  
 32896                                  ;	two sided drives have two special cases to look for. One is
 32897                                  ;	   a 320K diskette (40 tracks, 8 secs per track). It uses
 32898                                  ;	   a mediaid of 0fch. The other is 1.44M, which uses only
 32899                                  ;	   one sector/cluster.
 32900                                  
 32901                                  ;	any drive with 18secs/trk, 2 heads, 80 tracks, will be assumed
 32902                                  ;	   to be a 1.44M and use only 1 sector per cluster. Any other
 32903                                  ;	   type of 2 headed drive is all set.
 32904                                  
 32905 00002E3D 833E[FA35]12            	cmp	word [deviceparameters+A_DEVICEPARAMETERS.DP_BPB+A_BPB.BPB_SECTORSPERTRACK],18
 32906 00002E42 7509                    	jne	short not_144m
 32907 00002E44 833E[EA35]50            	cmp	word [deviceparameters+A_DEVICEPARAMETERS.DP_CYLINDERS],80
 32908 00002E49 7502                    	jne	short not_144m
 32909                                  
 32910                                  ;	We've got cyl=80, heads=2, secpertrack=18. Set cluster size to 1.
 32911                                  
 32912 00002E4B EB24                    	jmp	short got_one_secperclus_drive
 32913                                  
 32914                                  ;	check for 320K
 32915                                  
 32916                                  not_144m:
 32917 00002E4D 833E[EA35]28            	cmp	word [deviceparameters+A_DEVICEPARAMETERS.DP_CYLINDERS],40
 32918 00002E52 7521                    	jne	short got_correct_mediad
 32919 00002E54 833E[FA35]08            	cmp	word [deviceparameters+A_DEVICEPARAMETERS.DP_BPB+A_BPB.BPB_SECTORSPERTRACK],8
 32920 00002E59 751A                    	jne	short got_correct_mediad
 32921                                  
 32922 00002E5B B3FC                    	mov	bl,0FCh
 32923 00002E5D EB16                    	jmp	short got_correct_mediad
 32924                                  
 32925                                  only_one_head:
 32926                                  
 32927                                  ;	if we don't have a 360K drive, then just go use 0f0h as media descr.
 32928                                  
 32929 00002E5F 803E[E735]00            	cmp	byte [deviceparameters+A_DEVICEPARAMETERS.DP_DEVICETYPE],DEV_5INCH ; 0
 32930 00002E64 740B                    	je	short got_one_secperclus_drive
 32931                                  
 32932                                  ;	single sided 360K drive uses either 0fch or 0feh, depending on
 32933                                  ;	  whether sectorspertrack is 8 or 9. For our purposes, anything
 32934                                  ;	  besides 8 will be considered 0fch
 32935                                  
 32936 00002E66 B3FC                    	mov	bl,0FCh			; single sided 9 sector media id
 32937 00002E68 833E[FA35]08            	cmp	word [deviceparameters+A_DEVICEPARAMETERS.DP_BPB+A_BPB.BPB_SECTORSPERTRACK],8
 32938                                  	; 12/12/2022
 32939 00002E6D 7502                    	jne	short got_one_secperclus_drive ; okay if anything besides 8
 32940                                  
 32941 00002E6F B3FE                    	mov	bl,0FEh			; 160K mediaid
 32942                                  
 32943                                  ;	we've either got a one sided drive, or a 1.44M drive
 32944                                  ;	  either case we'll use 1 sector per cluster instead of 2
 32945                                  
 32946                                  got_one_secperclus_drive:
 32947                                  	; 04/01/2023
 32948                                  	; ax = 2
 32949 00002E71 48                      	dec	ax  ; ax = 1
 32950 00002E72 A2[EF35]                	mov	[deviceparameters+A_DEVICEPARAMETERS.DP_BPB+A_BPB.BPB_SECTORSPERCLUSTER],al ; 1
 32951                                  	;mov	byte [deviceparameters+A_DEVICEPARAMETERS.DP_BPB+A_BPB.BPB_SECTORSPERCLUSTER],1
 32952                                  
 32953                                  got_correct_mediad:
 32954 00002E75 881E[F735]              	mov	[deviceparameters+A_DEVICEPARAMETERS.DP_BPB+A_BPB.BPB_MEDIADESCRIPTOR],bl
 32955                                  
 32956                                  ;	 Calculate the correct number of Total Sectors on medium
 32957                                  
 32958 00002E79 A1[EA35]                	mov	ax,[deviceparameters+A_DEVICEPARAMETERS.DP_CYLINDERS]
 32959 00002E7C F726[FC35]              	mul	word [deviceparameters+A_DEVICEPARAMETERS.DP_BPB+A_BPB.BPB_HEADS]
 32960 00002E80 F726[FA35]              	mul	word [deviceparameters+A_DEVICEPARAMETERS.DP_BPB+A_BPB.BPB_SECTORSPERTRACK]
 32961 00002E84 A3[F535]                	mov	word [deviceparameters+A_DEVICEPARAMETERS.DP_BPB+A_BPB.BPB_TOTALSECTORS],ax
 32962 00002E87 F8                      	clc				; we currently return no errors
 32963                                  
 32964 00002E88 C3                      	retn
 32965                                  
 32966                                  ;	M047 -- end rewritten routine
 32967

 32970                                  ; procedure : organize

 32978                                  	; 04/01/2023

 32988                                  ;

 32990                                  ;endif
 32991                                  	; 02/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS SYSINIT compatibility)
 32992 00002E8F E81B02                  	call	mapcase
 32993                                  
 32994 00002E92 31F6                    	xor	si,si
 32995 00002E94 89F7                    	mov	di,si
 32996 00002E96 31C0                    	xor	ax,ax

 33004                                  org1:
 33005 00002E9B E8B101                  	call	skip_comment
 33006 00002E9E 740D                    	jz	short end_commd_line	; found a comment string and skipped.
 33007 00002EA0 E89601                  	call	get2			; not a comment string. then get a char.
 33008 00002EA3 3C0A                    	cmp	al,lf ; 0Ah
 33009 00002EA5 7406                    	je	short end_commd_line	; starts with a blank line.
 33010 00002EA7 3C20                    	cmp	al,' ' ; 20h
 33011 00002EA9 76F0                    	jbe	short org1		; skip leading control characters
 33012 00002EAB EB0A                    	jmp	short findit
 33013

 33015 00002EAD AA                      	stosb				; store line feed char in buffer for the linecount.
 33016                                  	;mov	byte [cs:com_level],0	; reset the command level.

 33020 00002EB3 EBE6                    	jmp	short org1
 33021                                  
 33022                                  nochar1:
 33023 00002EB5 F9                      	stc
 33024 00002EB6 C3                      	retn
 33025                                  
 33026                                  findit:
 33027 00002EB7 51                      	push	cx
 33028 00002EB8 56                      	push	si
 33029 00002EB9 57                      	push	di
 33030 00002EBA 89F5                    	mov	bp,si
 33031 00002EBC 4D                      	dec	bp
 33032 00002EBD BE[5535]                        mov     si,comtab		; prepare to search command table
 33033 00002EC0 B500                    	mov	ch,0
 33034                                  findcom:
 33035 00002EC2 89EF                    	mov	di,bp
 33036 00002EC4 8A0C                    	mov	cl,[si]
 33037 00002EC6 46                      	inc	si
 33038 00002EC7 E324                    	jcxz	nocom
 33039                                  
 33040                                  	; 02/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS SYSINIT compatibility)
 33041                                  
 33042                                  ;ifdef	MULTI_CONFIG
 33043                                  ;
 33044                                  ;;   Simplify future parsing by collapsing ";" onto "REM", and at the same
 33045                                  ;;   time skip the upcoming delimiter test (since ";" need not be followed by
 33046                                  ;;   anything in particular)
 33047                                  ;
 33048                                  ;       cmp     byte [es:di],CONFIG_SEMICOLON  ; ';'
 33049                                  ;       je	short semicolon
 33050                                  ;loopcom:
 33051                                  ;       mov     al,[es:di]
 33052                                  ;       inc     di
 33053                                  ;       and     al,~20h ; 0DFh		; force upper case
 33054                                  ;       inc     si                      ; compare to byte @es:di
 33055                                  ;       cmp     al,[si-1]
 33056                                  ;       loope   loopcom
 33057                                  ;;else
 33058                                  ;;	repe	cmpsb
 33059                                  ;endif
 33060                                  	; 02/11/2022
 33061 00002EC9 F3A6                    	repe	cmpsb
 33062                                  
 33063 00002ECB 9F                      	lahf
 33064 00002ECC 01CE                            add     si,cx                   ; bump to next position without affecting flags
 33065 00002ECE 9E                      	sahf
 33066 00002ECF AC                              lodsb                           ; get indicator letter
 33067 00002ED0 75F0                    	jnz	short findcom
 33068 00002ED2 26803D0D                        cmp     byte [es:di],cr		; the next char might be cr,lf
 33069 00002ED6 7410                    	je	short gotcom0 		; such as in "rem",cr,lf case.
 33070 00002ED8 26803D0A                	cmp	byte [es:di],lf
 33071 00002EDC 740A                    	je	short gotcom0
 33072                                  
 33073                                  ; 02/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS SYSINIT compatibility)
 33074                                  ;
 33075                                  ;;ifdef	MULTI_CONFIG
 33076                                  ;
 33077                                  ;;   Skip the delimiter test for the BEGIN identifier (it doesn't have one).
 33078                                  ;
 33079                                  ;       cmp     al,CONFIG_BEGIN  ; '['
 33080                                  ;       je	short gotcom0
 33081                                  ;;endif
 33082                                  ;	push	ax
 33083                                  ;       mov     al,[es:di]		; now the next char. should be a delim.
 33084                                  ;
 33085                                  ;;ifdef	MULTI_CONFIG
 33086                                  ;
 33087                                  ;;   If keyword is *immediately* followed by a question mark (?), then
 33088                                  ;;   set the high bit of the ASCII command code (CONFIG_OPTION_QUERY) that is
 33089                                  ;;   stored in the CONFIG.SYS memory image.
 33090                                  ;
 33091                                  ;       cmp     al,'?'                  ; explicit interactive command?
 33092                                  ;       jne	short no_query		; no
 33093                                  ;       pop     ax                      ; yes, so retrieve the original code
 33094                                  ;       or      al,CONFIG_OPTION_QUERY  ; and set the QUERY bit
 33095                                  ;       jmp     short gotcom0           ;

 33098                                  ;       jmp     short gotcom0
 33099                                  ;no_query:
 33100                                  ;;endif  ;MULTI_CONFIG
 33101                                  
 33102                                  	; 02/11/2022
 33103 00002EDE 50                      	push	ax
 33104 00002EDF 268A05                  	mov	al,[es:di]		; now the next char. should be a delim.
 33105                                  
 33106 00002EE2 E8A001                  	call	delim
 33107                                  no_delim:
 33108 00002EE5 58                      	pop	ax
 33109 00002EE6 75DA                    	jnz	short findcom
 33110                                  gotcom0:
 33111 00002EE8 5F                      	pop	di
 33112 00002EE9 5E                      	pop	si
 33113 00002EEA 59                      	pop	cx
 33114 00002EEB EB0F                    	jmp	short gotcom

 33437                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 33438                                  ;
 33439                                  ; procedure : skip_comment
 33440                                  ;
 33441                                  ;skip the commented string until lf, if current es:si-> a comment string.
 33442                                  ;in) es:si-> string
 33443                                  ;	 cx -> length.
 33444                                  ;out) zero flag not set if not found a comment string.
 33445                                  ;	  zero flag set if found a comment string and skipped it. al will contain
 33446                                  ;	  the line feed character at this moment when return.
 33447                                  ;	  ax register destroyed.
 33448                                  ;	  if found, si, cx register adjusted accordingly.
 33449                                  ;
 33450                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 33451                                  
 33452                                  	; 04/01/2023 - Retro DOS v4.0
 33453                                  
 33454                                  skip_comment:
 33455 0000304F E3EE                    	jcxz	noget		; get out of the organize routine.
 33456                                  
 33457                                  	; 04/01/2023
 33458                                  	; ds = cs	
 33459                                  
 33460 00003051 803E[CC03]00            	cmp	byte [com_level],0
 33461                                  	;cmp	byte [cs:com_level],0 ; only check it if parameter level is 0.
 33462 00003056 752C                    	jne	short no_commt	 ; (not inside quotations)
 33463                                  
 33464 00003058 803E[CD03]01            	cmp	byte [cmmt],1
 33465                                  	;cmp	byte [cs:cmmt],1
 33466 0000305D 7225                    	jb	short no_commt
 33467                                  
 33468 0000305F 268A04                  	mov	al,[es:si]
 33469                                  	
 33470 00003062 3806[CE03]              	cmp	[cmmt1],al
 33471                                  	;cmp	[cs:cmmt1],al
 33472 00003066 751C                    	jne	short no_commt
 33473                                  
 33474 00003068 803E[CD03]02            	cmp	byte [cmmt],2
 33475                                  	;cmp	byte [cs:cmmt],2
 33476 0000306D 750A                    	jne	short skip_cmmt
 33477                                  
 33478 0000306F 268A4401                	mov	al,[es:si+1]
 33479                                  	
 33480 00003073 3806[CF03]              	cmp	[cmmt2],al
 33481                                  	;cmp	[cs:cmmt2],al
 33482 00003077 750B                    	jne	short no_commt
 33483                                  skip_cmmt:
 33484 00003079 E3C4                    	jcxz	noget		; get out of organize routine.
 33485 0000307B 268A04                  	mov	al,[es:si]
 33486 0000307E 46                      	inc	si
 33487 0000307F 49                      	dec	cx
 33488 00003080 3C0A                    	cmp	al,lf		; line feed?
 33489 00003082 75F5                    	jne	short skip_cmmt
 33490                                  no_commt:
 33491 00003084 C3                      	retn
 33492                                  
 33493                                  ; 02/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS SYSINIT compatibility)
 33494                                  %if 0
 33495                                  
 33496                                  ;ifdef	MULTI_CONFIG
 33497                                  
 33498                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 33499                                  ;
 33500                                  ;   kbd_read: wait for keystroke
 33501                                  ;
 33502                                  ;   INPUT
 33503                                  ;       DS == CS == sysinitseg
 33504                                  ;
 33505                                  ;   OUTPUT
 33506                                  ;       Carry SET to clean boot, CLEAR otherwise
 33507                                  ;
 33508                                  ;   OTHER REGS USED
 33509                                  ;       All
 33510                                  ;
 33511                                  ;   HISTORY
 33512                                  ;       Created 16-Nov-1992 by JeffPar
 33513                                  ;
 33514                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 33515                                  
 33516                                  kbd_read:
 33517                                          test    byte [bDisableUI],2
 33518                                          jnz     short kbd_nodelay
 33519                                  
 33520                                          push    ds              ; the bios timer tick count is incremented
 33521                                          sub     ax,ax           ; 18.2 times per second;
 33522                                          mov     ds,ax           ; watch the timer tick count for 37 transitions
 33523                                  	;mov	dx,[046Ch]	; get initial value
 33524                                  kbd_loop:
 33525                                          mov     ah,1            ;
 33526                                          int     16h             ; peek the keyboard
 33527                                          jnz	short kbd_loopdone ; something's there, get out
 33528                                          mov     ah,2            ; peek the shift states
 33529                                          int     16h             ;
 33530                                          test    al,03h          ; either right or left shift key bits set?
 33531                                          jnz	short kbd_loopdone ; yes
 33532                                          mov     ax,[046Ch]	;
 33533                                  	;sub	ax,dx           ; get difference
 33534                                  	; 15/04/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 33535                                  	sub	ax,[cs:_timer_lw_] ; MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS - SYSINIT:42E5h        
 33536                                  
 33537                                  	cmp     al,37           ; reached limit?
 33538                                          jb	short kbd_loop	; not yet
 33539                                  kbd_loopdone:
 33540                                          pop     ds              ; delay complete!
 33541                                  kbd_nodelay:
 33542                                          sub     bx,bx           ; assume clean boot
 33543                                          mov     ah,2            ; peek the shift states
 33544                                          int     16h             ;
 33545                                          test    al,03h          ; either right or left shift key bits set?
 33546                                          jz      short kbd_notshift ; no
 33547                                          inc     bx              ; yes
 33548                                          inc     bx
 33549                                  	; MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS - SYSINIT:4301h
 33550                                  	or	byte [bQueryOpt],4
 33551                                  kbd_notshift:                   ;
 33552                                          mov     ah,1            ; peek the keyboard
 33553                                          int     16h             ;
 33554                                          jz	short kbd_test	; no key present
 33555                                          or      al,al           ; is it a function key?
 33556                                          jnz	short kbd_test	; no
 33557                                  
 33558                                  	; MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS - SYSINIT:430Bh
 33559                                          cmp     ah,62h          ; CTRL F5
 33560                                          je	short kbd_cfg_bypass
 33561                                  	
 33562                                          cmp     ah,3Fh          ; F5 function key?
 33563                                          jne	short kbd_notf5	; no
 33564                                  kbd_cfg_bypass:
 33565                                          mov     dx,_$CleanMsg
 33566                                          call    print
 33567                                  	; MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS - SYSINIT:431Bh
 33568                                  	or	byte [bQueryOpt],4           ;
 33569                                          jmp     short kbd_eat   ; yes, clean boot selected
 33570                                  kbd_notf5:
 33571                                  	; MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS - SYSINIT:4322h
 33572                                          cmp     ah,65h          ; CTRL F8
 33573                                          je	short kbd_cfg_confirm
 33574                                  
 33575                                          cmp     ah,42h          ; F8 function key?
 33576                                          jne	short kbd_exit	; no
 33577                                  kbd_cfg_confirm:
 33578                                          mov     dx,_$InterMsg
 33579                                          call    print           ;
 33580                                          mov     bl,1            ; yes, interactive-boot option enabled
 33581                                          mov     [bQueryOpt],bl  ; change default setting
 33582                                  kbd_eat:                        ;
 33583                                          mov     ah,0            ;
 33584                                          int     16h             ; eat the key we assumed was a signal
 33585                                          mov	byte [secElapsed],-1
 33586                                          or      bx,bx           ;
 33587                                          jz	short kbd_clean	;
 33588                                  kbd_test:                       ;
 33589                                          cmp     bl,2            ;
 33590                                          jb	short kbd_exit	;
 33591                                  kbd_clean:                      ;
 33592                                          call    disable_autoexec; yes, tell COMMAND to skip autoexec.bat
 33593                                          stc                     ; set carry to indicate abort
 33594                                          retn			;
 33595                                  kbd_exit:                       ;
 33596                                          clc                     ; clear carry to indicate success
 33597                                          retn			;
 33598                                  
 33599                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 33600                                  ;
 33601                                  ;   set_numlock: set numlock LED
 33602                                  ;
 33603                                  ;   INPUT
 33604                                  ;       ES:SI -> numlock setting (ie, "ON" or "OFF")
 33605                                  ;
 33606                                  ;   OUTPUT
 33607                                  ;       None
 33608                                  ;
 33609                                  ;   OTHER REGS USED
 33610                                  ;       None
 33611                                  ;
 33612                                  ;   HISTORY
 33613                                  ;       Created 16-Nov-1992 by JeffPar
 33614                                  ;
 33615                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 33616                                  
 33617                                  set_numlock:
 33618                                          push    ax
 33619                                          push    ds
 33620                                          sub     ax,ax
 33621                                          mov     ds,ax
 33622                                          mov     ax,[es:si]      ; get 1st 2 bytes of value (ON or OF)
 33623                                          cmp     ax,[cs:OnOff+2]	; should we turn it off?
 33624                                          jne	short not_off	; no
 33625                                          and     byte [0417h],~20h ; 0DFh
 33626                                          jmp     short set_done
 33627                                  not_off:
 33628                                          cmp     ax,[cs:OnOff]	; should we turn it on?
 33629                                          stc
 33630                                          jne	short set_done	; no
 33631                                          or      byte [0417h],20h
 33632                                  set_done:
 33633                                          pop     ds
 33634                                          pop     ax
 33635                                          retn
 33636                                  
 33637                                  ; 16/04/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 33638                                  
 33639                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 33640                                  ;
 33641                                  ;   menu_check:  check for presence of menu (and other) configuration blocks
 33642                                  ;
 33643                                  ;   INPUT
 33644                                  ;       CX == "organized" config.sys memory image length
 33645                                  ;    ES:SI -> "organized" config.sys memory image
 33646                                  ;       DS == CS == sysinitseg
 33647                                  ;
 33648                                  ;   OUTPUT
 33649                                  ;       Same as above;  the idea is that menu_check simply transforms
 33650                                  ;       a block-structured config.sys image into a conventional image,
 33651                                  ;       based on the user's block selection and any other boot-time options
 33652                                  ;       the user may have employed...
 33653                                  ;
 33654                                  ;   OTHER REGS USED
 33655                                  ;       All
 33656                                  ;
 33657                                  ;   NOTES
 33658                                  ;       [count] and [org_count] are set to the new config.sys image length
 33659                                  ;
 33660                                  ;   HISTORY
 33661                                  ;       Created 16-Mar-1992 by JeffPar
 33662                                  ;
 33663                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 33664                                  
 33665                                  menu_check:
 33666                                  
 33667                                  ;   Search for SWITCHES, determine if /N or /F are present;  if so, then
 33668                                  ;   disable clean/interactive boot options
 33669                                  
 33670                                          push    cx              ;
 33671                                          push    si              ;
 33672                                          sub     bx,bx           ; remains ZERO until first block
 33673                                  swchk_loop:                     ;
 33674                                          call    get_char        ; get first char of current line
 33675                                          jc	short swchk_end	; hit eof
 33676                                          cmp     al,CONFIG_BEGIN ;
 33677                                          jne	short swchk_next1 ;
 33678                                          inc     bx              ; remember that we've seen a block
 33679                                          jmp     short swchk_nextline
 33680                                  swchk_next1:                    ;
 33681                                          cmp     al,CONFIG_NUMLOCK
 33682                                          jne	short swchk_next2 ;
 33683                                          or      bx,bx           ; only do NUMLOCK commands that exist
 33684                                          jnz	short swchk_nextline ; before the first block
 33685                                          call    set_numlock     ; REM it out so we don't act on it later, too
 33686                                          mov     byte [es:si-1],CONFIG_REM
 33687                                          jmp     short swchk_nextline
 33688                                  swchk_next2:                    ;
 33689                                          cmp     al,CONFIG_SWITCHES
 33690                                          jne	short swchk_nextline ; this line ain't it
 33691                                  swchk_scan:                     ;
 33692                                          call    get_char        ; look for /N or /F
 33693                                  swchk_scan1:                    ;
 33694                                          cmp     al,LF           ; end of line?
 33695                                          je	short swchk_nextline ; yes
 33696                                          cmp     al,'/'          ; switch-char?
 33697                                          jne	short swchk_scan ; no
 33698                                          call    get_char        ;
 33699                                          and     al,~20h ; 0DFh	; convert to upper case
 33700                                          cmp     al,[swit_n+1]
 33701                                          jne	short swchk_scan2 ; no
 33702                                          or      byte [bDisableUI],1
 33703                                          jmp	short swchk_scan ; continue looking for switches of interest
 33704                                  swchk_scan2:                    ;
 33705                                          cmp     al,[swit_f+1]
 33706                                          jne	short swchk_scan1 ; no
 33707                                          or      byte [bDisableUI],2
 33708                                          jmp     short swchk_scan ; continue looking for switches of interest
 33709                                  swchk_nextline:                 ;
 33710                                          call    skip_opt_line   ;
 33711                                          jmp     short swchk_loop ;
 33712                                  swchk_end:                      ;
 33713                                          pop     si              ;
 33714                                          pop     cx              ;
 33715                                  
 33716                                  ;   Do the keyboard tests for clean/interactive boot now, but only if
 33717                                  ;   the DisableUI flag is still clear
 33718                                  
 33719                                          test    byte [bDisableUI],1
 33720                                          jnz	short menu_search
 33721                                  ;
 33722                                  ;   Wait for 2 seconds first, UNLESS the /F bit was set in bDisableUI, or
 33723                                  ;   there is anything at all in the keyboard buffer
 33724                                  ;
 33725                                          call    kbd_read
 33726                                          jnc	short menu_search
 33727                                          jmp	menu_abort
 33728                                  
 33729                                  ;   Search for MENU block;  it is allowed to be anywhere in config.sys
 33730                                  
 33731                                  menu_search:
 33732                                          sub     bx,bx           ; if no MENU, default to zero for no_selection
 33733                                          mov     di,szMenu	;
 33734                                          call    find_block      ; find the MENU block
 33735                                          jnc	short menu_found ;
 33736                                          mov     byte [szBoot],0
 33737                                          jmp	no_selection ; not found
 33738                                  
 33739                                  ;   Process the requested menu color(s)
 33740                                  
 33741                                  menu_color:
 33742                                          push    cx              ;
 33743                                          push    dx              ;
 33744                                          mov     dx,0007h        ; default color setting
 33745                                          call    get_number	; get first number
 33746                                          and     bl,0Fh		; first # is foreground color (for low nibble)
 33747                                          mov     ch,bl           ; save it in CH
 33748                                          and     dl,0F0h         ;
 33749                                          or      dl,bl           ;
 33750                                          call    delim           ; did we hit a delimiter
 33751                                          jne	short check_color ; no, all done
 33752                                          call    get_number	; get next number
 33753                                          and     bl,0Fh		; second # is background color (for high nibble)
 33754                                          mov     dh,bl           ; save it in DH
 33755                                          and     dl,0Fh		;
 33756                                          mov     cl,4            ;
 33757                                          shl     bl,cl           ;
 33758                                          or      dl,bl           ;
 33759                                  check_color:                    ;
 33760                                          cmp     ch,dh           ; are foreground/background the same?
 33761                                          jne	short set_color	; no
 33762                                          xor     dl,08h          ; yes, so modify the fgnd intensity
 33763                                  set_color:
 33764                                          mov     [bMenuColor],dl ;
 33765                                          pop     dx              ;
 33766                                          pop     cx              ;
 33767                                          jmp	menu_nextitem
 33768                                  
 33769                                  ;   Back to our regularly scheduled program (the COLOR and other goop
 33770                                  ;   above is there simply to alleviate short jump problems)
 33771                                  
 33772                                  menu_found:
 33773                                          mov     byte [bDefBlock],1
 33774                                          mov     word [offDefBlock],0
 33775                                          mov     byte [secTimeOut],-1
 33776                                          and     byte [bQueryOpt],~2 ; 0FDh
 33777                                  
 33778                                          call    skip_opt_line   ; skip to next line
 33779                                          sub     dx,dx           ; initialize total block count (0 => none yet)
 33780                                  
 33781                                  ;   Process the menu block now
 33782                                  
 33783                                  menu_process:
 33784                                          call    get_char        ; get first char of current line
 33785                                          jc	short to_menu_getdefault ; could happen if menu block at end (rare)
 33786                                          and     al,~CONFIG_OPTION_QUERY ; 7Fh
 33787                                          cmp     al,CONFIG_BEGIN ; BEGIN implies END
 33788                                          je	short to_menu_getdefault
 33789                                          cmp     al,CONFIG_SUBMENU
 33790                                          je	short menu_item	; go process sub-menu
 33791                                          cmp     al,CONFIG_MENUITEM
 33792                                          je	short menu_item	; go process menu item
 33793                                          cmp     al,CONFIG_MENUDEFAULT
 33794                                          je	short menu_default ; go process menu default
 33795                                          cmp     al,CONFIG_MENUCOLOR
 33796                                          je	short menu_color ; go process menu color
 33797                                          cmp     al,CONFIG_NUMLOCK
 33798                                          je	short menu_numlock ;
 33799                                          cmp     al,CONFIG_REM   ; allow remarks in menu block
 33800                                          je	short menu_nextitem ;
 33801                                          call    any_delim       ; allow blank lines and such
 33802                                          je	short menu_nextitem ;
 33803                                          stc                     ;
 33804                                          call    print_error     ; non-MENU command!
 33805                                          jmp     short menu_nextitem
 33806                                  menu_numlock:
 33807                                          call    set_numlock
 33808                                          jmp     short menu_nextitem
 33809                                  to_menu_getdefault:
 33810                                          jmp     short menu_getdefault
 33811                                  
 33812                                  ;   Save the offset of the default block name, we'll need it later
 33813                                  
 33814                                  menu_default:
 33815                                          mov     [offDefBlock],si; save address of default block name
 33816                                          cmp     byte [secElapsed],0
 33817                                          jne	short timeout_skip ; secElapsed is only zero for the FIRST menu,
 33818                                          call    skip_token      ; and for subsequent menus IF nothing was typed;
 33819                                          jc	short menu_nextitem ; secElapsed becomes -1 forever as soon as
 33820                                          call    skip_delim      ; something is typed
 33821                                          jc	short menu_nextitem ;
 33822                                          mov     si,bx           ;
 33823                                          call    get_number      ; get number (of seconds for timeout)
 33824                                          cmp     bl,90           ; limit it to a reasonable number
 33825                                          jb	short timeout_ok ; (besides, 99 is the largest # my simple
 33826                                          mov     bl,90           ;  display function can handle)
 33827                                  timeout_ok:                     ;
 33828                                          mov     [secTimeOut],bl ;
 33829                                  timeout_skip:
 33830                                          jmp     short menu_nextitem
 33831                                  
 33832                                  ;   Verify that this is a valid menu item by searching for the named block
 33833                                  
 33834                                  menu_item:
 33835                                          cmp     dl,MAX_MULTI_CONFIG ; have we reached the max # of items yet?
 33836                                          jae	short menu_nextitem ;
 33837                                          mov     di,si           ; DS:DI -> block name to search for
 33838                                          call    srch_block      ;
 33839                                          je	short menu_itemfound ;
 33840                                          stc                     ;
 33841                                          call    print_error     ; print error and pause
 33842                                          jmp     short menu_nextitem ; if not found, ignore this menu item
 33843                                  
 33844                                  ;   srch_block, having succeeded, returns DI -> past the token that it
 33845                                  ;   just matched, which in this case should be a descriptive string; ES:SI
 33846                                  ;   and CX are unmodified
 33847                                  
 33848                                  menu_itemfound:
 33849                                          inc     dx              ; otherwise, increment total block count
 33850                                          mov     bx,dx           ; and use it to index the arrays of offsets
 33851                                          mov	[abBlockType+bx],al
 33852                                          add     bx,bx           ; of recorded block names and descriptions
 33853                                  
 33854                                  ;   There should be a description immediately following the block name on
 33855                                  ;   MENUITEM line; failing that, we'll just use the block name as the
 33856                                  ;   description...
 33857                                  
 33858                                          mov     [aoffBlockName+bx],si
 33859                                          mov     [aoffBlockDesc+bx],si
 33860                                          mov     di,bx           ; skip_delim modifies BX, so stash it in DI
 33861                                          call    skip_token      ;
 33862                                          jc	short menu_nextitem ; hit eol/eof
 33863                                          call    skip_delim      ;
 33864                                          jc	short menu_nextitem ; hit eol/eof
 33865                                          xchg    bx,di           ;
 33866                                          mov     [aoffBlockDesc+bx],di
 33867                                  
 33868                                  menu_nextitem:
 33869                                          call    skip_opt_line   ;
 33870                                          jmp     menu_process    ; go back for more lines
 33871                                  
 33872                                  ;   Display menu items now, after determining which one is default
 33873                                  
 33874                                  menu_getdefault:
 33875                                          or      dl,dl           ; where there any valid blocks at all?
 33876                                          jnz	short menu_valid ; yes
 33877                                          sub     bx,bx           ; no, so force autoselect of 0
 33878                                          jmp     menu_autoselect ; (meaning: process common blocks only)
 33879                                  menu_valid:
 33880                                          sub     bx,bx           ;
 33881                                          mov     [bMaxBlock],dl  ; first, record how many blocks we found
 33882                                          mov     di,[offDefBlock];
 33883                                          or      di,di           ; does a default block exist?
 33884                                          jz	short menu_nodefault ; no
 33885                                          inc     bx              ; yes, walk name table, looking for default
 33886                                  menu_chkdefault:
 33887                                          push    bx              ;
 33888                                          add     bx,bx           ;
 33889                                          mov     si,[aoffBlockName+bx]
 33890                                          mov     cx,128          ; arbitrary maximum length of a name
 33891                                          push    ds              ;
 33892                                          push    es              ;
 33893                                          pop     ds              ;
 33894                                          call    comp_names      ; is this block the same as the default?
 33895                                          pop     ds              ;
 33896                                          pop     bx              ;
 33897                                          je	short menu_setdefault ; yes
 33898                                          inc     bx              ;
 33899                                          cmp     bl,[bMaxBlock]  ; all done searching?
 33900                                          jbe	short menu_chkdefault ; not yet
 33901                                  menu_nodefault:
 33902                                          mov     bl,1            ; if no default, force default to #1
 33903                                  menu_setdefault:
 33904                                          mov     [bDefBlock],bl  ; yes, this will be the initial current block
 33905                                  
 33906                                  ;   If the timeout was explicitly set to 0 (or technically, anything that
 33907                                  ;   failed to resolve to a number, like "NONE" or "EAT POTATOES"), then we're
 33908                                  ;   supposed to skip menu display and run with the specified default block;
 33909                                  ;   however, if the user hit Enter prior to boot, thereby requesting fully
 33910                                  ;   INTERACTIVE boot, then we shall display the menu block anyway (though still
 33911                                  ;   with no timeout)
 33912                                  
 33913                                          cmp     byte [secTimeOut],0 ; is timeout zero? (ie, assume default)
 33914                                          jne	short menu_display ; no
 33915                                          test    byte [bQueryOpt],1 ; yes, but was INTERACTIVE requested?
 33916                                          jnz	short menu_display ; yes, so *don't* assume default after all
 33917                                          jmp     not_topmenu	;
 33918                                  
 33919                                  ;   Reset the mode, so that we know screen is clean and cursor is home
 33920                                  
 33921                                  menu_display:
 33922                                          mov     ah,0Fh          ; get current video mode
 33923                                          int     10h             ;
 33924                                          mov     ah,00h          ; just re-select that mode
 33925                                          int     10h             ;
 33926                                          push    es              ;
 33927                                          mov     ax,40h          ; reach down into the ROM BIOS data area
 33928                                          mov     es,ax           ; and save the current (default) video page
 33929                                          mov     ax,[es:004Eh]   ; start address and page #, in case the
 33930                                          mov     [wCRTStart],ax  ; undocumented QUIET option was enabled
 33931                                          mov     al,[es:0062h]   ;
 33932                                          mov     [bCRTPage],al   ;
 33933                                          mov     ax,[bMenuPage]	; select new page for menu
 33934                                          int     10h             ;
 33935                                          mov     ax,0600h        ; clear entire screen
 33936                                          mov     bh,[bMenuColor] ; using this color
 33937                                          sub     cx,cx           ; upper left row/col
 33938                                          ;mov	dl,[es:CRT_Cols] 
 33939                                          mov	dl,[es:4Ah]
 33940                                  	dec     dl              ;
 33941                                          ;mov	dh,[es:CRT_Rows];
 33942                                          mov	dh,[es:84h]
 33943                                  	or      dh,dh           ; # of rows valid?
 33944                                          jnz	short menu_clear ; hopefully
 33945                                          mov     dh,[bLastRow]   ; no, use a default
 33946                                  menu_clear:
 33947                                          int     10h             ; clear the screen using the req. attribute
 33948                                          pop     es              ;
 33949                                          mov     [bLastRow],dh   ; save DH
 33950                                          mov     dx,_$MenuHeader
 33951                                          call    print           ; cursor now on row 3 (numbered from 0)
 33952                                  
 33953                                          test    byte [bDisableUI],1
 33954                                          jnz     short menu_nostatus
 33955                                          mov     bh,[bMenuPage]  ;
 33956                                          mov     dh,[bLastRow]   ; restore DH
 33957                                          mov     dl,0            ; print the status line on row DH, col 0,
 33958                                          mov     ah,02h          ; now that we can trash the cursor position
 33959                                          int     10h             ;
 33960                                          mov     dx,_$StatusLine
 33961                                          call    print           ;
 33962                                          mov     ah,3            ; get cursor position
 33963                                          int     10h             ;
 33964                                          sub     dl,2            ;
 33965                                          mov     [bLastCol],dl   ; save column where status char will go
 33966                                  
 33967                                  menu_nostatus:
 33968                                          mov     bx,1            ; now prepare to display all the menu items
 33969                                  menu_disploop:
 33970                                          call    print_item	; print item #BL
 33971                                          inc     bx              ; why "inc bx"?  because it's a 1-byte opcode
 33972                                          cmp     bl,[bMaxBlock]  ; all done?
 33973                                          jbe	short menu_disploop ; not yet
 33974                                  
 33975                                  ;   Set cursor position to just below the menu items
 33976                                  
 33977                                          mov     dl,0            ; select column
 33978                                          mov     dh,bl           ;
 33979                                          add     dh,4            ; select row below menu
 33980                                          mov     bh,[bMenuPage]  ;
 33981                                          mov     ah,02h          ; set cursor position beneath the block list
 33982                                          int     10h             ;
 33983                                  
 33984                                          mov     dx,_$MenuPrmpt
 33985                                          call    print           ;
 33986                                          call    select_item     ; make a selection, return # in BX
 33987                                          mov     dx,crlfm	
 33988                                          call    print           ;
 33989                                          push    word [bDisableUI]
 33990                                          or      byte [bDisableUI],1
 33991                                          call    show_status     ; clear the status line now
 33992                                          pop     word [bDisableUI]
 33993                                  
 33994                                  ;   Now begins the "re-organization" process...
 33995
