 35062                                  ;       CX == # bytes remaining from that point
 35063                                  ;    ES:BX -> new token (since ES:SI is already pointing 1 byte past token)
 35064                                  ;
 35065                                  ;   OTHER REGS USED
 35066                                  ;       AX
 35067                                  ;
 35068                                  ;   NOTES
 35069                                  ;       None
 35070                                  ;
 35071                                  ;   HISTORY
 35072                                  ;       Created 16-Mar-1992 by JeffPar
 35073                                  ;
 35074                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 35075                                  
 35076                                  skip_delim:       ; returns carry set if eol/eof
 35077                                          call    get_char        ;
 35078                                          lea     bx,[si-1]       ; also returns BX -> next token
 35079                                          jc	short skip_token_done ;
 35080                                          call    delim           ;
 35081                                          je	short skip_delim ;
 35082                                          jmp	short skip_check_eol  ; 13/05/2019
 35083                                  
 35084                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 35085                                  ;
 35086                                  ;   skip_opt_line: same as skip_line provided AL != LF
 35087                                  ;
 35088                                  ;   INPUT
 35089                                  ;       AL == last character read
 35090                                  ;    ES:SI -> position in config.sys
 35091                                  ;       CX == remaining bytes in config.sys
 35092                                  ;
 35093                                  ;   OUTPUT
 35094                                  ;       CF set if EOF hit
 35095                                  ;       AL == 1st char of new line
 35096                                  ;    ES:SI -> just past 1st char of new line
 35097                                  ;       CX == # bytes remaining from that point
 35098                                  ;
 35099                                  ;   OTHER REGS USED
 35100                                  ;       AX
 35101                                  ;
 35102                                  ;   NOTES
 35103                                  ;       In other words, the purpose here is to skip to the next line,
 35104                                  ;       unless ES:SI is already sitting at the front of the next line (which
 35105                                  ;       it would be if the last character fetched -- AL -- was a linefeed)
 35106                                  ;
 35107                                  ;   HISTORY
 35108                                  ;       Created 16-Mar-1992 by JeffPar
 35109                                  ;
 35110                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 35111                                  
 35112                                  skip_opt_line:
 35113                                          cmp     al,lf ; 0Ah
 35114                                          je	short skip_line_done
 35115                                       
 35116                                  	; fall into skip_line
 35117                                  
 35118                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 35119                                  ;
 35120                                  ;   skip_line: skip to the next line
 35121                                  ;
 35122                                  ;   INPUT
 35123                                  ;    ES:SI -> position in config.sys
 35124                                  ;       CX == remaining bytes in config.sys
 35125                                  ;
 35126                                  ;   OUTPUT
 35127                                  ;       CF set if EOF hit
 35128                                  ;    ES:SI -> just past 1st char of new line
 35129                                  ;       CX == # bytes remaining from that point
 35130                                  ;
 35131                                  ;   OTHER REGS USED
 35132                                  ;       AX
 35133                                  ;
 35134                                  ;   NOTES
 35135                                  ;       None
 35136                                  ;
 35137                                  ;   HISTORY
 35138                                  ;       Created 16-Mar-1992 by JeffPar
 35139                                  ;
 35140                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 35141                                  
 35142                                  skip_line:
 35143                                          call    get_char
 35144                                          jc	short skip_line_done
 35145                                          cmp     al,lf ; 0Ah
 35146                                          jne	short skip_line
 35147                                  skip_line_done:
 35148                                  num_done:	; 18/12/2022
 35149                                          retn
 35150                                  
 35151                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 35152                                  ;
 35153                                  ;   get_number: return binary equivalent of numeric string
 35154                                  ;
 35155                                  ;   INPUT
 35156                                  ;    ES:SI -> position in config.sys
 35157                                  ;       CX == remaining bytes in config.sys
 35158                                  ;
 35159                                  ;   OUTPUT
 35160                                  ;       AL == non-digit encountered
 35161                                  ;       BX == binary #
 35162                                  ;    ES:SI -> just past 1st non-digit
 35163                                  ;       CX == # bytes remaining from that point
 35164                                  ;
 35165                                  ;   OTHER REGS USED
 35166                                  ;       AX
 35167                                  ;
 35168                                  ;   NOTES
 35169                                  ;       None
 35170                                  ;
 35171                                  ;   HISTORY
 35172                                  ;       Created 16-Mar-1992 by JeffPar
 35173                                  ;
 35174                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 35175                                  
 35176                                  ; 13/05/2019
 35177                                  
 35178                                  get_number:
 35179                                          sub     bx,bx           ; BX = result
 35180                                  num_loop:
 35181                                          call    get_char        ;
 35182                                          jc	short num_done	;
 35183                                          cmp     al,'0'          ; convert to value
 35184                                          jb	short num_done	; no more number
 35185                                          cmp     al,'9'          ;
 35186                                          ja	short num_done	;
 35187                                          push    ax              ;
 35188                                          mov     ax,10           ;
 35189                                          push    dx              ;
 35190                                          mul     bx              ;
 35191                                          pop     dx              ;
 35192                                          mov     bx,ax           ;
 35193                                          pop     ax              ;
 35194                                          sub     al,'0'          ;
 35195                                          cbw                     ;
 35196                                          add     bx,ax           ;
 35197                                          jmp	short num_loop	;
 35198                                  
 35199                                  	; 18/12/2022
 35200                                  ;num_done:
 35201                                          ;retn
 35202                                  
 35203                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 35204                                  ;
 35205                                  ;   get_char:  return next character, advance ES:SI, and decrement CX
 35206                                  ;
 35207                                  ;   INPUT
 35208                                  ;    ES:SI -> position in config.sys
 35209                                  ;       CX == remaining bytes in config.sys
 35210                                  ;
 35211                                  ;   OUTPUT
 35212                                  ;       AL == next character
 35213                                  ;    ES:SI -> just past next character
 35214                                  ;       CX == # bytes remaining from that point
 35215                                  ;
 35216                                  ;   OTHER REGS USED
 35217                                  ;       AX
 35218                                  ;
 35219                                  ;   NOTES
 35220                                  ;       None
 35221                                  ;
 35222                                  ;   HISTORY
 35223                                  ;       Created 16-Mar-1992 by JeffPar
 35224                                  ;
 35225                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 35226                                  
 35227                                  get_char:
 35228                                          sub     cx,1            ; use SUB to set carry,zero
 35229                                          jb	short get_fail	; out of data
 35230                                          ;lods	byte ptr es:[si] ;
 35231                                  	es	
 35232                                  	lodsb
 35233                                          mov     ah,al           ;
 35234                                          retn			;
 35235                                  get_fail:                       ; restore CX to zero
 35236                                          mov     cx,0            ; leave carry set, zero not set
 35237                                  nearby_ret:
 35238                                          retn
 35239                                  
 35240                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 35241                                  ;
 35242                                  ;   query_user: ask user whether to execute current config.sys command
 35243                                  ;
 35244                                  ;   INPUT
 35245                                  ;       AL == current command code
 35246                                  ;    ES:SI -> current command line in config.sys
 35247                                  ;    config_cmd == current command code, but with QUERY bit intact
 35248                                  ;                  (00h used to generate "Process AUTOEXEC.BAT" prompt)
 35249                                  ;
 35250                                  ;   OUTPUT
 35251                                  ;       CF set if command should be ignored (it is also REM'ed out)
 35252                                  ;
 35253                                  ;   OTHER REGS USED
 35254                                  ;       BX, CX, DX, DI
 35255                                  ;
 35256                                  ;   NOTES
 35257                                  ;       None
 35258                                  ;
 35259                                  ;   HISTORY
 35260                                  ;       Created 16-Mar-1992 by JeffPar
 35261                                  ;
 35262                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 35263                                  
 35264                                  	; 12/12/2022
 35265                                  query_user:
 35266                                          test    byte [bQueryOpt],4	; answer no to everything?
 35267                                          ;jz	short qu_1		;
 35268                                          ; 12/12/2022
 35269                                  	;jmp	short skip_all		;
 35270                                  	jnz	short skip_all
 35271                                  qu_1:
 35272                                  	test    byte [bQueryOpt],2	; answer yes to everything?
 35273                                          jnz	short nearby_ret	; yes (and return carry clear!)
 35274                                          push    ax                      ;
 35275                                          mov     al,[config_cmd]         ;
 35276                                          test    byte [bQueryOpt],1	; query every command?
 35277                                          jnz	short query_all		; yes
 35278                                          test    al,CONFIG_OPTION_QUERY  ;
 35279                                          ;jnz	short query_all		;
 35280                                          ; 12/12/2022
 35281                                  	;jmp	short do_cmd		;
 35282                                  	jz	short do_cmd ; cf=0
 35283                                  query_all:
 35284                                  
 35285                                  ;   Search for the command code (AL) in "comtab", and then print
 35286                                  ;   out the corresponding keyword, followed by the rest of the actual
 35287                                  ;   line pointed to by ES:SI
 35288                                  
 35289                                          push    si                      ; save pointer to rest of CONFIG.SYS line
 35290                                          mov     dx,_$AutoPrmpt    	;
 35291                                          and     al,~CONFIG_OPTION_QUERY ; 7Fh
 35292                                          jz	short generic_prompt	; config_cmd must have been 0
 35293                                  
 35294                                          mov     dh,al                   ; save config_cmd in DH
 35295                                          sub     bx,bx                   ;
 35296                                          mov     di,comtab		;
 35297                                  find_match:                             ;
 35298                                          mov     bl,[di]                 ; get size of current keyword
 35299                                          or      bl,bl                   ;
 35300                                          jz	short line_print	; end of table
 35301                                          inc     di                      ;
 35302                                          cmp     al,[di+bx]              ; match?
 35303                                          je	short cmd_match		; yes
 35304                                          lea     di,[di+bx+1]            ; otherwise, skip this command code
 35305                                  	; 13/05/2019	
 35306                                          jmp	short find_match	; loop
 35307                                  cmd_match:                              ;
 35308                                          mov     cl,[di-1]               ;
 35309                                          mov     ch,0                    ;
 35310                                          mov     ah,STD_CON_OUTPUT ; 2
 35311                                  cmd_print:                              ;
 35312                                          mov     al,[di]                 ;
 35313                                          inc     di                      ;
 35314                                          mov     dl,al                   ;
 35315                                          int     21h                     ;
 35316                                          loop    cmd_print               ;
 35317                                          mov     dl,'='                  ;
 35318                                          cmp     dh,CONFIG_SET  ; 'V'    ; for SET commands, don't display a '='
 35319                                          jne	short cmd_notset	;
 35320                                          mov     dl,' '                  ;
 35321                                  cmd_notset:
 35322                                          int     21h                     ; '=' looks funny on SET commands
 35323                                  line_print:                             ;
 35324                                  	;lods	byte ptr es:[si]        ;
 35325                                          es
 35326                                  	lodsb
 35327                                  	or      al,al                   ;
 35328                                          jnz	short non_null		;
 35329                                          mov     al,' '                  ;
 35330                                  non_null:                               ;
 35331                                          cmp     al,' '                  ; control code?
 35332                                          jb	short prompt_user	; yes, assume end of line
 35333                                          jne	short non_space		;
 35334                                          cmp     byte [es:si],' '	;
 35335                                          jb	short prompt_user	;
 35336                                  non_space:                              ;
 35337                                          mov     dl,al                   ;
 35338                                          mov     ah,STD_CON_OUTPUT ; 2	;
 35339                                          int     21h                     ;
 35340                                          jmp	short line_print	;
 35341                                  prompt_user:                            ;
 35342                                          mov     dx,_$InterPrmpt		;
 35343                                  
 35344                                  generic_prompt:
 35345                                          call    print                   ;
 35346                                  input_loop:                             ;
 35347                                          mov     ah,0                    ; read a key
 35348                                          int     16h                     ;
 35349                                          or      al,al                   ; is it a function key?
 35350                                          jnz	short not_func		; no
 35351                                          cmp     ah,3Fh                  ; F5 function key?
 35352                                          jne	short input_loop	; no
 35353                                          mov     al,[_$NO]                  ;
 35354                                          or      byte [bQueryOpt],4	; no more queries
 35355                                          jmp     short legal_char        ;
 35356                                  not_func:
 35357                                          and     al,~20h ; 0DFh		; converting to upper case
 35358                                          cmp     al,[_$NO]		; verify character is legal
 35359                                          je	short legal_char	;
 35360                                          cmp     al,[_$YES]		;
 35361                                          je	short legal_char	;
 35362                                          cmp     byte [config_cmd],0	;
 35363                                          je	short input_loop	; don't allow Esc on this query
 35364                                          cmp     al,1Bh                  ; Esc?
 35365                                          jne	short input_loop	;
 35366                                          or      byte [bQueryOpt],2	; no more interactive boot prompts
 35367                                          mov     al,[_$YES]
 35368                                  legal_char:                             ;
 35369                                          call    disp_input              ;
 35370                                          pop     si                      ; restore pointer to rest of CONFIG.SYS line
 35371                                  
 35372                                          cmp     al,[_$NO]		; process line?
 35373                                          je	short skip_cmd		; no
 35374                                  	; 12/12/2022
 35375                                  	clc
 35376                                  do_cmd:
 35377                                  	pop     ax			;
 35378                                  	; 12/12/2022
 35379                                  	; cf=0
 35380                                  	;clc				; just do the command
 35381                                  	retn
 35382                                  
 35383                                  skip_cmd:
 35384                                  	pop     ax			;
 35385                                  skip_all:
 35386                                  	mov     ah,CONFIG_REM ; '0'	; fake out the rest of sysinit's processing
 35387                                  	stc
 35388                                  	retn
 35389                                  
 35390                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 35391                                  ;
 35392                                  ;   print_error: displays multi-config error conditions
 35393                                  ;
 35394                                  ;   INPUT
 35395                                  ;    Carry set to pause, clear to not
 35396                                  ;    ES:SI -> current command line in config.sys
 35397                                  ;
 35398                                  ;   OUTPUT
 35399                                  ;       None
 35400                                  ;
 35401                                  ;   OTHER REGS USED
 35402                                  ;       None
 35403                                  ;
 35404                                  ;   NOTES
 35405                                  ;       None
 35406                                  ;
 35407                                  ;   HISTORY
 35408                                  ;       Created 16-Mar-1992 by JeffPar
 35409                                  ;
 35410                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 35411                                  
 35412                                  print_error:
 35413                                          push    ax
 35414                                          push    bx
 35415                                          push    cx
 35416                                          push    dx
 35417                                          push    ds
 35418                                          push    cs
 35419                                          pop     ds
 35420                                          pushf
 35421                                          call    get_linenum
 35422                                          mov     [linecount],bx
 35423                                          call    error_line
 35424                                          popf
 35425                                          jnc	short pe_ret
 35426                                          mov     dx,_$PauseMsg
 35427                                          call    print
 35428                                          mov     ax,0C07h		; flush input buffer, then wait for key
 35429                                          int     21h			; wait for a key
 35430                                          or      al,al			; extended key?
 35431                                          jnz	short pe_1		; no
 35432                                          mov     ah,07h			; yes
 35433                                          int     21h			; eat it too
 35434                                  pe_1:     
 35435                                  	mov     dx,crlfm
 35436                                          call    print
 35437                                  pe_ret: 
 35438                                  	pop     ds
 35439                                          pop     dx
 35440                                          pop     cx
 35441                                          pop     bx
 35442                                          pop     ax
 35443                                  	retn
 35444                                  
 35445                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 35446                                  
 35447                                  ;   This function is very simple:  it merely prepends a "/D" to the
 35448                                  ;   command-line for the shell;  this (undocumented) switch disables
 35449                                  ;   AUTOEXEC.BAT processing and the date/time prompt that is usually
 35450                                  ;   displayed when there's no AUTOEXEC.BAT.
 35451                                  
 35452                                  disable_autoexec:
 35453                                  	; MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS -  SYSINIT:4BE2h
 35454                                  	; 17/04/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 35455                                  
 35456                                  	test	byte [bQueryOpt],4
 35457                                  	jz	short disable_exit
 35458                                  	test	byte [dae_flag],1
 35459                                  	jnz	short disable_exit
 35460                                  	or	byte [dae_flag],1
 35461                                          ;or	byte [bQueryOpt],2 ; MSDOS 6.0 
 35462                                  	or      word [bQueryOpt],102h	; [bDefBlock] = 1
 35463                                  	mov     dx,'D ' ; 2044h
 35464                                  dae_1:
 35465                                          ;mov	al,[def_swchr]
 35466                                  	mov     al,[command_line-1]     ; get default switchchar
 35467                                          or      al,al                   ; anything there?
 35468                                          jz	short disable_exit	; no, disable_autoexec already called
 35469                                          mov     bl,[command_line]       ;
 35470                                          mov     bh,0                    ; BX == command-line length
 35471                                          mov     cx,bx                   ;
 35472                                          add     bl,3                    ;
 35473                                          cmp     bl,126                  ;
 35474                                          ja	short disable_exit	;
 35475                                          mov     [command_line],bl       ; update length
 35476                                          add     bx,command_line+1	; make sure we move the NULL too
 35477                                          inc     cx                      ; (just for consistency sake)
 35478                                  disable_loop:                           ;
 35479                                          mov     ah,[bx-3]               ;
 35480                                          mov     [bx],ah                 ;
 35481                                          dec     bx                      ;
 35482                                          loop    disable_loop            ;
 35483                                          mov     [bx-2],al               ;
 35484                                  	;mov	word [bx-1],'D ' ; 2044h ; /D is stuffed into place now
 35485                                  	mov	[bx-1],dx  ; MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS - SYSINIT:4C29h		
 35486                                          ;mov	byte [command_line-1],0 ;
 35487                                  disable_exit:                           ;
 35488                                          retn
 35489                                  
 35490                                  CheckQueryOpt:	; MSDOS 6.21 IO.YSYS - SYSINIT:4C2Dh
 35491                                  	cmp     byte [bQueryOpt],1
 35492                                  	jnz     short disable_exit
 35493                                  	test	byte [dae_flag],2
 35494                                  	jnz     short disable_exit
 35495                                  	or      byte [dae_flag],2
 35496                                  	mov     dx,' Y'
 35497                                  	jmp     short dae_1
 35498                                  
 35499                                  ;endif  ;MULTI_CONFIG
 35500                                  
 35501                                  %endif	; 02/11/2022
 35502                                  
 35503                                  
 35504                                  ; 19/04/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 35505

 35507                                  ;
 35508                                  ; procedure : delim
 35509                                  ;
 35510                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 35511                                  
 35512                                  ;	; 02/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS SYSINIT compatibility)
 35513                                  ;
 35514                                  ;;ifdef	MULTI_CONFIG
 35515                                  ;
 35516                                  ;any_delim:
 35517                                  ;       cmp     al,cr
 35518                                  ;       je	short delim_ret
 35519                                  ;       cmp     al,lf
 35520                                  ;       je	short delim_ret
 35521                                  ;       cmp     al,'['
 35522                                  ;       je	short delim_ret
 35523                                  ;       cmp     al,']'
 35524                                  ;       je	short delim_ret
 35525                                  ;
 35526                                  ;;endif  ;MULTI_CONFIG
 35527                                  
 35528                                  	; 02/11/2022 - Retrodos v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)
 35529                                  	; (SYSINIT:3450h)	
 35530                                  delim:
 35531 00003085 3C2F                    	cmp	al,'/'		; ibm will assume "/" as an delimeter.
 35532 00003087 7416                    	je	short delim_ret
 35533                                  
 35534 00003089 3C00                    	cmp	al,0		; special case for sysinit!!!
 35535 0000308B 7412                    	je	short delim_ret
 35536                                  
 35537                                  org_delim:			; used by organize routine except for getting
 35538 0000308D 3C20                    	cmp	al,' '          ; the filename.
 35539 0000308F 740E                    	je	short delim_ret
 35540 00003091 3C09                            cmp     al,tab ; 9
 35541 00003093 740A                    	je	short delim_ret
 35542 00003095 3C3D                    	cmp	al,'='
 35543 00003097 7406                    	je	short delim_ret
 35544 00003099 3C2C                    	cmp	al,','
 35545 0000309B 7402                    	je	short delim_ret
 35546 0000309D 3C3B                    	cmp	al,';'
 35547                                  
 35548                                  	; 02/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS SYSINIT compatibility)
 35549                                  ;;ifdef	MULTI_CONFIG
 35550                                  ;;   Make sure there's no chance of a false EOF indication
 35551                                  ;	clc
 35552                                  ;;endif
 35553                                  
 35554                                  	; 02/11/2022
 35555                                  delim_ret:
 35556 0000309F C3                      	retn
 35557

 35562                                  ;  newline returns with first character of next line

 35567 000030A0 E898F6                  	call	getchr			;skip non-control characters

 35570 000030A7 75F7                    	jne	short newline
 35571 000030A9 E88FF6                  	call	getchr
 35572                                  nl_ret:
 35573 000030AC C3                      	retn

 35577                                  ; procedure : mapcase
 35578                                  ;
 35579                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 35580                                  
 35581                                  	; 02/11/2022 - Retro DOS 4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)
 35582                                  mapcase:
 35583 000030AD 51                      	push	cx
 35584 000030AE 56                      	push	si
 35585 000030AF 1E                      	push	ds
 35586                                  
 35587 000030B0 06                      	push	es
 35588 000030B1 1F                      	pop	ds
 35589                                  
 35590                                  	; 02/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS SYSINIT compatibility)
 35591                                  ;;ifdef	MULTI_CONFIG
 35592                                  ;
 35593                                  ;	mov	bl,al                   ; same cmd code this line
 35594                                  ;;else
 35595                                  ;;	xor	si,si
 35596                                  ;;endif
 35597                                  	; 02/11/2022
 35598 000030B2 31F6                    	xor	si, si
 35599                                  
 35600                                  convloop:
 35601 000030B4 AC                      	lodsb
 35602 000030B5 3C61                    	cmp	al,'a'
 35603 000030B7 7209                    	jb	short noconv
 35604 000030B9 3C7A                    	cmp	al,'z'
 35605 000030BB 7705                    	ja	short noconv
 35606 000030BD 2C20                    	sub	al,20h
 35607 000030BF 8844FF                  	mov	[si-1],al
 35608                                  noconv:
 35609                                  
 35610                                  	; 02/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS SYSINIT compatibility)
 35611                                  ;;ifdef	MULTI_CONFIG
 35612                                  ;;
 35613                                  ;;   When MULTI_CONFIG enabled, "mapcase" is used to map everything to
 35614                                  ;;   upper-case a line at a time, after we've been able to figure out whether
 35615                                  ;;   the line is a SET command or not (since we don't want to upper-case
 35616                                  ;;   anything after the "=" in a SET)
 35617                                  ;;
 35618                                  ;       cmp     bl,CONFIG_SET  ; 'V'	; preserve case for part of the line?
 35619                                  ;       jne	short check_eol		; no, just check for end-of-line
 35620                                  ;       cmp     al,'='                  ; separator between SET var and value?
 35621                                  ;       je	short convdone		; yes
 35622                                  ;check_eol:
 35623                                  ;       cmp     al,cr
 35624                                  ;       je	short convdone
 35625                                  ;       cmp     al,lf
 35626                                  ;       je	short convdone
 35627                                  ;;endif
 35628                                  	
 35629                                  	; 02/11/2022
 35630 000030C2 E2F0                    	loop	convloop
 35631                                  convdone:
 35632 000030C4 1F                      	pop	ds
 35633 000030C5 5E                      	pop	si
 35634 000030C6 59                      	pop	cx
 35635 000030C7 C3                      	retn
 35636                                  
 35637                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 35638                                  ;
 35639                                  ; procedure : round
 35640                                  ;
 35641                                  ; round the values in memlo and memhi to paragraph boundary.
 35642                                  ; perform bounds check.
 35643                                  ;
 35644                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 35645                                  
 35646                                  round:
 35647 000030C8 50                      	push	ax
 35648 000030C9 2EA1[DE03]              	mov	ax,[cs:memlo]
 35649                                  
 35650 000030CD E8F1DF                  	call	ParaRound		; para round up
 35651                                  
 35652 000030D0 2E0106[E003]            	add	[cs:memhi],ax
 35653 000030D5 2EC706[DE03]0000        	mov	word [cs:memlo],0
 35654 000030DC 2EA1[E003]              	mov	ax,[cs:memhi]		; ax = new memhi
 35655 000030E0 2E3B06[A302]            	cmp	ax,[cs:ALLOCLIM]	; if new memhi >= alloclim, error
 35656 000030E5 7322                    	jae	short mem_err
 35657 000030E7 2EF606[3614]02          	test	byte [cs:setdevmarkflag],for_devmark ; 2
 35658 000030ED 7418                    	jz	short skip_set_devmarksize
 35659 000030EF 06                      	push	es
 35660 000030F0 56                      	push	si
 35661 000030F1 2E8B36[3414]            	mov	si,[cs:devmark_addr]
 35662 000030F6 8EC6                    	mov	es,si
 35663 000030F8 29F0                    	sub	ax,si
 35664 000030FA 48                      	dec	ax
 35665                                  	;mov	[es:3],ax
 35666 000030FB 26A30300                	mov	[es:devmark.size],ax	; paragraph
 35667 000030FF 2E8026[3614]FD          	and	byte [cs:setdevmarkflag],not_for_devmark ; 0FDh
 35668 00003105 5E                      	pop	si
 35669 00003106 07                      	pop	es
 35670                                  skip_set_devmarksize:
 35671 00003107 58                      	pop	ax
 35672                                  	; 11/12/2022
 35673                                  	; cf = 0
 35674                                  	; 02/11/2022
 35675                                  	;clc	; ? (not needed here)	; clear carry
 35676 00003108 C3                      	retn
 35677                                  
 35678                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 35679

 35685 0000310B BA[A938]                	mov	dx,badmem

 35688 0000310E E87602                  	call	print

 35717                                  todigit:

 35720                                  	; 12/12/2022
 35721 00003139 7203                    	jb	short notdig2
 35722                                  	;cmp	al,9
 35723                                  	;ja	short notdig
 35724                                  	;clc
 35725                                  	;retn
 35726                                  	; 12/12/2022

 35734                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 35735                                  ;
 35736                                  ; procedure : getnum
 35737                                  ;
 35738                                  ; getnum parses a decimal number.
 35739                                  ; returns it in ax, sets zero flag if ax = 0 (may be considered an
 35740                                  ; error), if number is bad carry is set, zero is set, ax=0.
 35741                                  ;
 35742                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 35743                                  
 35744                                  getnum:
 35745 0000313F 53                      	push	bx
 35746 00003140 31DB                    	xor	bx,bx			; running count is zero
 35747                                  b2:
 35748 00003142 E8F2FF                  	call	todigit 		; do we have a digit ?
 35749 00003145 7247                    	jc	short badnum		; no, bomb
 35750                                  
 35751 00003147 93                      	xchg	ax,bx			; put total in ax
 35752 00003148 53                      	push	bx			; save digit (0 to 9)
 35753                                  	;mov	bx,10			; base of arithmetic
 35754                                  	; 12/12/2022
 35755 00003149 B30A                    	mov	bl,10
 35756 0000314B F7E3                    	mul	bx			; shift by one decimal digit
 35757 0000314D 5B                      	pop	bx			; get back digit (0 to 9)
 35758 0000314E 00D8                    	add	al,bl			; get total
 35759 00003150 80D400                  	adc	ah,0			; make that 16 bits
 35760 00003153 7239                    	jc	short badnum		; too big a number
 35761                                  
 35762 00003155 93                      	xchg	ax,bx			; stash total
 35763                                  
 35764 00003156 E8E2F5                  	call	getchr			;get next digit
 35765 00003159 722D                    	jc	short b1		; no more characters
 35766 0000315B 3C20                    	cmp	al,' ' 			; space?
 35767 0000315D 741F                    	je	short b15		; then end of digits
 35768 0000315F 3C2C                    	cmp	al,',' 			; ',' is a seperator!!!
 35769 00003161 741B                    	je	short b15		; then end of digits.
 35770 00003163 3C09                    	cmp	al, tab ; 9		; tab
 35771 00003165 7417                    	je	short b15
 35772 00003167 2E3A06[2A03]            	cmp	al,[cs:sepchr]		; allow 0 or special separators
 35773 0000316C 7410                    	je	short b15
 35774 0000316E 3C2F                    	cmp	al,'/'			; see if another switch follows
 35775                                  	;nop				; cas - remnant of old bad code
 35776                                  	;nop
 35777                                  	; 12/12/2022
 35778                                  	; 02/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS SYSINIT compatibility)
 35779                                  	;nop
 35780                                  	;nop
 35781 00003170 740C                    	je	short b15
 35782 00003172 3C0A                    	cmp	al,lf			; line-feed?
 35783 00003174 7408                    	je	short b15
 35784 00003176 3C0D                    	cmp	al,cr			; carriage return?
 35785 00003178 7404                    	je	short b15
 35786 0000317A 08C0                    	or	al,al			; end of line separator?
 35787 0000317C 75C4                    	jnz	short b2		; no, try as a valid char...
 35788                                  b15:
 35789 0000317E 2EFF06[D203]            	inc	word [cs:count]		; one more character to s...
 35790 00003183 2EFF0E[D603]            	dec	word [cs:chrptr]	; back up over separator
 35791                                  b1:
 35792 00003188 89D8                    	mov	ax,bx			; get proper count
 35793 0000318A 09C0                    	or	ax,ax			; clears carry, sets zero accordingly
 35794 0000318C 5B                      	pop	bx
 35795 0000318D C3                      	retn
 35796                                  badnum:
 35797                                  	; 02/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS SYSINIT compatibility)
 35798                                  	;mov	byte [cs:sepchr],0
 35799 0000318E 31C0                    	xor	ax,ax			; set zero flag, and ax = 0
 35800                                  	; 12 /12/2022
 35801 00003190 2EA2[2A03]              	mov	[cs:sepchr],al ; 0
 35802 00003194 5B                      	pop	bx
 35803 00003195 F9                      	stc				; and carry set
 35804 00003196 C3                      	retn
 35805                                  
 35806                                  ;****************************************************************************
 35807                                  
 35808                                  setdoscountryinfo:
 35809                                  
 35810                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 35811                                  ;input: es:di -> pointer to dos_country_cdpg_info
 35812                                  ;	ds:0  -> buffer.
 35813                                  ;	si = 0
 35814                                  ;	ax = country id
 35815                                  ;	dx = code page id. (if 0, then use ccsyscodepage as a default.)
 35816                                  ;	bx = file handle
 35817                                  ;	this routine can handle maximum 438 country_data entries.
 35818                                  ;
 35819                                  ;output: dos_country_cdpg_info set.
 35820                                  ;	 carry set if any file read failure or wrong information in the file.
 35821                                  ;	 carry set and cx = -1 if cannot find the matching country_id, 
 35822                                  ;	 codepage_id in the file.
 35823                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 35824                                  
 35825 00003197 57                      	push	di
 35826 00003198 50                      	push	ax
 35827 00003199 52                      	push	dx
 35828                                  
 35829 0000319A 31C9                    	xor	cx,cx
 35830 0000319C 31D2                    	xor	dx,dx
 35831 0000319E B80002                  	mov	ax,512			;read 512 bytes
 35832 000031A1 E84F01                  	call	readincontrolbuffer	;read the file header
 35833 000031A4 724D                    	jc	short setdosdata_fail
 35834                                  
 35835 000031A6 06                      	push	es
 35836 000031A7 56                      	push	si
 35837                                  
 35838 000031A8 0E                      	push	cs
 35839 000031A9 07                      	pop	es
 35840                                  
 35841 000031AA BF[CB34]                	mov	di,country_file_signature ; db 0FFh,'COUNTRY'
 35842 000031AD B90800                  	mov	cx,8			;length of the signature
 35843 000031B0 F3A6                    	repz	cmpsb
 35844                                  
 35845 000031B2 5E                      	pop	si
 35846 000031B3 07                      	pop	es
 35847 000031B4 753D                    	jnz	short setdosdata_fail 	;signature mismatch
 35848                                  
 35849 000031B6 83C612                  	add	si,18			;si -> county info type
 35850 000031B9 803C01                  	cmp	byte [si],1		;only accept type 1 (currently only 1 header type)
 35851 000031BC 7535                    	jne	short setdosdata_fail 	;cannot proceed. error return
 35852                                  
 35853 000031BE 46                      	inc	si			;si -> file offset
 35854 000031BF 8B14                    	mov	dx,[si]			;get the info file offset.
 35855 000031C1 8B4C02                  	mov	cx,[si+2]
 35856 000031C4 B80018                  	mov	ax,6144			;read 6144 bytes.
 35857 000031C7 E82901                  	call	readincontrolbuffer	;read info
 35858 000031CA 7227                    	jc	short setdosdata_fail
 35859                                  
 35860 000031CC 8B0C                    	mov	cx,[si]			;get the # of country, codepage combination entries
 35861 000031CE 81F9B601                	cmp	cx, 438			;cannot handle more than 438 entries.
 35862 000031D2 771F                    	ja	short setdosdata_fail
 35863                                  
 35864 000031D4 46                      	inc	si
 35865 000031D5 46                      	inc	si			;si -> entry information packet
 35866 000031D6 5A                      	pop	dx			;restore code page id
 35867 000031D7 58                      	pop	ax			;restore country id
 35868 000031D8 5F                      	pop	di
 35869                                  
 35870                                  setdoscntry_find:			;search for desired country_id,codepage_id.
 35871 000031D9 3B4402                  	cmp	ax,[si+2]		;compare country_id
 35872 000031DC 750A                    	jne	short setdoscntry_next
 35873                                  
 35874 000031DE 83FA00                  	cmp	dx,0			;no user specified code page ?
 35875 000031E1 7415                    	je	short setdoscntry_any_codepage ;then no need to match code page id.
 35876 000031E3 3B5404                  	cmp	dx,[si+4]		;compare code page id
 35877 000031E6 7413                    	je	short setdoscntry_got_it
 35878                                  
 35879                                  setdoscntry_next:
 35880 000031E8 0334                    	add	si,[si]			;next entry
 35881 000031EA 46                      	inc	si

 36090                                  readincontrolbuffer:
 36091                                  
 36092                                  ;move file pointer to cx:dx
 36093                                  ;read ax bytes into the control buffer. (should be less than 2 kb)
 36094                                  ;si will be set to 0 hence ds:si points to the control buffer.
 36095                                  ;entry:  cx,dx offset from the start of the file where the read/write pointer
 36096                                  ;	 be moved.
 36097                                  ;	 ax - # of bytes to read
 36098                                  ;	 bx - file handle
 36099                                  ;	 ds - buffer seg.
 36100                                  ;return: the control data information is read into ds:0 - ds:0200.
 36101                                  ;	 cx,dx value destroyed.
 36102                                  ;	 carry set if error in reading file.
 36103                                  
 36104 000032F3 50                      	push	ax			;# of bytes to read
 36105 000032F4 B80042                  	mov	ax,4200h
 36106 000032F7 F9                      	stc
 36107 000032F8 CD21                    	int	21h			;move pointer
 36108 000032FA 59                      	pop	cx			;# of bytes to read
 36109 000032FB 7209                    	jc	short ricb_exit
 36110                                  
 36111 000032FD 31D2                    	xor	dx,dx			;ds:dx -> control buffer
 36112 000032FF 31F6                    	xor	si,si
 36113 00003301 B43F                    	mov	ah,3Fh			;read into the buffer
 36114 00003303 F9                      	stc
 36115 00003304 CD21                    	int	21h			;should be less than 1024 bytes.
 36116                                  ricb_exit:
 36117 00003306 C3                      	retn

 36121                                  set_country_path:
 36122                                  
 36123                                  ;in:  ds - sysinitseg, es - confbot, si -> start of the asciiz path string
 36124                                  ;     dosinfo_ext, cntry_drv, cntry_root, cntry_path
 36125                                  ;     assumes current directory is the root directory.

 36785 0000395E 00<rep 2h>              		times (16-number3mod) db 0
 36786                                  %endif
